column3: Buskers give a home to a maid abandoned by a married seducer.

Keiko, the daughter of a legendary sushi chef, runs away from home when his Karate-style regimen becomes too severe. Finding work at a rural hot springs inn, she is ridiculed by the eccentric staff and guests.

When John takes his friends to his deceased uncle's remote ranch to hunt wild pigs, it seems like a typical guys weekend. But as John and his crew trek deeper into the forest, they begin tracking the awful truth about his uncle's demise.
A squad of four undercover cops are charged with cleaning up the streets of Seville from drugs and prostitution.

Shot at Greystone Mansion in Beverly Hills, Greystone explores how an LA oil heir and his assistant might actually have died by restaging the historic killings using nothing but dialog from 32 feature films also shot at the estate.
A war veteran is forced into a life of crime and must survive not only the war on the streets but within himself.
A kindly English botanist and a gruff American scientist lead an expedition to the Himalayas in search of the legendary Yeti.

A gang of thieves plans to make their fortune by stealing a shipment of contraceptive pills from Finisham maternity hospital. They assume disguises and infiltrate the hospital, but everything doesn't go according to plan.
Set during the Second World War, a young wife on the homefront copes with the legacy of her presumed dead bomber-pilot husband, and the secrets she kept from him.
In a traditional upper class town 4 members of a very modern family will have to face their desires trying to reach the perfect love, the ultimate paradise.
The German war machine is in retreat. Two American M 18 tank destroyers are sent to root out a die hard group of Nazis holed up in the Harz Mountains.
A newspaper reporter is lured into a mire of pagan rituals and human sacrifice.

A government experiment goes totally wrong as a creature confined in a hidden lab inside and abandoned house escapes. Afterwards, some teens show up to have a little fun in the house, not knowing that the beast is loose and watching them.
A group of aspiring filmmakers must overcome a series of obstacles and conflicts as they strive to complete their cinematic masterpiece.

A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music, ranging from the abstract to depictions of mythology and fantasy, and settings including the prehistoric, supernatural and sacred.
Neutron, a wrestler/superhero, investigates a series of murders at a sanitarium.
With a string of murders plaguing a small town, Det. Kelly Lang's faith is put to the ultimate test as she tries to find the killer.
Ram's visit to his nephew Eswar's place takes a shocking turn when he finds the dead body of Eswar while Eswar finds Ram's dead body. Who is alive and who is dead?
Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

Two parallel stories about characters trapped in illogical endless spaces: two brothers and a detective locked on an infinite staircase, and a family locked on an infinite road - for a very long time.

A new drug grants its users the ability to place their consciousness into the bodies of other people. Soon, a serial killer begins to use the drug as a way to live and die as other people by forcing his victims to kill themselves.

A San Francisco cab driver finds himself in possession of a monkey that is carrying a formula for turning atomic waste into a plutonium bomb. He finds himself framed for a murder and chased all over town by people trying to get the formula.
A taxi driver's normal shift turns into a chaotic adventure.
Two Best Friends Trying to Escape a World of Danger.

A lonely hotel by a lonely road. Sarah is lost, looking for somewhere to sleep. She's come to the wrong place. A lonely hotel by a lonely road. Sarah is lost, Jenny is looking for her. She's come to the right place. The Bridgeburn Hotel.
During World War II, a junior American Army officer, Lt. Peter Stirling, gets sent to the psychiatric ward whenever he insists that an Army mule named Francis speaks to him.

column2: Olsenbanden jr. og det sorte gullet
column3: In the beginning of the sixties, Egon persuades his friends to buy oil stocks, and has to battle crooks who try to give fake information about the oil tests in in North Sea.
Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

A news team investigating rumors of aswang killings in a remote barrio are attacked by a group of soldiers, forcing them to run for their lives deep in the forest, where more mystery and danger lie in wait.

Deadly government assassin Sebastian Dellacourt botches a job and ends up in prison. His only way out is to do one final job and infiltrate a dangerous militia led by delusional Arno Taylor, who wants to overthrow the US government.
A unique and enigmatic look at the interconnection of Montreal's people and their sub-subcultures.
A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.
Five friends plot to murder an upstairs neighbor simply to avoid an awkward conversation.
A young dolphin with an active imagination saves Fish Town from evil Moray Eels and reunites with his father after discovering a magic arch that makes wishes come true.

Tells the story of a boy and his great love for horses, especially a beautiful white stallion, to which he is strongly attached. When he hears that the horse is to be slaughtered, he flees with it, and it becomes an escapee.

A night Ragnhild can't sleep due to a storm, she discovers a horse in distress. The horse runs away, and the days after she is told that the horse is not real, but an old saying. But Ragnhild knows what she have seen.
A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

Four tweens develop a life-long friendship when they discover an injured mystical sea creature. They bravely go to extreme lengths to protect her from selfish scoundrels set on capturing her and even harming her for their own profit.
The story about the Armenian Genocide based on the account of survivor Aurora Mardiganian.
Pepe is a 12-year-old boy who lives with his grandmother, a witch-businesswoman. After discovering that he is adopted and that his parents are alive, he decides to go out in search of them.
A squadron of outer space bimbos decide to take revenge on the male chauvinists of Earth.

Steve Lindsay, a civilian scout attached to the U.S. Cavalry, and his friend, Tex Harding, are assigned to investigate the murder of an Army lieutenant in connection with cattle rustling in...                See full synopsis »

A slice-of-life drama set in the Texas Hill Country centered around a struggling family who's dynamics are challenged and a unique friendship is born when a small-town Texas handyman becomes caregiver to their son with cerebral palsy.
Death has no borders.
Sirf Ek is a 2 hour Crime Drama on the prevailing issue of sexting among teenagers and related crimes

Ram is a govt official who tries to brings justice to an oppressed village. He almost succeed in his mission but is murdered by Vijay singh. His dream of justice is filled by his most loyal dog, MOTI.
When his family is torn apart, Arjun sets out to on a journey to solve the mystery and seek revenge.
A mans voyeurism lands him in the middle of a murder case.
Inspired by one of the most important, controversial Iranian novels of the twentieth century: The Blind Owl. Plot Line Kept Under Wraps.
Would-be drug dealers are caught between the police and the Mafia.
An American spy on assignment in Romania infiltrates a small unit of German SS soldiers. They encounter a mysterious enemy while fighting partisans in The Carpathian Mountains... vampires.
James Ellison ("The Gang's All Here") stars as a man who saves a German shepherd from the city pound, only to have the dog implicate him in a murder. Featuring Ace the Wonder Dog.
Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

Police officer Yukimura Sayo and her younger sister Miwa visit a ryokan located deep in the mountains. They don't know that this traditional inn famous for a nearby hot spring with healing qualities is a den for vampires.

column2: The Mysterious Death of Lord Harrington
column3: Eight people on an island estate for the will reading of Lord Harrington, who was killed by a mysterious wolf like creature. Must band together in order to survive until morning.
A classic Hollywood tale, plot under wraps.
The damaged relationship of a couple heals again when they accidentally learn about the famous Iranian poet Maulana.

An odd set of circumstances sets off an American journalist on a retrograde pursuit to uncover an international conspiracy and salvage herself from a spectacular hoax in the high tech by-lanes of India.

Rather unusual and unexpected wedding anniversary gifts, such as a pair of women's panties with the name "Teresa" on them get a husband in hot water with his wife, and need some explaining during this 93 minute Musical-Comedy.
A poor young man's girlfriend leaves him for a gangster.
A wounded soldier awakens in a strange cube that tests his physical and mental limits as he attempts to find a way to escape against a ticking clock.

Tora-san spends several days at the home of a hard-working salary man, who abruptly disappears. When the man's wife asks Tora-san to help find him, he falls in love with her, and secretly hopes the husband will not be found.

For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.
5 Musketters are friends since their childhood. When Refik resists to proceed the big robbery they had planned, his friends are ready to protect him. This is a story for what friendship is about.
A shy and humble young man overcomes his fears and becomes a racing champion.
The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliott, who happens to be a dragon.
a giant alien come to earth from the fictional planet of DHANDOK. Why the alien comes to earth, lands in Rajasthan and what happens next forms the crux of the tale.
In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragón under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.
THE IMPOSIBLE MISSION. The quest to become mightier and greater in the Christian circle motivated a lot of pastors to join the Dark circle confraternity.
Four friends from Punjab embark on a journey to make a mark in the world of pop music and form a band. While they face opposition from their parents, they continue to pursue their passions.
Forced for some time to be a fighting slave, a pagan warrior escapes his captors with a boy and joins a group of Crusaders on their quest to the Holy Land.
Two ghosts walk along the Camino of Santiago.
A thriller about a father who is an ex-CIA is on the run while trying to clear his name and to reunite with his deaf daughter.
It's spring break at Dread Gorge Lake and nanobots have been loosed on the unsuspecting revelers. Its up to a group of unlikely heroes to devise a plan and destroy the NANOSHARKS.
A rogue scientist's fear of death leads him down a dangerous and destructive path as he risks everything in his search for immortality through time travel.

column2: The Case of the Cold Fish
column3: A lazy cop and a H.K. inspector team up to find an elusive murderer.
How the community's first sheriff, Parker Rose, defeated a corrupt rival, cleaned up the community, and made it safe as a point of commerce and stage coach route to New York.
A group of unaccompanied minors bond while snowed in at the midwestern Hoover International Airport during the holiday season and ultimately create a makeshift holiday themselves.
An expecting couple move to a rural mountain villa. Shortly after arriving, they begin experiencing horrific supernatural occurances.

With the human exploitation of natural resources, the Arctic environment is completely destroyed, leaving only the last polar bear to survive. Jessica, a human girl, adopts the polar bear and names him Backkom.

A test tube human baby becomes embattled in the conflict between technological advances and nature. He continuously fights on the side of the natural environment but is hindered by artificial intelligence.
A Chinese policeman investigates the American Centipede case.
Feature Film Starring Shiri Appleby And Chaney Kley.
Two rivaling professors - a journalist, a young wealthy woman and a teenage boy - travel through Africa in search of "The Lost World", a place where dinosaurs still roam.

The missing case of a teacher named Prakashan is reported at the police station where John Luther works as a CI. As the investigation progresses, John meets with an accident in a scuffle while investigating another case.

column2: Kokdu: A Story of Guardian Angels
column3: Siblings Su-min and Dong-min trade their grandmother's shoes for a puppy they discover at the market. When the mortally ill old woman is admitted to the hospital and pines for her lost footwear, the two children feel guilty.

The slasher movie gets molested in this wickedly funny horror-thriller from Writer/Director Drew Barnhardt. Fun is the order of the day. Big Stevie's brand of fun. "Murder Loves Killers Too" is an off-beat twisted treat for horror fans.
With Share Bear as the emcee, the Care Bears take part in the Care-a-Lot Rescue Awards.

The illegitimate son of a nobleman defends peasants from greedy rulers, confounds local bandits, and struggles for permission to marry his tasty upper-crust sweetheart despite their vast societal differences. Then ninjas arrive.
A woman with a lonely life decides to go to a tarot reader to find out about her future.

The story of a young Viking boy who accompanies his father, the chief of their village, and his men on their adventures--and often is the person who uses his wit and instincts to help the men in their times of need.
An agent, sent by the Indian army to observe a terrorist, finds his mission complicated when he discovers undercover agents in his own country.
A sadistic killer sets his sights on a group of friends partying in an abandoned lake house, determined to make their murders his symphony.

Six people unwillingly find themselves locked in another series of escape rooms, slowly uncovering what they have in common to survive. Joining forces with two of the original survivors, they soon discover they've all played the game before.
An imaginary character named Beekle sets off on a journey in search of a friend.
Kabir convinces Atul to kill their best friend and hide his body in Atul's office. They throw a birthday party to check out whether they get caught and if their crime is perfect or not.
A young man named Amadeo sets off on an unexpected adventure with the players of his beloved Foosball game.
A young man finds out that his parents had been used in an atomic-weapons experiment shortly before he was born, and that the results have had some unexpected effects on him.
The life story of Sri Rama from his wedding to his crowning ceremony.

A girl named Eve has destructive thoughts. Unable to tell whether it's a dream or reality, she lives in a shadow world killing her dead friend again and again. Surrounded by screams, a grisly vision brings the killing into the real world.
An investigation into a retired WWII sub plunges a research team into a supernatural journey across the dark abyss of time - with history hanging in the balance.
In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.
Two helpless high school geeks travel to Russia the summer before their senior year in hopes of losing their virginity at a summer camp that "guarantees" they'll get laid.

An entry in the new sub-genre of "movies made in lock-down". Olivia Davis escapes her abuser with the help of a kind stranger, but his intentions are not yet clear to her. She must figure out the situation and escape her nightmare.
A Chinese warlord hires a conjurer to help him impress a resistant concubine.
Two prankster best friends gets unwittingly involved in a terrorist plot and tries their best to save the country.
In 1946 just after World War Two, James Hawthorne leads an expedition to an island in search of treasure hidden by Japan. Once they arrive the team finds more than they bargained for.
Two dark forces entangle an 18 year old American gamer. She resides with an evil entity influencing her animus towards all. Then enters Jin.
A family tragedy forces a young woman to discover and defend her faith, values and the real meaning of Christmas in this "light" hearted holiday story.
Dr. Larry Forbes visits the château of Dr. Robert Renault, uncle of his fiancée Madelon, who is idolized by Renault's assistant, a strange émigré from Java.
A film about a combat veteran's need for redemption, about saving mankind, learning to trust again, and most importantly... kicking alien ass.
Adventure, Romance. Comedy, Songs - In a setting of an isle of enchantment.
The first lady of a noble house has died and now there is conflict between the remainders for taking over her inheritance.
In 1952, during the Korean War, two American pilots become bitter enemies over the same woman but must shelf their personal feud when confronted by deadly Chinese MIG fighter jets in battle.
A barrister's letter proves his bride shot her aged husband on learning he was already married.
Ninth exploitation anthology from the twisted minds of established and up and coming directors from across the globe.
When a troubled war veteran's politician father is killed, he discovers a shadowy conspiracy that will take him to the edge of his sanity and beyond.

Set against an appealingly sunny Sicilian backdrop, this movie finds Simon Templar, an elegant thief and ethical busybody, outraged when a British banker is murdered after he recognizes an old colleague-turned-Mafia kingpin.

In a future, private underground prison/Fortress, the inmates are computer controlled with CCTV, dream readers and devices that can cause pain or death. John and his illegally pregnant wife are inside but want to escape before birth.
In the distant future, humanity is overthrown by artificial intelligence on Earth and other worlds.
Deceit, body heat and pulsing street beats converge in this explosive story about the music industry!

Inspired by true events, spanning centuries and set against the background of china's recent push for a modern silk road, a canal dividing the north of Thailand from the south, is at the heart of this story.
Two old women who happen to be pickpockets stole money from Simon, the taxi driver. The police are unable to find the thieves, so Simon decides to find them himself.
Big Anthony stirs up trouble when he's asked to watch over Grandma Witch's magic cauldron while she's away.
After a long murder investigation, a police investigator finds the killer closer to home than he imagined.

United States Marine Corps Captain "Happy" Smith (Monte Blue) and Gunnery Sergeant Wilmer (Guinn "Big Boy' Williams) lead a squadron of Marines in search of a party of American tourists lost in a Central America banana-republic jungle.
A weekend boating party turns into a nightmare for a group of young Londoners when they stumble upon a terrifying secret hidden in the reeds.
A teenage werewolf falls for a girl, who helps him find a way to become human.
A serial killer is taking down the hip hop industry one rapper at a time and the detectives on the case must get to him before the killer gets to them.
This ain't your regular Hood

A girl, the daughter of a wealthy businessman, is kidnapped by a man and taken to a country house to await the collection of the ransom. But several unforeseen events complicate the kidnapper's plans.

Bill Foster, a suspended auto racer, attempts to get even with Jerry Neeley, the woman who owns a bus line, by going to work for the rival company. But Bill soon learns about his new boss' shady practices and begins to fall for Jerry.
Three goofballs go back in time to save the Ramses Colony. Unfortunately, saving the colony screws up the future, so they have to go back in time to stop themselves from stopping themselves!

A future civil war is sparked by government-imposed measures due to climate change. Nia, her sister Penny, and her boyfriend Ethan are hiding out when a militia leader and his followers arrive on their doorstep.
When a young woman is arrested for a series of brutal killings, police are confounded by her confession, which places blame on an accomplice who doesn't seem to exist.
A throwback to the horror movies of the 70s and 80s.
Two itinerant boys pretend to be poets in order to impress two girls.
An orphaned girl is taken in by a snobbish family at the insistence of their rich, crotchety uncle, even as her devoted aviator godfather fights for custody.
To form an alliance after a great battle, a lady rides through a forest to marry a lord's son. But something dark lurks in the forest that may prevent the lady from ever leaving the forest.

A self-obsessed starlet, a grieving father, and a self-worship app are at the center of a global femicide where thousands of victims share a disturbing commonality with the rising actress: the name of the viewer's closest loved one.

A workaholic with no time for romance, or the holidays ends up meeting two potential suitors on the same day, but unbeknownst to her, they turn out to be brothers. A sibling squabble commences in this holiday romance.

column2: Crafty Peter and the Mystery of the Missing Diamond
column3: When old village Peter receives a letter from his priest cousin in the big city, he takes on a journey to solve the greatest mystery he has had yet to investigate.

Rumor has it that the house of Prague hide secret obtain the philosopher's stone, and complex multi-level labyrinth of underground tunnels and cellars keep many unsolved mysteries and untold treasures.
A rape / murder victim returns as a ghost to get even with the four men who killed her by possessing each man's bride on their wedding night.

A Romeo-and-Juliet kind of love affair. The difference here is what sets the two lovers apart: their soccer teams. Being a fan of Corinthians, Romeu has to fake he really likes Palmeiras, in order to gain Julieta's heart.
Police procedural film about a police captain assigned to take over a demoralized police precinct and turn it around by solving all the unsolved cases as well as some new tough ones.

A team-building conference for municipal employees which turns into a nightmare when accusations of corruption begin to circulate and plague the work environment. At the same time, a mysterious figure begins murdering the participants.

column2: Knight Rider: Rise of the Phoenix
column3: A reclusive auto mechanic is living a quiet life when a chance meeting with an old mentor changes his destiny forever. Forced to dig into his past, he begins to search for a man who does not exist.
A man searches for a missing woman who has been kidnapped by a deranged Professor with sinister intentions.

Awakening from a 200 year sleeping spell, Anna must adapt to modern culture and combat an evil witch, in order to protect a handsome stranger. Based on the romantic novella "Upon A Time" by Charles Dewandeler.
Anne, a painter who struggles with inner demons after being forced into a life of solitude when her husband leaves mysteriously.

When three children survive a bus crash that kills their parents, their childhood dies as well. Until they find an unlikely partner in grief at the shallow grave of a long lost child in the woods of a desolate park.

12 year old Gerald has a hard time dealing with the divorce of his parents so he has created a fantasy world that is very real to him where he is King Gerald and the peace is held in the lands by colorful, powerful dragons.
Petty thief Czarek takes part in a TV reality show to escape from the mafia. He is sent to a house on a desert island with 9 other contestants. Even the death of one of them does not stop the show.
When something big happens at Drama High, the girls and guys come together to fight the terrible creature. Then, they dance the night away.
A neurosurgeon with a cheating wife takes an amnesiac into his home and conditions him to believe that the cheating wife is his own and to take the "appropriate" action.

On their way to find Paris, Sture the dog (Hasse Alfredsson) and his friend Picasso end up on a hotel in the middle of nowhere. Along with Miss Mops, Sture tries to sniff out who is causing all the strange events of the hotel.
A former Christian missionary, who specializes in debunking religious phenomena, investigates a small town which seems to be suffering from the 10 biblical plagues.

column2: Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods
column3: In order to wipe out the Gaulish village by any means necessary, Caesar plans to absorb the villagers into Roman culture by having an estate built next to the village to start a new Roman colony.

The film tackles cybercrime through the story of Younis, a man who lives with his wife and their baby girl, as he decides to rob a bank through the internet, but then finds himself chased by a dangerous gang.
When a treasure hunter seeks a downed airplane in the jungles of Africa, he encounters one of the passenger's young daughter, now fully grown, and with a gorilla protector.
No matter where the humanity goes, the war goes with them.

Remnants follows Chris, who lost his dad to a cynical warlord, Purple Swordsman. He's taken under the wing of his father's friend, Milo. Together they must find out what happened to Chris's father and stop Purple Swordsman at all costs.
A crew of interplanetary archaeologists is threatened when an alien creature impregnates one of their members, causing her to turn homicidal and murder them one by one.

column2: Untitled Will Rogers/Gauchos in Buenos Aires Film
column3: When Will Rogers was younger he went off and traveled the world moving cattle. One of those places was Buenos Aires, Argentina where he became one of the Gauchos, using his lasso tricks and quick wit to get by in life.
Police suspect a young teenager who was horrifically abused by her family and raped by her father of finally snapping and slaughtering them all.
Plot kept under wraps.
Nobita and his friends go an adventure to save the future from monsters that come out from doraemon's gadget.Will nobita be able to capture all of them and help a monk in his journey to the west?
Two friends at a coconut farm are visited by a stranger who wants to spend the night.
When a group of young people camping in the ruins of a medieval Turkish town play a party game called 'Murder in the Dark', they soon discover that someone is taking the game too far.
A young girl named Alice falls down a rabbit-hole and wanders into the strange world of Wonderland.
A 19th century American boy is discovered to be the heir to a grand aristocratic estate in England. He wins the heart of the local common folk and eventually his dour elderly grandfather.
Only Theseus, the son of a god with a heart of gold, can stop the evil King Minos and his hideous Minotaur from conquering the world.
When a mysterious hitman stirs up what was a perfect operation, tension grows high between Keyshawn and his crew as they try to survive attacks from the hitman and getting captured by the FBI.

A wise martial arts teacher, knowing that the future will need his treasure, hid his hoard of gold before he died. His daughter and a rival teacher have other plans for gold and each send their agents to try and find it
A Greek-Italian co-production, probably a romantic melodrama peppered with comedy, inspired by a theatrical play by Carlo Goldoni.

The extraordinary rise of Réka. From a carefree Khan's ward to a legendary warrior. Her adventurous journey, following a mystical revelation, marked by difficult decisions and hopeless situations, to find her destiny.

Dan, a tough police captain, and Ray, a hardened criminal, are estranged brothers. When Ray faces capture, Kitty, the sister of Ray's ex-partner, offers to help him escape because she sees an opportunity for revenge against Dan.
A 10-year-old boy's fondness for practical jokes gets him into trouble when a baby is accidentally kidnapped.
A law student, who takes a job as a night watchman at a morgue, begins to discover clues that implicate him as the suspect of a series of murders.

a protesting woman who has being oppressed by her husband's family and the contemporary culture in a male dominated society. At the climax with the help of an Educated family she succeed to give them punishment.
In the 11th-century epic Roland des Roncesvalles is a legendary knight from the age of chivalry in France. He is depicted as a key figure in halting the advance of the Arabs into France.
JK, an unemployed man, falls in love with Nandini, a lawyer. Everything in his life changes after he is mistaken for a serial killer.
An amorous lieutenant is forced to marry a socially awkward princess, though he tries to keep his violin-playing girlfriend on the side.
Tomas, enters a clandestine fighting circuit called "The Pit", lead by El Gonzo, to find and rescue his young brother Kevin, before it's too late.
Three kids skip school in order to explore an abandoned film studio lot where they catch site of a woman being dragged across the lot by a masked man.
A dark story of a dark woman.
A group of amateur detectives sets out to expose The Crooked Circle, a secretive group of hooded occultists.
A moody, jaded police detective, while investigating a drug ring, falls for a mysterious woman and is drawn into a shady and dangerous scheme.
In a land torn by corruption during China's classic period of political intrigue, one man upheld the torch of traditional high ideals - Until it was time for revenge.
retelling the famous case that yet remains unsolved
A young man defends the world from legendary beasts from folklore.

Having just lost her husband, Rini's grief increases when Auntie, who raised her, dies. While returning to the village to mourn, Rini's only child, Hafiz, goes missing and is found unconscious in the middle of the forest.
A young man, previously missing for over a month, returns to his small Welsh town. What he finds is a world that's changed beyond his reckonings.
A horse breeder needs to acquire his rival's horse at the same time protecting his three beautiful daughters from marrying three musicians who work for his rival.

A fun filled flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed in a freak accident and they are trapped on a raft, 100 miles from shore with man-eating sharks lurking beneath the surface.

A circus lion (Jason Priestley) finds himself in a magical land where he becomes the leader of a journey to stop the Wicked Witch of the East (Lynn Redgrave), a task which may lead him to lose a part of himself.
Growing up in a dysfunctional family leads to murder and deception.
Nukri is a troubled young boy with special gifts in a dystopian world.
When model Barbara Hallen disappears in France, her father's private detective traces her steps to a private plastic surgery clinic run by Dr.Flamand.

A strict priest denies a spy a by phone confession. On the phone, too, two nerdy and weird scholars keep a strange long chat on conspiracies, schemes, and plots. An odd conspirator rejoices in his power. All of the five sing what they say.
An alien takes over the body of an Earthman in order to learn about the planet so his race can take it over.
A prehistoric shark is released into a the waters near a small lake community as a result of an oil drilling accident, and proceeds to wreak havoc on nearby swimmers.
A group of punks touring in a bus survive a dinosaur attack.
An environmentally-friendly botanist discovers that she is part of a hidden magical world inhabited by fairies and elves.

Action superstar Chow Yun-Fat portrays real-life gangster Chen Daqi as he rises to the upper echelons of power, finding himself torn between the love of two women, the murderous plots of the secret service, and the looming threat of war.
Two people who have been soul mates through many past lives struggle to find each other in today's world.
A honest man negleted by his family members who are high grade officials wins the election as an independent candidate against his father and becomes high grade minister,roses in the political field

column2: The Lone Wolf and His Lady
column3: Lone Wolf (Ron Randell), a retired thief temporarily working for a newspaper, is accused of gem theft.
An animated movie that follows the adventures of Emil, who lives on a farm in a Swedish village with his parents and little sister.

After America's financial collapse and its people's abandonment, a group of pioneers journey through a ravaged wasteland to return to the "New World" as a leader plans to unleash his nuclear arsenal against anyone who threatens his power.

In order to earn goodwill, a businessman adopts 6 orphan girls. After the initial friction, he does warm up to them. Meanwhile, a young girl falls in love with him. All goes well till tragedy strikes.
A disturbed young man is terrorized by a vicious shadow after attempting to take his own life.

A US submarine runs into a time rift. A special unit goes on a mission to see what's on the other side. They find themselves in an alternate dystopian America, now a one-man dictatorship. They decide to help the rebels.
Follows a famous detective trio of boys in Transylvania who must unravel mysteries involving a long-missing boy, a mysterious brotherhood and a mysterious undead.
Desert ants suddenly form a collective intelligence and begin to wage war on the inhabitants. It is up to two scientists and a stray girl they rescue from the ants to destroy them.
The plot is unknown at this time.

The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

column2: The Nutcracker and the Magic Flute
column3: Follows Marie, as she makes a wish and becomes the same size as her toy nutcracker, who is really a prince under a spell, and they must travel to the magical Land of Flowers to save the world from the rat people.
Keith finds himself entangled with the mob and the police who both believe him to be a murderer.
An American journalist temporarily stationed in Central Europe searches for his new girlfriend, who has suddenly disappeared.
The Olsen Gang has to pay for their summer vacation in Spain, and Egon is hired to open a safe with black market money in Switzerland. He is conned, but Egon has sworn revenge.
A bunch of losers who can afford the price of the boat travel to Marseille are hired by a blonde woman for a mysterious mission in the jungle.
A wealthy Developer tries to remove settlers from his newly acquired land, which leads to dire consequences.
A British-American returns to Britain after 20 years to discover that his father has been jailed since WW2 for a murder that took place in murky circumstances.
Chen Xiang is the son of a mortal and San Sheng Princess, a fairy. But his mother is imprisoned in the Mount Hua by his uncle Er Lang God. He is going to save his mother.
Voz flees to outer space after attempting to start a nuclear war on Earth and there is only one man who the President can trust to take Voz down: Machete.
A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.
A wealthy businessman's wife mysteriously disappears, and a team of investigating officers embark on a search for her. Will they be able to decipher what's going on?

column2: Onigamiden - Legend of the Millennium Dragon
column3: A 15-year-old boy goes 1200 years back in time to find his unlikely destiny as the savior to end the war between humans and demons.
An insurance investigator is looking for a stolen priceless medieval Russian icon.

When a South American drug lord pays Pace to steal 48 cars for him, all but one is in the bag - thereby, the police precipitate in a desperate car chase against Pace and his Eleanor across Southern California.
A girl searching a forbidding jungle for her missing father stumbles upon a savage jungle girl.
A journalist uncovers a government conspiracy to unleash virus-carrying killer bees that could wipe out humanity.
A disturbed young girl starts believing that there is something very sinister at work after her estranged father visits her at her mother and grandmother's house with the woman he plans to marry.
Michel Bernardin works at Planet Assistance, who helps Frenchmen who are in trouble in foreign countries.
A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

Young James Sheridan's uneventful life gets blown apart when a vicious killer named Webb abducts James' crippled mother. On the run, James pursues a corrupt politician tied to Webb, and discovers a shadow agency known as THE VEIL.
A group of crypto savvy friends begin experiencing strange occurrences after buying into a cursed NFT collection.
Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.
A young woman chases after love in death, and finds truth.
An incorrigibly self-serving exiled squirrel finds himself helping his former park brethren survive by raiding a nut store, a location that also happens to be a front for a human gang's bank robbery.
Two would-be crooks attempt a robbery of a small town bank in 1960 America.
The vampire myth is given a stylish 1960s treatment, where a human cop partners with a vampire cop to stop a vamp bent on creating a war between the two "separate but equal" races.
Riki, 10, who runs away from home, following an enigmatic emergency signal which leads him to the parallel world of "Yourland."
Adwoa owns a very exclusive hair salon that charges thousands of dollars to schedule an appointment. When clients start disappearing the police start to question recent murders in the area.

column2: Fist of the North Star: The Raul Saga
column3: Evil martial arts fighter Raul intends to be master of the world, and only Hokto fighter Kenshiro can stop him.

Two undercover cops who go in search of a fugitive enter another dimension occupied by uncivilized residents who are crass and rude. There, the two men get stuck in an apparent time loop as inexplicable events begin to occur.
When his mother dies, scandal-ridden ex-Olympian John Wright returns to a hometown that has not forgiven him.
Young girls stranded on a mysterious sea, must win a most unusual game to get back home. As they learn to work with each other they find themselves on a most extraordinary adventure.

column2: Untitled Laeta Kalogridis/Patrick Lussier Sci-Fi Project
column3: Plot being kept under wraps.
A young man with a strong sense of justice is torn between two girls: the flighty Taneko and the serious Suzuko.

On their way to school Paul and Fiona find and help a Professor Wagstaff who's trapped inside his new, untested time machine, so beginning an adventure that will send them back and forth through their local history.
After a seemingly innocent prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one in their sorority house while throwing a party to celebrate their graduation.

13 year old Emily Windsnap just found out that she is half-mermaid - um, like, kinda cool. When Emily starts to look for answers, the search for her hidden past leads to undersea adventures beyond her wildest dreams.
A young woman reluctantly agrees to attend a retreat in the wilderness with friends. When they find a strange object in the woods, they realize it's not from around here.
A young woman has to deal with her fear of not being alone and her desire to be a great actress, leaving aside what her heart and reason dictate.
JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from MIT, enlists his family's help to uncover the truth behind his best friend's untimely death.
In the midst of the wedding princess Miroslava is kidnapped by a dragon and carried away into his castle on the remote island.
Humpty Dumpty had a great fall, and he's back in the form of a doll that belongs to a woman with dementia who starts to recall his dark past.
When the robber Hotzenplotz steals a grandmother's coffee grinder, Kasperl and his friend Seppel set out to get it back from him.

column2: Ewan Pendle and the White Wraith
column3: A young boy discovers he is one of an ancient race of people, those who can alone see the real Creatures which inhabit the earth.

Time travelers kidnap a 1990s NASA scientist and loop him into the future in order to steal his anti-aging research. Meanwhile his wife suffers a sexual identity crisis and becomes the prime suspect in his disappearance.
A group of people set out to a dangerous journey to find cure of strong venom.
Moomin, Sniff and My set out to stop a comet approaching the Moomin valley. Along the way they meet Snusmumriken, the beautiful Snorkfröken, Snorken and a Hemul, who join them in their quest.
Three friends in quest for a documentary production in a haunted jungle as part of a 'Adventure Competition'.

Chris is just like any other 10 year old kid, he's got a secret, He has superpowers, except in Chris's case it happens to be true, or is it ?. We all have secrets we try to hide, except for Chris hiding it isn't really a priority.

Navy SEALs aboard a nuclear submarine get miniaturized and injected into the President's body to surgically remove a malignant tumor from her brain, in what becomes a virtual mission to assassinate world terrorists in her dreams.

Based on Sci-Fi story by Igor Rosokhovatsky, an artificial brain vanishes from professor's lab causing havoc in the city. It creates an android and appears before the professor, finally taking off on a mission to constellation Gemini.
A tale of two 12-year-old vampire sisters who have to adapt to the human world after their family decides to emigrate to Germany.
A group of people trapped in a house try to escape a murderer. A police officer comes to their aid, but discovers something stranger unbeknownst to anyone.

In a near future Vietnam where global warming and rising seawater levels have forced cultivation to be done on floating farms, a strong-willed woman has to make a critical decision about her ex-lover, a suspect of her husband's murder.
Teenage Ferco falls in love with Rosalba who's already in love with Rafael. To impress Rosalba, Ferco learns to drive his father's plane, hoping this will win her over from Rafael.
A group of Irish noblemen kidnap girls in order to marry into their fortune and avoid becoming priests or soldiers.

Rishav creates a mobile app called Cheene Baadaam for lonely people to find friends, Trisha his girlfriend helps him build it. Now they are on their separate ways and both use the app to find friends.
A detective seeks retribution for unpunished killers and the rest of the cruel world - even if it means going outside the law.
The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.
An upright city-bred police officer launches an attack against the caste system after caste-based discrimination and other crimes are dismissed.
The bittersweet sentimental adventures of four young people in 1950s Athens.

Set ten years after the most peaceful revolution in United States history, it presents a dystopia in which the issues of many groups - minorities, liberals, gay rights organizations, feminists - are dealt with by the government.
Nerdy comic book aficionado Roberto Rodriguez battles low self-esteem, loser friends and vicious high school bullies as he vies for the heart of Cristina, the hot new girl from Madrid.
Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.
Manu, a bodybuilder from Chandigarh, India, falls in love with Maanvi, a Zumba teacher. All seems well until a revelation causes turmoil in their love story.

Hakan and Nihal seems to have a perfect marriage. The problems of the young architect couple are started to emerge when Nihal suddenly disappears. While looking for his wife with the police, Hakan faces the facts of their relationship.

Geron Olivar is a story of a good and dedicated policeman who, in his devotion to duty, gets himself at odds with an established crime syndicate. Geron's crusade becomes a battle between good and evil.
A teenage girl gets entangled in an online affair without knowing the true identity of her virtual lover.
When a serial killer starts picking off beautiful young hipsters on the east side of Los Angeles, a group of crime scene videographers hatch a plan to catch him.

Time is ticking for captain Jackson Elis as he interrogates a mysterious man with ties to a bio terrorist group holding a team of B.S.A.A. operatives hostage. Foxtrot team is sent in to rescue them through the zombie infested Red Falls.
A lonely barfly falls in love with a married bar singer.
Retired performer Mike Morgan sells original illusions to fellow magicians, and although he believes in the supernatural, likes to expose sham psychics. This involves him in some mysterious murders.
A somewhat prim and proper Englishman is hired as the tutor to the son of the Japanese ambassador. His life changes when he and the boy are kidnapped by terrorists for political purposes.
Clueless on a gruesome case, a skeptical and lonely policewoman in a small village, is guided by a newly arrived clairvoyance gifted boy, who claims that the murderer is the Virgin Mary.
"The Goon" comic is about a hulking orphan raised by his aunt, a strong-woman for a carnival. When a gangster Labrazio guns down the aunt, the goon kills the gangster and takes over the operation.

A mouse-detective with his rabbit and lizard friends in Steamburg. They will jointly expose the crime one of their biggest enemies, a cat named named Bulpan. Starting as a pickpocket, Bulpan works hard to become a very skilled criminal.
A pair of professional but mismatched criminals break into a house with a dark past that is about to make its presence felt. Their story soon intertwines with two other sinister tall tales.
A group of astronauts land on a new planet and discover their own dead bodies.
A family's harmonious existence is interrupted when the young son begins showing symptoms of anxiety that seem linked to disturbing events at home.
Plot Unknown
Judy Garland and Mickey Rooney star in a musical directed by Busby Berkeley as two talented teenagers dreaming of success as Babes on Broadway.
A police detective goes undercover and joins a gang of Nazi agents using explosive gases and artificial lightning to sabotage the war effort, whom he battles in disguise as The Black Commando.

After another teenager disappears from the idyllic suburb of Sunshine Hills, Suzy, the girl-next-door of every boy's dreams, persuades Daniel, a fourteen-year-old with an obsessive crush, to help her uncover the truth.

column2: Doomsday and the Arrival of Dajjal
column3: Doomsday and The Arrival of Dajjal There will be three hard years before the Dajjal (appears). During them, people will be stricken by a great famine. In the first year, . People will stop offering the prayers .

On 25th April, 2011 a horrific and tragic incident occurred which remained unsolved. Till the date no explanation or evidence found to be satisfying to suggest what exactly happened on that day. This film is a record of those events.
A man works as clerk in an estate and is very loyal to him. However, when his boss accidentally kills him, the brother of the employee becomes furious and decides to avenge his death.
As reward for his honesty, ACP Arjun is frequently transferred. But he faces a real challenge when he is sent to an area that is ruled by gangster Satyalal who controls the police like puppets.
After becoming obsessed with a Ouija board, a young college woman unwittingly unleashes a demon via the world of social-networking.
The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.
Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.
Squad of beautiful government agents tries to catch saboteurs.
Attempting to find his lost dog in a vast Georgia swamp, Ben Ragan stumbles upon wanted murderer Tom Keefer who convinces Ben he was framed for the murder by the real killer.
Drama/Mystery- Billionaire and Media Mogul Dash Turner plots and schemes until the point of murder.
The fates of several people are randomly intertwining. Their sympathy of each other faces multiple differences in their lifestyles.
A New York City narcotics detective reluctantly agrees to cooperate with a special commission investigating police corruption, and soon realises he's in over his head, and nobody can be trusted.

The Village Hidden in the Leaves is home to the stealthiest ninja in the land. But twelve years earlier, a fearsome Nine-tailed Fox terrorized the Village before it was subdued and its spirit sealed with in the body of baby boy-Naruto.
During the Cold War, an American soldier is abducted in West Berlin, sparking a recovery effort led by Colonel Steve Van Dyke.
Even when the prosecution is providing overwhelming evidence against Kaggwa Dave, Cindy is determined to establish a prima facie case over accusations of murdering his own wife.
Story of the gold strike on an immigrant's property that started the 1849 California Gold Rush.
Set in the Suffolk rave culture as the film follows two gangs one from the London J1 crew as they battle with each other for the control of a new Bio-Drug, Stagger.
The fictional tale of a boy who wanted to save the day. But paid the price when he met face-to-face with the legendary Slender Man. Based off the video game.
Mercenaries, hired by the Catholic Church, break into a research facility and unwittingly release the demon, Abaddon.
Get your barf bag ready for this anthology horror film of the gross and weird. Stories to make you feel sick and nauseous . You've been warned.

A private investigator goes undercover to investigate the death of a legendary dance instructor. As he becomes romantically entangled with the alluring dance studio manager, a drama of shattered dreams and tangled motives unfolds.
During a violent storm, Hotel guests are hunted by an unknown threat.
The journey of two robots on their quest to become human.
Charmed by the residents of Tressock, Scotland, two young missionaries accept the invitation to participate in a local festival, fully unaware of the consequences of their decision.
Mad scientist brings Dracula, the Wolfman, the Mummy, and Frankenstein's Monster to life... but there's a problem and they end up three feet tall.
A young woman follows a mysterious melody onto a remote tidal island. When she crosses back over at the next low tide, she emerges into a world where 25 years have passed.

column2: Black Widow: Forever Red Part 1 and 2
column3: Black Widow is now a wanted criminal; with the help of Jessica Jones and Daredevil, they have to stop Taskmaster, an enemy who changed her life forever.
Naura, Okky, and Bimo were chosen to represent their schools to compete in the science competition at Creative Tent which is located in Situ Gunung rain forest, Sukabumi.

Uptight city accountant Michael Thompson is hired to help a family save their stable before the bank shuts them down. Michael reluctantly agrees, but as he searches for ways to save a family's legacy, he finds something he never expected.

column2: Theoretically, an even much more paranoid conspiratorial phone call
column3: Challenged by phone by the Pro Bono Spy Hunter and his valet, The Boss travels to the year 2121, where the USSR won the Cold War. Caught spying, The Boss undergoes a subtle questioning technique that tortures him and his interrogator.
When a socially inept genius inventor is on the edge of a breakthrough, he immediately becomes the hunted target of mercenaries and law enforcement in a deadly international cat and mouse chase."
A story about Fadil who fall into mafia world led by Taji Samprit and his son Wak Doyok. An incident causes Inspector Wahab and Inspector Shuib to suspect Fadil as Tiger, a professional assassin.
Red Riding Hood is training in the group of Sister Hoods, when she and the Wolf are called to examine the sudden mysterious disappearance of Hansel and Gretel.
Three young men try to escape the reality of their everyday lives and succeed in ways they had least expected.
A Brooklyn answering service operator becomes involved in the lives of her clients, including a struggling playwright with whom she begins to fall in love.
A Secret Agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by several other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.
Eric Thornton has been called The Ugly One by everyone in his town since he was 10. Now he is the only one who can save them from a Viking Warlock searching for a lost piece of Thor's hammer.
A man sets out to fulfil his mother's last wish after serving his term in a juvenile detention center for a murder he did not commit.
A mad doctor is determined to take revenge on the family he believes is responsible for his daughter's death.

column2: Myths and Legends: The New Alliance
column3: A group of teenagers open a portal where a malevolent god wants to dominate the world of humans.

A team of collegians probe the mysterious deaths occurring in their campus wherein the victims die immediately after accepting a friend request on social media from a girl, Mona, who has gone missing.

An inspirational expedition of a Government official and his team to expose a "No Identity Land". A gripping and heart warming journey to connect a remote Indian village to the system of communication and networks.
Private Investigator Terry Moran, who is in love with Nora O'Brien the daughter of Police Detective Tim O'Brien, is hired by Mrs. Hamilton to solve the murder of her husband, a fur dealer
Everyone in Paris thinks Fantomas is dead. A wave of extortion, blackmail and murder all point to the master criminal. Inspector Juve and his reporter friend Fandor set out to find the truth.
Count Spatula's house is invaded by a group of swingers wanting to have sex in a haunted house.
A desperate couple in an isolated beach house must overcome their spiralling paranoia and a chilling external presence to find the truth about their beloved missing daughter.
It follows a true event of a case that occurred in the morgue of a government hospital.
When spy chief Bob Sharkey finds out one of his agents-in-training is actually a Nazi double agent, his strategic decision not to arrest him results in tragedy.
A young girl faces the bittersweet reality that, on her upcoming twelfth birthday, she is destined to turn into a mermaid.
The evil Queen of the Dead Moon has returned to earth and plans to claim what is rightfully hers. Its up to Sailor Moon and the Sailor Soldiers to put an end to her evil plans.

column2: Inside the Mind of Casper Night
column3: Stacey Bright presents a collection of short films made over the course of three years by her friend, Casper Night, and attempts to establish what they all mean and what significance they have to Casper's thoughts and feelings.

In the wake of a solar flare of unusual properties, a mismatched group of inner-city survivors must put aside their animosity to escape a Los Angeles now free of gang-bangers, but infested instead with blood-sucking zombies.
Widow Ruth is seven months pregnant when, believing herself to be guided by her unborn baby, she embarks on a homicidal rampage, dispatching anyone who stands in her way.
After exhausting all the usual means of wooing a lady, a desperate admirer steps out of the box for a final push.
A fugitive stumbles onto a movie set just when they need a new stunt man, takes the job as a way to hide out and falls for the leading lady while facing off with his manipulative director.

column2: Mr. Moll and the Chocolate Factory
column3: Dad is left home with the kids when their Mom is away for the weekend, but when Dad has to work overtime at the Chocolate Factory, mayhem ensues when the kids get into a feud with the nasty boys next door!
An ex-gang member must recruit a Jesuit priest to save her younger sister, not only from the prostitution ring that she fell into, but from the demon that's possessing her body.
An idealistic woman steals a box of incriminating evidence to bring to justice the celebrity who had years ago abducted her and two classmates for a night of torture.
When tragedy strikes her isolated ranch family, Kate is forced to confront her trauma or be consumed by the creature it has created.

In 1980s suburbia, two feuding cyberpunk step-brothers must learn to work together in order to confront and stop a malicious hacker from planting a fatal virus in the launch sequence of the Space Shuttle, just minutes before launch.
A perpetually miserable man finds happiness when he starts dating a manic pixie dream girl, to the befuddlement of his cynical best friend.

Amin returns home to the South of France and reconnect with his family, childhood friends, his cousin Tony and his best friend Ophelie. He spends time between his parents restaurant, local bars and beaches frequented by girls on holiday.

column2: The Adventure of A.R.I.: My Robot Friend
column3: A teenager summons the courage to help a friendly robot known as A.R.I. kidnapped by a ruthless lab director working for a powerful corporation seeking to turn him into a dangerous weapon in order to rule the world.
Adventurers search for World War II gold in the Philippines.
Plot kept under wraps.
Four guys plot revenge on the businessman who ripped them off.
A young member of an underground gang in Belgrade puts himself and his family in danger when he crosses a mafia leader who works for the chief of police.
Follows Lina against her brittle, damaged mother-in-law, Katherine. An affair sets Lina onto a journey of secrecy, betrayal and murder and a plot to seemingly destroy her. But who is the real victim?

Two brothers lost each other in their childhood. When grow up one becomes a thief known as the black suit thief and the other a cop. While they meet each other they have to overcome many troubles against love and law.
An ad-agency bookkeeper (Matt Craven) follows his billboard dream-girl (Kim Cattrall) to a shady nightclub in 1950s Toronto.
The lives of a rookie police officer and a struggling single mother collide as a pair of dangerous criminals descend upon their quiet Bay Area suburb.

column2: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
column3: Batman and Robin of the 1960s live action series are back in action to take down their fiendish foes united once more against them.
After being attacked, an introverted young man must follow clues left by his dead parents in order to figure out who is after him - and who he really is.
When a social media feud erupts between a girl clique, their mothers get involved to try and solve the problem, only to get caught up in all the drama themselves.
A Combat Veteran who lost everything in the Great Recession becomes involved in an investigation in Los Angeles concerning his Actress ex-Fiancé that threatens his stability and his life.
A 4-year-old boy is abducted by aliens and raised on a distant planet to be an unstoppable killing machine only to crash land on Earth.

column2: Las aventuras de Enrique y Ana
column3: Enrique is a gym teacher who along with his sister want to start a musical career with the support of their grandfather, a great scientist who wants to stop an evil despot from getting an artifact that would endanger the entire world.
25 years later 3 stars from the 1980's try not to fade alway as events from their past may interfere with their comeback.
After being murdered by a masked killer, Rain, Snow and Romeo find Roy, a conman, and ask him to find the killer for them.
A small-time talent agent discovers an amazing boxing kangaroo and figures to use it as his stepping-stone into the big time.
An all-time rager of a teen house party turns to terror when aliens attack, forcing two warring siblings to band together to survive the night.

A horror comedy about wrong place at the wrong time can lead to the scariest phenomenon. How a spirit captures a human being making it impossible for her to leave its lurches. Will good win over evil?
Two lousy crooks find paradise in the seven stages of love.
Based on the Hasbro board game, a band of strangers frantically try to figure out who is the murderer among them.

A college student struggling to find his purpose in life accompanies his physics professor to find a long forgotten ancient mysterious relic only to find themselves entangled in a worldwide conspiracy web that involves the Russian mob.

column2: Firildak Family: Down with This Middle Earth
column3: One night, when all the women are abducted from the village, Sabri Firildak and his friends enter a magical forest to get their wives back.

column2: How to Beat the High Cost of Living
column3: A caper comedy about three suburban housewives who, in order to beat inflation and subsidize their alimony checks, plot to steal $1 million from a large plastic ball which is displayed in a local shopping center.
A generation is caught between image and the search for authenticity.
After a relationship goes downhill. A serial killer starts making their count on a bunch of high school students.

For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.

The Mourning Tree coping with the loss of a loved one is about a father and son who are faced with the loss of a loved one. The Mourning Tree teaches them through nature's sight and sound perceptions of how to cope with death.

column2: The Ash Lad: In the Hall of the Mountain King
column3: Espen "Ash Lad", a poor farmer's son, embarks on a dangerous quest with his brothers to save the princess from a vile troll known as the Mountain King - in order to collect a reward and save his family's farm from ruin.

A troubled teenager studying the Earth falls for a girl he's never met, and after learning that life on his assigned planet may be coming to an end, he risks everything to get to Earth before it's too late.
A little monkey with a big secret.

After 17 years, a woman discovers she has been placed on an FBI Watch-list that uses informants to conduct a slander campaign against her homosexuality based on illegally fabricated evidence submitted by a former employer.
Freddy Palmer has escaped the asylum and is on a one-way, blood-filled rampage through woods, houses and bodies.
The Sequel to the notorious "Amityville Thanksgiving". It's Turkey Time Mother Clucker.
Ijjat Beg comes to India with his caravan and settles in a town in Gujrat. Here, he falls in love with Sohni, who owns a shop of metal pots.
Two children meet a pair of aliens just before Christmas, and all learn a lesson about what it means to give.

A Tale of Two Cities scenario contrasting Self-Sacrificial Love to Selfish Love set amidst the religions of the human-sacrificing Mayan and Aztec civilizations. A tale that tests the protective love between sisters AND their lovers.

Zi Yu comes from a wealthy family and lives with his mother and brother. He is married, but they have no children. Zi Yu's mother wants an heir, so she accepts a second daughter-in-law. Then Zi Yu meets the beautiful Xi Meng Yang.

In a post-apocalyptic London, humans carve out a medieval-like existence in the rubble of a ruined city. Meanwhile, the goblins have come up from the deep places and taken over the old underground stations. What would you do, to protect your world?
Kids from the same block hold a court trial to local cat who ate their canary.
A promising young army cadet is raped by her commanding officer, She gets her revenge by luring him and the men who acquitted him to a remote island.
While playing a video game on TV, school-children are mysteriously transported to a prehistoric island.
A star-crossed love story set in the world of polyamory and sex parties in New York City.

A gang of punks, led by a masquerader named Tarzan; terrorizing a small Mexican city, robbing banks, raping women, and killing people with cruelties. Two enforcers Marco and Javier fight this gang of punks.
An explosion at a nearby chemical factory locks two neighbours in together, but they are not what they seem. Who really is in danger.
During the joseon dynasty in Korea, the princess travels to the Qing to have a beneficial marriage. On her journey to the Qing, she meets and falls in love with a magician.
In 1969 PRChina, two men survive a supernatural tomb. They later become tomb raiders with Shirley/Shu Qi. 20 years later in NYC, one is hired to find that tomb again and the 2 friends follow later.
A treasure map found by three young boys allows them reason to get their kicks in more ways than one.
At 44, Hans still lives with his mother. When Matilda, a tenant half his age, moves in, Hans relives old memories and is infatuated. To win her love, Hans comes up with a dangerous plan.
While investigating a couple of murders in a small town, Sheriff Beck discovers a link to an old murdercase, closed thirty odd years ago.
A boy and a girl, who have run away from their respective homes for different reasons, meet and eventually fall in love. On their way, they commit a number of crimes.

column2: Amazing Sucking Slit-Mouthed Woman is Real
column3: Dressed in a coat and with her mouth ripped open, she attacks the terrified women and men. But the legendary monster is also a woman - Surrounded by numerous men, she is locked up, bound, and humiliated.

Thrown straight into a dangerous mission with none of his memories intact, a man must escape death while trying to figure out who he is, how he ended up here, and who is the mysterious voice in his ear calling him "Carter"?
Death and violence anger a twelve-year-old drug courier, who sets his employers against each other.

On Feb 11th 2013, Mia Hollingworth and her boyfriend went searching for the truth behind her mother's alien abduction. After three days of searching, they were never heard from again. This is the document of their journey.

Catherine Morris loves her husband Kurt so deeply that she subjects him to all kinds of humiliations every single day. Kurt Morris adores his wife so truly, he has planned for Catherine a romantic dinner...with her death as dessert.
Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.
A revolutionary and his band take over a small Mexican town. The townspeople begin to take sides over whether to fight him, join forces with him or just try to get along with him.
A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents.
A young man gets jailed for killing a woman who seduces him. When he gets released, he tries to stop his employer's son from committing the same kind of crime he did.
Two survivors struggle through a dangerous journey in a world shrouded with evil and terror.

Six hundred years ago, Fang Xiaoru's entire clan was slaughtered by the King of Yan, Zhu Di. Now, 600 years later, he has returned as an undead vampire to reclaim what is rightfully his and rediscover the love that was taken from him.
Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.
A young man invents a robot dog that has super strength, x-ray vision and can detect crimes being committed. A greedy businessman tries to steal the invention from him.

NYC Chinatown. A young pregnant couple battle parental anxieties and prophetic visions in the summer of 2003, a fever dream of Orange Alerts and SARS scares.Meg and Noah are the begrudging ...                See full synopsis »
A group of people trying to cross the border from Mexico into the United States encounter a racist man who has taken border patrol duties into his own hands.
War correspondent Roger East and the young Jose Ramos-Horta travel to East Timor to investigate the murders of the Balibo Five in 1975.

Based on the inspirationally true story of a father who, against all odds, pursues his vision to build a facility to care for special needs kids and their families all while trying to balance his own family.
Nicholas Felt and Jacob Crimsby head to the moors of Bodmin to uncover the mystery of the Beast.

The murder of a number of men in Jinning City. As the mystery unfolds, the legendary banshee turns to be the work of a female demon. The demon-hunter Gu Shijie battles with the demons and the heroes in a battle of wits.

A criminal drama told in a semi-documentary fashion. The murder of the chief official of Kobe city's Customs triggers an investigation of a prostitution ring called the 'Yellow Line' that sells Japanese women.
In Colombia, a young surfer meets the woman of his dreams - and then meets her uncle, Pablo Escobar.
Egyptian movie deals with the issue of corruption in Egypt and the Egyptian police excesses, embodies all of this in the character of the police officer, "Hatem".

A Hall of Fame baseball legend comes back to life as a twelve year old boy to befriend a failed minor league baseball coach, helping him manage an unruly Little League team comprised of foster-home juvenile delinquents.
A group of complete strangers find themselves isolated by a wealthy madman on his island compound.
In a small town, superhero Gaudêncio fights jewel thieves: mobster Giovanni and Spider-Woman Greta.

A rhythmically fast-paced music-packed romantic drama with deep, intense emotion as action. It's the universal story of a man who loses his family, then works to prevent it from happening to others in the future.

In 1947, a smart-mouthed Brit working in L.A. as a private eye (or peeper) is on a case to find the long lost daughter of a shady client pursued by two dangerous goons. The case leads him to a rich oddball Beverly Hills family.
A modern twist on Cinderella set in New York City's Sneaker culture.
Biological internet and mobile static virus for a newly governed globalization.
The tragic story of a platoon of Spanish soldiers, in the hell of the Kosovo war in 2000

The Through Another's Series is a Collection of thrilling stories that expand the 7 deadly Sins of the flesh. Each features a complex psychological element to get people to think about the consequences of their actions or lack thereof.
Lucille is murdered by crime boss Severin and his thugs, goes to hell and returns five years later as a demon/zombie to get her revenge.
Ekin Cheng is a young triad member who is betrayed by his boss, later he is back to HK with a police officer and a gangster to have his revenge.
Dr. Diane Landry (Cassandra Schomer) creates an alien-human hybrid to fight off a malicious group of invaders from space.
On Halloween 1997, two estranged teen skaters embark on a surreal journey through their memories, dreams and fears.

A desperate writer signs up for a fully A.I. operated retreat to cure her writer's block, but when an unforeseen software glitch occurs, she gets trapped inside her unit with an unstable android and no communication with the outside world.

In a world where dreams are controlled and only same sex relationship is allowed, a nerdy medical researcher must fight to save his illegal Dream; his love for a woman, from termination by a ruthless government agent.
When a young rancher crosses paths with a Lakota girl from a nearby reservation, her mysterious disappearance sparks a search that uncovers a harrowing past and hints at a dire future.
A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

When their closest friend April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.
A photographer named Andrew Kaleen incidentally gets wrapped up in a series of murders delivered through clues in the form of 35mm film.

Outlaw gun for hire Jericho (played by Michael Pare) is on the run from the law when he finds himself tangled in a situation that will fundamentally change his life, his views and his beliefs forever.
Fearing for his comatose girlfriend's life, Patrick creates a way to enter her world to bring her back to reality.
A reluctant samurai with a dark past sets off on a mission to fulfill his destiny.

column2: Mr Bartholomew: A Call from Manhatten
column3: Tony and Mr Bartholomew are dragged into a conspiracy in a live-action-animation. The lives of important people are at stake.
A lonely introvert begins to suspect that he's nothing more than a fake social media account and sets out to find his creator before he's deleted forever.
Time To Fall in Love - its About True Love

Six teenagers are whisked away to an uncharted land where they are given magical weapons to defeat a tyrannical king and with the help of a talking squirrel and dragons find the potion that will change stone back to people.
A stuffy businessman finds himself trapped inside the body of his family's cat.
A cavalry deserter risks his life to warn and protect a wagon train from an impending Indian attack.

Naani is an 8 year old boy who attempts suicide, but is rescued by a scientist who changes his life completely with his invention. The boy had no clue that this will transform his life and teach him how to be a good son, lover and father.
This film tells the story of how Long Wei, the captain of a special forces unit, and his comrades destroy a drug stronghold against all odds.

To avoid silent nocturnal zombies, Elise and Ashley keep on the move in a retro Winnebago and stay in the light, until an accident and a chance encounter force them to make a deal with a mysterious stranger and a blind girl.

column2: See You in Hell, My Darling
column3: Vera, Elsa, a man, and the great love that unites them. They grew up together but didn't get very far. Leaving behind a desolate world full of traps, they begin a hallucinogenic journey of tenderness and violence.
A woman wakes up on a distant planet and finds the crew of her space station viciously killed. Her investigation into what happened sets in motion a terrifying chain of events.
A reincarnated man unknowingly falls in love with his own daughter from his previous life. Once he realizes this, he tries to end their relationship before angels erase his memory.

Farah, Belisa and Alma find themselves trapped in a life that they wish to change. What they don't suspect is the bond that they will share with the mysterious Ícaro, in what will become the most important spring of their existence.
A single mother's search for her stolen new born baby sends her on a journey through the underworld of London and on a collision course with her past.

A parliament member's sixteen year old daughter Agata falls in love and runs away with a convicted young tramp, while her father uses his friends in the government and police to brutally break their happiness.

Malone is an undercover detective whose job is to sort out the low-lifes in the city but when his partner is shot dead he turns into a one-man army with a score to settle - but has he gone too close to the edge this time?

column2: Pokémon Ranger and the Temple of the Sea
column3: Our heroes must protect the Prince of the Sea, Manaphy, from the evil pirate Phantom, and return the young Pokémon to the Sea Temple with the help of the the People of the Water and Jackie the Pokémon Ranger.

Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures and woolly mammoths roamed the earth, Early Man tells the story of Dug, along with sidekick Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth and his Bronze Age City to save their home.
A HK cop investigates several similar murders done by Chow's men. Golgo 13, top sniper, is the 4th assassin hired to kill HK drug lord Chow for Americans wanting the HK drug market.

Follows Red, daughter of the Queen of Hearts, and Chloe, daughter of Cinderella, as they team up to save Auradon by traveling in back in time using the White Rabbit's pocket watch, to stop an event that would cause grave consequences.
Alice, feeling stuck in her life, obeys the call of a mobile application and dives into a virtual world by following the White Rabbit.
In a world where vampires and humans live in unison, a detective tries to unravel a murder mystery involving a member of the undead monarchy before all hell breaks loose.
Family relations begins to get rough when father of the house desperately insists to have a boy and his first wife gives birth to their forth daughter.

Seon-yeong, who works as a copywriter, go on a camping trip with her friend Eun-mi and Yeong-sik, who is in love with her. The group meets a mysterious looking man, Tae-ho, while they hike up to their camping ground on the mountain.
With the help of an inventor's secret workshop, Ritter Rost tries to lead his country out of a terrible crisis and become a knight again.
A young man and woman recover from separate tragedies. Unseen forces in the universe work to bring them together for a purpose far greater than themselves.
9 college students on road trip get waylaid and wind up in deep trouble.

column2: Hitman in the Hand of Buddha
column3: A country bumpkin arrives to help his brother's rice business. Things get out of hand while a rival company becomes corrupt. The bumpkin, an ace martial artist, fights off the rivals with the aid of some Buddhist guidence...
Will remain hidden until production permits.
A team of Navy Seals investigates a mysterious science outpost only to have to combat a squad of formidable alien soldiers.
Inquisitive teenage orphan James is invited to stay at his uncle's country mansion. He explores the property and discovers the house holds many mysterious secrets.

Tommy leaves his kittens out for Santa to take back to the North Pole, but after a major allergic reaction Santa can't deliver presents anymore, so the kittens have to deliver the rest of the presents to all the boys and girls.
