A group of religious fanatics, the Sikkim rebels, capture an English lieutenant and the daughter of the Viceroy.
Your landlady is your friend and then becomes your worst nightmare, and then you find out there were others before you.

Mariangula, an obsessed lady, to win she will do everything in her power to reach for glory, but her actions will bring fatal consequences for her and the people around. Mariangula based on the most traditional legend of Ecuador.

column2: Bloody Things Lie in Dark Places: A Tale of Death and Despair
column3: Blake Sullivan, a private investigator, is hunted by both the Chicago Mafia, and the FBI, in a thrilling journey to unveil the truth behind secretive government testing in this noir action adventure.

column2: The Adventures of Qiaohu Magic Island
column3: Qiaohu and his friends meets a mouse boy from the mirror portal named Xiaojing who asks Qiaohu for help on a quest to restore the rainbow flower in his world.
A town is disrupted with the arrival of a beautiful new tax inspector.

Officer Hung, a gambling addict owes a large sum of money and makes money through the inmates. The department finds out and fires him. Unemployed, Hung recalls a trick formula that will daze the victim and take the victim's money.

A town falls victim to a series of gruesome murders, an FBI agent with a tattered past must work with the local Sheriff to stop the beast before she too falls prey to The Lycanthropist that howls under the full moon.
A prince kidnapped at infancy and his foster brother fight against an evil wizard and a conspiracy in the palace.
A mimic artist/ventriloquist is fooled into believing that a woman loves him.
A notorious counterfeiter passes himself off as a Secret Service agent to Steve and gets him to unwittingly help him bilk the racetrack out of tens of thousands.

Explore a majestic kingdom where legends come to life. Witness the extraordinary feats of heroes encounter mythical creatures and experience the triumph of good over evil in an epic battle for the fate of the kingdom.
A woman's husband with a perfect life cheats with her sister with extreme consequences befalling them all.
Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Alexis Zarkov visit the planet Mongo to thwart the evil schemes of Emperor Ming the Merciless, who has set his planet on a collision course with Earth.
A railway is threatened by mysterious wrecks, which turn out to be caused by criminals using a unique deception.

Policewoman Maria and Rocco expect offspring. Rocco's father Silvio, officially pizzeria owner, unofficially Mafiapate, is not thrilled. Even Maria's father, a policeman himself, is anything but pleased.
A lot of expensive trial medicine was stolen from the experimental clinic. Major Grigasts holds the clinic staff as the suspects. He hands over the case to new investigator Mara.

Srivali, a village girl, who is so passionate about living her life on her own terms, struggles between three people who love her too much, the father Reddy Grau , the ex lover, and the present husband Anand.
Two old friends. An ex couple. A music tour. Two lives to meet again.
A comic book creator and a writer of color are sucked into to final issue of a popular comic series and have to stop a super villain from destroying the world.
An independent programmer consultant agrees to evaluate and develop a human-mechanical A.I. hybrid who displays characteristics of emerging super intelligent behavior.
Best science now tells us, everyone alive today is descended from the same few-thousand people who survived our near-extinction a few-thousand generations ago - Their story continues.

An eclectic group of runaways, artists, and drifters reside in a Utopian squat house on the coast, though the future of this peaceful commune is threatened as greed, hypocrisy, and corruption grow from within.
Indian Oriya film directed by Vijay Bhaskar.

After his quest to retrieve the fabled Golden Fleece, Jason returns to Greece with powerful sorceress Medea. However, when the king banishes her, it's only human that Medea plots her furious revenge. Can they escape her wrath?
A terrorist hunter is hired by a scientist to deactivate her android double, a walking, talking, murderous nuclear bomb which has gone amok in the big city and is about to explode.
A teenager named Ethan, 16, who dies on august 21st 1863 who has been a ghost on earth for 163 years. In 2026 befriends a troubled teen named Abbygale.
On her 16th birthday, Gwendolyn Shepherd finds out that instead of her cousin, she has inherited a rare gene that allows her to travel through time.
Monica and Quincy love and play basketball together through many life challenges from childhood to adulthood.
Loose portrait of João Francisco dos Santos, also known as Madame Satã, a sometime chef, transvestite, lover, father, hero and convict from Rio de Janeiro.
A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.
An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

A Man suffers from insomnia and decides to go to therapy. A Shrink hypnotizes him and realizes the Rorschach test and sends him into a deep sleep as they enter his psyche, which is a surreal world with his biggest fears and regrets.
In Macau, criminal Tong Heung-Tung of the Hunan Gang, who bombed the Hong Kong police headquarters, was being send back to Hong Kong by Kowloon OCTB inspectors Lee Ho-lung and Lo Mo.

Michel is a bored lonely cheap-thrills-seeker. Everything changes when he finds an unusual bobble head doll in the shape of a pretty woman that can say "I love you" and falls in love with it to the point of obsession.

column2: Kamen Rider W Forever: A to Z/The Gaia Memories of Fate
column3: A mercenary group called NEVER lead an assault onto Futo City using T2 Gaia Memories, a series of enhanced Gaia Memories based on data from the Kamen Riders. To protect their city, Shotaro and Philip have to uncover the secrets behind it.

Two reporters from the Pacific Union investigate the 104th meridian as the World Trade Federation launches their corporate blitzkrieg. Now everyone must escape westward to post apocalyptic California.

A detective is hired to tail an ordinary man, but the further he investigates, the further he unravels an otherworldly presence, and with the intensity increasing in his life, he is forced to make drastic decisions regarding his discovery.
Desolate by the loss of his daughter, a geneticist creates a monstrous new mutation.

A high flying career woman is distraught when her long term boyfriend tells her that he is not ready for children and so decides to secure a baby daddy by any means necessary, however she is unprepared when the unexpected happens.
A young captain, after participating in a duel, becomes the suspect in a series of killings in Epping Forest.
Plot undisclosed.
The daughter of a Kentucky colonel returns from her European finishing school to help prove his innocence as he is accused of killing a major with whom he had a feud over money.
Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

column2: The Adventures of George the Projectionist
column3: A Cinema Projectionist becomes entangled with a mad Italian Director's crazily combined remake of Cinema Paradiso and Pulp Fiction.
Two girls falls in love with the same boy, and to win his heart they start a gang team to compete in a schoolyard Battle Royale.

Ninni is sixteen and she lives in a beautiful mansion in the swedish countryside with her family. Her parents, both unemployed actors, risk to lose their property owing to the unpaid ...                See full synopsis »

Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends a naive real estate agent to his will, then takes up residence at a London estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

A prosecutor is building a case against a suspected serial killer. She receives death threats, but ignores them at first. When her husband disappears and someone blackmails her, she turns to her ex, a suspended homicide detective.
A young boy completes the time travel research of his deceased scientific Father in order to erase the man's death.
Tomás is 13-year-old and lives under the care of his mother. Between the pressure to pass exams and the anti-psychotic drugs he is forced to take, he finds a way to escape reality.
Two rival getaway drivers settle the score on the open road.
The girl and boy who have grown up together realise very late that their relationship is that of love. By the time they realise it, they are about to go separate ways.
Six young women are responsible for the death of a man whose spirit returns to kill them one by one.

A scientist engineers a group of genetically engineered creatures for use as "supersoldiers" to fight U.S. wars in the Middle East. However, things get ugly when the creatures malfunction and turn on their creators.

Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.
In the wake of Omolara's demise, everyone becomes a suspect and anyone could be the perp.

A scuba diving instructor, her biochemist boyfriend, and her police chief ex-husband try to link a series of bizarre deaths to a mutant strain of piranha fish whose lair is a sunken freighter ship off a Caribbean island resort.
BE SURE YOU GET YOUR FIRST FROM THE ONE YOU LOVE -- THIS LIGHT-COMEDY-DRAMA RECALLS THE JOYS AND THRILLS OF INNOCENT YOUNG LOVE, ESPECIALLY OF A FIRST ROMANTIC KISS.
A young man's sudden discovery of his father's past life changes him from an aspiring professional boxer to a thug, destroying his career and his relationships with those who care for him.
An undercover police detective infiltrates an organized crime operation. Once inside he discovers the boss of the operation is a childhood friend from the neighborhood.
A family is terrorized by a possessed marionette during the American dust bowl.

Action superstar Chow Yun-Fat portrays real-life gangster Chen Daqi as he rises to the upper echelons of power, finding himself torn between the love of two women, the murderous plots of the secret service, and the looming threat of war.
His desire bears another desire and he is getting attached to her more and more. At last, it starts to tear apart his life little by little.
Years after WW3, scattered individuals and gangs survive by plundering, killing, cannibalism etc. A young man tries to survive on his own in rural "England".
Magazine reporters Hiroyuki Kurosaki and his colleagues brought back to Japan a monster child who had just hatched from an egg issued on the isolated island of Obelisk in the South Sea.

A horror comedy with fake news and commercials section, that was filmed on old video cameras to make it look like a real VHS recording of a commercial television station's Halloween special from 1987.
The story of a man who confronts his betrayed wife and child years later.

When a waterborne illness shuts down NYC, a traumatized woman absconds to the Catskills to work with a renowned healer, but when she discovers she's pregnant, she must fight the staff for her sanity and child as cult-mentality takes over.

Fofão is summoned to defend the ship orbiting the Fofolândia the clutches of a villain who wants a sign placed in your nose, so he was born, to govern all galaxies. So Fofão has help Aliemac, fofolo, and children Bruno and Patricia.
The lives of Angels, living in human society, begin to impact one another as they unknowingly search for paradise.
Several persons, including an off duty policeman and a weird rich guy, are suspects in the murder of a beautiful actress.
A college fraternity initiation rite goes awfully wrong. A bullet wounded frat boy and a kidnapped convenience store clerk end up at the frat house. Panic continues.

Taking its cue from classic survival-thrillers such as 'Duel' and 'Deliverance', 'Survival Instinct' is a fast-paced edge-of-your seat thriller with a strong female lead and a plausible, morally-ambiguous villain.
The plot is undisclosed at this time.

column2: Cartoon Classics - Vol. 3: 25 Favorite Cartoons - 3 Hours
column3: A compilation of 3 hours of Classic Cartoons from the Golden Age of Animation. Cartoon characters include Bugs Bunny, Porky Pig, Daffy Duck, Betty Boop, Popeye, Little Lulu, Casper the Friendly Ghost, Felix the Cat, Superman and many more.

Movie based on the popular CAPCOM game: "Sir Arthur must defeat zombies, ogres, demons, cyclops, dragons and other monsters in order to rescue Princess Prin Prin, who has been kidnapped by Satan, king of Demon World".
An American journalist is recruited as a spy in World War II Cairo.
A draper's maid weds a poacher's son when the village watch committee tries to expel her.

In the sci-fi thriller The Philadelphia Experiment the sole survivor of a wartime experiment is catapulted 41 years into the future and must race to save the world as we know it. It's now 10 years later--1993.
The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.
A South American revolutionary is facing death for murder but the President's daughter in London is taken hostage.

column2: Down to the Sea in Ships
column3: Whaling ship captain Bering Joy takes his grandson Jed on a whaling trip to teach him core life values while First Mate Dan Lunceford is tasked with tutoring Jed.
A story about a young girl who is being raised by her grandparents yet longs to know her parents because sometimes love doesn't seem to be enough. Can love can come from any struggle?
A cruel contract killer nicknamed "Kamikaze" uses all kinds of methods to carry out his work. One day he will have to face an old enemy who has an old score to settle with him.
A good little witch refuses to work for an evil wizard. Her friends become displeased and begin to despise the girl. Based on the play The Little Witch That Was Good.
A peaceful summer day in the Moomin Valley is interrupted by a volcanic eruption.

column2: Wraith of the Umbra and Eidolon
column3: For endeavors long ago, two friends travel to an island resort that specializes in rebirth, overseen by a lonely spirit who divide their stay into three stages.
Yoon Gyeom is a loyal subject of King Jung Jong of Joseon. He struggles to fight against a monster that threatens King Jung Jong's life and a group of people trying to depose King Jung Jong.

Three unique and strange women each battle their own literal and metaphorical demons. Their lives soon collide due to the mysterious appearance of a massive prism and the nonsensical becomes the sensical.
An experimental cosmic horror film following Henry (Peter King) and Jordan (Courtney Honors), two young adults facing the stress of a new life, who encounter the old gods in our neon lights.
52 minutes of previously lost footage from Blue Velvet.

Year 2028, Seoul. Yuha and Juno live in seclusion, refusing artificial intelligence in the age of singularity. Their lives take on a complete turn when Jia, a female android, appears at their doorsteps.

Willington's only love, Mariana, is about to get married to his cousin. While Willington tries to get her back, the rumor of a thief in town and a series of violent murders remind them of a fearful past, that will endanger Mariana.
A group of people, facing a lot of challenges, decide to hunt down lost treasure en route to India.
Robert McQueen's day takes a turn for the worst when he is held hostage and accused by three vengeful husbands of sleeping with their wives.

Two middle aged orphans are released from prison for a crime they didn't commit and stumble upon a "Book of Truth". As they find their new path in life they discover a crypto key and search for the password to open its contents.
Kittu, a vigilante, goes by the name Black Cobra and thwarts the operation of a criminal syndicate. However, they frame him for crimes and Inspector Srikanth is assigned to catch him.
A blind American Army officer becomes involved in a murder mystery and solves it after regaining his sight.

A small detour from the main road leads Boyan to a chance meeting with his student love Neda. The two set off in his car to Sofia. This journey brings them back to the memory of their youth and their great love.
A successful woman faces the repercussions of her bullying ways when she's confronted by a woman from her past.
Party girl meets a male ballet dancer on the Internet.
The most backward tanker among the ships of the Caspian Sea is becoming an advanced and exemplary one.
"After a large scale catastrophic event, four strangers band together in search for safe haven"
The singer Rodolfo Salazar enters a room. He finds her second wife Victoria and her twenty-something son Rudy murdered, so he suspects her.

A group of filmmakers investigate the legend of America's first serial killer, Jeremiah Godslight. However, they get more than they bargained for and soon learn that by unraveling the secrets of the past, unspeakable evil is unleashed.
After losing his eyesight in an ironic accident, a famous author is caught in a downward spiral, until his new guide dog leads him to true love and an unexpected adventure.
A dramatic and devastating murder sends the lives of three women spiraling way beyond their control.
Hikers find a secret grove of extra-terrestrial marijuana and must fight for their lives when they anger the other-worldly forces protecting the plants.
At a college party gone horribly awry, Jenna is involved in a brutal rape, aggravated assault, and murder...video cameras set up to make a sex tape record the entire ordeal.
A couple flying on a small plane to attend a tropical island wedding must fight for their lives after their pilot suffers a heart attack.
A dream and a curse lead a teen and his newfound friends on an unlikely destiny as they set out to save the nine realms of Ezra.
The Treasury Department plants a female agent in the office of a luggage company that is suspected of smuggling diamonds.

Ariel Price is a hardened prosecutor who has never lost a case for the state. When she encounters accused murderer Idris Grange, a descent into an unseen spiritual landscape begins that quickly envelopes everyone around her.
At sea,sailors have got to make do with what they have . François is in love with....the figurehead,the bust of a gorgeous woman..
Quick-witted, well-read cultured types revolve around each other in a delightful potpourri of theatre, romanticism and theft.
Fung, Lok, Calf and Singer were gangsters under Scarface Ho. They got in conflict with Wai's gang but ending up working for them instead.
Plot kept under wraps.

A mentally disturbed young woman takes a job at a posh country club and falls in with a clique of wealthy college kids where she's taken under the wing of the clique's twisted leader, who harbors some dark secrets too terrifying to tell.
Join Katsuma, Poppet, Mr. Snoodle, and the other Moshi Monters in an action-packed, song-filled race against time. Together they must stop evil Dr. Strangeglove and his incompetent sidekick Fishlips.
When a mother eats her own, no one is safe.
A village in north-central Mexico, is stalked by a mythical animal in early 20th century.

Gwen has just discovered that she's the final member of the secret time-traveling Circle of Twelve. Now she must juggle with constant trips to the past, her relationships with Gideon, and figuring out dark secrets surrounding the Circle.

The illegal sports car race "Street legal" goes 2000 kilometers through Norway from Oslo to North Cape, and Roy has been challenged to participate. At the same time, he has to look after his daughter.

A movie about devotion to God and the Trust and Faith to the One that has been always a devoted Father that always kept his promises to us. Trust in Him is not a safe comfort alternative in case things get touch in life.

Fed up with the growing number of "Naughty-Listers", Santa becomes a superhero dubbed Santaman. Santa and his new friends must find a way to stop the ultimate "Naughty-Lister" before Christmas disappears forever.

Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.
In purgatory for his role in a botched bank robbery, former carnival barker Billy Bigelow (Jackman) is sent back to his old life to for one day, where he's to fix the problems he left behind.
A retired assassin has to survive the wave of assassins who come knocking.
A 17-year-old girl tries to fit in at her new high school, while also finding a way to deal with her dad's unfortunate condition: he's a bloodthirsty werewolf.
A con man with freedom supervised starts a bloody path of revenge when his little daughter dies in a car crash after of First Communion's celebration.
A highly driven law student eludes her entitled rival as she retraces the path of the underground railroad.

BoBoiBoy and his friends have been attacked by a villain named Retak'ka who is the original user of BoBoiBoy's powers. He seeks to take back his powers from him to become the most powerful person and dominate the galaxy.
Love has it's secrets.
A Barbarian and his friends trying to do what's right is thrust into chaos trying to save the land and its people that he loves from an evil Sorceress in this epic tale of Sword and Sorcery.
After a young woman commits suicide, her neighbors try to piece together why she did it by tracking down her acquaintances.

An incredible movie beyond artificial intelligence. Riccardo builds and educates his artificial intelligence with all his strength till his artificial intelligence turns itself autonomously into a strong artificial intelligence.
Seven years of captivity come to an end and grief turns to joy when an unlikely hero rescues the princess to win her hand and the throne.

When a man's girlfriend (30 years his senior) passes away unexpectedly; while mourning his loss, he takes a walk on the beach and is mysteriously transported back to the year 1967 where he encounters an unexpected miracle.

column2: Pup School Jr: How Are We Made
column3: Pup School is back in session. Perfect for toddlers and babies, follow best buddies pups Moxie and Bo as they learn the basics of human anatomy in Pup School: How Are We Made?
During the last days of Eva Peron, a pair of low-ranking detectives are thrust into a case of corruption involving the Mafia.

Abby and Griff, driving into Los Angeles, find themselves in possession of a body and a bag of money. Pursued by the henchman of the mysterious and powerful Mr Colpeper, they enter a downward spiral of futile reaction and bad faith.
Modern adaptation of Charles Dickens' Great Expectations; a poor but talented boy falls in love with a girl from an affluent family.
Story under wraps.
An inexperienced thief decides to rob a bank to raise the money his sister needs to undergo an operation in the United States. During the robbery, he takes a very peculiar hostage.
In this fun family comedy, a village rooster's punctual (and loud!) crowing keeps everyone awake until a group of sleepy locals hatch a scheme to get rid of him.

Zagan, a bio-genetically enhanced human is looking at furthering human evolution through brute force and politics. It's the year 2021 and it's up to Fenneck, Rich and Nick to put a stop him. A sequel to Fatal Encounter: Rise and Fight.

When a new doctor moves in next door, the neighborhood kids believe that the doctor is making frankeinstein in his basement make it their mission to ensure he is not a creepy guardian of a terrible neighbor-eating monster.
Former underground out-law, John Steel is hired from the CIA to bring down 4 members of a silent corrupt group within the FBI.
When the final train of the night fails to arrive at a rural railway station, the expectant passengers begin to rift with matters made worse when one of the commuters is found dead.
The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.
Sci-fi story about a man (Timothy Dwight) on the run from a Big Brother-like security force.
A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.
Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.
A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.
Sharon Newton (Cassie Stuart) leads the uncooperative James Richards (Charles Dance) into a world of misplaced government secrets, capitalistic artists and bungling secret agents.

column2: Will Our Heroes Be Able to Find Their Friend Who Has Mysteriously Disappeared in Africa?
column3: A pompous, adventure-seeking businessman journeys through Africa with a clumsy employee to find his own disappeared brother-in-law.
Five strangers struggle when a madman imprisons them in an underground dungeon in this nail-biting horror.
It's up to a brother and sister with a mysterious past to stop age-old vampires from annihilating their college campus. Oh yeah, and still pass their mid-terms.
Set on the streets of East London; a young man teams up with his friends to take revenge on a group of thieves who murdered his mother.
A raging god of battle and a master samurai duke it out in a series of sword fights in a remote temple.
The Justice Society of America, a group of heroes aiding the allies in World War 2, acquire an ally from the future who sends them on an adventure that changes history.
A con-man/thief robs a suitcase containing explosives belonging to terrorists.
A slum girl reforms a gangster.

Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

An idealistic rookie cop joins the L.A.P.D. to make ends meet while finishing law school, and is indoctrinated by a seasoned veteran. As time goes on, he loses his ambitions and family as police work becomes his entire life.
An apolitical worker in a printing press who works as a scab during a company strike belatedly realizes that everyone is affected by the evils of society.
A middle-aged, misanthropic divorcé from New York City surprisingly enters a fulfilling, Pygmalion-type relationship with a much younger, unsophisticated Southern girl.
The imagination of a wildly creative girl comes alive in an amusement park.

Two young male metalheads get locked and trapped inside a bombed out town and have to face the repercussions of a nuclear fallout and radiation poisoning while a supernatural horror begins to engulf their lives.
In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.
Ganesh loves Sandhya obsessively , but she is not interested in him. His relentless pursuit leads to a lot of problems. However, everything changes the day he loses his father in an accident.

Based On Kanu Bhagdev's Novel "JASOOS", Mr. Jasoos revels around a murder which has more than 3 suspects and each has a strong motive for doing this murder. Find Out How Vijay Mane AKA Mr. Jasoos solves complicated case in the film.
A single mother on vacation, takes the law into her own hands to take back her abducted child.

Never-been-in-love Elvis, an extraterrestrial falls for Lea, a surfer after she rescues him from drowning. He makes it his new found life's mission to approach her but soon his plans go awry when he learns all Lea wants to do is die.
A Psychotic saxophone player (played both by Amos Poe and John Lurie) lures victims to deserted spots with his music and then guns them down.

Daniel and Walter are prisoners who have been recently released, and decide to take a boat tour where they meet couple Susan and Nob. They decide to camp out in the woods together, but things escalate when couple Linda and Phil show up.

Glen Davidson, a true crime novelist with a tragic past, and one-arm, becomes the top suspect in a murder. Dying of cancer, with weeks to live, Glen must prove his innocence, finish his most important book, and maybe find, Closure.

After unearthing an ancient bas-relief sculpture of the gradiva or 'woman who walks' a young archaeologist begins to dream of the figure eluding him, while also pursuing a mysterious woman who eludes him in his waking life.
Judge and his mistress are investigated on suspicions of corruption.

An English school boy living with his father, near Doha, Qatar, is almost killed when discovering what seems to be a spacecraft while diving in a ghostly Aquifer with his best friend, Amal, a young Qatari girl.
The third and final film of Anthony Chen's 'Growing Up' Trilogy will reunite his frequent collaborators Yeo Yann Yann and Koh Jia Ler as the leads.
A rom-com involving Rao and Mary, two unemployed new graduates, who decide to act as a married couple so that they qualify for two teaching jobs at a High School and eventually fall in love.
Six strangers find themselves in a maze of deadly mystery rooms and must use their wits to survive.
The fun-tastic Honey Bunny will kickstart the day at 9 AM with the movie, Honey Bunny as Police Patrol where they will save the day against dangerous criminals.

A yakuza enforcer is ordered to secretly drive his beloved colleague to be assassinated. But when the colleague unceremoniously disappears en route, the trip that follows is a twisted, surreal and horrifying experience.
Feature film based on the video game, 'Dante's Inferno', about a knight named Dante, who battles through the nine rings of hell to rescue his beloved Beatrice.
A tale of love and deception centred on Melbourne's crime syndicates and the men and women who pursue them.

An evil spirit Possesses the corpse of a diseased man. It must absorb the life energy of the living, in order for the corpse to not rot away. It moves to the suburbs, where, a neighbor begins to suspect something isn't right.
Trust. Deception. Loyalty. Who can you trust?

Betty and Victor are a pair of scam artists. One day Betty brings in Maurice, a treasurer of a multinational company. Maurice is due to transfer 5 millions francs out of Switzerland, and Betty is convinced he plans to steal that money.
A romantic journey through Stockholm's swing dance world. A dramatic comedy about love, music and dance.
After undergoing a procedure to erase his memories, a successful author begins having unexplained recollections relating to a series of unsolved murders.

Nerdy Herbert meets Annie, the holier-than-thou girl of his dreams. But his plans for romance might be derailed by a nasty punk rocker, a mad scientist, obsessed federal agents... and mysterious aliens bent on destroying the planet!
Two gay men live together. One of them falls for a beautiful woman.
Vahid meets a strange creature named "Patal" who comes out of the globe that his mother bought for him.If Vahid allows him to return to his homeland, Patal will agree to fulfill his wishes ...

column2: The Witch hour: Curse of the ring
column3: Sameer along with his girlfriend Natasha and business partner Vikrant land up in a house during a field trip. A strange women visit their house and gifts Natasha a cursed ring,which leads to a horrible chain of events in the house !!.
An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.
"Srinivasa Kalyanam" illustrates the sacred bond with another human through nuptial rituals and the sanctity of the institution of marriage.
The love of half-witted Vyshakh for the beautiful Fida and how it takes him places that are beyond reality.

A beautiful but imperious princess refuses all offers of marriage, often condemning her suitors to death. The prince of Denmark comes seeking her hand and, aided by magic objects given to him by a mysterious spirit, seeks to win her love.

Two dogs are placed in a pet hotel on New Year's eve as their owner go away on vacation. Feeling insulted, the dogs escape and return to their home, where they can enjoy life. But luck is brutally interrupted when two burglars break in.

Most of Earth has been destroyed by an asteroid. A small military colony, New America, has managed to survive in the Arctic. When a soldier goes missing at the colony, authorities send Ryan Murphy to investigate.
A fantasy story based on Kornei Chukovsky classics about a brave doctor Aybolit and his adventures on the land and on the sea.

column2: Masikip na ang mundo mo, Labrador
column3: A policeman escapes to the province to avoid being framed-up in a gold-bar heist that killed all his companions. He is also being hunted by the robbers who think that he ran away with the gold bars.

column2: Lady Love Life One: The Egyptian Greek Irish
column3: A Lady out of Love from a mixed heritage descent, finding her One in a time where Life a bit hectic going on but surprise still around, while meeting individuals on her way some connection to some old new ways to connect in Love in a way.
A cop travels back in time to take on a corporation that's out to eliminate a doctor who has created a new technology which can break up the monopoly on a energy resources.

On a chilly Halloween night in 1988, Fall Creek Valley turned upside down when Robert "Bobby" Maxwell disappeared from a party. On the 20 Year Anniversary, BLOODY BOBBY seeks revenge on his tormentors who sealed his fate with a blood pact.

A group of six friends on a road trip stop off at an amusement park attraction named 'Dark Ride', unaware that a psychopath who brutally murdered two girls, has just escaped a mental institution and is seeking refuge there.
Elliot heads for the sexual fantasy island, Eden. He takes some photos of diamond smugglers. They and undercover cops want the photos and follow him to Eden.
Olya and Yalo save the people of the looking glass from lies.
After a terrifying incident of man, a policewoman detective needs to find a way to stop the creepy horde of roaches before it can kill more people.
Shattered by the loss of her child, Nyla Jayde, a brilliant criminal defense attorney, takes on a case involving a 14th century Moroccan legend, a vengeful spirit named "Kandisha".
Fantasy adventures of a little redheaded girl and her animal friends in Australia. Live background and animated characters.

The unexpected disappearance of a young wife forced the protagonist to go to the police. The commissioner begins an investigation, and in the meantime, the local curate brings an allegedly repentant wife to the inconsolable husband.
The Reboot Cycle expanded universe.

A brilliant young psychiatrist devotes herself to the case of a chronic schizophrenic patient, whose family are utterly convinced she is possessed. Little by little, as the doctor succumbs to despair, could their fears be justified?
Detective Ellery Queen aids Free Dutch agents battle Nazi spies over a prize of industrial diamonds.

During the rebirth of society, two low-level workers unearth a mysterious device that traps them in a reality where their deepest fears and desires come to life, forcing them to confront the true nature of their existence.
When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.
Ateng and his twin Agung have been separated. Ateng meets Agung who has the same body and face as himself. Agung's assistant is also surprised.
At the time of the 90's two brothers usually visit the OVNI sightings area in the town of Atlimeyaya in Atlixco, Puebla Mexico. By means of a regression, they discover that they were abducted.
The city of Antwerp is being terrorized by a serial killer. When the killer discovers one of his victims is seeing a psychiatrist to overcome her trauma, he goes after her.
A young elven girl named Apple grows up to be a dark sorceress named Orb.
Three brothers are separated and united after many years - one is brought up a Hindu, another a Muslim and the last a Christian. Hilarity and adventure ensues.
Blackie helps the police rescue hostage from an escaped maniac on a killing spree.
An entrepreneur will let nothing stand in his way of acquiring a 100-story office building.
A small desert town is terrorized by a powerful, seemingly possessed car, and the local sheriff may be the only one who can stop it.

As the world faces a deadly plague, humanity's hope for a cure lies with a scientist who awakens imprisoned in a metal chamber. She desperately works to escape her confined cell to save the last of humanity.
PADDAYI is the story of Madhava and Sugandhi. They are a newly married couple from the fishing community in India. Driven by ambition, they bring upon them selves an epic tragedy.
A group of contestants travel to a castle in Italy to participate in a million dollar treasure hunt hidden on the premises. Little did they know, the lord of the castle hides a deadly secret.
A lone warrior nicknamed Deathstalker is sent by a witch on a quest to find a sword, a chalice, and an amulet, two of which are held by the wicked king and sorcerer, Munkar.
The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

Newyorkers visit the Texas depicted in The Texas Chainsaw Massacre. Their car breaks down. A young girl offers them her home as a refuge. Upon arrival, their northern prejudices clash with the southerners.
A constable seeks revenge for the murder of his father.

When "The Combat Mafia", the most notorious super-villains in the town of Blackridge , declare immediate demolition on all to bring worldwide terror, their nemesis, The Battle Head Warriors, must find a way to conquer their threat.

column2: And If Life Was but a Story...
column3: Not just another violent gangster story, this redemption tale is full of wisdom, depth and spirituality with synchronistic events presented in non-chronologic order and sliced down with the precision of a razor blade.
An unassuming track coach accidentally invokes the spirit of a notorious pirate long believed dead, and who must now team up to lay the pirate to rest, and save a local hotel from a mobster.
Bao sacrifices herself, becoming a butterfly, to save her sick fiance and discovers in the process how true their love is.

Rena Riffel (Showgirls/Mulholland Drive) stars in her directorial debut, the B Movie Musical Retro Satire, Trasharella. Transforming into a recycling trashy super hero, it is up to Trasharella to kill the Hollywood Vampire.
A toy shop owner/hero and his assistant/heroine battle a leather-clad vixen and her minions to prevent them from acquiring the pieces of a mystical skull.
Three evil sisters plot to kidnap a small Yorkie terrier who has inherited 500 million dollars.
An engineer travels back in time to stop herself from committing a murder.
A man becomes the superintendent of a large New York City apartment building where people mysteriously go missing.
A boy imprisoned by an abusive recluse mother alone in a mansion in the 1920s begins to get ideas of his own when a goblin in his closet comforts him in the dark.
A budding young man, entangled in a string of ritualistic murders, fights to find the killer and protect the people he loves.
The lives and loves of four sisters during their pastor father's absence.

column2: Taj Mahal: An Eternal Love Story
column3: The story of Shah Jahan...the love of his life...the life of his love...and his monument to love, the Taj Mahal.

Jeeva goes through 3 different stages of life - from school, to college and career. It talks about the views of youth on love. The story underlines the importance of not giving up hope after a break-up.
This revealing film shows unprecedented authentic images of babies inside and outside the uterus.

GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted criminal.
Four stories- and only one of them can be true.
Whilst on a picnic a teacher and her young student accidentally stumble across a murder victim and unwittingly become the target of the murderer.

column2: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
column3: "An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge" is a psychological thriller that takes many emotional turns and finally catches the audience off guard as it ends with an unsettling, macabre twist.
Khaldoun and Arif are two brothers separated by the war, both of them have different opinions, and between them Nejma and Nesma, between them a dream that will never come true.
Following Miguel, a former political prisoner under Pinochet who made a daring prison break in the '80s.
When one by one three female students went missing from a reputed university, Laboni may also be a victim of kidnapping. But how will Manju save Laboni based on only ideas?
A crazed killer known as "The Bat" is on the loose in a mansion full of people.
A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.
The year's great re-teaming event--two superstars, together again.
After the betrayal of his partner special police member Kei Nixon must evade capture from a bounty hunter looking to steal one the the universes most powerful weapons.
An exploration of masculinity and violence. A story of obsession and revenge, as a man tries to come to terms with a brutal, random attack and its consequences.

Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

column2: Doomsday and the Arrival of Dajjal
column3: Doomsday and The Arrival of Dajjal There will be three hard years before the Dajjal (appears). During them, people will be stricken by a great famine. In the first year, . People will stop offering the prayers .

column2: The Last Time I Saw You Blessed
column3: Mourning the drug-related murder of her boyfriend, a teenage girl trains for her town's half-marathon and becomes involved with a mysterious lover and a local gambling magnate, both of whom may be connected to her boyfriend's death.
A biographical fiction about a second-generation Korean in Japan named Kwon Hyi-ro (AKA Kin Kiro) who became a national hero in South Korea after holding 18 Japanese citizens hostage in 1968.
A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.
A dogged detective and his partner must uncover the mysteries relating to a Jane Doe murder when the only evidence is DNA leading to a twelve year old boy.
Wishes can come true if your dealing with the Devil in a bottle.
The agent for the Devil takes the soul of a high school sophomore in exchange for a date with the most popular girl on campus.
American spy Scorpion learns of the KGB capture of The Widow just as she is ready to retire. Later Scorpion gets kidnapped from her hot tub.
A man and a woman are on their way to a pool party. The apparently harmless situation shifts into a dance macabre.
When Sveppi's best friend Villi is kidnapped by the bad guys. Sveppi takes it upon himself with his buddy Goi to rescue him and an incredible adventure unfolds.
Iran, 1997: An American professor contracted by the federal government to observe tensions in pre-coup Tehran winds up falling for a woman with ties to Tehran's secret police force.
The parallel stories of a police commissioner and a bank robber whose lives eventually come together.

column2: Tempelriddernes Skat III: Mysteriet om Slangekronen
column3: The snake crown is stolen (or taken back) from the Knight Templars by the earth worshippers of Crete; the three kids try to retrieve it on behalf of the Knight Templars.
The house five people decide to stay on their trip to an island has some dark secrets that will unleash each of their inner fears and secrets as well.
Plot kept under wraps.
Follows a day in the lives of a group of Los Angeles high school students and the strange lives they lead.
A dying musician's son turns beggar, is adopted by a violin maker, and marries his daughter.
Curse turns a handsome prince into a werewolf at night. A princess tries to help him, while his enemies plot to take his throne.

column2: Kamen Rider Wizard in Magic Land
column3: A rainbow-colored tornado takes Haruto and Koyomi to an alternate reality called "Magic Land" where anyone has an ability to use magic, and some of them can even transform into a Kamen Rider Mage.

The town where Dina, a student of the Pedagogical Institute, comes to practice, is paralyzed with fear. A series of mysterious murders of outwardly similar girls makes residents think that a real maniac is operating in the city.
A farmboy-turned-knight must protect a princess from the schemes of an evil wizard.
A young boy and his family embark on a series of adventures when the boy finds some mysterious eggs which hatch to reveal a brood of baby dinosaurs.

Andrine and Kjell are both 17, and attends a private high school. Many things disturb their way to the spring exams, and fall in love. The come from different backgrounds, but gets common problems when she rents a room at Kjells parents.
In a groundbreaking new worldwide reality show, a randomly selected couple of strangers is sent into space, but the viewers do not know yet that they will be, on Earth, the actors of the program.

George, convinced a ghost killed his family, hires Robert, a talented Medium frustrated by his job. As the dead return to tell of ghostly seduction, demonic rage, and brutal murder, Robert discovers a horror more real than any ghost story.
The young girl Trine is expecting her boyfriend, the sailor Hans, home on Saturday night. They look forward to being together, but he never show up and Trine socialize with her neighbors instead.

column2: Capulina vs. The Mummies (The Terror of Guanajuato)
column3: A taxi driver winds up working as a butler for a scientist who is trying to revive mummies.

Two crooks attempts to blackmail a rich hotelier in order to get a huge sum of money. The plan goes horribly wrong as the hotelier is murdered and they have no choice except keeping his body to show him alive in order to be safe from law.

A man stares a dead girl. He doesn't know what happen. Patricia has a visit: a woman warns her about a girl who's in danger. With the help of an old man, the killer recalls the events of the murder while Patricia begins to dream nightmares.
The plot is unknown at this time.
A woman offers her country home to friends to help them save their marriage, but her well-meaning gesture creates a new problem.
Nine tales of terror weave together the story of isolated citizens around the world as they confront their darkest fears in an attempt to survive an increasingly deadly outbreak.
The various residents and occupants of a resort hotel await the outcome of a horse race at a nearby track, as it will affect each of their lives in different ways. .

This edgy Australian film stars an ensemble cast headed up by pop superstar Kylie Minogue, David Field, and Simon Lyndon. Various characters interact under strange circumstances, calling to mind movies such as GO and PULP FICTION.

Acting boss Hirotani of the Ohara gang uses his friendship with corrupt cop Kuno to usurp a staged land deal that rival yakuza gang Kawade had arranged through local politicians. Open warfare erupts between the two gangs.
the story of a gang consisting of seven snipers.
A disparate group of mystical misfits intertwine with an otherworldly, genderless apparition through fantastic and carnal dreamscapes.
Over-the-hill futuristic SEALs must train a rag-tag group of throw-away teens to help them save an entire planet from slavery using only gun powder.
Elizabeth, a down to earth school teacher and Donovan, a reserved NewYork businessman, are very different. Which means their engagement and wedding is nothing if unpredictable.

After a professional art thief steals a religious painting from an Italian museum, he tries to cheat his partner by claiming the painting was accidentally destroyed but his suspicious partner and the police are determined to find it.
Kaala is about the life of Nellai / Tirunelveli based Tamils who live in large number in Mumbai.
A group of indomitable Gauls are challenged by Roman Emperor Julius Caesar to accomplish twelve impossible tasks.

column2: The Seven Deadly Sins: Prisoners of the Sky
column3: The Seven Deadly Sins travel to the Sky Temple in search of an elusive ingredient.
The film deals with the current issue of terrorism, the working of government agencies and their information network, the exploitation of human emotions, and, the psyche of a terrorist.
A young star at a Wall Street firm finds that the white-collar world is filled with as much crime and death as the dangerous hood where he was raised.
After '3.11' Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant accident, an electric power company man who lost the spirit's balance turns into a monster and attacks Tokyo.
A talking purple dinosaur leads a group of children on a hunt for a large missing egg.
A train accident in rural Nebraska gradually unveils a mystery involving the town's bank clerk.
A re-telling of the Blue Gender TV series with newly added footage.
After gaining superpowers, a Korean man takes on the super-hero role of Esperman, and uses his powers to defeat evil space criminals.
A middle-aged ex-con hired to manage his nephew's fledgling music career is caught between working for and taking down the neighborhood's crime boss.

Delivering a continuous flow of urban landscapes' digitally reworked images where passers-by are seen as anonymous silhouettes, the film offers a poetic monologue commentating on a disenchanted vision of the ghostly ballet of modern life.
A futuristic firefighting mecha service is created to protect the world.
A knight and a priest investigate the disappearance of a young girl and the masked cult responsible.

When a monster from a popular animated show appears and starts a zombie outbreak, it's up to eccentric duo Lung and Chi-Yeung to stand up and fight the horde of the recently deceased, and save their friends from all around chaos!

The sleepy mountain town of Mystic Valley is a place where local legends reign supreme, where children have gone missing inexplicably for decades, and where deep in the mysterious woods- one little girl learns that legends - are real.

column2: The Butterfly Collector: The Red Room
column3: Sad and beautiful fate of a high school girl and a former high school teacher. Their deep affection turns into madness - A modern adaptation of a short novel "Akuma Ningyo" by Edogawa Ranpo.
A chilling supernatural thriller about the nomadic spirit of a semi-conscious child -- the only one who can identify a brutal killer.
A truly one-of-a-kind story. Revenge taken to the next level. This film is highly experimental, so much so that we believe it's never been done before.
A couple is pulled over by police. When a simple traffic stop becomes a nightmare they will never forget.
When Scrat's acorn sends an asteroid to Earth, the Herd must find a way to stop the asteroid from hitting Earth with the help of a returning friend.
After killing the son of a powerful oil tycoon, an infamous hit-man becomes the target of American soldiers and superhuman killers.
When he was about to quit his job to open a restaurant, Brian takes finds himself embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.
In the near future, a financial crisis will hit Korea and slums arise. From those areas, a group of young people commit crime to survive.

A female Anglican priest and her husband, a soldier suffering from PTSD, must cope with the death of their child. While both descend deeper into depression, they become aware of demonic spirits haunting and terrorizing them.
A picture you will tell your friends to see.
George, Ruth and Humphrey go for a boat ride with Wolf Larsen.

column2: Baba Yaga: Terror of the Dark Forest
column3: When Egor's mom dies, he gets a stepmom and then a baby half sister. Things get seriously twisted when his dad gets a hot nanny, who's the witch, Baba Yaga.

A TRUE-TO-LIFE STORY - THE FIRST FILIPINO WHOSE CRIME TERRIFIED NOT ONLY THE WHOLE NATION, BUT THROUGHOUT THE WORLD!. EVEN THE CRACK COMMANDO AND THE SWAT COULD HARDLY STOP HIM. AN ACTION-FILLED MOMENT IN CRIME HISTORY.
One man's rogue is another man's hero: The story of Edmund Teach - AKA Blackbeard.
Damian grows up like a normal boy, with an unusual musical talent; Until he realizes his destiny was written in the stars years ago, and he's given a divine task to save the world.
A petty robbery spirals into a tense hostage situation after three gunmen hold up a diner that's a front for the mob.
A master thief's shady parole officer coerces him and five misfit ex-cons into committing a lucrative heist that could jeopardize their freedom . . . or bring down a corrupt pharmaceutical company.
A modern-day Parisian town crier gradually learns that someone is using him to give cryptic warnings of a plague outbreak in the city.

FBI agent Jeff Gordon is to investigate the theft of a US missile prototype. The suspect Anderson, however, is found dead. Jeff Gordon's only lead is the photograph of a woman that Gordon finds among Anderson's papers.

When an adventurous Hmong teen discovers a secret map to a mythical dragon, he and his three best friends decide to go on a quest that leads them on a journey filled with danger, excitement, and self-discovery.

column2: I Was a Prisoner on Devil's Island
column3: A ship's officer is sentenced to Devil's Island for murder after a fatal brawl.

In 18th-century England, the Royal Crown sends Royal Navy Captain Collier and his crew to investigate reports of illegal smuggling and bootlegging in a coastal town where locals believe in Marsh Phantoms.
A musical story about how people find their love on the streets of beautiful Paris.
The Chamber of Commerce brings together the Dionne quintuplets and other people Dr. John Luke delivered. He hands out wisdom and advice to all.
Nasty white hunters are testing out their germ warfare weapons using wild animals in Africa ... until they run into Jungle Jim.
University students, planning a bravery initiation test for their fellow classmates, choose a campus bridge rumored to be haunted by a vengeful female ghost.
They came from a doomed world to save us from the same fate.

In the winter of 1932 a communist pioneer leader was found slain in a working class district of Berlin. The police tried to blame the communists for the murder and arrested the dead man's friend and comrade, Kurt Büttner.
Racecar-driver Lou Larrigan gets mixed up with a crooked gang of racetrack promoters, and is in love with Ruth Morgan, whose father is marked as a victim by the gang.
During a Sunday trip into war-ravaged Tokyo, despairing Yuzo and optimistic Masako look for work and lodging, as well as affordable entertainments to pass the time.
Felix is an Angel working in a low level job in heaven's accounting department until he answers a distress call from earth.
A conflict of generations when a father, connected to organized crime, is sentenced for embezzlement and his son turns to drugs and a spectacular suicide in a car accident.
A telepathic mutant recruits a post-World War III TV game-show warrior to lead her band of mutants to safety.
Kid Azteca not only fights to be someone in life, he also fights for the love of Avelina, who shows disinterest in him when she sees that fame has gone to his head.

A wealthy narcissist and his friends travel to Africa in the 1970's posing as artists in the scheme of the year smuggling drugs. Their rapacious greed awakens the vengeful spirits of the jungle, which follow them back to New York.
Four local boys borrow a lot of money from the local mafia. Incompedent as they are, they loose the money. They have to think of infinite ways to earn and return the amount. In seven days...
Bengali adaptation of the hound of baskervilles
Plot and story are in development.

Story centers on an everyday guy with the rarest of blood types who is suddenly and unexpectedly forced to deliver his very own, freshly stolen kidney to an infamous criminal whose life depends on it.

When a car thief can't resist stealing one more car, she finds herself in possession of $2.7 million mob money, and the mob's counterfeit printing plates. The mobsters and corrupt cops don't take kindly for this, and the chase soon begins.

column2: The Place Between Heaven and Hell
column3: Justin is distort over the fatal car accident which takes the lives of his fiancée and best friend. When suicide seems to be his only option, he visits his uncle Peter, the therapist to discuss his emotion struggles.
An elite team of firefighters are forced to fight for survival when they become trapped in a burning building with a fire demon.
After finding an old storage locker filled with his family's history, James Erikson begins a journey to discover the truth behind a mysterious piece of land in the small town of Solitude.

A wondrous prostitute plies her trade while living on a boat in Hong Kong. With a superhuman libido and three loving husbands, she doggedly devotes herself to her work. Using sex to satirize the era, this film brims with intense desire.

Summoned to his soon-to-be demolished childhood home, Mason discovers a video camera that can see into the past, driving him to record as many memories as possible before the doomed house is destroyed.
When the madam of a brothel is robbed by a notorious and wanted criminal in 1850s San Francisco, she forms a posse of her ladies and seeks justice for his wrongdoing.
The story about the guy, who want to find the killer of his girl, going through the mind of many people...
DRAMA (2002) A girl is found dead. Three suspects have been romantically involved with her.

column2: Eddie Reynolds y Los Ángeles de Acero
column3: They are not wild and crazy anymore, or at least they think so. Now, thanks to an offer nobody can't refuse, they will try to recapture that old rock and roll magic and give themselves a second chance.
Philippa Shelley races against time to clear her husband Nicholas Talbot of a murder he did not commit. While she works on getting proof, the prosecution is doing all it can to force a conviction.

A father pulls his son from junior high so the boy can help him in his deepsea fishing operations. Unhappy, the boy runs away to Seoul and becomes a boxer, eventually returning home a hero in all but his father's eyes.
The story of this film is about a young adult boy whose father was dead, and he could not believe this truth.
A psychiatrist, John Hatchett, wakes up tied to a chair in an abandoned warehouse. Left with no food, water or chance of escape, John's only weapons are his mind and he must use them to full effect.
The adventures of motorcycle cops, from their academy days, to chasing crooked truckers.

Charlie Bucket, an African-American teenager, wins not only the chance of a lifetime by finding a golden ticket in a Wonka bar but also a fate and divine truth about himself as things unfold in Wonka's devilish labyrinth.
Toward the icebreaker "Mikhail Gromov" is moving a huge iceberg. Leaving from collision, the ship falls into the ice trap, and is forced to drift near the coast of Antarctica.

column2: Once Upon a Time in Phuket
column3: Average Swedish guy Sven, bored with his life, decides to go to Thailand to write a novel and "get away from the rat race". He meets a range of peculiar characters and learns a few things about love, friendship, and himself.
Depressing tale about a world of the undead and a woman's trek to get home to her boyfriend's house.
A young boy, in an effort to have a normal childhood in 1980's El Salvador, is caught up in a dramatic fight for his life as he desperately tries to avoid the war which is raging all around him.

column2: RUMP: The Complete, Untold Story of Rumpelstiltskin
column3: Based on the Brothers Grimm fairy tale of Rumpelstiltskin.

Chris, slick adventurous grandson of legendary adventurer Allan Quatermain, searches for the mythical treasure of Alexander the Great with the help of a pretty German girl, while eluding a dangerous greedy gangster.
The film tells, like a fable, the struggle of a young woman to protect her unborn child which she believes is a miracle, an immaculate conception.

An undercover cop visits a drug company to get information on a program that gives convicted felons superpowers. With heat on his trail, he must use his newly acquired powers to stop the program and bring its powerful convicts to justice
Tomás returns to the summer house of his childhood in order to sell it, only to find himself caught in a spiral that will face him to his most deeper fears.

column2: Henry Seers and the Cycle of Doom
column3: plot is unknown at this time.
-The Hunt Begins- For them it was revenge. For him it was a challenge. A timeless ride on a ferocious mission.
A newlywed woman goes to the local shaman to get some help with her love life, but instead she gets turned into a white reindeer vampire.

Mexican beauty Camilla Lopez (Salma Hayek) hopes to rise above her station by marrying a wealthy American. That is complicated by meeting Arturo Bandini (Colin Farrell), a first-generation Italian hoping to land a writing career and a blue-eyed blonde on his arm.
To escape the wrath of the gangster whom they work for, a gang of treasure-seeking, bumbling criminals go to a hillside village, which, they don't realise is a ghost town, literally!
Two brothers, one wanted for murder, are shipwrecked on an island inhabited by nubile young women who have amassed a valuable cache of pearls.
Though Benny, an orphan, shares a close bond with Annie, the two get separated at a very young age. Years later, when Annie decides to return to Benny, fate has other plans for them.
Scientists working on the CIA's Remote Viewing black-project: 'Cassandra', uncover the most dangerous threat humanity has ever faced.

column2: The Domestication of Otis WIckle Wackle
column3: When Otis Wickle Wackle cannot stop crying, he discovers a box containing a Mary Lou Head which he soon falls head over heels in love and with that he threatens to break through societal barriers.

An Alien virus is unleashed on Earth, mutating millions into carnivorous beasts. Scientist Nick Richards, and a hard nosed team of survivors wage a losing battle against the alien force, desperately trying to restore Human life.
A young girl's seven brothers have been turned into ravens, so she sets out to save them.
An aspiring singer-songwriter's life and marriage suffer when the song he writes for his wife propels him to stardom.
A rescue unit within the Chinese Coast Guard are forced to overcome their personal differences to resolve a crisis.
A comic thriller about two people who miss the last local train at 1:40 am and how missing of their train changes their course of life forever.
The true story of how a seal named Andre befriended a little girl named Toni and her family in 1962.
When her best friend disappears, a sheltered college student investigates the dark underbelly of the lakeside vacation town she has only known as a summer tourist.
A Swedish airline stewardess fall in love with a black American man.
When her father is taken hostage, a woman is forced into a life of crime; and soon, everyone is after the priceless necklace in her possession.
While searching for her missing father, an emotionally damaged woman confronts her tragic past and a shadowy figure with sinister intentions.
In a provincial town, a student discovers that he has a heart disease. The boy is a pioneer and his colleagues support him.

column2: Vi kunde ha' det saa rart
column3: A poor lady comes the nanny to three children while supporting the children's musical program.
The Nepal Bhasa film 'Karma' based on a Buddhist story began its screening at Guna Cinema Hall, Gwarko, Nepal on Saturday.
A Dogme film about an engaged couple that is torn apart after the man is paralyzed in an accident, and the woman falls in love with the husband of the woman who caused the accident.
Sebastien is a psychological horror story about dark secrets destroying people and their families from the inside out.

Arnold, a boy who has believed from an early age that he is an extraterrestrial and now sees his time on earth coming to an end. He tries to build a flying machine so that he can return ...                See full synopsis »

A group of friends go to the desert for a gun instruction course and accidentally unleash a power so great it overwhelms them where they must choose between family and friends versus the fate of the world.
Traces the journey of a suburban family - led by a well-intentioned but domineering father - as they navigate love, forgiveness, and coming together in the aftermath of a loss.
After a young artist saves a girl from drowning, they fall in love. But her father opposes the match unless the young man can succeed in business. He does, and wins the lady.
Postal inspectors track down money stolen from a railroad car.
Laura inherits an aunt's house and decides to stay there for a few days with her partner in order to renovate it and sell it. But they are not alone.
After an Algerian informant is murdered, two female investigators are sent to investigate.
A sympathetic anthropologist uses drugs and surgery to try to communicate with a primitive troglodyte who is found living in a local cave.

Egon Olsen and his 2 friends are hired to stage the theft of a Ming vase. He's double-crossed by the baron and wants revenge by swapping the Ming vase with a cheap copy during a big party at the castle. Will they succeed?
William Singh is a hard working man until a tragedy brings out his alter ego Bush Knife.
Three strangers are drawn together in search of Darcy, a man they all love who has been involved with some nasty underworld business.
After breaking up with girlfriend Zeta, Frankie heads north for prostitution where he meets an attractive girl Celia and develops feeling for her.

Talking to a stranger can be very therapeutic for the fact that you can say exactly how you feel without fear, judgment and insecurity. But what happens when that stranger becomes a reflection of the decision you should make?
Inner city kids from a poor neighborhood go up against the undefeated Beverly Hills Junior National Karate Team.
A desperate drug-pusher must avoid police, and find money to pay-off a huge debt.

When a magical anime transforms two Japan-obsessed teenage friends and a shy foreign exchange student into its superpowered characters, the three underdogs must discover their inner heroes in time to save the world.
a group of international robbers go to Rio to preform their biggest job.
A year after losing her mother, a little girl learns that she must journey across Japan to the annual gathering of gods in the sacred land of Izumo.
A team of criminals with technological skills are recruited on a mission.
A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

column2: The Strongest Man in the World
column3: Dexter Riley and his friends accidently discover a new chemical mixed with a cereal seems to give anyone temporary superhuman strength

column2: Little Einsteins: Our Big Huge Adventure
column3: The title group comprises Leo, Annie, Quincy, and June and their quest to get a lost caterpillar back home.
An insurance investigator goes to Los Angeles to investigate the disappearance of a colleague.
As bipolar Psyche Lyssa Echo Smith enters therapy so her estranged husband will come back home, her psychoses begin traveling in outer space.
Two brothers with the secret power of starting fires with their minds, reunite after years apart, only to find conflict with their differing lifestyles.

College students exploring an abandoned insane asylum accidentally shatter canisters holding the cremains of former mental patients. Inhaling the dusty ash filling the air, they're soon possessed by the souls once held within them. One is a convicted serial killer from 1950.

column2: Dragon Ball Z: The Return of Cooler
column3: Cooler has resurrected himself as a robot and is enslaving the people of New Namek. Goku and the gang must help.
To marry Princess Jana, Captain Sindbad must battle deadly obstacles and fight El Kerim, the evil ruler who also wants to marry the princess.
Behind the looks of a shy film student, David hides an obscure past that is about to be revealed.

A couple drives to their weekend-cottage, one final time: The woman wants to sell it, the man does not, because he has too many personal connections with the place. When a duo of intruders shows up, everything seems to escalate...
A man named Lucio decides to avenge the death of his sister-in-law after she is killed during a break-in. In order to complete this task, he must become part of a gang.
A Chinese-American woman tries to expose an illegal-alien smuggling ring.
A hospital psychiatrist's own sanity is pushed to the edge when a frightened amnesiac patient insists that he has died and brought something terrible back from the other side.
When his classmate is injured while delivering milk before school, a friend takes over his task and pays the hospital bill for his friend's poor family.

A man is trapped in a murder conspiracy and no one believes him and gets further blackmailed by the killer. Now he must race against time to find out who is the real killer and uncover his secret motive behind it.

Joe Joe has just opened up his very own rim shop and things are going well until an evil loan shark comes to collect an old debt. With no money in the bank Joe Joe has 24 hours to come up with the cash or he loses everything.
A high school senior has to re-live losing his virginity over and over again until he gets it right, with the right girl.
The film tells the story of a boy who is responsible, along with his father, for finding the cure for an illness that is contracted after the person takes a fright.
A couple decides to split after 12 years together. The man (Bernal) find it easy to move on, but difficult to prevent his ex from hounding him, or the new women in his life.

Over breakfast, Bill Fry tells his wife Constance that he has had another call from their old friend, Dan Carter, who is the principal at their overly imaginative teenage son Junior's ...                See full synopsis »
A taxi driver with a tragic past sees an opportunity for redemption when he encounters a woman sold into prostitution. Wanting to help her escape, he has to deal with the wrath of the brothel madam.

The Gas House Kids take a job delivering an automobile to California, unaware that it is a stolen car. Upon their arrival, they discover a hot-car ring run by a crooked ranch foreman with lecherous designs on the rancher's daughter.
6 diverse college students end up at the mercy of an Occult ritual, after deciding to attend the biggest party of the year, on Halloween night, hosted by fellow student James Pitman.
The heinous murders of a serial killer keep the residents of the small town of Sountheim in suspense.

What would happen if the Earth collided with a Nebula and created a new plant over Earth. Would there be a new living species running over our planet? The connection between two planets one new and one existing inter-square planet Earth 2.
A fifteen-year-old model train geek's date with his dream girl suddenly derails when a sinister hobby store owner shrinks and imprisons them in an elaborate, unearthly train set.
Retelling of the classic fairy tale, but from a decidedly 1960s point of view, complete with "groovy" dialogue.
When three young friends uncover ancient Hawaiian legends, they unleash a giant pineapple-headed monster wreaking havoc on the island and its up to them to save their hometown.
Two twin barbarians seek revenge from the warlord who massacred their tribe and captured them when they were small children.

It's a funny thing facing your fears. For the friends and family of Peter Mills, overcoming your childhood fears is just another part of growing up. But for Peter, it means facing a monster that's always lived under his bed.
When a girl goes missing a suspect is quickly established but as events unfold the truth becomes ever more distorted.

Maël tries hard to cope with his partner Adam's suicide as well as their troubled past together. Patricia, also one of Adam's lovers, gets herself into danger in her attempt to help Maël in his grief.
The simple working guy Lyokha gets acquainted with the beautiful Masha. She shows him photos that he cannot remember.

Struggling with a lack of self-confidence, a woman travels down the rabbit hole as a underground black market body enhancement practitioner juggling life, death, motherhood and the price of beauty in this dark, sexy crime thriller.
A young woman's dreams of moving to Wyoming are halted when her unstable boyfriend accidentally kills a man.
A young couple need easy money. A few friends join them to plan a kidnap, but nothing goes right when some of them go after revenge and betray each other.

Beware of Nosfero's army - they worship strength and have no mercy for the weak. His dangerous cult begins a wave of terror through the wasteland. In their way is Sgt. W2 of the special police forces.
An impecunious employee embezzles a large sum of money to save his ailing sweetheart.
Two outer-space aliens visit Earth with the intention of blowing it up, but they meet a hot blonde and decide to postpone the planet's destruction in order to try to score with her.
China 1925, a man returns to track down a kill the men who murdered his brother.
A man seeks revenge after he and a bank teller are shot during a robbery.

Occupied France; Lebrac leads a play war between two rival kid gangs, but a girl he likes, who's Jewish, is in danger of being discovered by local Nazi sympathisers. Lebrac and the village must now respond to the reality of what's happening.

Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.
"In a world where life and death are slowly becoming the same thing, I have come to realize that while I thought I was learning how to live, I had actually been learning how to die"
The story of a young boy and his lifetime loyal family Airedale.

Simple, beautiful "Payal" one day suddenly her own acquaintance made her pregnant and killed her, Payal is not in this world, but will Payal's soul rest in peace, will her killers be punished and if they get punished, how will they get it?

Don't open the box is a horror movie anthology. A journalist interviews indie director Andy Dodd about his new horror movie and realizes that the inspiration for his film doesn't come from his mind, but is based firmly in reality.
Based on the true story of Air Force personnel in Srinagar, Kashmir.
If your deepest desires spontaneously manifested into reality, giving you powers and abilities once limited to your dreams, what would you do?
Dorothy Gale's granddaughter returns to Oz to fight evil.

Gordon invents the Rememory machine that allows him to see memories as they actually were. He dies in his office. Is it murder? Sam investigates by using the machine "borrowed" from Gordon's wife. He looks at memories of others involved.

For Christmas, family members are driven to head for Quebec City. Elsa longs to find a boyfriend. Chloe is preoccupied by her professional duties and by her dog. A has-been singer is torn between his mistress and his lawful wife.

column2: Ping Mo Ce: The Red Sword of Eternal Love
column3: Yue Qingyin investigates her sisters death.
A young Japanese woman has been trained to become a professional killer since childhood. Two cops pursue the girl, who has assassinated a Hong Kong official.
Based on the true story of the "Necrophil Brothers", two young brothers who were accused of brutal murders in the 90's, in Brazil.

A college student researching massage parlors decides to take the next step and work at one herself, a particularly sleazy one in the bad part of town. In the massage parlor she learns a great deal about friendship and life.

A teenage girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.
Spoiled son of a businessman is expelled from his fathers testament, left only with antique car that his father used in his youth. The car turned out to be the time machine..
Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.
Dark mysteries of a once great ancestral home are unleashed in the aftermath of tragedy.
Bill, Dan, Diana and Jamie, four motorcyclists who arrived at Whiskey Mountain for a treasure hunt, are terrorized in the woods by a gang of murderous hillbilly drug dealers.
A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.
A rich young boy finds his family the target of an inside job, and must use his cunning to save them.

Somewhere in the jungles of South America mercenaries stop a truck which has allegedly loaded fruit. The cargo turns out to be six young women. Apprehended and handed over to the custody of the local women's prison.

After being left at home when her mother goes on a business trip, a young girl witnesses a woman being kidnapped. With the help of a veteran New York detective, she undauntedly attempts to solve the kidnapping - no matter what it takes.
Two high-school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, who promptly turns their lives upside-down.
A modern adaptation of Dumas' Three Musketeers.
A pair of adventurers try to track down an ancient Aztec/Mayan/Egyptian/Apache hoard of gold.
Set in Shanghai. Everyone panics.
After his family tries to kill him and he has been pronounced dead, Michel returns to vex them. He presents each one with a voodoo doll, warning of their fate.
Retells the events of the anime series into one film.
After an innocent man is executed in a case for which he was responsible, a Scotland Yard superintendent finds himself investigating the murder of his key witness.
A masked wrestler/superhero goes up against a madman and his army of robots.
In the eleventh hour, one man's last attempt to preserve humanity may be what separates a desperate group of survivors from becoming the very monsters they are trying to escape.
Eda's quiet and small environment changes when she meets undercover cop Sarper. An unexpected love reveals all the secrets.
