A man named Sean must go on a quest to end his former friend Cooper before he ends the world and all of humanity. Sean must go on a Journey to defend his world.
An ex con antiques dealer is faced with a huge debt he's put under pressure to repay. As a solution he agrees to steal the Russian crown jewels on exhibition on board a cruise ferry.
A ruthless criminal flees from the pursuit, involving more and more casualties.

The Day After Halloween follows a group of college students, in a community that is trying to forget about this particular holiday--as it is a reminder of a tragic time. After some time, things begin to take a turn for the worse.
Canal V is the most viewed channel of Portuguese television, Valentina its biggest star. Her body is discovered in a meeting room. The past comes back to haunt Canal V. What happened to Valentina?
Shawn (Michael Masurkevitch) and Manny (Mandip Brar) are spending the weekend at Shawn's family cabin. However, as the past and present begin to overlap, Shawn descends into horrific madness.

In a near future dominated by augmented-reality eyepieces, a troubled young man who suffers from agoraphobia experiences an unlikely transformation when he comes across a mysterious app that transforms every facet of his life into a game.

Faith Jennings is adopted and blessed with the gift of music. After a tragic accident, she becomes blind and partially deaf in one ear. Family and friends pray for a miracle to have her hearing and sight restored once again.
A lovable scoundrel's life is cut short when he angers the god of death; however, he still has a few tricks up his sleeve.
Six troubled young adults come face-to-face with their worst nightmares when their traumatic pasts come back to haunt them.

column2: Broken by a Vampire (Las Vegas Vampires Four)
column3: Book Four of the Las Vegas Vampires Vampire Dark Romance Series.

column2: Wicked Trails: From a future we'll never know
column3: Set in a neo-noir universe, a father must trigger a chain of events in order to live in a reality where his daughter is still alive while an amateur actor from a far advanced reality gets stuck in this world.

Hupar wakes up from a 20-year coma. Disoriented, he soon meets Arete, a young poet and Sophis, a TV newswoman. Together, the three team up to expose corporate crime in a crumbling city scape of the very near future.

Faced with many outside struggles, a group of friends decode to take some time off and go to the cabin in the woods, expecting nothing but a good time. But those dreams are short-lived as a killer is found amongst them.
A group of college students travels to a mysterious island to attend a rave, which is soon taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.
After the climate change disaster, a new breed of teenagers survive with the help of the Sun god and solar energy is the only option.
A clumsy police officer must save the town from the forces of evil before it's too late.
Hackett, the executive of the local Cattleman's association which also runs the local orphanage is using the Association police to rustle cattle and embezzle its funds.
A group of friends start to notice something weird happening in their home town. The residents start displaying rage like symptoms after a buried bacteria is released into the public.

A painter who can temporarily talk to the creatures of an enchanted forest must help them stop the evil Cactus King, who's building an army of magical living weapons and machines to turn the forest into a wasteland perfect for the cacti.

Citizens of Oro Fino hire a gunman known only as The Texan to ward off bandits. As he heads into town, he meets Teresa, who also has a job awaiting her. Upon arrival, the Texan narrowly escapes an attempt on his life. Is Teresa involved?
A couple steals a Matisse painting on contract. They manage to escape the police. The sale takes place 4 days later on an island. Things don't go as planned.
A frame that says, 'Drink makgeolli (rice wine) here and the one you miss will return' is hung on the wall of a tavern titled The Return. The tavern's regulars miss their lost ones.
When a woman is killed in a park, the police bring in everyone suspected of being there when the incident occurred and question them. One of them is the killer.
At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

Story about a man named Kato that is a Limo Driver by day and gets a job to pick up a client that is a CIA agent and mixes Kato up into a operation that will bring him across the globe to become the unsung hero.

column2: Space Opera - The Shade of Human Soul
column3: 22nd Century, A bureau officer of Earth Space Station receives an enigmatic call from the future. The officer joins a new Colonizer Mission in order to discover its meaning. A hundred years of adventure and loneliness through galaxies.
A prop dagger is replaced by a real dagger at a ballet school, and may help to find the killer in a 30-year-old murder.
Plot undisclosed. Described as "a thriller about stealing a country."
Kamali loses her bag in the railway station. Later, her bag is sent to her home, along with a letter from Surya, who found it. Kamali and Surya send letters to each other and soon fall in love.

Ajay, Kiran and Shalini, who are best friends. One day Ajay, who is a young entrepreneur, plays a prank but things get out of hand and he gets entangled in it himself. With the police on the hunt for him, will Ajay get out of this mess?

column2: Olsenbanden og Dynamitt-Harry mot nye høyder
column3: A formerly respected oil company man wants to sell company secrets to a foreign company for 100 million German mark. Egon Olsen gets hold of the micro film. The worst is not the police, since Dynamite Harry is near in his helicopter.
A species of creatures known as "thoriphants" rebel against their life of servitude and embark on a treacherous journey to find the fabled city of Uprights.
A hitman approaches a writer to help him create his next best seller, but the violent world he was a part of has other plans.
Eleven-year-old Cory (Dan Byrd) is a foster child nobody wants. Carlotta (Academy Award-nominee Julie Harris) is an elderly woman the world has forgotten.
Dorothy enters the picture.

After the battle of Worcester at the end of the Civil War, the main aim of Oliver Cromwell's Commonwealth is to capture Charles Stuart. The future king's escape depends on the intrepid Earl of Dawlish.
A group of college students attend a haunted attraction in the south, where things aren't quite what they seem and their worst nightmares become a reality.

A small group of young misfits with supernatural abilities must band together against an evil tyrant who seeks to capture them for his own selfish gain. Will the help of two former heroes be enough to survive and put a stop to Him?
'My father is abroad', says the 12-year-old Lena, when the teacher asks. But Lena's father is not abroad. He is in jail. Now she is 16 and sitting there herself. Original drama for a young audience.

After Leila, his boss's daughter, is kidnapped by psychopathic plague victim Decker, chauffeur Chazz teams up with plague-infected mercenary Luger to penetrate the toxic & off-limits Plague Zone and bring her back alive.

Detective David Wright is on a search for his uncle who just committed a murder. With their father on the run, his seven children has a choice to help find their murderous father, or help him escape. You don't choose your family.
The lives of three different men named David are about to change forever.
Set in a mythical world, riders compete in a race with their water horses.
Two teenage detectives, who started off finding lost kittens, begin searching for a missing high-school senior.

Lucas and his team are after a gang of Serbian criminals using NATO-issued weapons. As the investigation leads him to Paris, Lucas attempts to reconnect with his estranged daughter, a young narc officer.
Getting trapped in your own visual universe.
Margot, a young woman who was abandoned by her mother as a baby, travels to a secluded Amish community with a documentary film crew seeking answers about her mother and extended family.
The criminal misadventures of a high school valedictorian on his last day of school in outskirts of Washington D. C.
In the early 1960s, a Sicilian single mother marries an older, crass widowed truck driver. When he is arrested trying to smuggle an antique, she ends up falling in love with her handsome stepson.
Superhero Captain America battles the evil forces of the archvillain called The Scarab, who poisons his enemies and steals a secret device capable of destroying buildings by sound vibrations.
A heroic-patriotic film about the Russian engineer Glagolev and his son Boris, a brave aviator-designer who became a Red Army man during the civil war years.
Plot under wraps.
Characters from an assortment of Victorian-era novels join forces to battle against a common enemy.

In order to buy a horse, a man wanders in the bazaars of Thessaly. His journey will take him further than he imagines, as old prophets, forgotten witches and vampire princes will find himself on his way.

It tells the story of a mother's desperation to locate her child when the abductor dies before her child can be located. With time running out, the child's mother seeks the assistance of a spiritual medium.
While preparing for a prestigious concert, a troubled pianist discovers that he is composing a spectacular masterpiece in his sleep.
A group of women with various criminal skills are thrown into prison during World War 2. They escape and proceed to head off to destroy a chemical lab in a well fortified valley.
A land developer and his girlfriend are hunted on a remote island for sport by three deranged locals.

7 guys from Paris' suburbs like challenges like climbing tall buildings and doing parkour - especially with cops/flics chasing them. When a kid fan urgently needs a heart the Yamakasis try to find a way.

Hailed as India's first stereoscopic animated film, 'Krishna Aur Kans' is an exciting narrative full of action and drama. The movie chronicles Krishna's early years -- from his birth as the nemesis of his tyrannical uncle Kans.
A twisted honeymoon adventure about a young couple on their way to Niagara Falls.
A story about love between a Italian guy and a Russian guy
The plot is under wraps but described as Hunger Games-like in tone.
An unstable veteran tries to rescue his kidnapped daughter and unleashes the beast within himself during his quest. He quickly becomes suspected himself.
Raised in Light while thrown into Darkness, a child finding its place through time and year, a better tomorrow on mind, while enough going on, a journey set to the Sky And Beyond.
When a young girl is jailed for a murder she didn't commit, a doctor helps her escape to capture the real killer and clear her name.
This is the story of rebirth, which is based on the love of past lives
An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.
Adventures of three Red Army soldiers - Misha, Dunyasha, and Tom Jackson (an African-American boy) - who fight against Ukrainian anarchist Nestor Makhno and his forces during the Russian Civil War.
A woman with a mysterious illness is forced into action when a group of terrorists attempt to hijack a transatlantic overnight flight.
An Indigenous Yoruba Film From Nigeria. It tells the story of God's Love for Man even when human being thinks HE does bad things.
At a local tennis club in a posh London suburb, an attractive but flirty young woman is murdered, prompting a Scotland Yard investigation.

Based on Dostoyevsky's 'Crime and Punishment': Ramón is a lonely laws student that lives in a rented room and thinks he has committed the perfect crime, but can't stand the consequences. A story of irrationality, anxiety and suffering.
A runaway bride, a young peasant, mysterious illusionists and a manic investigator become entwined in a murderous affair at a Baltic German baron's manor.

It's Ed and Sarah's first night in their new home, a perfect farmhouse in the country. A new beginning away from their stressful city lives. It suddenly dawns on them: they do not belong here and they're certainly not welcome.

After conquering R'yleh and the Frozen Kingdom young Howard Lovecraft must now travel to the Undersea Kingdom in order to free his captured family, protect three mysterious magical books, and prevent the impending wrath of Cthulhu.
Before the veil of the Key of Life in "Neoni: Destiny of Archangel" pushed them together, they lived not knowing that the universe would bring them together. These are the Keys of Life they Lived.
Based on the popular legend of the Neibelungen.
In this action/horror movie, a gun-slinging vampire fights his bloodthirsty instincts while doing battle with the leader of a werewolf family.
A criminal master of disguise nicknamed The Ringer is out for deadly revenge against a treacherous London lawyer who is under police protection.

A radio show by Count Slashula at 'Slash FM', on a Halloween Night, will be presenting and warning viewers about the creepy stories they are about to watch, involving death, blood and some laughs. (inspired by Creepshow and Body Bags)
A huge fan of Amitabh Bachhan, falls in love with a Colonel's daughter and tries to woo her. Later, he finds a mobile which belongs to a ruthless gangster and starts blackmailing him.

Whizzo the clown takes a bunch of kids on a magic carpet ride to the North Pole to see Santa Claus, but not before the kids (members of the Johnny Miller Dance Studio) perform as circus animals in "Whizzoland."
An International businessman and playboy tries to avenge the death of his girlfriend, who was murdered by a gang of robbers, by entrapping them through a reality TV show.
One of two sisters becomes a 60-foot tall giant and terrorizes Toronto, Canada.
Sister and brother are trying to escape after the killing of their mother's murderer.
Independent league baseball player Roberto Presario sets out on an extraordinary journey to the 'BIGS' with the help of his quite peculiar new 10-year old little league female fan Stevie.
In 1907, a nurse arrives in the Belgian Congo to work for a missionary doctor but meets a grumpy animal hunter who secretly plans to search for gold in the dangerous Bakuba tribal region.

Du Meng Fei fresh out of Kung-Fu training, finds himself caught up in a 20 year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Lei seeks his missing daughter and will kill anyone who gets in his way.
When a cosmic event turns Emma's dog and cat into two perfect guys, Emma reconsiders her outlook on dating, hilariously works out her trust issues, and ultimately learns to love herself.

Shwan is a boxer who grows up with his best friend, David, also a boxer. One day, Shwan has an affair with a woman named Claire. Unknown to him, she is from the realm of the demonic djinn and his life takes a disastrous turn.
Riyo marries a man more than twice her age. She is devastated and labors in the sugar cane field. At the end she is able to love her husband.

Dylan is very successful at running his own lunchroom and YouTube channel. Then IJsbrand comes into his life and copies everything he does. Dylan decides to get to the bottom of this and puts fame and friendship at risk.
Threatening letters, phone calls in the middle of the night - Who is threatening engineer Stamatiad?
That day, the time stopped, but pushed a couple to make a move. The husband looked for his wife, and the wife looked for herself. They get separated and got reunited. Again, at the same place.
A young man brought up in a nunnery escapes from the abusive nuns into the disconcerting outside world.
A good couple in a bad place plans a last-ditch cabin trip; but when an awkward third wheel arrives, they worry more than their relationship may be in danger.
The lover of a woman whose uncle has been found dead in the mansion is accused of murder.A lawyer knows the real culprit's identity but cannot directly come forward due to attorney-client privilege.

Two young women, who operate as high-end call-girls, become embroiled in espionage with a young John F. Kennedy, visiting Estonia on diplomatic business in the summer of 1939. Romance, drama, and intrigue ensue.
A group of friends travel to a wilderness area to play a survival game. Soon they unexpectedly find themselves in a real-life survival situation.
A journey through history.
A flag said to possess supernatural powers of protection comes into the possession of a highland clan of Scotsmen fighting for their survival.
A group of college friends head to a remote cabin for the weekend when a mysterious earthquake unleashes a horde of bloodthirsty, subterranean dinosaurs.
A disgruntled veteran unable to adjust back into society justifies domestic terrorism by interpreting his actions with alien invasion.
Special agent Adam Hardy deals with internal departmental battles and radical quantum disasters.
Loosely based on a Japanese fairytale, an elderly male couple on a farm in the 1920's South find a little girl from the moon inside an ear of corn and raise her as their own.
His family was his when they took it away--that's when his vendetta begins.
After a politician's daughter is kidnapped by a ruthless gang, a brutal policewoman is released from jail and sent after them.
When Robert Stone is kidnapped and held hostage, his only chance of survival is to engage in a campaign of psychological warfare against his captors.

Bob Gordon is staging a new Broadway Show. He gets an offer of money by Lillian, if she can dance in his show. Gordon's old class mate Irene, tries to get the leading role in this show, but Lillian insists in getting this part herself.

Two girlfriends let themselves be locked in a department store for the sake of a school paper, but they look quite differently at this exciting undertaking. One takes everything seriously. The other wants to turn the night into a party.
Lieutenant Ray Harlan returns home to escape his past and find solace with his family. But what he encounters is quite different and cuts to the very core of his existence.
Yakuza revenge movie with wandering yakuza gambler Fujiko first out to kill the man she once loved and then slicing through the yakuza who betrayed her lover Tatsumi.
A naive small-town girl comes to New York City to meet her husband, and discovers that he may be a murderer.
An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.
Besides breaking the law, we have no other choices.

Vince is a young boy when he witnesses his father murdered on stage at a political rally. 15 years later, he plots to infiltrate a dangerous arms dealer, and exact revenge on the men responsible for his father's death.
When a seemingly mindless young man wins big on a game show, his unique relationship with a powerful U.S. Senator, sets in motion a whirlwind of international connectivity.

In order to help the penguin families to protect their homeland and kick the evil humans, Dr. Gick and her fellows out, Euri, Luck and Buffet launch an adventurous counter-offensive operation in the South Pole.
Microscopic clues in our DNA link every man on earth back to one man. One common ancestor. At an unexpected crossroads of bible and biology, we take you on a search for Adam.
In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a universe of greed.
Scientists discover that a group of meteors are hurtling on a collison course with Earth, and if they hit, the planet will be destroyed.

column2: A Matter of Life and Death
column3: A firefighting pilot survives bailing out of his doomed plane without a parachute only to have to fight for his extended life on earth in a Heavenly court. Based on the 1946 film.
All hell breaks loose when a mysterious new internet meme goes viral, making anyone who sees it turn obsessive and violent.
Mandar, an ordinary guy is obsessed with sex and chases girls until he meets Tripti and decides to settle down with her.
When her husband goes missing during their Caribbean vacation, a woman sets off on her own to take down the men she thinks are responsible.
At the time of the Invasion of Normandy, an American soldier is asked to impersonate a British General in order to confuse the Nazi spies and assassins in London.
A woman struggles to protect her children from a dangerous fog as she fights through two converging timelines - one in an abandoned chapel, the other in a research facility.
A mission led by an Indian army, named Red Mercury to eradicate terrorism with its roots and criminals who are helping them
Once in the fabulous country of Lyonia, three schoolchildren become involved in the long-term struggle of local residents with the evil Queen Magnilda.

On the eve of retirement a middle class, judgmental snob discovers her husband has been having an affair with her best friend and is forced into exile with her bohemian sister who lives on an impoverished inner-city council estate.
A small crew crash land on Mars and find they're not alone on the red planet.

It's the year 2131. A bold team from the Tri Force rebel alliance embark on a daring mission in a last ditch effort to save what's left of the human race and liberate space aliens from an Evil Brain's tyrannical mind control.
It's about two different characters in their 20s, Vennela & Siddu. They have setbacks in their lives. How they meet, change for good, sort life and become successful forms the movie.
Pin-up vixens vs. bloodthirsty zombies, set in post-apocalyptic Hollywood.

After being accused of stealing the main prize from the tambura band competition, the members of Aveti Ravnice must flee for their lives, as an angry mob of other bands, gypsies, policewomen, butchers and helicopters are pursuing them.
In a race against the clock, Alexandra will be forced to choose how to spend the next hours: facing a critic family drama or trying to bring an answer to one of humanity's most important questions.
An Alien helps a scientist discover the serum to save the world from the deadly virus spread.
When a detective comes face to face with his own dead body, he attempts to thwart his future murderer by preventing time travel technology from ever being invented.
When Lupin heads to the kingdom of Zufu to pilfer its treasure, he incurs the wrath of its psychotic ruler General Headhunter, who places a dead-or-alive bounty on his head.

column2: The Gas House Kids in Hollywood
column3: The Gas House Kids go to Hollywood, where they become entangled with a mad scientist while attempting to find a lost treasure in a haunted house.
New visionary indie director starts life-changing movement with innovative inspirational film. The uncommon Hollywood story.
A greedy gold smuggler hires a handsome hero to transport a stolen fortune to a new hideout in this thrilling adventure.
Which side will you choose when evil takes over...

When you're a Lethal Mafia Leader, the Five Families ask you to move. Your Loyal and best interest of the Mafia you move, you take your family, Your crew to new city, State. You fight the Cops,other Mobster. Then you still get Ostracized.
A young woman is recruited as a psychic detective by an organization whose motives are shrouded in secrecy
A good cop bad cop project with action, drama and mystery. The lead haracter winds up having to make a choice between being a good cop or a bad cop.

column2: Return to Return to Nuke 'Em High Aka Vol. 2
column3: Following the events of the previous film, a lesbian couple are determined to eliminate the most corrupt, evil forces of Tromaville and the world.

A college student moonlighting as a chauffeur picks up two mysterious women for a night of party-hopping across LA. But when he uncovers their bloodthirsty intentions - and their dangerous, shadowy underworld - he must fight to stay alive.
Inept Vampires attempting to save humans from alien eradication, race into space to fight off Superior Aliens, but find themselves trapped on board an alien mother ship in route to destroy the earth.
A group of international travelers struggle to survive when Islamic extremists besiege their luxury Indian hotel. Inspired by true events.
The adorable little VW helps its owners break up a counterfeiting ring in Mexico.

The Passion of Jesus starting with His arrest and trial that was shot near Madrid and features narration by Sebastion Cabot. Jesus' face is never seen but in the English version he is voiced by veteran Hollywood actor Macdonald Carey.
In a community center where a mass murder took place years earlier and it involves a paranormal investigator who discovers a door to another world.

Truck driver Bugs Raymond organizes the trucking associations and takes protection money. Now rich, he decides to marry socialite Dorothy Stone. She rejects him for another, so he plots to kidnap her on her wedding day.

8 months prior to the Zombie Pandemic, a family is stalked by a demonic presence which influences them to do things out of their character. We soon realize that this demonic influence the creation of the Zombie pandemic.

Inspired by actual events in the mid-1400s, the mighty Albanian king, Skanderbeg, returns home to reclaim his throne, and protect his people and a continent from the cruel conquerors who stole him as a child.
A young Sydney stockbroker risks it all to win a friendly bet about making money.

column2: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
column3: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.
When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.
During the Civil War a group of Union soldiers and two Confederates escape the stockade using a hot-air balloon and end up on a strange Pacific island.
"Falling Into Place" is a love story set in Scotland and London that follows a romance between Kira and Ian, two 30-somethings who meet while on the run from themselves.
A former British agent is employed at the Fenton country estate where he aids Fenton's niece in eluding the police after she's unjustly accused of murdering a local gamekeeper.
An investigative filmmaker looking into the emergence of a new street drug discovers twin brothers being used as a control group for a new product with diabolical and dire consequences.

In the future, mental institutions are located on far-away planets. One such planet is the apex for an invasion of Earth by rodent-like aliens. It is up to a band of intrepid mental patients to thwart their evil schemes.

When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.
The famous story of Peter Pan has been reimagined with a horrific twist.

Tom receives the news of his father's death, who was searching for the grave of Genghis Khan. A package with an artifact and a note from his father arrives a day later. Things become eerie when Tom arrives on the land of the Great Mongol

A group of five people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack.
The story of a mother and daughter and their lives aboard a boat in a fishing town.
A Czech circus owner/clown and his entire troupe employ a daring stratagem in order to escape en masse from behind the iron curtain.

A middle-aged married couple lead a simple happy life in their house in the woods, far away from any urban noise. The husband has got, however, two passions: his film camera and a beautiful blonde he likes filming.
Caught behind enemy lines, a small group of dissident survivors struggle to remain hidden from the Nazis as they use a radio to broadcast a message of hope.
A brilliant student starts hallucinating after moving into a room that was occupied by another who committed suicide.
Schoolboys marooned on a Pacific island create their own savage civilization.
A young woman is murdered on an elevator and the only witness is her cat Bidan. Her friend So-yeon brings the cat home and wild and disturbing things begin to happen.
A triad boss runs a family business, who deals in arms. He has a good relationship with his sister Amy, until she finds out that he killed their father.
Appalachia: 1 year after the apocalypse.
A photographer and his model are on a photo shoot in a forest when they get the feeling they are being watched. The feeling becomes so strong that they decide to cut their session short and leave.

In a rural Pennsylvania hospital, a deranged serial killer awakens from a coma and escapes, as a local town sheriff with a traumatic family secret must track him down and stop him from killing everyone in his path.
A teenage girl is able to speak with the dead.
Factory worker Bill Fox (Sir Dirk Bogarde) is fired from a reliable job and becomes a successful motorbike racer, until his wife threatens to leave him unless he comes to his senses.
Luisa and Manuel begin the existence of married, having only their dream and hope. He judges himself a Tarzan in the jungle of life, able to face all the threats, next to his companion.
Two spies are undercover to track down a nuclear missile while distracting a vilain trying to get world's domination
Divina at her best, Bino at his ruggedest and Berting at his toughest, they call themselves the unholy trio as they blast their way to hell.
The identity of a mysterious American diver by a British police officer, which leads to an investigation into a high-society family's links to international drug trafficking.
A US Marine is sent to the future on a deadly mission. He has to help save human kind.
Rogue intelligence agents, right-wing politicians, greedy capitalists, and free-lance assassins plot and carry out the JFK assassination.
This is strange story about problems of Japanese society and youth love. A young programmer wanders in psychological world with a mysterious woman and her husband who has paranoia.
A young boy becomes a target for crooks, after he claims to remember his past life and mentions precious jewels in a golden fortress.
Peter and Margaret Eastwood believe they've purchased their dream home to start their lives together but this house seems to be hiding something dark and terrifying in every corner.
Santiago wakes up in the desert and goes to his father's house who receives him at gunpoint. Ernesto decides to sacrifice Arón, the dog, but phantasmagoric apparitions shake the family's foundations.

column2: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon: Sword of Destiny
column3: A story of lost love, young love, a legendary sword and one last opportunity at redemption.
Mixture of social satire and fantasy, in which a worker at a science research facility uses his newfound ability to transmit his dreams and sets up a business to sell them to a sleeping audience.

column2: Friends: Naki on the Monster Island
column3: On an island, the residents have named the island "Monster Island." The monsters living on the island are friendly, but live in fear of humans. A child named Kotake wanders onto the island and meet a red ogre named Naki.
In 1974, high-wire artist Philippe Petit recruits a team of people to help him realize his dream: to walk the immense void between the World Trade Center towers.
A nerd has 24 hours to lose his virginity or a bomb will explode, killing his family.
After radioactive devastation destroys the Earth in 2020, the Galactic Marine Infantry is formed to protect the remaining human race, struggling for survival on a distant star.
Due to past tragedies, someone looking for revenge hides bombs in soccer arenas multiple times and it's Conan's job to save everyone once again.
An isolated and wingless dragon is transformed through his friendship with a brave and compassionate young girl.
A college student takes over the family business in the field of organised crime.
An eleventh century Viking Prince sails to America to find his father, who on a previous voyage had been captured by Indians.
Action thriller involving a retired police officer on a tropical island facing a militant group of radicals.

Black Easter is based on the famous legend of a bride that was killed on her wedding night. The ghostly bride also known as "Resurrection Mary" hitchhikes and kills everyone in her path on each anniversary of that fateful night.

column2: Casseta & Planeta: A Taça do Mundo É Nossa
column3: A satire about the dictatorship period in Brazil, in which communist militants try to steal the soccer World Cup Trophy from the players Pelé and Carlos Alberto Torres.

Ten-year old Ted Dodd is on a driving trip with his parents and his beloved German shepherd dog Buddy, when a reckless driver swerves into the path of his parents' car, sending the vehicle ...                See full synopsis »
A man discovers that his hallucinations are actually visions from past lives.

column2: Far til fire - tilbage til naturen
column3: The family goes on a vacation in Sweden's wild nature. Here they experience bears, moose and much, much more...
An undercover cop goes into big world where a place is taken over by a don, where his safety may be compromised.
A martial artist fights her way to save her sister and herself from a lifetime of imprisonment.
A military intelligence officer and a pretty reporter try to find a scientist whose inventions can destroy the world.
When an ancient prophecy unfolds in modern day, the battle of good versus evil takes center stage to keep World War 3 from erupting. The supernatural joins the battle, amidst action and romance.
An aging scream queen desperate to get her career back on track marries her prison pen pal, but when he gets released on parole, the people closest to her start dying.
A fisherman with a dysfunctional family discovers some moss with magical properties.
A guy on a self-destructive path. A girl with an expiration date. What a perfect time to meet and fall in love.
Two fraternity pledges travel to a sleazy bar in search of a stripper for their college friends, unaware it is occupied by vampires.
A German documentary filmmaker travels to Madrid to do a TV program about the city and the Spanish civil war commemorating its 50th anniversary.
A paroled convict is framed for murder and must clear himself before the police catches him.
Adaptation of the NYTimes best-selling book.
When Andreas overhears his parents'conversation about conquering the world and becoming leaders, their can only be one conclusion: Andreas' parents are aliens.
A killer uses an 18th century machine with supernatural powers to terrorize students at a college.

column2: Once Upon a Time: The Rock Opera
column3: Join Emma and the gang and sing along in this zany musical spoof of ABC's Once Upon a Time.
The love of an enchanted young girl brings wonder and healing to a broken family.
A hunting expedition goes awry when another hunter decides to make the hunters the hunted.

column2: The Haunting of Sweet Hollow Road
column3: 1978, the Cotton family is torn apart by death, as deranged teenage boy plots evil. Now decades later, his horrible deeds continue to haunt the nearby road. Based on the real-life haunted road on Long Island, New York.
What the rest of the world sees as random occurrences are, in fact, carefully orchestrated events designed to spark significant changes in the lives of their targets and sometimes even history.
A man and a woman struggle for survival after a plane crash leaves them marooned on a tropical island.

An expedition to Infant Island discovers a native population and tiny twin fairy priestesses of the island's mythical deity. Named Mothra, she sets out to rescue her fairies after they are kidnapped by an exploitative businessman.
Four high level executives are held hostage by an unknown terrorist who knows all their dirty deeds. Once the truth comes out, they must choose their own fate.

TV journalist Tab Holland assists Scotland yard with the murder of a reclusive millionaire whose corpse is discovered locked in a vault. The key to the vault is mysteriously found on the table beside the corpse.

7 guys from Paris' suburbs like challenges like climbing tall buildings and doing parkour - especially with cops/flics chasing them. When a kid fan urgently needs a heart the Yamakasis try to find a way.

column2: The Blood-Red Night of Hatchet Valley
column3: Thirteen strangers -- each with their own dark secrets -- fight to survive an overnight siege by ferocious beasts. But their secrets may be more deadly than any monster.
Two college students on a survival weekend in the wilderness cross paths with three desperate killers in what turns into a fight for life.
In the near future, a high school senior discovers that events in her waking life begin to parallel events in her dreams.
A modern-day deputy tracks an abducted girl to a ghost town, and the spirits of the past who took her.
A trilogy of fantastic stories involving murder and the supernatural.
The adventurous and noisy life of the Faragó family in their two-bed apartment in downtown Budapest.
This is a story about Gender Equality. Women coming together after overcoming obstacles created by heir families and society.

column2: El infierno de todos tan temido
column3: A writer finds himself amid a spiral of violence, alcohol and his leftist ideologies, eventually being locked down in an asylum, where he leads a rebellion.
Following a group of students who leave hateful comments on the page of a fellow pupil who recently committed suicide.
A rickshaw puller is forced to take revenge against a group called the invincible four, and their Japanese backers after they murder his uncle, mother and girlfriend.
Twin sisters Katre and Birsu try to go to the last party of year at the Sehnaz high school in Istanbul.

Recently released from a mental hospital after suffering through a traumatic event, Monica starts to see things as a wave of murders hits Los Angeles. Is she really seeing UFOs and mysterious beings or is she losing her mind?

column2: Jesus Shows You the Way to the Highway
column3: CIA Agents Palmer and Gagano are tasked with the mission of destroying a computer virus called "Soviet Union". They enter the system using VR but the mission turns into a trap.
The old man trusts him and gives him the address of the hill. They feel the pulse of a treasure beneath their feet. A new life with an identity to be created.
When a young man reaches the ultimate high he realizes how low some people will go in order to get what they want.
A pregnant woman, Kate, questions whether or not she should leave her husband, Ollie, despite him being the object of envy for many of Kate's friends.

A man known only as the Stalker is looking for the Hamiltons, and is willing to kill anyone who gets in his way. Embark on a horror/mystery thrill ride that takes you back to the classic films of the genre.

Cilali Ibo, who runs the shoe shine salon, inherits it from his grandfather. There is also a mansion on the heritage list. An inheritance lawyer collaborates with a gang. The gang tries to kill Ibo and prevent him from reaching mansion.
Rancher and down-trodden Sheriff confront hired gunmen on the Mexico border.
Sybil works at an undertakers. It's a lonely job, with few perks. So she takes solace where she can.
An accountant with super bad luck is sent in search of a missing boss's daughter, also an incredibly unlucky person.
Driverless is about three love stories that are intertwined by a car accident.
A brilliant surgeon encases his dead son's brain in a large robot body, with unintended results...
Thrill upon thrill awaits you as the mysterious, mystic statue from India comes to life in this new and daringly different fantasy-comedy.
Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.
An attorney returns to his small home town in Alaska and quickly rocks the boat by getting an injunction against the nativity display tradition and attacking Christmas.
Compatible dating site or nightmare? Emily Taggert joins Compatible a new interactive dating App where your viewers can judge your dates. At first, Greg gets perfect compatibility, until he doesn't.

column2: El miedo no anda en burro
column3: A maid and her boss's dog are the inheritors of a large fortune of money, properties and mansions. However, the boss's furious relatives scheme several unsuccessful plans to get rid of them.
Robbers break into a bank strongroom in a combination of Rififi and Charley's Aunt

Ahlam who is studying medicine in the college is in love with Dr. Parviz and wants to marry him. But according to her tribe's laws and traditions she must marry her cousin Farhan. She decides to face her family and find a solution.

"A recently mourning father, CIA agent Benjamin Huffman, is sent to London to uncover why the Russians are funding US Senators when his plans are overturned by Giulia, a single mom whose daughter was kidnapped by the same cartel."
Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, and decide to use a beautiful call girl to do so.

Dating in any city can be difficult. But dating in Los Angeles is even harder. Between all of the bling, celebrities and velvet ropes, Haley hopes that someone real steps out from behind all of the smoke and mirrors.
Clutch is the story of a struggling race car driver who puts it all on the line. He risks his life, friends, and freedom when he takes a wrong turn in his attempts to support his racing.
An ensemble of adult children move into an abandoned pool. There they develop a brief utopia.
A woman battles an unspeakable terror.
An adaption of the classic tale of a girl's dreams turned reality when her new toy turns out to be a young man placed under a curse.
A jaded, overworked elf runs off to the real world where he tries to experience the magic of Christmas with the help of a newly befriended young boy.
A woman runs a massage parlor in Dharavi, Mumbai.
A stranger comes to a small town and sets into motion a series of events that would affect the lives of those who live there, including the nefarious Neo-Nazi gang that runs it's criminal underworld.

Set in the near future the Monkey King and his compatriots once again must prevent a tragedy of epic proportions that will impact the world as we know it. A young group must join forces with the heroic trio to stop the coming darkness.
An investigative journalist gets entangled in a murder case, where the victim was seemingly tormented and possessed by an ancient evil.

Three stories about modern women. The first works in a nightclub and plans to marry the boss. The second is used by a real estate agent as a lure for customers. The third is a retired geisha who waits to be reunited with her jailed lover.
A hair stylist, who can read the minds of those whose hair he cuts, decides to act on his gathered information.

Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.
Samarth returns to India and works as a bodyguard for Maya, a renowned actress. He soon gains her confidence, but has a hidden agenda.

Two Chinese friends, who operate a food truck in Barcelona, Spain, use their martial arts expertise to help their private investigator friend protect the pickpocket Sylvia, who's been targeted by a ruthless gang.
Intergalatic bounty hunter ends up on earth on a mission.

While vacationing on Captiva Island, Florida with his parents, a teen, gloomy about his future, finds love and friendship when he meats a cute girl and 3 kooky pensioners with passion for life and crazy schemes.
Former CIA officer Max Ford is hired by the wife of a prominent Senator to determine the cause of his untimely death.
A gorilla named Ivan tries to piece together his past with the help of an elephant named Ruby as they hatch a plan to escape from captivity.
Shortly after the Korean war, a father and a son are wandering through the country and make a stop in a remote village, where strange and dangerous happenings occur.
After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.
It follows Olivia as she tries to survive when a storm crashes into her town with a mind-bending monster in tow.
A bored, married Parisian socialite is pulled into a web of lust and deception after he seemingly rescues a woman from her abusive boyfriend.

When a deadly outbreak spreads across an isolated island, the survivors, who have lost everything, must find a way to escape the virus filled island while survival on the island becomes threatened and while a dark secret unravels.
A young boy from a Georgian village is kidnapped and sold in slavery. He is raised as a Mamluk in Egypt, where he quickly rises through the ranks.

Landlord Wilhelm Stone, who owns the beautiful old estate "Elleholm", has because of his weakness for games and beautiful young women, put his marriage in disarray, lost his family and all his friends.

A young boy finds a stack of his sister's secret letters who's been missing since their mother's death. He sets off on the journey of a lifetime to reunite with her and he meets a man who calls himself the last true Communist.

At college Paige meets Eddie, a fellow student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.

Six paranormal ghost hunters are competing to stay in the most haunted house in New York , the winner gets one million dollars. Little do they know they are being set up to be tortured and killed by a ghoulish soul - a bloody nun .

19-year-old Billy Lynn is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle. Through flashbacks, the film shows what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions.
An alcoholic ex-cop, now the house detective at a scuzzy hotel in an even scuzzier part of town, stumbles through New York City's sleazy underworld searching for his kidnapped son.
Raised by compassionate wild animals as one of their own, a helpless eight-year-old girl grows into a beautiful, untamed woman and becomes Lady Tarzan: the fearless Queen of the Elephants.
Toni discovers his new friend, a talented free-diver, is being forced to help dangerous smugglers steal national treasures from an underwater cave.
Union prisoners use a balloon to escape a Southern prison camp near the end of the Civil War and end up marooned on a mysterious volcanic island with very unusual inhabitants.
This is a sequal to 2012s The Three Stooges.
An epic couple Muse and Orpheus from another Universe lands on the earth to save humanity through ancient Greek knowledge.
This "feminist" reworking of Fritz Lang's classic M focuses on the mothers of children stalked by a deranged pedophile.
Matt Webster measures his success by his possessions. Matt and his family are stripped of all they own and are humbled enough to learn what success is really all about.
A lawyer suffers a guilt complex after getting a murder acquittal for his client, and then finding out she did commit the crime.

The story of an old man who is very good in Karate but pretends to be weak and fragile. By this way he and his friend make quarrels and steal the people. But one day he meets a person who is very familiar to him.
The movie follows the story of Jonah Thomas, a US senator, who gets trapped in an epic battle fought between life and death.
A Harvard law student, Horace Arthur Bates, time travels to help the Moors of Spain in 1492.

There are two villages on the land. They are called Farri and Nestarico, both surrounded by mountains. As the villagers of Farri have lost their houses and food, they've left the village to seek a new place.
An alien life form arrives in the Dominican Republic in search of freedom and forms an unique bond with an autistic girl and the town's drunkard.
The Saken team and their allies must be willing to sacrifice everything in an attempt to defeat the powerful Korrag before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to reality as we know it.
Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

Two detectives from two different countries are investigating the same case. As their investigation brings them closer to the truth, they discover something else. What can it be, and what truth lies within?
Racial tensions and corruption come to a head in a small, segregated town after the police find the body of a young Afrikaner girl in the bush.
When star student Kaley gets suspicious of a group of underachievers' high SAT scores, she unwittingly uncovers a cheating ring and puts her life in jeopardy.
A thriller that follows Janie Hannagan, a young woman who has the ability to enter other people's dreams.
A group of young environmental activists become infected, ravenous, unstoppable zombies when a forestry company's genetic experimentation goes disastrously wrong.
In post-Civil War Missouri, friends, relatives and neighbors find it difficult to live harmoniously together knowing that some of them fought on opposing sides during the war.

The 2020 election is looming closer than ever and is coming at the American people like a freight train carrying an unfathomable cargo. Find out what is behind the most imperatively election of our lifetime, in Trump Vs. Biden.
An Evil Threat Sends Bounty Hunters after DKE defectors, the Farazies
Jackie Powers will stop at nothing to prevent his son from following him into a life of crime. With his mob employer in pursuit, a chance encounter at a roadside diner charts a new path.
One boy's wish changed a man. One man's wish changed the world.

Many years later, in a fierce battle with the three-eyed God of War, Monkey King was broken and fell into the mortal world. Monkey King realizes self-salvation under the conspiracy of Mu Shen Jumang to bring disaster to the world..

Confined to a secluded rest home and trapped within his stroke-ridden body, a former Judge must stop an elderly psychotic who employs a child's puppet to abuse the homes residents with deadly consequences.

column2: Hidden Orchard Mysteries: The Case of the Air B and B Robbery
column3: When a home robbery occurs, two junior detectives attempt to discover the culprit. Their closest neighbors are the most likely suspects and the investigation digs up bigger secrets than they expected.
Following their divorce, Hyun-Woo's ex-wife Sun-Young starts dating another man, who is unaware that the two of them were once married.

Tadao returns from Tokyo to live in his home town. Living with his parents, he gets a job fixing radios and TV sets. He catches up with an old school friend, Tetsuji. One night Tetsuji decides to elope to Tokyo with a bar hostess.
A snake charmer girl falls in love with Mohan and he lost his memory due to poisonous snake bite and the boys housemates also recognised him and then the three decide to live together.
Two men are locked in a room with 60 minutes to find out why they are in the room with a mad man coming to torture them every 10 minutes.
Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.
Santa Claus assumes the guise of a worker, a maid, a clerk and a bartender to solve the problems of different people.

Architect Frank wakes up from unconsciousness, squashed in a porta-potty. But it gets worse: In order not to be blown up during the imminent demolition, Frank must make his way out of his blue grave in one hour. A race against time.

Krishna and Mahalakshmi have been in love since childhood but obstacles stand in the way. When a mafia gang attacks the Rajanna family and abducts three children, Krishna makes it his mission to rescue them and prove himself to Mahalkshmi.

After a shopping mall in Chennai had been hijacked by terrorists who held the visitors as hostages, Veera Raghavan, a spy also trapped in the mall, decides to save the hostages by eliminating the terrorists.

A romance-infused thriller about a woman with a supernatural secret who 'dances' her way through the relationships of four friends and how their lives are captivated, stirred up, and turned upside down by her presence.

column2: The Incredible Face of Dr. B
column3: Count Brankovan is a mad scientist who is trying to become immortal by draining and then drinking liquid from his victims' brains. The police are desperately trying to catch him.
A frantic college freshman comes of age and falls in love with her sleep paralysis demon.

Native American teenagers confront an oil pipeline project, down the hill from their ancestral land. The grandfather evokes the tale of Creation, reminding all of us that we need to find our place in the great circle of creatures.
The only cure of being jobelessness, unhappy and hopelessness is friendship, life is beautiful together.
A young female marshal goes undercover on a deathtrap starship to prevent a terrifying alien invasion.

Following an Electromagnetic Pulse war, that has left America ravaged and lawless, a grieving mother teams up with a jaded bounty hunter to bring the thieving and murderous Llewelyn Gang to justice after the death of her son.

The first adaptation of American novel Wieland. and the inspiration for Mary Shelley's Frankenstein. Religious fanaticism, schizophrenia, supernatural powers and repressed sexual desire combine into a deadly family drama.
A sarcastic loser gets help putting his life back together....against his will.
When separated from his mother on a family camping trip, a young boy meets a fantastical creature that helps him find his way back home.

At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon (Tim Curry) and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?
A black-ops mission to the moon has unintended and disturbing consequences.
An intrepid dog comes to the rescue when a boy's life is put at risk by the greed inflamed by a gold strike.
Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

The romantic comedy with the element of action. Modern Hollywood couple in dilemma between the busy career and the original human needs. While get lost in the romance - robbery and the murder shaking things up to the clarity.
A 30-year-old writer spends a wild weekend in Palm Springs and wakes up to find she has magically transformed into her 70-year-old self.
An unusual friendship between a mute kid, a monkey and a thief ends up changing all of their lives for the better.
An up-and-coming journalist finds his world and faith increasingly challenged when he's granted the interview of a lifetime - with someone who claims to be God.

When five teen employees at the local movie theater in a small Christian town discover a mysterious old film hidden in its basement, they unleash an alluring succubus who gives them a sex education...written in blood.

A Group of Teenagers murdered someone by accident. They decide to keep it a secret but someone else knows. They get tortured and killed by a person in a Jabbawockee mask. They either must confess or die.

Ten thousand years ago, two young lovers and their friends set out to save their at risk cave dwelling clan. A series of teenage love, bravery and a willing heart to save a people and in doing so conquer one's greatest fears.
A man and his sentient napkin friend save the world from a dark evil in a cabin deep in the Utah mountains, and also learn to love.
Two neighbours in the housing blocks of Belgrade spark a friendship then a war as emotions and money take center stage. Based in part on the novel 'Poor Folk' by Fyodor Dostoyevsky.
A psycho girlfriend, Tracy, moves in with her boyfriend Scott and his two roommates, Cam and Dan, only to start targeting them when they get in the way of her plans for the perfect relationship.

column2: Sarah Landon and the Paranormal Hour
column3: A 17-year-old girl has mysterious encounters with paranormal activity in the small town of Pine Valley.
A lonely boy tries to save a young woman from his psychopathic next door neighbor who cannot tell fantasy from reality.

When a 23-year-old Florida man earns himself the notorious nickname, "Fumbles The Bank Robber" he instills his place in history as one of the most infamous bank robbers and crime stories ever to be told.
This movie describes the violent break-up of former Yugoslavia from the Serbian point of view, using the story of ethnicly mixed couple in war-torn city of Vukovar as metaphore.
In 1999, a battle takes place between two factions of divine warriors for the fate of the world.

The Island Paradise turns out not to be the wonderland that she thought it would be. The day began with a broken nail, a late plane, lost luggage, lost hotel reservation and ended with an unknown man dead in her bed. Now onto day 2.
in October 2020. in New York, Krogzilla's just trying to fit in, but now he needs a job.

Riccardo Finzi is a private investigator On his first night in town he meets a mysterious girl named Susy, who is later found dead. Convinced of foul play, he and his assistant Giuseppe decide to investigate.
A deaf boy joins a boarding school for similar children. Confronted by the violent and criminal antics of some of the other boys and girls, he struggles to conform and join the 'tribe'.
When Lylian's father is facing death, a mysterious stranger with the power to take pain from others onto himself appears in the small remote village of Fillem Circle.
David Chambers, tries to avenging his girlfriends' murder and defeating the man who placed his father in the hospital. Only to find out that the same man is responsible for both crimes.
The Three Supermen travel to Tokyo in search of a stolen miniaturization ray which they end up testing upon themselves.
Six high school seniors celebrating in the middle of a lake find themselves trapped on a rowboat due to a man-eating fish.
Based on Ion Creanga's book, the story of a child from his childhood to his manhood.
An adaption of Fyodor Dostoevsky's Crime and Punishment; Ram is a destitute but bright law student who decides to rob the safe of the moneylender.

column2: Annie Brocoli dans les fonds marins
column3: An adventurer (Annie Brocoli) participates in a treasure hunt whose objective is to clean the sea bottom. She drives a Volkswagen Beetle and sings a few too many songs than necessary, should probably call it a musical.
Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.
Something happens to a young couple in love that drives them into madness.

Dobrinya Nikitich goes on a quest to save the royal niece and finds out whether his old friend Zmey Gorinich is loyal to him. During the adventures, he is accompanied by the royal messenger who's in love with the royal niece.
Drummond, his girlfriend and his butler try to free an high post of Scotland Yard who has been kidnapped.

About a college/high school teacher who tries to intervene and rescue his student who is being pursued by the law. The professor happens to have sexual intercourse with at least two different women on his way to save his student.
A heist film in the hypebeast world following a group of sneaker heads who come together to steal the world's first ever pair of Air Jordan's.
A New Yorker moves to the country with her boyfriend, where her new friendship causes a problem as her partner also takes an interest in the woman.
A hit man and his bubbly apprentice stab their way through the mob and ignite a revolution.
A group of Droids on a dying planet struggle to preserve the last remaining city.

Doug Trench, a talk show host, is the sole man left on Earth after everyone else has been assimilated by Hive Mind. He decides to fire up his radio transmitter one last time and fight the Hive Mind with half his brain tied behind his back.
A young family copes with a series of disturbing events that force them to question their relationship, their faith and their very existence.

column2: One of Our Dinosaurs Is Missing
column3: A suspected Western spy steals a secret microfilm from China and hides it in the skeleton of a museum dinosaur, prompting a frantic search for it by various interested parties.

Maskull, a man longing for adventures, accepts an invitation from Krag, an acquaintance of his friend Nightspore, to travel to Tormance after a seance. The three set off in a crystal ship from an abandoned observatory in Scotland.

When an evil corporation threatens to unleash the black plague, Evan Grail, is recruited by his grandfather,Max, into the order of the Black Knights - a secret band of warriors who have been called upon in the past to fight evil
Usha is heartbroken after she loses her lover Ravi in a railway accident. Things take a turn when Ramankutty falls in love with her.
Secure within a desolate home as an unnatural threat terrorizes the world, a man has established a tenuous domestic order with his wife and son. Then a desperate young family arrives seeking refuge.
A couple spend eternity in a castle until their reality starts to shift, as the unknown moves into their lives.
James Gibb fights a two headed penis
A group of punks touring in a bus survive a robot attack.
They came for a legend. What they found was a problem.
Tia and Tony visit Los Angeles, but he's quickly kidnapped by an evil scientist, leaving her to desperately search for him.
The true feel-good story of how James Bowen, a busker and recovering drug addict, has his life transformed when he meets a stray ginger cat. Based on the international best selling book.
Remake of Amenabar's classic horror thriller which starred Nicole Kidman.

column2: Volverá El Polvo a La Tierra
column3: After losing his wife, Marno tries to transplant his soul to the body of a young woman. Together with their two children, they kidnap a woman. Already in captivity, she will have to adapt to an obsessive family dynamic to survive.
A rowdy mechanic with a golden-heart turns into a body guard to save a family from goons.
An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.
A boy forms an unusual imaginary friendship with an alien.
A sheriff makes a strange discovery when he gets called to an orchard where three teenage sisters have been attacked by a band of young delinquents.
Ray, a man without family addicted to the gambling, dedicated to steal cars and for love will end up in jail.
Two estranged sisters torn apart by their differences suddenly find themselves working together towards a common goal in the heartwarming drama, The Bouquet.
A professor of chemistry wins the Nobel Prize. His wife joins him to Stockholm but his PhD. working son gets kidnapped. The kidnapper demands $2,000,000 = prize sum.
In 1519, Conquistador Diego de Ordaz and two soldiers march to the summit of the great Mexican volcano Popocatépetl.
After a martini-induced rampage, a fantasy-prone young woman is placed under house arrest.
Amnesiac Matt Sadler awakes alone in the middle of the countryside. Gradually his memory and experiences rebuild and he finds his destiny inextricably linked with a farm and the Farmer Calham.
A simple suburban family man turns out to be the country's deadliest killer for hire.
College student Sonja summons the demonic sorcerer Var after viewing a 500-year-old film containing his spirit.
In Dark Age Britain, a brotherhood of Celtic Knights battle against enemies natural and supernatural in preparation for the coming King.
A young woman seeking adventure, and several other people have to outwit a mysterious killer on a remote island.

Michael and Franziska's relationship suffers from the separations brought on by his photojournalism. Only after Michael's colleague lay dying in his arms does he decide to go home, but is asked by Franziska to join the war: as a soldier.
A Graphic Novel-style telling of Grace O'Malley (a. 1530 - 1603) who was one of the most famous pirates of all time.
Julia Luu, a child therapist, finds that a young girl's imaginary friends might be more than they seem.
Professor Dooley takes home a duck from his research laboratory as a pet for his son, but soon finds out that it lays golden eggs.

A love story. Theo and Frank are on the run from the British Navy in the early 1800's. They hide in the grounds of an abandoned country house and discover it's more than the living they're running from.
Live-action adaptation of Disney's animated musical version of 'The Hunchback of Notre Dame'.

A trilogy of separate stories. In "Labyrinth labyrinthos", a girl and her cat enter a strange world. In "Running Man", a racer takes on the ultimate opponent. In "Construction Cancellation Order", a man must shut down worker robots.
Plot details kept under wraps at this time

Three space women land on Earth in search of sexual energy to fuel their spaceship and get back home. They befriend a lonely farmboy who helps them on their plight, all while evading their mortal enemies, the Scrotes.
Three guys find a magic pen, and they have to hide it from three fake FBI agents trying to make money.
A horror anthology that explores various aspects of the human condition as each character traverses through tragedies caused by a supernatural entity.
A man tries to save his reclusive scientist brother from slipping permanently into madness while struggling with the power of a stolen technology.

Tormented by his mother's suicide, an artist chases after fame and a temptress lured by a powerful art dealer to the brink of ruin. In a decadent world steeped in social injustice and wealth inequality, redemption and revenge collide.
A young woman goes on surveillance with a Private Detective in New York City who has been following people around since the 1970s.

Greedy oil speculators led by Morgan are trying to force Tiger Woman and her band of warriors from their jungle home. Allen Saunders of Inter-Ocean Oil wants to develop the oil too, but fights with Tiger Woman to stop the bad guys.
A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.
John Berlin, a former Los Angeles homicide detective, investigates a multiple murder case in San Diego. The only witness is a blind girl to whom he is immediately attracted.
THE MASTER is a story about a Grand Master (Louis Scarano), a chess champion who finally finds his "unusual" match (Celine Alva).

When a transgender meth cook is kidnapped and dragged to the middle of a swamp to make product, her kidnappers unwittingly gain the attention of deadly supernatural forces, that leads to a chaotic showdown between gangs, cults, and demons.
To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

An entity is terrorizing a small Midwest town. Ludlow Falls continues to descend into madness and death as more young women are driven insane. Sometimes small towns hide big secrets and a town's sin will be exposed.
An attorney with a military past hunts down the gang who killed his wife and took his daughter.
The McCready Family faces a seemingly insurmountable evil whose presence is due to their own indifference and disregard for the abuse in their home.
Kariya, a gangster falls for a rich dancer Maya, but hesitant to express his love due to his criminal history. Meanwhile his enemies in the echelons of underworld conspire to have him murdered.

column2: Mighty Mouse in the Great Space Chase
column3: Space cat villain Harry the Heartless holds space mouse Queen Pureheart. Only Mighty Mouse can save her.

A luminous UFO streaks across the night sky, impact an obstetric delivery room, and a baby boy is born there at the same time. The boy is Beibei, his hands are electriferous and able to control electrical appliances.
When a government agent crash lands on a tropical island run by a cruel dictator, he must seek the wisdom of a fallen hero in order to survive the island's mysterious power. Will he escape?
Two Miami Detectives get detoured by mistrust, lust and philosophical musings as they attempt to catch a serial murderer who has accomplices in the multiverse.

In ten minutes, everything can change - for these ten people, it will. An innovative real-time crime thriller in which the murderous events of one fateful day, committed between 11:50am and noon, are replayed from different points of view.
An epic adventure about the last five children on Earth discovering the truth behind the malevolent forces of mother nature. The film follows a group of daring friends in a coming of age adventure.
Ge Zhen joins a killer organization the 12 troops. Justice and evil coexist and the entanglement between loyalty and betrayal come one after another.
After refusing to rejoin a cold hearted gang, a former gang member, fresh out of jail, must find a way to eradicate the price on his head.
On the outskirts of the U.S. Civil War, a boy is sent north by his bounty hunter gang to retrieve a wanted man.
An ordinary guy falls in love with her dream girl Maya. Maya feels doubt and betray when they begin a long term relationship. Her feeling completely reverses some day.
Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.
Following the death of his wife, Andrew Lockney is assigned a special mission codenamed Two Forty-Six, but Andrew and everyone involved with the mission become prey to a mysterious killer.

column2: The Oogieloves in the Big Balloon Adventure
column3: The Oogieloves, Goobie, Zoozie, and Toofie, set out to find five magical balloons that will make their good friend Schluufy's surprise birthday party extra special.

column2: WANG II - The Circle of Shambhala
column3: First sequel of the WANG franchise, based on the novel WANG - THE DRAGON KING.
A police detective investigating what seems unrelated murders with no common motivate, suddenly becomes aware of the murderer actually spying on her.
A young kung fu student is thrown into jail on a false charge. He shares a cell with a shaggy convict, who is repeated tortured by the magistrate to reveal the deadly secret.

Set in the 1980s, an estranged family hires a cult deprogrammer to take back their teenage son from a murderous cult, but find themselves under siege when the cultists surround their cabin, demanding the boy back.

column2: Pinkfong and Baby Shark's Space Adventure
column3: Follow PinkFong and Baby Shark's space journey as they visit mysterious planets to help find the special star for PinkFong.

Narc wars is the first one of three feature films which is part of a film trilogy and it was made as an spin-off of that Tv. serial. In this first film Escobar kidnaps L.J's best friend. LJ hires a group of mercenaries to rescue him.
In this parody of blaxploitation movies, a black hero wannabe reunites former black heroes from the 70s to help him get revenge on Mr. Big.
A new-born Indian baby... An age-old horror practice and the fact how evil are certain human practices
Carlos is a businessman who gets a request to intercede on behalf of a US engineer in the oil industry who's been kidnapped.
A world filled with chaos and terror, consumes the lives of everyone in this Louisiana city.
The partner of a slain nightclub owner seeks out an Asian underworld big shot.

When the first manned mission to Mars disappears and its crew explorer vehicle crashes onto the Brown's wheat farm, what Ben discovers leads him to build a flying machine that will change his final high school year and the world forever.

Six complete strangers are forced to band together and flee the city when a zombie outbreak occurs. But after making camp in the middle of the wilderness, the group realise it's each other they should fear.

A former mobster finds himself on a violent mission, searching for his supposedly dead daughter and wife. His chase to find his loved ones leads him through a hellish underworld, caught in a state of dream to nightmare feverishness.

A hacker and war veteran are on the run after obtaining top secret government data, now the men in black; aliens disguised in human form are after anyone who knows of their evil plans on humanity and beyond.

Set in the near future, where environmental conditions have caused some people to find refuge on the ocean floor, an underwater teenage boy and a surface girl work together to find out what caused the catastrophes.

Hotaro Oreki was forced by his older sister to join the Classic Literature club. Upon joining, he met Eru Chitanda; who have great curiosity. When Eru is curious, the energy saving Hotaro just can't say no.
Unwanted by the family who bred her to replace their deceased daughter, a beautiful young clone tries survive in a world that wants nothing to do with her kind.

After a local Factory closes-down in a small Town, a group of Men that have been friends since High School decide to join their local D-III College Football Team and help their sons have a National Championship Season.
In the future, a cop protects a reporter from crooked, renegade cops who think she knows too much about them.
Detective Charlie Vargas returns to Los Angeles to take charge of a top priority case: the reappearance of the drug lord Jimmy Vanilla, founder and singer with the music group Black Vanilla.

Multi award-winning film; including 2 BEST FILM trophies. Johnny comes home on Army leave to marry his fiance Estella. Strange and terrifying events trap the young couple on their honeymoon in a living nightmare.

column2: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
column3: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.
While spreading her father's ashes, Mara meets Jon who offers to give her a ride. Risking everything to escape this hell she's entered, she won't stop running until she finds safety.
In 1995, a group of kids who share a passion for movies decide to venture out into the forest to create a horror film, but in the depths of the woods, there is a existent creature who poses a threat.

Outlasting the Y2K apocalypse at a cabin in the space and time defied Mobius mountains, Manny Moondog must go on a psychedelic oddity in search of his missing best friend and lead a hunt for Big Foot who might be at the center of it all.
In this Pororo the Little Penguin adventure, Pororo must tap into his video game abilities to save a princess. Together with his group of friends, Pororo enters a magical world to save the day!
(Supernatural Thriller) A homeless teen answers the voice of a child calling out for help and is sent on a journey to find a human trafficking network run by the child's killer.
An astronaut and his android double travel back to the time of King Arthur.
The story follows a married couple, as the husband works as a doctor who dreams of immigrating to Canada, a woman soon appears in their lives and starts following them everywhere.
The capo of a powerful mafia family tries to destroy the local crime task force chief, not realizing that the man he is trying to destroy is his only son.

In a funny, animated family movie with songs, Young Zuzanka, Honzik, and Goat are searching for the children's parents, who the devil has apparently kidnapped to punish them for producing devilishly good goat cheese.
A workaholic wakes up to find himself stuck in a time warp. What follows is a series of bizarre events, until he meets a mystery man who gives him life-changing lessons.
A young man returns to his village to defend the honor of his cousin, Golfo.
Two ballerinas plan a gruesome attack on the ballet school that mistreated them.
A street hustler begins to take control of the New England drug trade.
A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.
Los Angeles, 2525: The future is here. And the Latinos are pissed. A truce is shattered when a drive-by shooting rocks the barrios of the desolate City of Angels.
A jet pilot, Dale Robertson, find himself assigned to the barren wastes of Alaska where it becomes his duty to man an observation post.
A young punk teenager pulls a prank on the night of Halloween that will come back to haunt him a year later.
A half-wit falls in love with a beautiful movie star.
"Only God Can" is the story of 5 longtime friends struggling through life's challenges, discovering through faith that Only God Can empower them to become the person they truly desire to be.
14th-century knights transport a suspected witch to a monastery, where monks deduce that her powers could be the source of the Black Plague.
A newly married woman begins to suspect that her husband is a killer. Even worse, she soon comes to believe that she will be his next victim.
Bandits trying to survive at the end of the Tang Dynasty.
A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.
This is a retelling of Tristan and Isolde, set in 1940s France. The script was written by Jean Cocteau.
An unscrupulous filmmaker hires the long-dead Maximilian Paspa to play himself in the upcoming biopic.
Handsome top-secret American agent Matt Helm must recover a laser-weapons inventor who has been kidnapped by arch-villain Julian Wall.

column2: The Juniors y La Fórmula Imperial
column3: 7 multimillionaire boys who venture into planning a social revolution, generated by video scandals and medical experiments. Its aim is to generate a change in the world's ideology and its ...                See full synopsis »
During WW2, U.S. Navy scientists working in Cuba attempt to find an effective shark repellent to be used by servicemen stranded in shark-infested waters.
Prematurely retired and famous investigative reporter is writing her crime novel but is interrupted when she believes that she has seen a murder outside her hotel suite.
During the California Gold Rush, a naive widow forms an intense bond with the alluring wife of a wealthy prospector while navigating her sexuality and survival in a male-dominated boomtown.
A big outdoor action adventure. A new KARATE FILM different from what you've seen before.

A man vows to avenge the death of his brothers, after they killed by a goon, who is also an aspiring politician. How he avenges forms the rest of the story of this violent saga set in a land of bloodshed and wars.
