A collected-works compilation featuring three short films, "Geu-ge a-ni-go/Not That", "Hear My Song", "Seul-peun ssin/Sad Song", by contemporary South Korean filmmakers and produced by fashion magazine W Korea on its 10th year anniversary.

column2: The House at the End of Time
column3: Dulce is a mother of two who experiences terrifying encounters with apparitions inside her old house, a place where a tragedy occurs. Thirty years later, an elderly Dulce returns home to decipher the mystery that has tormented her for so long.

column2: The Man Who Fell to Earth
column3: An alien must pose as a human to save his dying planet, but a woman and greed of other men create complications.
The murdered father's ghost comes home to drag the mother to the very end.
A scientist experimenting with suspended animation decides to use himself as a test subject. Before he is frozen, his wife is killed, and he is suspected of her murder.
Widowed and bankrupt, madame Selstrup (Maria Garland) starts hunting for a "goldfish" for her daughter Ellen (Bodil Kjer) to marry.
A dance instructor brings his dance troupe to Russia for training. What his dancers don't know, however, is that he has a dual personality, and his hidden personality is a serial killer.
A man descends into paranoia after trapping what he believes to be the devil in his basement, but things take a dark turn when his family unexpectedly arrive for Christmas.

Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.
A boxer is modified and forced to fight in a "winner stays on" tournament to the death against five other ruthless cyborgs.
Trey wants to marry his true love by the 31st - six weeks away. Problem is he hasn't even met her. And when he does he runs into life threatening danger.
A road trip from Karachi to Lahore where 5 friends discover themselves and the country amidst getting to their destination.

Set centuries after an environmental disaster causes a small population of people to live on an unusual landmass known as the Tearling, a young princess named Kelsea Glynn, tries to save the kingdom by reclaiming her dead mother's throne.

column2: On My Way to the Crusades, I Met a Girl Who...
column3: The knight Guerrando is forced to leave for the Crusades before he's had time to consummate his marriage with the beautiful Boccadoro. According to the custom of the period, Guerrando applies the chastity belt to the bride.
A young boy attempts to reunite an abandoned polar bear cub with its mother in northern Canada.

An alluring hit man and a mysterious woman meet, not realizing they share a close bond through vengeance and murder. But clues to her real identity lead him to New York City and its deadly underbelly of organized crime.

When a precious Tibetan bead is stolen by rogue members of the mysterious Gemini Clan, the protectors of the bead enlist the help of some righteous former Gemini Clan members to retrieve the bead and bring the evil disciples to justice.

When a vlogger's girlfriend disappears and can only be seen through his video camera, he chases after her, unaware of the alternate dimension he's trapped in and that their reunion might trigger the undoing of their entire world.
To treat his friend's cocaine induced delusions, Watson lures Sherlock Holmes to Sigmund Freud.

After witnessing the occurrence of a suspicious death a group of medicos navigate to a village called Mayong , to find out the science and truth behind a superstitious belief and what they discover on that journey.

A member of a secret order of knights and his estranged sister take on the mob and a troubled scientist in pursuit of the stolen Danger Element, which they believe has the power to bring their father back from the dead.
When a soldier returns home to visit his estranged father, three lives will be altered forever.
The story is about 5 characters who have a dream of becoming great musicians. To accomplish this, they look for a peaceful place to work on their music.
In a desert dystopia, a young woman is kidnapped by cannibals.
After a mad genius inventor of killer robots and cyborgs at Chaank Armaments Corp. kills execs, he unleashes his ultimate death machine on the new cute CEO firing him.

column2: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
column3: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.
An ill girl wishes to stop time. This wish will lead her to a transitional adventure of self discovery and undertanding about life, death and relativity.
A post-apocalyptic tale set in the west Balkans, after a nuclear war.

column2: Star Wars: Battle for the Holocrons
column3: A battle rages between the Sith and Jedi Knights over an ancient artifact that holds consequences for the fate of the galaxy in the past and in the future.
A soap opera screenwriter writes a romance for herself and the star of the show.

column2: There's A Madman Named Guru in Montego Bay
column3: An alcoholic expatriate running a small and shoddy wellness retreat in Jamaica is revealed to be on the run from his former life when his vices and controversial practices uncovers a former identity back in America.
This will follow seven complex young girls in a ravaged unfamiliar country, unmade by ancient Gods hellbent on stopping them, who gradually come together to reach the only safe place left.
An ordinary day. A chain of incidents. Four people. A cold town.

The undercover agent with dragon tattoo Kowloon continually helped the police to solve mysterious cases, which made him known as a rising star. However, his impulsive personality dragged him into endless troubles.
A young girl is chased through a strange land where fairy tales seem to be coming to life.
A group of teens on a spring break road trip are terrorized by a ruthless killer when their car breaks down on an isolated twin span highway suspended over the Bayou.
Plot kept under wraps.
Ryan figures out a way to make his parents dissappear, but something goes wrong when his friend, Holly, starts disappearing too.
Boston Blackie Dawson gets some jewels that belonged to the imperial family of Russia. A gang of terrorists is after the jewels.
A lady who has been through many ups and downs throughout her life but she is fearless protector who wishes to provide the best life for her child.

In post-apocalyptic 2037, Judy rebels against the AI-ruled utopia where people live in a happy VR simulation. She's exiled to a post-nuclear wasteland where she meets drifter Stover. Mutated cannibals capture them for their leader Seer.
A visitor from another galaxy, an experiment gone wrong and a mysterious freeway killer are all at the center of this horror anthology hosted by genre legend George Stover.
A bumbling police detective and his sidekick attempt to arrest an assassin.
A man starts to walk in his sleep, and kill his family.
A psychopathic serial killer and a School girl. The serial killer gets the taste of his own medicine, when he tries to sexually assault and kill the school girl.
Despite their attraction to each other and Leon's persistence in pursuing Angel, the latter's dream of becoming rich prevents them from having a lasting relationship.

After seeing that Nelson kisses his lover, Barlow poisons him. But it turns out that Nelson comes back to life when he was about to be buried. From that moment, Barlow does not stop chasing him to finish his work.

Gunned down in the snowy wilderness and desperate for shelter, Billy Cavanagh is taken in by kooky old lady Agnes, unaware that her isolated log cabin is being stalked by a bloodthirsty skinless creature hellbent on getting inside.

When the first snow falls in the valley, it is urgent to prepare its reserves for the winter. Alas, during the operation, a small ladybug is trapped in a box - to the Caribbean. One solution: reform the shock team.
SupaDupa is an superhero epic about someone with extraordinary power who is having trouble realizing his potential.
The story of a poor Turkish family who try to emigrate illegally to Switzerland.

column2: Cool Cat Stops a School Shooting: A School Safety Film
column3: Cool Cat is in class when an active shooter attacks his school, and Cool Cat shows children different techniques and safety tips on what to do to stay safe, and then Cool Cat comes face-to-face with the shooter - But what happens then.

An escalating dispute with the Shadow Clan, a newcomer from the Surface, and all the usual thugs-Eli and the Shane Gang have their hands full from the moment they return home from the Eastern Caverns.
A mysterious vengeful man takes a job as a security guard for a money transport company amidst a series of violent robberies.
Familiar story involving star-crossed lovers from rival gangs, this time in Koreatown, L.A.
A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.
Inspired by Midway's popular 80's video game "Joust".
It's Paris in the winter after its liberation. A tramp who may also be Destiny predicts that Jean Diego will fall in love with a beautiful girl. That same evening, Jean meets Malou.

column2: The Mystery of the Third Planet
column3: Zoologist professor Steel, his small daughter Christine and captain Green leave Earth in search for rare space animals. The journey turns into adventurous and dangerous mission involving space pirates and a missing captain of a ship.
A 13-year-old girl and her two friends fall asleep watching a monster movie and are literally sucked into its world.
Truth and illusion blurs when a homeless amnesiac awakens from an experimental medical procedure with the ability to see people's innermost traumas.
In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.
A troubled and racist African-American L.A.P.D. Officer will stop at nothing to force out a friendly interracial couple who just moved in next door to him.
Using a special smartphone app, four present-day kids travel trough time to help save the world from a robotic alien invasion.

A young singer wakes up and she does not recognize in a world where humans are given the opportunity to connect of their own lives. Ada must play the game in order to return her real life, with the help of mysterious stranger.
Another Saga of Filipino HEROISM.
A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.
A man is released from prison and finds the society on the outside less than appealing. With several women as well as the police on his tail, he sets out to find an old friend.
A girl with PTSD attempts to refresh her life at a new school, but soon finds it impossible when she's afflicted by not only bullying and bad memories, but also the supernatural.

A satanist cult leader is burnt alive by the local church. He vows to come back to hunt down and enslave every descendant of his congregation, by the power of the book of blood contracts, in which they sold their souls to the devil.
A high school student switches places with himself from an alternate universe.
The new village priest gets entangled in a complicated romantic triangle involving a local noble family's paraplegic daughter.
A mystery novel-loving American tourist witnesses a murder in Rome, and soon finds herself and her suitor caught up in a series of killings.

column2: Un nuage dans un verre d'eau
column3: An Egyptian living in Paris disappears mysteriously, and his grandson searches for him.
A musical following Noah, a boy with a song in his heart and dreams to share messages of love with the vile Knawkemoutville, a city obsessed with violence and boxing.
A mad scientist transforms a panther into a man-like creature that escapes and goes on a murderous rampage.
A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their country's authoritarian government.

Two young men working as pages at a radio station try to get an audition for a girl they know who wants to be a singer. When the station's star singer is murdered, they decide to solve the crime themselves.

Who is knocking at my door? You see, there is no one at home. Come to me yesterday at 8 pm at the morning. Let the radio watch on the colored iron. Will drink tea when you left. If you want to smoke - valenki stand in the corner.

Mandy, a modern teenage "Lolita" with a wild sense of adventure and a burning desire to taste life, buys a ticket out of her one-horse town of Paint Rock, Texas, hitting the road to love, life and self-discovery.
Abhimanyu and Aditi, two youngsters who seem different have a lot in common which eventually draws them closer to each other.
On New Year's Eve in 1955, Richard Howell, a patient at the Hillcrest Sanatorium, went on a bloody rampage, killing three children before he hanged himself.

column2: Evil Bong 3: The Wrath of Bong
column3: An evil alien bong crashes on earth. Its intent: world domination. Our stoner heroes are sent to the alien bong planet and held captive by nude alien beauties. Their only hope to escape and save planet earth: Eebee, the original Evil Bong.
A police commissioner and a political activist join to investigate the suspicious death of a playboy Prince.

Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.

STATES OF MIND - Synopsis Ali and Vanessa leap from the back of an old pickup truck and push through the iron gate to start a long trek up the winding road. No one wanted to bring them up ...                See full synopsis »
Story of a highly successful criminal lawyer (Suresh Gopi) who brings his own version of street justice upon his clients after freeing them.
A dysfunctional east coast family tries to save a flamingo that has been blown off course by a hurricane and ends up in their attic.
Princess Leah is the rightful heir to a tribal throne which has been stolen from her by the dastardly Hassan. Bomba the Jungle Boy, of course, comes to her rescue.

A man finds out by letter that a distant Uncle has died and he has inherited property. He and his wife go to his solicitors where the solicitor reads out the will and explains to them both that they have inherited a Graveyard.
Animated flick based on book "O dwoch takich, co ukradli ksiezyc" by Kornel Makuszynski with music written and performed by the rock group Lady Pank.
A newspaper reporter stumbles upon German spies after a new alloy, an experimental metal that is lighter than aluminum but stronger than steel.
After a pact of vampires brutally murders Lucy's husband and leaves her for dead she turns into a vampire and plans on painting the town red with her husbands killers.
Missing for seven years and presumed dead, a woman returns home on the day of her husband's second marriage.

Aiman, who deals with never-ending problems starts to wonder the judgment given by God which brings him to stuck in another dimension leading him being fully alone until he starts meeting a mysterious woman named Maya.
An androgynous immortal, living in the last city in an alternate reality where time has collapsed, takes a dangerous job in the hopes of attaining a better life.

Daisuke struggles with a traumatic accident. One day, he met Ayumi who's being harassed by yakuza. He decides to protect her from them but he developed of seeing violence as a way to gain the affirmation and approval of others,

The Seven Dwarves live deep within a female-free-zone of the Enchanted Forest, but they cannot resist the innocent charms of Snow White when she enters their world. So when the evil queen (Nina Hagen) abducts her, it is up to the dwarves to save her life.
Several groups of people try to survive a zombie pandemic that unleashes itself in downtown Seoul.
In WHEELMAN, you are the most feared man in the US: Johnny Booker. But play through his humble beginnings as an employee for a mediocre taxi service.
A father struggles to keep his infant daughter alive in the wake of Hurricane Katrina.
A drunken Sherlock Holmes is really just a cover for the real detective, Dr. Watson.
Not everything is as it seems in 1980s Miami.
Four women in four countries suffer after being raped. They join together and use the Internet to fight back. Together they change their world. Based on real life experiences.

column2: The Adventures of Qiaohu Magic Island
column3: Qiaohu and his friends meets a mouse boy from the mirror portal named Xiaojing who asks Qiaohu for help on a quest to restore the rainbow flower in his world.
Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.
A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.
A group of teens trapped on an island, and are haunted by a demon hidden inside a pinata.
A thrilling and action-packed Western, The Ballad of Lefty Brown is a story about loyalty, friendship, and the relentless pursuit of justice.
Plot Kept Under Wraps.

A yokai known as surinaki has escaped his sell and is causing trouble through out the yokai world Yasha Enma and Enma King Shien must stop him from destroying everything and stop Enma king Shein from turning to the Darkside.

Both parents of a young teen who walks with crutches secretly meet their lovers, who both surprise each other at the family's country home. The daughter arrives and initiates a guessing game of "Chinese roulette."
A dark comedy about dysfunctional relationships, sexual hang ups, and vampires.

E is a gangster who attempts to teach the son he never had Shawty the game of the streets. After the wrong decision made by Shawty, E has to decide to either protect his protege or leave him to suffer the consequences of his own actions.
All Jean wants is romance but all she gets is casual sex. It turns out that her stepniece Debbie has the same problem.

column2: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc II - The Battle for Doldrey
column3: For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in order to become Griffith's equal and truly be called his friend, Guts realizes he will have to leave the Band of the Hawk.
After the disaster of Le Fear, director Carlos Revalos decides to make a sequel with a bigger budget. What could go wrong? Simply everything.
A Beagle must use his newly-bestowed superpowers to defend Capitol City from mad scientist Simon Barsinister.
A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.
Pregnant with director Roman Polanski's child and awaiting his return from Europe, 26-year-old Hollywood actress Sharon Tate becomes plagued by visions of her imminent death.
A bandit leader kidnaps the wife of the policeman who killed his sister, but later falls in love with her.
Sira shall marry Zagro, King of Licia, for political reasons.

During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone and, because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

A lonely 9-year-old boy makes a new friend when he discovers a magical little man inside of a cupboard, but when one of the man's spells goes awry, the boy's entire family is shrunk down to four inches in height.
When four dudes find a magical necklace that summons four foxy women looking to have a good time, the sparks fly and the partying begins in this outrageous fantasy comedy co-starring Michael Madsen.

In late 18th century ice is a commodity more valuable than gold. When corrupt officials conspire to form a monopoly and fix its price, a gang of 11 professionals is formed to steal all the royal ice blocks in five storage for a night

After the evil Internet meme Momo causes her son to commit suicide, a vengeful mother goes onto the dark web to track his killers - but as she delves into the shadows she discovers that it's a journey that will ultimately corrupt her too.
A real-life story of Canadian outlaws who nearly incited a native uprising in 1879 British Columbia.

Hanne, Marthe and Klaasje go to an Egyptian museum to present their new album. They all make a wish to an Egyptian Wishing Cat, not knowing that it's cursed by Farao Tritanchamon. The cursed wishes turn against K3. Can friendship survive?
After a San Francisco detective's partner is murdered by Northern Irish terrorists, the officer joins the bomb squad in order to bring them to justice.
Two spies are undercover to track down a nuclear missile while distracting a vilain trying to get world's domination
Secrets That We Keep is a psychological thriller about five friends whose relationships are tested after a secluded getaway turns fatal.
Vasu wants to contest in the college elections but is forced to withdraw in favour of the local MLA's son. But when the MLA's goons bash him up, he decides to fight and take on the brutes.
A romantic drama that follows a couple's second chance at love that is challenged when it's revealed that one has a terminal illness.
A New York doctor travels with her team to Los Angeles to find survivors of a worldwide pandemic.
A baby is thrown out of a window, and we get to understand the multiple characters who witness or influence its flight.
A story of justice and tyranny with the fate of Rome in the balance.
A cop in a dystopian Europe investigates a serial killings suspect using controversial methods written by his now disgraced former mentor.
The next trilogy of Blade.
Facing a deepening depression, a jaded artist's malaise is shattered when he dials a wrong number and a mysterious voice offers him a way out.
Walküre and Delta Flight used music to save people from the Vár Syndrome, a previously unknown disease that made humans and others go berserk. However, they find themselves facing a new threat.

Rose awakes in an unknown house following a serious car accident with memory loss and no ability to walk. Her Mother and boyfriend are there to help her. Rose wants to piece together her life before the accident. All is not what it seems.

column2: Alpha and Omega 4: The Legend of the Saw Toothed Cave
column3: After exploring the haunted Saw Tooth Cave and finding a wolf who has been driven away from her pack, Runt musters all of courage to help her.
A police officer (Suresh Gopi) tries a different strategy to help a man facing death sentence.
A murder suspect has gone missing. Three people must find him, each for their own reasons. Only one of them can get what they want. How far will they go to get it?
A downtrodden, hapless human spirit is given one final quest in the flesh to redeem itself and find the purpose of life.
A romantic comedy that explores the adult film industry through the eyes of an idealistic 25 year-old award winning film school grad.
A fancy masquerade party is the scene of a jewel robbery, and later several suspects in the robbery are discovered to be aboard the same train.
A divorced New York cop takes his son on a ride along with him on Christmas Eve.

column2: Stella und der Stern des Orients
column3: On New Year's Eve 2005, little Stella visits her grandma in the family home. Unknowingly she activates a time-travel machine and is transported back to the year 1905, where she meets some long-gone relatives when they were her age.

A chess columnist ends in prison when one of his columns is mistakenly seen as a subversive attack. From there he invents a game of war and strategy and a cellmate who escapes uses it initiating a real revolution. Gripping story.
The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

A man who wants to raise his daughter, Aysegul, away from modern life moves to a mountain with his daughter. One day a handsome, bankrupt man comes to mountains. Aysegul falls for him, which led her to join the corrupt modern life.
In 1743, outlaw Leon Alastray is hunted by the Spanish army but is given sanctuary by a priest in a village terrorized by marauding Yaqui Indians.
The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.
During the Napoleonic invasion of Spain Dolores, singer and dancer at a venta (inn), uses her position to help the Spanish resistance.
A war correspondent is forced to go on vacation in a sleepy coastal town in Senegal. Can a man of war really live in peace.
Stowe is a dirty cop who is hooked on heroin, and everyone dislikes him. Because of an accident he is put into a coma, and comes out of it a better person. He wakes up wanting to put things right.

column2: The Minotaur Takes a Cigarette Break
column3: A half-man, half-bull creature living in a trailer park, finds work at a local diner.

Tianya and his sister are ordered by General Feng Peichuan to embark on a treasure hunt to find the Golden Moon Gem to cure the plague in Heishui Town, but General Feng Peichuan has other motives for finding this treasure.
Beans decides that the only way to grasp the American Dream is to take it. State Property follows Beans and his crew, as they take over the city creating mayhem as their empire builds.

Blossom Hollow, a small family farm in Riverhead, New York, is where the Madden family claims their piece of the American dream- the freedom and the financial struggles, the community and the isolation, the highs and lows.
A fisherman contends with an ocean-borne outbreak that threatens his seaside island community.
Detectives from The Major Crimes Unit of Jersey Heights contemplate their future as a politically correct regime takes over during the murder of one of their own.
A few nigella seeds tucked in the palm of her hand, six-year-old Dounia leaves Aleppo with the Princess of Aleppo's help and travels towards a new world.
A Bounty Hunter and his private network of elite vigilantes must prevent a dangerous crime syndicate from establishing absolute power.

The Marquis de Villemaur reunite stranges visitors in his Castle, to meet a survivor of the 3rd Reich. There is an Italian fascist ; Heinrich, a German ; Matthias, a russian ; and Dromard, a blind French war hero, with a black monocle.
A geeky boy creates a " LIFE CODE " app enabling his teen sister to travel into the fifth dimension and change her life however she wishes.
Sawaal is a powerful confrontation of life's greatest motivating forces - self against selfishness, love against power, good against evil.
When mysterious crimes emerge in the psychiatric hospital, two elderly patients resurrect the super heroes they were in their youth.
Unexpected journey waits for Ali when he embarks through the wonder of the valley
After his pregnant wife is killed in a gruesome hit and run accident, a grieving Beijing real estate agent becomes obsessed with finding the driver and exacting revenge.
A settler family are shipwrecked on a desert island.
A grandfather, a priest and a police officer investigate the case of a kidnapped child.
Sebastian returns to his hometown to take care of his mother after her sudden illness. While there, he struggles to come to terms with his past and the closed-minded people in this town.
It tells the story of a retired police officer who is recently divorced and caring for her father when a beautiful stranger enters her life.

After breaking up with her boyfriend and losing her job, Jane reluctantly heads home to the small town she grew up in. But on her way there, she stops to help a stranger who shows her how to believe in love once again.

A Cold War story set in 1950 about a mass murder and political corruption that follows seasoned detectives and WWII veterans Ben Rockwood and Roy Hickock as they pursue a ruthless serial killer - a former Nazi hiding out in the US.

column2: Doraemon: Nobita and the Wind Wizard
column3: A boy befriends a wind-child and goes on an adventure to a land of wind wizards.
When an old, bitter, chain smoking, religious woman discovers that the gender fluid teenager who has moved in next to her is possessed by a demon, she takes it upon herself to save his soul.
A woman leaves an abusive relationship, just to end up in the sickest of situations.
A war vet turned long haul trucker becomes the focus of a Govt. experiment that unearths an occult entity at a mom and pop truck stop.
Rahul, a prizefighter who hails from a poor family, is smitten with Ruby, the daughter of a rich and powerful man. While their love blooms, her father opposes their union fiercely.
A group of friends reunite at a winter resort to party through the weekend, but things take a deadly turn when they cross paths with an old Viking secret that can't stay buried.
A psycho mother's boy is infatuated with a cute widow and stalks her.
An introverted and reclusive U.F.O believer who writes strange songs about aliens unwittingly becomes the star of a Hollywood documentary drawing unwanted attention from the psychiatric community.
A young girl risks everything to prevent a powerful, multinational company from kidnapping her best friend - a fascinating beast named Okja.
In the Arizona Territory of 1868, a fugitive army scout and a crooked Indian Agent lock horns over the treatment of the cheated Natives and over the affections of a local beauty.

Kripto wakes up 200 million years into the future on the continent Pangea II. It's a world were all his friends no longer exist. Together with a new ally he must find a way back and confront an enemy who lures in the dark.

12 Strong tells the story of the first Special Forces team deployed to Afghanistan after 9/11; under the leadership of a new captain, the team must work with an Afghan warlord to take down the Taliban.
A robot boy and a human boy team up to save their respective parents, who are being held captive by the organization that funded the robot's creator.
This hot plot is kept under wraps.
Maggie Diggins, a wombat turned Wonder Woman, unintentionally becomes the city's superhero after she begrudgingly saves a rookie superhero sugar glider from certain doom.
A pitch party, the demise of the families dog, accusation of murder,a wild city chase,a bumbling terrorist, a vet with a 'potion', exhausted brother and sister and 24 hours of craziness.
A little fox named Tod, and Copper, a hound puppy, vow to be best buddies forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.
After surviving a traumatic car accident, a race car driver travels to the Cote D'Azur to recover but is plagued by an urge to strangle his wife.
A brave adventurer embarks on a quest to find the legendary Eternal Flame said to possess the power to grant immortality while facing fiery trials and dangerous adversaries.

The Bar Mitzvah is a movie written by Mark A. Tachna. It is a story of a young boy named Robert, growing up as a reform Jew in a middle class society during the mid-1980's. The story starts...                See full synopsis »
The history begins in a small small village. The son lives with the father, and the daughter with mother, their parents constantly are at enmity and clash, bringing the matter to fights.
Two ex-cons try to frame the good-guy detective who sent them to jail. However, a group of kids shut the gangsters' operations down with the help of some friends from the animal kingdom.
A look at the corruptions scandal involving the leaders of the international football organization, FIFA.
Professor Fernandez is studying the metamorphosis in living organisms to cure his daughter of a strange disease that occurs in full moon nights.
Carmen is fond of astrology and conducts her own program of romantic advice on the radio. However, she lives trapped in her own time and in her past.

A crippled old man and his daughter plot to kill a young man they mistakenly believe was responsible for the man's injury. Matters get complicated when his other daughter, who is a twin, falls in love with the intended victim.
Born in a French prison in 1775, François Eugène Vidocq becomes a professional thief and is later appointed chief of Parisian police.
Romantic melodrama about a man (Kitaoji) suffering from amnesia after while scaling Kitahodaka Mountain.
Once again the legendary tomb explorer Hu Bayi is on a dangerous mission as he seeks out the Tomb of Emperor Xian, located on an island of monstrous creatures in this mystical action-adventure.
Wang Chung plays a cop in charge of a rag-tag bunch of misfits who are after a drug runner.
Ashraf Din Kiggundu and Frank Okoth Junior; are the chief architects of a plot, -to steal 1.36 tons of standard Gold from the Uganda Police Force custody.
Returning to a hotel now haunted by its mysterious past, an artist and her elderly mother confront long-buried secrets in their former family home.
Circa 1898: An alternate reality. Every full moon, the fortress town of Blackwood is besieged by ravenous werewolves. But tonight is different. Come "High Moon", all hell's going to break loose.
An old boxing coach helps a young ex-con and teaches him how to box and try to become a professional.
Nicolas Philibert goes to America after killing a French aristocrat. On his return he tries to divorce his wife, Charlotte, but when he sees others trying to woo her his own interest is rekindled.

A woman keeps coming to Quai Des Orfevres to see Inspector Maigret about disturbing events in her household.Maigret and his colleagues are annoyed, until this woman is found dead and they realize she was on to something.

A proper BritFlick based in the Midlands The Methodists, 'Harvey' and 'Winks' are not your ordinary hitmen. This darkly humorous and very British film With iconic characters, amazing monologues, literally has something for everyone.
This is NOT ABCs of Death 3. ABCs of Death 2.5 showcases an additional top 26 finalists, providing fans 85 minutes of unadulterated madness.
Top special agent Lucinda Kavsky works for a secret part of the CIA. She's given a special assignment but then set up by her own agency.
The Hero of the Soviet Union becomes a GULAG prisoner and then an Indian Chief.

A social-media obsessed American guy falls in love with an unplugged Japanese girl in Tokyo.
A woman living in seclusion fights for survival after being stalked by a nightly visitor.

Joe, a comic-book loving guy living in the slums, gets shot and dies, but comes back to life as a superhero. His painful past is the key to piece together who killed him and why, but not without a price.
A suburban cop, whose family is targeted by a maniacal mastermind, drags them through a gauntlet of deceit, deviant sexual behavior, and murder.
A young man channel hopping late at night discovers a mysterious horror show "Terror Telly" hosted by the manic depressive aging horror host Maurice Morbid. Wacky Horror comedy anthology.
A teenage girl becomes involved in a centuries-old war between good and evil forces after her younger brother is possessed by the spirit of ancient magician.
In the distant future an amnesic young woman struggles to recover her past and reunite with the love of her life.
A serial killer with a rubber-like Freddy Krueger mask terrifies the city of Virginia Beach.
A young woman studies in the university to join the UN.
As they're held for ransom, a husband and wife's predicament grows more dire amid the discovery of betrayal and deception.

A government paralyzed by political correctness, incapable of making decisions. One man has no choice but to make decisions from the shadows, taking on the leadership of global terrorism, NARCO's and the Underworld.
The power struggles and wars between the Frisian Redbad and his sworn enemy Pepin of Herstal, Lord of the Franks.
Based on a true story- Romantic Action Western
A story about healing love in shattered circumstances.
An angry young professional discovers she is dying, and sets out on a journey of self-discovery.

Set in the late 1800's, Bloodletting is a Horror Western Thriller about 3 handcart company pioneers who find themselves descending into madness while stranded in an abandoned fort surrounded by what appears to be a haunted forest.
A surreal period film following an university professor and his eerie nomad friend as they go through loose romantic triangles and face death in peculiar ways.

A spoiled Hollywood actress struggles back to civilization after the crash of her private jet botches a kidnap attempt, leaving her stranded in the jungle with her irritating assistant and her inept hijacker pilot.
Catherine's seemingly perfect rural life is turned upside down after she discovers her husband is hiding a dark secret that leads her to the unthinkable. Murder.

An adventurous young koala embarks on a journey across the wild and dangerous Australian outback in the hope of finding his missing father, but he soon discovers that there is more to being a hero than meets the eye.
What will happen to Nobita's life after Doraemon leaves?

Vinny and Sebastion, two burnouts going nowhere in small town suburbia, are always searching for the perfect high. Against geeky frat boys, dangerous businessmen and zombies, will they achieve their dreams or watch it all go up in smoke?

Shayon, Tista, and Ratri travel through time to both past and future by using a newly-invented app. Their voyages seem quite nice initially. But later on, as they forget the cardinal rule of time travel, some untoward ramifications occur.
The story of Ali, the secret police who captured traitors one by one who wanted to seize some secret documents belonging to Turkey.
A terrorist places an atom bomb somewhere in an American metropolis. The president of the U.S. has no other choice, he has to call Delta Force.
In the New Mexico desert, two desperate teens flee their traumatic pasts trying to outrun the law until they discover that the home they seek is within each other.
Ramón put Chile's Punta de Lobos on the map, and now he must guard it.
Chandramukhi visits Shimla and learns that she is a reincarnation of Paro, a girl who was raped and murdered. Plagued by her dark past, she attempts to bring the culprits to justice.

Marco, Mario and Filippo are friends have a great passion in common, flying. They attend the Air Force Academy of Caserta to become pilots, with the ongoing war and the risk of being called into action.

Three beautiful women from different cities in Latin America. Ana, in Buenos Aires; Sol, in Bogota and Patricia in Caracas, go through a day in which they are simultaneously faced with the same challenge: an unexpected pregnancy.
A young boy discovers a fascinating secret about the guests who stay at his grandmother's cozy inn.
Captain Mia Verse and her crew scour the cosmos for ancient living organisms, the discovery of which has radically altered society.
Three young martial artists travel to the big city to retrieve a sacred statue that was stolen by gangsters.
A new government agency with the right to domestic charter is reformed to prevent another terrorist attack in the United States.

A young cop, Tina, meets a gambler, Lee, at a casino in Las Vegas and things started to happen. With an Indian rock, they are brought back to the past to change history, which includes changing the relationship between them.

Four years after the death of her mother, a grief-stricken woman joins her sister as a catholic missionary in a rural town in Yucatan, Mexico and is haunted by the Huay Chivo, a half human-half beast creature that lives deep in the woods.

In the distant future, a man goes on the run from a scientist who wants to harvest his very rare, ultra-healing blood. But when her science project gets shut down, the scientist goes crazy and decides to kill everyone left on this planet.
Plot is being kept under wraps.
The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
A sci-fi thriller about a space mission sent to terraform a distant planet. However, the mission encounters something unknown that has its own plan for the planet.
A collection of three fantasy shorts: "La Choucroute", "L'homme qui osa" and "La princesse demande".
"My Love Puppy" is about a man who is about to get married going through an adventure when he sets off with his friend to drop his dog off at the pet-sitters.
A youth who finds a dinosaur egg accidentally breaks it. Soon after, she begins to have surreal visions of dinosaurs, including the Tyrannosaurus Rex.
To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.
Three college students on a wilderness getaway run into criminals and vanish, leaving behind home videos that the police scrutinize for clues.

A hip hop horror anthology of three tales of terror told by the Hound of Hell that revolve around the residents of an inner-city neighborhood whose actions determine where they will go in the afterlife.
Classical Czech fairy tale from Zdenek Troska. Two clumsy devils are punished by Lucifer, who sends them to human world for two sinners.

Fascinated by the causes of violence, Dr. Amanda Tyler, interviews and analyzes death row inmate Jack Shea. As the interview begins, and Jack's fate hangs in the balance, Amanda must decide if a stay of execution should be granted.
A woman who is plagued by nightmares involving a serial killer learns her dreams have a horrifying connection to the real world.
A young man and woman meet at the beach. The man falls in love with her despite her perpetually moody personality. She soon reveals that she is dying and has only a few months to live.
In Belle Époque Paris, accompanied by a young scooter deliveryman, little Kanak Dilili investigates mysterious kidnappings of girls.
A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.
Alex, a boy obsessed with scary stories, is imprisoned by an evil young witch in her contemporary New York City apartment.

Follows Zoe who finds herself tied up with a group of misfit students when they encounter an ancient relic which transports them to a magical forest with an age-old evil form trying to destroy the world.
Masoud takes his wife who has neurotic tensions to the asylum to take care of her but..

A woman struggles to survive an outbreak of insomnia when insomnia becomes an infectious disease. But is she escaping from the Tall Men; a special police task force charged with recycling Red Eyes, or is she escaping her own reality?
Disaster movie about a Navy jet and a commercial airliner heading for a mid air collision.
A couple of twelve-year-old Norwegian girls struggle with their intense, taboo relationship during the 1930s.
A group of modern warriors with extraordinary powers called Zodians, must work together to save their city from a scoundrel threatening their Goddess.
Two holes appear suddenly on the walls of a cheap apartment where a piddling fiction writer, Makiguri, lives. What he wrote fiercely after that was his own death.
This is a story of The Father Knight, who set out on a journey one perilous night.
The Black Mask must stop a group intent on setting off a DNA bomb that could cause mutations to the human race.
A businessman creates a horde of zombie killers. They massacre a platoon of soldiers, and the only survivor teams up with a group of teenage campers to fight them.
Kabul, Afghanistan. A drug addicted FBI agent is brought in to work alongside the corrupted local police force to investigate a suicide bombing at the American Embassy.
A man is unjustly convicted of a brutal crime. In prison he must fight for survival, justice and freedom.
A student keeps a journal while a one-world government takes over the world. Years later, a soldier finds her journal and questions everything he believes.

An elderly, paralyzed woman is in a nursing home for several years. Suddenly, her relatives come and take her home. Vulnerable, helpless, unable to say she thinks she has returned to the family, and found a house.
A mysterious serial killer is shocking the underworld. Scotland Yard is investigating the case. Clues lead the detectives to Blackwhite Castle.
Stranger than fiction adventures of secret agent 'Ace'.
The journey of an adoloscent boy who transforms into a transgender, the trauma he goes through in the process of discovering himself and how 'she' survives as a winner.
At the lowest point of his life, Richie gets a call from his estranged sister, asking him to look after his 11-year old niece Sophia for a few hours.
A tough, New York City ex-cop relentlessly searches for his kidnapped teenage daughter whom is held by a twisted psycho after mistaking her for the daughter of a wealthy businessman.

Nothing is as it seems when major credit card company is hijacked, and the ensuing battle for justice brings an unexpected group of enforcers on a global manhunt with a ticking clock. Based on actual events.
After a self-imposed absence, Avril Kyte returns to the small North Pacific fishing town she grew up in to discover her entire world is about to change dramatically.
A group of Renaissance Fair players are chased through an isolated forest by zombies.

In 44 BC, after the assassination of the leader of Rome Julius Caesar, Egyptian Queen Cleopatra and one of the highest ranking Roman generals and Caesar's possible successor Mark Anthony begin a tragic love affair.
A Southern mobster attempts to rescue his kidnapped brother.

A desperado named Reo is killed by the police. When he goes to hell, The Devil gives him a second chance to live. After returning to the living world, he looks for redemption. But soon he finds out that The Devil has played dirty with him.
Ben and Alee's relationship strains when they become trapped in the woods by an unexplainable force, but they are not alone.
A slave hunter attacks a ship on sea in which six girls are on their way to Australia. They succeed in escaping and are being picked up by a whaler.

When Raja and Shakti's fight turns into an ugly gang war, the police must intervene to restore peace in the city. Realising their personal lives are at a stake, they must fight together to protect it.

Caralique is a determined, young fashion designer looking to bring color to the people around her. Constantly being told no, Caralique must learn to stick to her instincts and continually try again in order to achieve her childhood dreams.
A musical fairy tale for children about the adventures of the blacksmith Mykhailo.
A couple finds their dreamy relationship turn into a nightmare when a first love unexpectedly reappears.
Two friends who win the lottery have the worst day of their lives with constant bad luck and unexpected turn of events.
When one by one three female students went missing from a reputed university, Laboni may also be a victim of kidnapping. But how will Manju save Laboni based on only ideas?
In the epic final installment of 'The Travesty Saga', the Multiverse is cracked open as Kyle and his friends fight to save the world from their Evil selves.
Two estranged brothers race against time to stop the little bro from mysteriously getting younger while on a cross-country road trip.

Five sexy females from the planet Venus are sent to Earth to bring back sperm samples to their planet. In Bavaria they use machines to extract the samples from resisting males but soon learn that sex is an easier way to get what they want.
In the mid 1980's, A family travels to their fathers favorite lake to spread his ashes. On route they run into trouble and end up at a strange farmhouse inhabited by two deranged siblings.
Fernando Poe, Jr. and Tony Ferrer stage an action-packed showdown as they play their respective signature film characters.
A gay detective tries to solve the murder of a college student.
After a lost battle, Kim Ho, a once-proud swordsman for the king, is suddenly reappointed as a lowly prison guard. Working overnight on his first day, he runs headlong into an attempted prison break.
Inspired by the story of convicts Robert Greenhill and Alexander Pearce, and their sensational journey of survival after escaping from prison, which scandalized the Victorian-era world.

On Vancouver Island, Paul Ho wakes up to discover the love of his life, Natasha, has gone missing. Ten years later, he returns to the island and meets a young student who manifests the spirit of Natasha.
A grieving snowplow driver seeks out revenge against the drug dealers who killed his son.
Alexandra has struggled with verbal an physical abuse her whole life. She finally decides to take charge of her own life by setting off into the wilderness.

column2: Seeking Wellness Part Four: Final Project
column3: "Final Project" is a precise and protracted classroom drama with a spectacular conclusion.
Bill struggles to put together his shattered psyche, in this new feature film version of Don Hertzfeldt's animated short film trilogy.

A man is found murdered, and witnesses are sure about the woman they saw leaving his apartment. However, it becomes apparent that the woman has a twin, and finding out which one is the killer seems impossible.
An American (Will Patton) in West Berlin finds himself caught up in murder and intrigue after his associate is killed and a diplomat's daughter is found dead in his room.
A man who abandoned his family now risks everything to find his missing daughter, including exposing the secret that he is becoming invisible.
John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

When a girl named Elizabeth finds herself in a magical world called Squisheeland, she needs the help of her friend Whoopi, a magical Squishee character who can transform into anything, in order to get back home.
A couple and many of their friends experience changes and challenges in their respective lives after attending a wedding.
A young man tries to repair his relationship with his father while falling in love.
Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.
Sethurama Iyer and the CBI investigate the mysterious murder of a famous actress.
Several big-city teenagers are falsely accused of vandalising a valuable organ, casting light on the hypocrisy of the adult world.

Shortly after moving to Pleasant Grove, Utah, Mia and Cole Whitman experience significant tragedy in their lives. As their wounds heal, they are enticed to use alternative coping methods by their neighbors and community.
The remnants of a massacred cavalry troop and ragtag group of stagecoach passengers fight for survival against fierce Comanches at a desert ruin.
Taking advantage of the panic after the explosion of the oil depot in Posolsk, someone managed to get acquainted with the secret documents of General von Rogge.
A bag of rare drugs brings together an eclectic group of college students.

The story of a father who's son leave him for poorness.Then his father became rich with hard work and skill to take-down his son.He was able to convince his son that the relationship is not bigger than money.
An architect buys an antique brass bottle that contains an ancient genie who's determined to fulfill his new master's every wish.

After losing her father, a girl takes up the responsibility of her mother. She then moves to the city in search of a job. Upon getting the job, her job takes her to a bungalow, where she is subject to a series of horrible situations.
A group of friends are seeking a new adventure in the mountains when their trip takes an unexpected turn. The evil of an ancient legend becomes a reality.
A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.
From International Fantasy Artist Dorian Cleavenger comes 4 stories of the bizarre and macabre in this unique journey of altered realities.
Nothing - not her father, not the church - can stop unruly Angela from being with her childhood best friend and great love, Sara in a 19th century Italian village.
In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.
A reunion between two couples becomes a massacre when one of the guests meets an anonymous person online and willingly becomes a participant on a bloody path to becoming God-like.

Domrol is a young valiant who has defeated all his rivals in wrestling and is sad because of lack of a good rival. He begins to annoy people till one day the right rival is come but destiny has another plan for Domrol.
Three teenage astronauts travel to the California desert for one last "mission" before moving away to college.
Two Brothers need to hide from their Parole Officer when his visit happens at the same time that a girl overdoses in the apartment.

On the eve of the new millenium, the American military are alerted of a long missing nuclear missile hidden deep in the jungle which is set to go off in January 2000, due to the millenium bug. They must race against time to stop it.
How many seconds do you have left to live?
A colonial police officer in Rhodesia hunts down the albino terrorist who raped and murdered his fiancée.
In search of his sister, a young man is in a ruined village, where there is a secret genetic research laboratory, which has escaped an experimental virus that turns people into zombies.
Action adventure in which the formula for a cancer-curing medicine is stolen, and a kung-fu fighting team must overcome rivals and doublecrosses in order to get it back

column2: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
column3: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

After the masked serial killer known as "The Bhen-Jah-Man" begins terrorizing the city of Wichita, it's up to three 'bonzos' and a resentful detective to bring him down as they unmask the truth in this mystery/comedy film.
Bill, Dan, Diana and Jamie, four motorcyclists who arrived at Whiskey Mountain for a treasure hunt, are terrorized in the woods by a gang of murderous hillbilly drug dealers.
Escalating tensions bring the world to the brink of nuclear war in 1983. Based on true events.
Story based on the life of 75 year old international jewel thief, Doris Payne, whose career spanned over five decades.
In september 2012, four film students disappeared while making a documentary in an abandoned building in downtown Mexico city. This is the footage recovered from the shooting.

The true story of two of NYPD's most decorated detectives who worked as hit men for the Mafia, getting away with murder for decades, until a prosecutor connects a series of unsolved gangland killings in an attempt to bring them to justice.
An incompetent, good-for-nothing handyman proves himself worthy after unconsciously helping a mad scientist by fabricating several mechanical parts for a machine capable of launching earthquakes.
A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.

column2: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time
column3: On the verge of being fired, a corrupt customs official finds a haul of drugs and teams up with a vicious gangster to become the most powerful crime partnership in Busan.

England, 1538. When her Catholic priory is sacked, a sheltered young nun must draw deep on her faith to overcome iron-masked enforcers, accusations of witchcraft, and the death of her Reverend Mother in a race through treacherous woodland.
Hoxha Mammed (Davood Rashidi) is suspected by government officials and then head of fisheries over past life issues and revelations against a former fisheries chief.

Man Ling steals two million dollars from the gangster boss Big Brother Lui, who wants to have Ling killed. Student Philag is also involved in the case. His father was murdered, and the young man goes to Hong Kong to find the murderer.
Ali (Lawrence Adisa), is a struggling real estate agent and ladies man who has never desired to commit to anyone or anything.
A sensitive puppet master is challenged by his creepiest puppet.

A Gentle Art is a twistedly erotic psychological horror that combines voyeuristic holds with hyper-kinetic editing, yielding a disturbingly entertaining film that doesnt let go. The film ...                See full synopsis »
A man must marry a tree to ward off threats to his love-life, but the tree turns out to have more spirit than the man bargained for.
Impossible visions of a dead world.

University students, Ray, Anna, Tyler, Halle, and Eisuke are enjoying student life while chasing their dreams. However, they have a secret mission, to fight against invading Reptilians from outer space.
A reporter investigates an exorcism.
A young boy who travels to a fantasy world in his dreams to break away from reality.
A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father who's been sent to Clunker Island to be re-purposed as junk metal.
Five teenagers frantically run for refuge down into a basement. They barricade themselves inside as they are being hunted down by an insane killer upstairs.
A lonely widower finds a mysterious video on his computer that leads him to an abandoned town occupied by an ominous entity.

column2: Scooby-Doo & Batman: The Brave and the Bold
column3: Batman teams up with the Scooby Doo gang when villains from both of their worlds unite to wreak havoc on the city.
After encountering gridlock on the highway to Heaven and Hell, a recently deceased conman attempts to work his way down the ladder by corrupting an innocent person.
As children are found ritually murdered in a small town in the mountains of Honduras, a girl and her U.S. expat step-father become obsessed with a mysterious young woman from the rainforest.
A troubled security guard begins working at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. While spending his first night on the job, he realizes the night shift at Freddy's won't be so easy to make it through.

The Oddsockeaters are small creatures, who live alongside us humans and are responsible for socks that go missing when we only have one left from a pair - the odd sock. They eat socks, but only one from each pair.

2 orphaned kids Luv and Kush embark on a journey to find their real father, before father's day. But their journey ends up in a tragedy where they are caught up between an intelligence officer and a terrorist.
An aging gangster escapes from prison and is taken in by a very beautiful blonde who asks him to kill her uncle because he guards her money but prevents her from using it.

column2: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl 3-D
column3: A young boy is recruited by his imaginary friends Sharkboy and Lavagirl to help save their planet.

The plot concentrates on the robbery of the Stroud Bank and the subsequent failed escape. On the way out of the town Starr was badly wounded by a teenager Paul Curry who, having witnessed the robbery, shot him in the leg from the riffle.
A massive influx of glacial melting triggers a new ice age in the Northern Hemisphere, forcing a family to make their way across the ice-covered landscape before they are frozen out for good.
The story of two friends Sasan and Bahram. Sasan is living in Brazil and Bahram is joining him too but they face many different challenges and adventures in between.
A young police officer and the daughter of a gangster fall in love at first sight.

column2: Totò Sapore e la magica storia della pizza
column3: Salvatore "Totò" Sapore, an unemployed minstrel, always manages to cheer up the hungry with his songs about good food. He seems to be the one reason of the typically and happy Neapolitan temperament and this upsets Vesuvia, a magma witch.

column2: The Adventures of P.C. 49: Investigating the Case of the Guardian Angel
column3: A police constable goes undercover to infiltrate a gang of violent thieves.
The entangled wedding proposal and love life of Carol, Ben and Doctor Steve. Will it end in true love or tears?

Evidence of a mass murder is released virally by an unknown subject, and then recovered by police and made public for awareness due to potential threat in surrounding communities and possibly nationwide.
To escape a gender war, a girl flees to a remote farmhouse and becomes part of an extensive family's unusual, perhaps even supernatural, lifestyle.
A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.
When an Iraq War veteran receives a calling from a higher power, he embarks on a mission to stop a fallen angel from raising an army of the dead to take over the world.
A politician (a brilliant and well-liked mayor from his fellow citizens, candidate for the Chamber) clashes with a graduate, disappointed and against the current dancer.
A lifelong womanizer gets a taste of his own medicine.
While visiting China, an American man falls in love with a young Chinese woman, but he then has second thoughts about the relationship.
Sunshine and America reminisce over a relationship that goes back "like skellys".

Mary, desperate to find a cure for her chronic, terrifying nightmares, takes a leap of faith on a reclusive Holistic Doctor, but as her clarity sharpens, Mary unearths the frightening mystery behind his obscure methods.
A daughter discovers she can magically control the performance of her football-playing father through her gaming console.

An actor battling his own moral standards witnesses a neighbor's murder and stumbles upon a load of cash the victim was hiding. He keeps the money, and in doing so, begins the performance of a lifetime to hide who he really is.
A man looks for the perfect roommate only to find that he must fight to survive the psycho he invited in.

column2: Asterix: The Secret of the Magic Potion
column3: Getafix/Panoramix decides it's time to pass the magic potion recipe on to a young, trustworthy druid. He looks all over Gaul with Asterix and Obelix as Demonix is out to get the recipe.
Two petty thieves face-off against gangsters, bandits and police after forging a treasure map.
1984. The rebellious, 17-year-old, punked-out Ulli and her promiscuous devil-may-care friend Edi set out for a wild hitchhiking trip across Italy.

Vijay struggles as a dockworker and eventually becomes a leading figure of the underworld, while his younger brother Ravi is an educated, upright policeman. This divide causes problems in their relationship.

Several oil companies are trying to get hold of Prof. Wilkens, who has discovered a revolutionary formula for a new type of fuel that will put all the oil companies out of business and control the world's economy.
Sparrow, Its father is unknown.
A young couple looking for the perfect home find themselves trapped in a mysterious labyrinth-like neighborhood of identical houses.
The movie is based on the British comic book of the same name.
Alibaba borrows money from his brother to set a slave girl free, and then finds a treasure trove that belongs to bandits. However, his brother's greed puts them in jeopardy.
In the Hudson Valley, there's Mafia warfare. Johnny Marzano vs Louie Benson. Trapped in the middle of this is Tommy Andreas.
An undercover policewoman helps three female convicts escape from prison so that they can lead her to a stash of stolen diamonds hidden in a swamp.
A stunt man is involved accidentally in a culture relics hustling crime and fight for himself in a series of dangerous adventures.
Without a shadow of doubt, Mr. B knows one person has the ability to make a life-long impact on another and he doesn't take that responsibility lightly.

Trapped in a mysterious room with no escape, four brilliant minds race against time to prevent a cosmic collapse of the universe. They must learn to work together and solve the puzzle before it's too late.
Plot currently being kept under wraps.
A young man returning home to attend a wedding hooks up with a drifter who turns out to be a violent bank robber. Before he knows it, the man finds himself involved in the robber's plans.

A film-report, in three episodes, on crimes involving teenagers: an indifferent classmate is bullied with nude photos; a fake kidnapping is intended to provoke a crime of passion; rockers let off steam in "Hell's Angels" fashion.
Photographer Neela and artist Manu share a unique association - their relationship is the only bright spot in their lives and one that gives them hope. However, destiny has other ideas.

column2: Moo Moo and the Three Witches
column3: Family of witches turn a mean orphaned girl into a cat to teach her a lesson.
Madhav and Mallika grow fond of each other, fall in love and get married. Things take a setback when the couple meets with an accident and their life changes forever.
The Wiggles (Anthony, Emma, Lachy, and Simon) save and return a baby Panda to his family.
Different shades and motives of violence are manifested through completely dissimilar characters.
After going to extremes to cover up an accident, a corrupt cop's life spirals out of control when he starts receiving threats from a mysterious witness.

column2: Flying Pig in Revenge Is a Hoof
column3: The Flying Pig is sealed in Sävarån and the chosen one has to find a way to release it, or else it will be a new ice age.

An epic hero's journey from the same lineage as Star Wars. An intense journey of a knight guided by a sorcerer to follow his destiny to save the lands from a powerful King and defeat the evil Black Angel.
In a dystopian future, a man rats out a mad scientist to save mankind from an extinction of its own making.
A group of passionate filmmakers venture deep into the mysterious underground Banning Tunnels, where they discover a lost city of cannibalistic, half-human, half-lizards.
A southern blue collar construction worker has an encounter with a mysterious "being" that he and his family will never forget.

CIA from USA sends their findings to the secret service in London. The mission is placed with their best, Agent M (Max). To prevent a financial meltdown, she must find a way to stop a computer virus as ominous as its name: Pandora's Box.

Marino, 18, a young foreign film student, meets Esmeralda, 20, a student and a painter, in whom he finds the muse he always wanted for his camera. Soon he sees himself wanting to be what she is to him: her muse.
Three strangers must work together with the fate of the universe in their hands

Set in and around Los Angeles, we follow a series of vignettes that capture a unique moment of love, hate, clarity, confusion, triumph, and failure among our characters' relationships with one another and with the city itself.
A teen girl, Jeong-min, stays with her grandpa and helps in his bookstore. A young bird store owning man with a broken heart sends off a pigeon with a letter that arrives at the now adult Jeong-min.
Plot is being kept under wraps.
The death of a shaman may not be accepted by the Earth!!!
Everybody has always wanted the real Alistair Crowley heritage, but nobody knows how to get it.
A dark comedy about an office worker and his first day on the job. After a day of unusual occurrences, Gregg (with two G's) is accidentally locked in the office overnight.
A young officer, saddened by the recent murder of his wife, agrees to test a revolutionary machine. But when a plethora of hidden motives and corporate lies begins to unfold, all hell breaks loose.

column2: Ho Ho Ho 2: O loterie de familie
column3: An orphan child who believes that dreams can come true.
The tale of the extraordinary life and times of Lucky, a horse that was born in captivity but achieves his dream of running free with the help of a stableboy.

Following a major event at work, a play-it-safe workaholic finds herself traveling to her roommate's small hometown in Texas for Christmas, where she quickly gets wrapped up in all the cheer and drama the small town brings in a BIG way.
In a teardrop-shaped land called Sangarashtra, a 9-year-old girl with special healing powers tries to save her homeland from the tyranny of an evil queen with the help of a blind swordsman.

On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. On the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, Charlie Watson discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken.
A scientist looking to cure the many symptoms of aging gets into some trouble that forces him to self his drug on the black market.
After two lifelong friends survive a near fatal car crash, they both gain a strange new ability to freeze time.
THIS FAMILY SAGA THAT SPANS TWO DECADES, FROM THE JAPANESE OCCUPATION TO THE 1950s, IS ADAPTED FOR THE BIG SCREEN FROM THE RADIO SERIAL THAT WENT ON AIR IN THE 1950s.
The vengeful spirits of the Ring and Grudge series face off.
Set near the end of the Great Depression, a young woman working as a secretary on Wall Street looks to join the upper echelons of New York society.
In a future not so distant, humanity has almost been extinguished by vampires. The dark of night is deadly and, while trying to survive it, a man finds a chance to redeem himself.
A couple returns home from a night out to find two sadistic strangers waiting to terrorize them.

Around the year 2000, a terrible incident shocks the city of Athens: a huge piece of moussaka appears on the city streets, spreading panic and death. Everyone keeps wondering: why, where, how? But no one can give an answer.

Three skiers from different continents join a team led by an industry icon to represent an age old ski company and emerging energy drink in a winter full of skiing, filming, competitions, and parties. Unfortunately, skiing's the easy part.
Four friends get together to have fun in a country house. Upon the unexpected suicide of one of them, the others panic and decide to hide it from the police.
Two American divers are distracted by fair ladies and skulduggery while trying to salvage a gold ship off Jamaica.
A young boy is trying to arrange money in order to build aircraft.
A group of Bomber pilots crash land in Germany and must survive the horrors they find
A daughter's relationship with Mother Nature could change the course of a family driven apart...
The story of a woman who is slowly losing her sight whilst trying to investigate the mysterious death of her twin sister.
Astronauts returning from Mars are horrified to find that the ancient microbe they found on the red planet has eaten the world's oceans.

Apart from local elections, one also has to win a kabaddi match to become sarpanch. Nana Patil goes to extreme levels to become the next sarpanch and applies all the possible dirty tricks to destroy leader Madhavrao Sardesai's popularity.

A bubbly Indian girl, Aalia, while on vacation in Mauritius, is forced by circumstances to place her faith in a Pakistani cab driver, Vicky, who then takes it upon himself to make Aalia's safe return to India possible.
Scientists mount an expedition to find a Bigfoot-type creature.

A group of pioneers heading west take an alternate route that ultimately leads to death. A nurse desperately fights a mysterious sickness racing through the group. While a psychopathic killer is picking them off one-by-one.

Four Boy Scouts are separated from their troop on a canoe trip. Lost and running out of time, the boys must utilize their courage, cooperation, and resourcefulness in order to escape from a real life monster and her brood.
A young boy and his family embark on a series of adventures when the boy finds some mysterious eggs which hatch to reveal a brood of baby dinosaurs.
The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairy tale romance is threatened after his luck turns sour.
A man, awakening with no memory, is told he is an heir to millions, but he suspects he is an heir to trouble instead.
Where gangsters set forth in terrorizing a wealthy family and where a street hoodlum eventually comes to the rescue.
Giorgio, a pianist arrived in South Tyrol to hold a concert, get to know Chiara, a beautiful girl.
Three powerful female executives explore their quest for romance in this drama.
A town is shocked when a high school girl commits suicide. A reporter and a cop team up to investigate and find out exactly what is going on among the youth of the town.
On the stagecoach to Cheyenne, a mixed group of passengers must work together to survive the arduous journey and the Indian attacks.
78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
Dann Mulvey (William Scott), just released from prison, is falsely accused of murder. The real culprit is the least-suspected person, who makes a deathbed confession.

In the midst of World War 2, intelligence services from England, Germany and Russia collided in a fierce fight for the mind of Nicky Raus, a genius German Jewish scientist who has been developing a powerful state-of-the-art secret weapon.
A British colonial policeman in Africa investigates a murder in a hospital up river.

As the world shuts down, Warren realizes how his lifestyle has put him on an island of loneliness as the damaged 12-year-old inside him emerges. He decides to try to find the love that he had been missing.
How far would you go...for your right to choose?

A rocker makes a pact to kill himself on his 37th birthday. 12 weeks before the release of his final album and the end of his life, he meets and falls in love with a woman who has a dark secret of her own.

After the murder of their parents,Nick and Steve Wellington are left to share their Inheritance. However, when the masked Figure shows back up to finish what was started, everyone will learn the hard way that blood runs thicker than water.
The sick old uncle wants to leave his inheritance to Girgir Ali, but Ali refuses. Meanwhile, an old friend accused of murder asks for help from Ali.
A young woman arrives in Los Angeles and is forced to take a job as a 'taxi dancer' in a strip club to financially survive.

Awoken from a 300 year imprisonment at the hands of Vampire hunter Christov Rachnba, Dakken founds himself in modern day England where he wastes no time feeding on his prey and claim back the empire he once had.
Velvet's orphaned niece Sarah follows her dream of Olympic glory with her horse Arizona Pie.

Contemporary Moscow. Nikita and Afina are the perfect couple: young, smart, attractive, and in love. Well, perfect, that is, until Afina suddenly leaves Nikita for a 40-year-old dentist. How will Nikita win her back?
7 years after the original Fortress movie, Brennick along with the rebels are captured and sent to a new, more sophisticated fortress prison, in outer space.
Two couples vacationing together in an R.V. from Texas to Colorado are terrorized after they witness a murder during a Satanic ritual.
An honest and humble gypsy lives in a poor neighborhood with his family until something unexpected changes his life forever.
A young warrior bands with a small group of rebels to wage a guerilla war in order to rescue his love and save his people from certain death.

A heinous crime tests the complex relationship between a tenacious personal assistant and her Hollywood starlet boss. As the assistant unravels the mystery, she must confront her own understanding of friendship, truth and celebrity.
A scientist helps a comic-book artist to become the superhero he has created in order to battle a vicious gang of rapists.
A physically challenged girl fantasizes about walking when a bizarre clown named Mini continues to appear to her on her magic Yamaha motorscooter.
Camille, a young woman who arrives at the Fairfield Academy following one of the student's untimely and violent death.
Dortmunder and his pals plan to steal a huge diamond from a museum. But this turns out to be only the first time they have to steal it...
An alien race forms a truce with the people of Earth, but one secret agent is sent on a mission to determine if there is an alien spy.
A thief's son cons his father into spending more time with him.
It's about a man who has lost his wife because of wedding's parties,so for revenge he gives flowers which has bomb in it to the every bride and groom he sees.
Upon arriving at their grandparents farm, a family soon realise the entire town has been taken out by an unknown monster.. And soon, they become its prey..
In Germany, more and more people are disappearing. Behind the mysterious missing person cases are no suspected wolf attacks, but vampires, which have their origin in the Middle Ages.
A Murdered Hillbilly returns from the dead to seek revenge on the town that put him to death in 1958. The small Town of Dackson is about to learn that the legend of 'Hellbilly', is true.

The nephew of a murdered millionaire decides to track down his uncle's killer. He faces many life-threatening dangers as he tries to break into the inner circle of the sinister criminal "The Tortoise."
For the second time the two curious boys named Pelle and Proffen get mixed up in dangerous business.

column2: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
column3: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife barreling towards a shattering climax.
A Russian Police Major is enlisted by the LAPD to help solve a series of gruesome murders perpetrated against young women by a sadistic sociopathic killer on the mean streets of Hollywood.
A man (Phillips) who wakes up with amnesia also finds his supposed friend has accused him of murder.

Based around the Solar Lodge secret society and the events leading up to the raid on Solar Ranch in 1969. The subsequent raid lead to the "Boy in the Box" trial of 1969-70 in Riverside County Superior Court, Vidal, California.

A dark romantic comedy. Tom and Janet have been happily married for years. But a visit from a mysterious stranger leads to a dead body, a lot of questions, and a tense couples' trip with friends who may not actually be friends at all.
When an apathetic home hospice nurse learns he shares a sinister connection with the mysterious old woman in his care, it forces him to confront a darkness he never could have imagined.

column2: The Princess with the Golden Star
column3: A Czech fairy tale about a princess named Lada who runs away from home in a mouse-fur disguise in order to escape an unwanted, forced marriage.

It's a funny thing facing your fears. For the friends and family of Peter Mills, overcoming your childhood fears is just another part of growing up. But for Peter, it means facing a monster that's always lived under his bed.
A young man searches for his father and encounters natural and supernatural forces, which ultimately lead him to unveil his true identity.
A Twisted triangle love, where a man feels the pressure of two woman of different age with different Demands!.
