A private detective is enlisted to find out who shot a dog and threatened its owner, but before long he's also involved in a kidnapping and murder plot.
A circus arrives in town, but an evil sorcerer threatens to destroy it. Only the clown Cepillín can save the day.
A CIA team investigate a botched experiment at a military contractor black site.
A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.
A homicide detective begins a torrid affair with a senator's son who is a suspect in a series of grisly murders.
A jungle boy of the fifth oracle travels to New York, with his talking dogs Winner and Fox, to find Father Christmas (Santa Claus) and helps many people along the way.
Babloo Ranawat, a genius hacker, is tasked with tracking down Laila, the mastermind behind the world's largest cyber-crime yet to occur. Will Babloo be able to stop him?

Maharishi Aazaad The Ultimate Megastar Of World and Student of military school has presented English Movie THE GREAT PATRIOT as an artistic and cinematic gift to the enlightened and civilized society of the World.
Bianong was a kidnapper, a deadly killer--until justice ended his bloody career in Baclaran on April 3, 1950.
English country squire Sir Hugo Cunningham searches for immortality by literally 'bottling up' the Spirit of the Dead, or Asphyx.
Two software engineers create an anti-crime app which ultimately gets them killed.

column2: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
column3: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.
A gigantic scope in film entertainment, mighty in cast, mighty in spectacle, mighty in its greatness.
While on the Trans-Siberian Express, an anthropologist and his rival must contain the threat posed by the former's cargo: a prehistoric ape which is the host for a parasitic life-form.
Two sisters flee the chaos of their abusive home and drive through the desert on a dream-like road trip where a series of puzzling events forces them to question their reality.
Mike Nelson and his robot companions watch and give their comments about This Island Earth (1955).
Harya tries all possible ways to free his land from villagers who use it everyday to answer nature's call.
When Myriam, the mother of two young children, decides--despite the reluctance of her husband--to resume her activity in a law firm, the couple starts looking for a nanny.

A detective in post-Katrina New Orleans has a series of surreal encounters with a troop of ghostly Confederate soldiers while investigating serial killings of local prostitutes, a 1965 lynching, and corrupt local businessmen.
Delshawn, "The Chosen One", is back in action, but this time, it's not for destiny. Not for revenge. Not for justice. ...For answers.
Young Jim Hawkins has an unforgettable encounter with pirate Captain Long John Silver and his murderous mates.

column2: Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget
column3: Having pulled off an escape from Tweedy's farm, Ginger has found a peaceful island sanctuary for the whole flock. But back on the mainland the whole of chicken-kind faces a new threat, and Ginger and her team decide to break in.
A diver investigates an underwater crime scene.
A scoundrel's cool facade crumbles when a feared associate reemerges to settle a debt.

column2: Professor Layton and the Eternal Diva
column3: Layton and Luke are caught up in an adventure, when a masked figure steals an entire opera house and forces those in attendance to play a high-stakes game. The winner will receive eternal life, but it could mean death for the losers.
The story follows a young soldier, and his introduction into the 2003 invasion of Iraq. Based on true events, it bears witness to the destruction, and horrors of war.
In the process of being written.

A modern-day African American journalist experiences a dual reality when wearing a mysterious locket - a forbidden dreamt romance with a white soldier in 1944 and a modern-day love with a white Civil Rights Attorney.
A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

Another world: Kitty is a barmaid at the Traveller's Rest in the occupied city of Tantillion. One night, a stranger walks in, and through a door and over the Frost Bridge between worlds - and Kitty follows him.
Three buddies are in for the surprise of their lives when the guy next door turns out to be anything but the quiet old man they think he is.
An original, surrealist thriller following a man deciding to face down a demon, whilst filmed by a mysterious third party.
A pastor bumps into an old trainer and begins boxing after his wife retires from MMA fighting.

column2: The Black Rose of Kush Return of the Gods
column3: A story that turns street thugs into magical Heroes and Heroines as they face an ancient Illuminati plot.

When a photojournalist captures images of a brutal child smuggling operation, he tries to take on the cartel alone - until his own wife becomes collateral. Now he must sacrifice all to rescue her and save the children.
A married couple plagued by memory lapses and vivid nightmares discover they've experienced an alien abduction.
A group of friends try to find shelter as America spirals into political violence.
A group of five friends decide to take a road trip, only to find themselves ending up in a dark government conspiracy.
While working on a TV-shop-bought time machine, tings go wrong. Gaus and Roms and the machine vanishes back to the Viking age.

Lida sells modern real estate developments to the new middle class in Phnom Penh. Her relationship with her boyfriend is deteriorating so she escapes to the beach, but finds there that the specters from the past haunt in sublime ways.
A police S.W.A.T. team investigate a mysterious VHS tape and discover a sinister cult that has pre-recorded material which uncovers a nightmarish conspiracy.
Lam cannot do right where his master or his main rival, Sui, are concerned. When the Master is killed, Lam must fight Sui and the Immortal Trio to protect the Book of Invincible Snake Fist.
Four boys came to know the hidden truth of their lives in their journey. What's the hidden truth?
Creepy happenings in an abandoned mansion are attributed to the ghost of an ancient courtesan, back for revenge

"Dances With Wolves" MEETS "The X-Files" THRILLER-Tina and Josh-lost, Native American, Bronx teens sent to Arizona-tangle with a Shaman unleashing a"vortex" that brings ET's-launching them into a New Dimension, changing them forever.

The only residents of young Nicholas' sea-side town are women and boys. When he sees a corpse in the ocean one day, he begins to question his existence and surroundings. Why must he, and all the other boys, be hospitalised?

Something twisted lies in the Realm of Eldervin. Dark magic has caused a sickness to fall over the village of Gallowmere. Our heroes Dagon, Nimue and Solomon are led by Jornas to assist in this Campaign to find the root of evil.

O FASCÍNIO is an intriguing story about a family and a manor house (where some terrible crimes were committed in the past by a member of that family) adapted from a novel with the same title by Tabajara Ruas.
Bound by friendship and loyalty despite hailing from different backgrounds, four former gangsters revert to their violent ways after a rival gangster kills one of their own.
An evil princess who kills her lovers is condemned by the Inquisition. Four centuries later she returns with the help of a vampire and tries to live forever in the body of an identical woman.
A young woman's journey towards self realization.
Second part of the Revelator Trilogy.

column2: Myths and Legends: The New Alliance
column3: A group of teenagers open a portal where a malevolent god wants to dominate the world of humans.
Twin brothers, one a Shaolin disciple and the other a bandit, trade places and confuse their respective pursuers.
A lady reporter and two college students search for the "Gold Special," a train that disappeared without a trace.
Actress Tsukuba was Nikkatsu's resident sex bomb in the late 1950's.
The Same Day is a surprising and original take on a man who wanted to be rich and powerful by any means necessary, but who regrets his past.

column2: Crayon Shin-chan: Burst Serving! Kung Fu Boys - Ramen Rebellion
column3: Shin-chan and the Kasukabe Defense Group are planning to perform an absolutely no-stunt Kung Fu challenge on the stage in Aiya Town, also known as the Chinatown of Kasukabe city.
A journalist, in a case of mistaken identity, joins a powerful and secretive council headed by a mysterious leader named Vrem.
A new scientific discovery reanimates a slain man who is either a missing person or a gangster's archenemy.
After moving back to her family home to care for her dying mother, a nurse haunted by her childhood memories must struggle with an evil force in the house.
Life is never easy, especially when three friends and their hunger to discover aliens finally becomes a reality.

Nap never knew his father and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

column2: The Adventures of Pepper and Paula
column3: Based on the true life adventures of Pistol Packin Paula and her dog, Pepper.
Two detectives at odds work tirelessly to catch a serial killer while get lost in the process.
It centers on the father and son dynamics of Batman and Robin.

Cameron comes from a Christian home but is still uncertain and in a desperate search for answers about the Gospel when he struggles with the guilt he harbors for not being able to save his best friend from a fireworks accident.

The tale of five adolescent boys enamored by the arts but drawn to crime and transgression. After committing a brutal crime aided by Trevor, a deity of chaos, they're punished to board a boat with a captain hell-bent on taming them.

After viewing a strangely familiar video nasty, Enid, a film censor, sets out to solve the past mystery of her sister's disappearance, embarking on a quest that dissolves the line between fiction and reality.
A troubled young girl gets a job at a modeling school where she is tortured by the voices in her head and the sounds in the walls.

Two married couples have challenges that threaten to destroy their marriages. One woman can't bear children and the other is being pursued by her rock star ex-boyfriend. When they meet at a Marriage Tribunal, what will God have to say?

Gold bullion worth USD 1 billion has been stolen from a hijacked train in Denmark. The main suspect is Count Massimo Contini. The US government sends Matt Helm, one of its top agents, to investigate and recover the gold.

Dylan James is an underground fighter who is estranged from his family. After he refuses to fight for the mob, his niece is kidnapped and he is forced to reunite with his brother to save their family.
Under the pressure of her mother and sister, failed-writer Eleonore Berthier undergoes a complete makeover and gets hired as an assistant in a publishing house specializing in erotic romances.
A private eye is hired to find a painting stolen from a powerful crime lord, but everything changes when the thief, the PI's former girlfriend, shows up on his doorstep in need of his help.
The lives of a couple, brother, and mob boss intertwine in search of peace, power, and redemption.
A detective counters a spy ring.
With only a few months to live, a desperate man kidnaps a successful advertising director and makes one demand: Create an online campaign to pay for treatment - or share his fate.

Chronicles the motorcycle trip of Ben Tyler as he rides from Toronto to Tofino, British Columbia. Ben stops at landmarks that are both iconic and idiosyncratic on his quest to find meaning in his life.
Jake's Closet takes you back through childhood in a suspenseful and deeply moving story that dives deep into the mind of a little boy under the stress of a fractured family.
After Flight 42 travels through a storm they find themselves in France, 1940, during World war II.
Heroes unite against evil forces.
This is a survival story - a Hemingway's 'Old Man and the Sea' as if written for our days.
Genevieve Shepherd discovers that her scientist father stole her DNA from a blood sample to create the first-ever human clone.
For the dead and the living, David Hazzard has to bear witness. For these are the last days for humankind. And Hazzard has but two companions who might or might not be the last men on Earth.

column2: Traces of a Black Haired Girl
column3: A railway worker moves to another city and experiences a love affair with a suburban prostitute. Their encounter disturbs his solitude, and the two begin their life together.
An inquisitive Jinn finds himself falling for a human girl while unraveling the truth of his royal lineage.
Plot kept under surface.
A young mother and her six-year-old son come face to face with the mysteries of two murders and a great crime against the Chinese community into which they have recently arrived from Shanghai.
A usual working day turns unusual for Guru and Harini when they get trapped in their haunted office. A patterned game unlocks a mystery and a lift is their only way out.

A young man recently released from prison recruits his three best friends to rob the local drug kingpin who is responsible for his incarceration. Can he get revenge and win back his fed-up girlfriend?
It follows a college student as she boards a party train for Halloween, and ends up fighting for her life when a mysterious assailant begins killing the people one-by-one.
After a deadly encounter with two yakuza, a loser with a crush on his childhood girlfriend goes to heaven and back, embarking on a psychedelic self-discovery experience with her and his friends.
The Film Is Based on Lord Ganesha.
Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.

When the First Lady's 55th Birthday is coming up, The President gets her the best Birthday present and has her own composer finish her beloved song, Requiem. A composer will go through the rabbit hole to finish it.
During World War II, two Soviet soldiers, man and woman, accidentally fall down on the Nazi camp.
Slumdog becomes a famous councilman and comes to be an obstacle to the mayor. While he's living a thug life and facing death threats, he is the only one that can change the city's politics.
A wanna be director's struggle in the film industry. The problems he faces and how he overcomes them.

Rasmus lives at an orphanage. He's OK, but wants a mom and a dad, and from time to time some comes to find a child, but they always chose little girls curls. Rasmus realizes he has to run away and find parents himself.
A beautiful young woman who doesn't believe in the supernatural must defend her only daughter from a demonic wraith intent on reaping the child's soul.
World-weary detective Michael Lawrence puts his personal problems on hold when the shocking death of a beloved professor turns out to be murder.
The inmate Takakura is set free and he takes a job to drive a truck through snowy Hokkaido.
A woman deals with her philandering husband.
Two men with the same name endure the funny consequences of getting mixed up during a business trip.

When a Halloween store opens in a deserted strip-mall, three friends, thinking they've outgrown trick or treating, decide to spend the night locked inside. But their night of spook-filled fun soon turns to outlandish survival.

Tadaomy works as a loan shark. He hires Tukasa to work for him. One day, Tadaomy's debtor, Okabayashi, asks to borrow two million yen more. Tadaomy trusts Okabayashi who has payed back sincerely, but Okabayashi suddenly disappears.
The story of real estate developer Harry Macklowe and his quest to own the New York City skyscraper, the G.M. building.
During the British Raj, the orphan of a British soldier poses as a Hindu and is torn between his loyalty to a Buddhist mystic and aiding the English secret service.
Mole's underground home is bought by the Weasels from wealthy landowner Mr. Toad and Mole is thrown out. He and Rat start to fight to get his home back from evil Weasels.
Feature adaptation of the video game where werewolves attack a small town.
To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.
A young woman recounts her claims that she was involved in a cult whose members were either murdered or committed suicide.
Vincent Will, a cold-blooded killer and mercenary working for a secret organization called, "the twelve disciples."
Two wrestling stars must investigate strange deaths and a secret criminal organization led by a madman who becomes invisible.
A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery without realizing they are stealing from the Mob.
Vennila meets Satish in college and breaks his heart miserably, leading him to a coma. Next she meets Santosh, who plays a game that leaves her mystified and in love. Amar, meanwhile, is her fiance.
Hong Kong detectives Chau and Beethoven join forces with Mr. Boo in a daring mission involving a jewelry heist and a museum caper.

Un ranchero mexicano envia a su hijo para la Guardia Forestal Mexicana tal como lo hizo el en su juventud. El hijo se involucra en un escandalo de corrupcion con la guardia de seguridad de la governacion.
Two descendants, one of the wolf and one of the undead and witchery, come together to stop the breaking of the seven seals.
Based on Byomkesh Bakshi novel "Magna Mainak"

A tale of women's empowerment, The Warrior Queen of Jhansi tells the true story of Lakshmibai, the historic Queen of Jhansi who fiercely led her army against the British East India Company in the infamous mutiny of 1857.
Six different stories of six couples in a particular room in a hotel in Singapore.
Plot being kept under wraps at this time.
In 1960s Australia, three families with their own problems set out for their respective Christmas holidays, but are driven together by a storm.
When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.
Infected by a virus, a mild mannered HR manager attempts to fulfill his overwhelming desire for brains, all while trying to keep it together so as not to incur the wrath of his bridezilla-to-be.

A high-flying couple lose their luxury lifestyle and end up living on the streets. They learn that life is so much more than just making money. It's about love. And they find a treasure they never knew they had - each other.
Two scheming demon brothers, Wendell and Wild, enlist the aid of 13-year-old Kat Elliot to summon them to the Land of the Living.
Based on true events, "Her Summer" tells the mystery of a 1999 police investigation, in which Ethan Crowe disappears after discovering two of his brothers brutally murdered.
Plot kept under wraps. Described as a supernatural horror-thriller that takes place on a global scale.
A murderabilia clerk discovers her own family's dark history when she receives a call from an anonymous caller.
Two narcotics agents go after a gang of murderous drug dealers who use ships docking at the New York harbor to smuggle in their contraband.

A neglected adolescent with an aberration for guns goes back to live with his biological mother leading him into a struggle to gain his stranded family's affection in the pursuit of his dream of having a place that he can call home.
Three amazing stories about love and friendship, about belief in a dream and connection between generations, about how not to betray yourself and remain human in any life situation.

column2: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
column3: A man and his wife decide they can afford to have a house in the country built to their specifications. It's a lot more trouble than they think.

A Jeep breaks down over the road through an old Forest road... Two men get out and look for a mechanic... They find one.. but when he reached at the spot he finds something fishy.. and the story revolves around these men...
A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.
A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.
Old men get ripped off by a young man and sexy girls. The old men finally wake up and exact revenge.

column2: The Demons of Grimsly County feature film 2022
column3: After a family tragedy two brothers move from the big city to a small town. At first everything is great, until one day they just snap, and release their rage upon the town.
Lara's a 25 years old attracting woman. She's tall and lean with a prosperous natural breast. Its silhouette does not go unnoticed, and her long black hair adorn a seductive and austere visage.
A traumatized member of an elite para-military police force falls for the sister of a female terrorist courier who died in front of him on duty.
In a world where the government tracks every movement via facial recognition, a man is tormented by his ex-wife who developed the software.
Plot details are unknown.
Four teenage sleuths solve a case regarding abducted children and teenagers and a mind machine.
A Mexican parrot named Cuco sets off on an adventure to defend his family.
A French artist, a bit shell-shocked from the Great War, tries to bring 'art' to a small country town.

A radio 'detective' gets involved with a wealthy socialite who can't seem to stop hiccuping due to the machinations of a ghostly cupid who works his magic to cause mayhem and laughter throughout the film.
The story of four American soldiers, who, after they witness a vicious murder of an innocent civilian at the hands of their Sergeant, are sent on a suicide mission led by a local partisan.
The Hellsing Organization fights against monsters and other monster hunting groups with the help of its greatest weapon, the enslaved super-vampire Alucard.

Zar-Go-Vlum-Roosh, the story of a strange planet, never known before, beyond the perception of our current zeitgeist. In this world, the major archetypes are vying for supremacy. Everything you thought u knew about, needs to be relearned.
A deadbeat weather reporter at an English newspaper in Kolkata evolves into a detective when he pursues a deeply buried story about a movie star.
A band of adventurers invade a native island determined to grab a reported fortune in buried treasure. The islanders are just as determined to keep their sacred treasure. Complications ensue.

William Edgar inhabits a strange dream-like reality. His obsession with a mysterious woman leads down a bizarre path full of signs and wonders. Sometimes finding the girl of your dreams can be a nightmare.

A religious country, constitutional monarchy. The highest political leader is the prime minister and the religious leader is the king of law. Military power and diplomatic rights are in the...                See full synopsis »

A fan film developed by fans for fans, we see a version of the Dark Knight developed with inspirations from the past mixed with original concepts by the director/writer (Jai Addison). In ...                See full synopsis »

When a drug epidemic ravages the city, Detective Grant Pierce decides to take matters into his own hands. Going undercover to infiltrate the infamous "Trap House": a madman's meth lab outfitted with lethal and sadistic booby traps.
An insurgent has to decide between their mission and family.

When oil is discovered in a small-town, some greedy prospectors hire a gang of wild bikers to scare the townsfolk away. However, when a group of young pilots stumble across the underhanded plot, they plan an effective retaliation.
13-year old Rikke sees Bea, the new girl in her class, as a challenge.
Prakash is called in to investigate the theft of diamonds and the kidnapping of scientists; a trail that takes him to distant Nepal.
A theatrical make up artist stumbles upon a murder, gets framed and goes on the run. He quickly discovers himself a pawn of an evil, supernatural cabal. Who will believe him?

After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

column2: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
column3: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.
A kickboxer is killed in the ring by a dirty opponent who works for a syndicate. The sister of the dead kickboxer vows revenge by facing off against both the dirty kickboxer and the crime syndicate.

4 runaways trying to survive and make ends meet struggle day by day. Enter Ma Dong-Seok. He tried to help but they took advantage of the wrong guy. So it's the classic mistake of wrong guy at the wrong time.
A pair of working class stiffs kidnap the son of San Francisco's most feared gangster only to find out that the father doesn't want him back.
On the anniversary of his sister's mysterious death, an apathetic alcoholic security guard is given the opportunity to crack the case, when she returns from beyond the grave.
DRACULA'S GUEST follows the story of two young lovers, Bram and Elizabeth. Dracula kidnaps Elizabeth and takes her to his castle while Bram sets out across Europe to rescue her.
The continuation of the adventures of Maria and Mirabella, in which the two girls get lost in a fabulous world inside a television set.
A maverick cop takes on the seedy criminal underbelly of Miami singlehanded.
Cosmic machinations unleash an epic, apocalyptic battle, against an ubiquitous alien menace of unknown origin.
Attempting to save his sick child,, Jack Whitlock, is drawn back to a life he thought he had left behind. When blindsided, consequences arise and cause everyone to close in on him for the truth.
Can people correctly 'evaluate' what's the right thing to do, while the world, as we know it, is coming to an end?
A Chinese doctor's assistant fights the morphine-dealing criminals who run a Japanese nightclub.
On a romantic getaway to Iceland, a young American couple wake up one morning to discover every person on earth has disappeared.
An idealistic cop joins an underground police unit and battles ghoulish forces threatening the balance between the human and the supernatural realms
A journalist tries to escape New York to save his wife and kid after catastrophic event occurs.

column2: Engkantadang Kangkarot and Her Magic Talong
column3: THIS IS A ZANY, COMIC, FANTASY FILM.
A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.
Four girls are stalked by a killer with a rusty power drill.
A movie about the power of friendship and courage during an exciting and thrilling adventure. A story about growing up, the fear of loss and finding yourself.
On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.
Several women, all bored with their menial lives, join a lesbian pirate ship and set sail on a kooky adventure.
Safin sets out on a quest to collect a virus kept hidden from anyone who tries to steal it, and he'll take out whoever gets in his way.
Colonel Mostyn of the British Intelligence Service suspects there is a leak in his department and hires an American expatriate to eliminate various targets working for the Soviets.
Blondie and Dagwood are in charge of operations at a mountain motel. The elderly owners of the establishment are in danger of losing their life savings. Among other things, arson threatens.

After the abolishment of the death penalty, California murderers are dumped on an island to spend the rest of their lives unsupervised. There, two groups are formed, one lead by a psychopath, and another group determined to bring him down.

Now a disgraced P.I., Marius M. Quick is forced to relive the past he's desperately tried to forget when a murderer dubbed 'The Pasta Killer' begins assassinating his friends, connections and contacts.
Yen Yuejun works as a truck driver in Mongolia and marries Ling Ling but his love for her has to be sacrificed because of his passion for Chinese opera.
University students, planning a bravery initiation test for their fellow classmates, choose a campus bridge rumored to be haunted by a vengeful female ghost.

Love You Too is an extramarital love story. Surya (a dance choreographer) struggles to justify his loyalty in love relationship with Sushma (a dancer), yet wanting to continue to stay loyal in his marital relationship with Poorna.

Mr. French and Mr. Berutti are the guardians of a city where the paranormal is a everyday thing. So far his work was very comfortable, but someone from their past returns with a vengeance that will put the entire city in danger.
A troubled girl must overcome her fear of change, love, and acceptance when she is sent to live with her uncle in the isolated countryside of Indiana.
Storyline One night Ashiq, an acting driver comes to know that his sister,who went out of town for a job interview is in a dangerous situation.

Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

column2: L. Frank Baum's the Wonderful Wizard of Oz
column3: Young Kansas farm girl Dorothy Gale is taken by a tornado to the marvelous Land of Oz. Together with her strange new friends, she will free the people of Oz from the rule of wicked witches and false wizards in her search for a way home.
Based on the SEGA video game title.

Accused of carrying out a campaign of psychological torture on the woman who left him a decade earlier, an antiquarian book-dealer must battle to prove his innocence and confront an evil that threatens to destroy them both.
In 1915 a man survives the Armenian genocide in the Ottoman Empire, but loses his family, speech and faith. One night he learns that his twin daughters may be alive, and goes on a quest to find them.
A young security man must prove himself worthy by defending the one object wanted by all the masters of the Martials Arts world - the Magic Lyre!
Two children on vacation in Egypt with their archaeologist parents expose the villainy of Arab workmen and help their father find the treasure he seeks.
What would it look like if Jesus were born in the 21st Century? Savior is a contemporary interpretation of the Christmas story set in modern England.
Two reporters investigate a series of UFO sightings and discover a supernatural connection.
Gracie, a fifteen year old girl, heals herself, her family and a sixteen year old boy through the dolphin research project that her late mother had started.
Remake of the 1988 sci-fi thriller about aliens trying to take over Earth.
After a young woman escapes from five years in captivity, she finds recovery so difficult that she manufactures unique ways to find and keep her sanity.
Plot kept under wraps.

The Heroes of Destiny have taken on the task of protecting Mexico from danger. A new batch of recruits start their trials to see if they can join. Meanwhile an old enemy seeks out vengeance at a dark place. Can destiny prevail?

column2: Shuang xiong da dou shuang jia mian
column3: King Gui's two daughters become victims of the Demon Society when villains try to seize the King's treasured Dragon and Phoenix Swords. Two young swordsmen, Jhuge Shiro and Zheng Ping, come to the King's aid.
Based on the backdrop of an illegal sand-mining racket, Veerapuram is the story of a young couple who are a witness to these illegal activities.

When a petty thief learns that his latest mark is a struggling single mother who works at a homeless shelter, he decides to use his savvy street smarts to make this Christmas one to remember for her and her young son.
After her parents arrange a summer job in a private island vacation home, a teenage nanny soon discovers the family has murderous secrets that drive her to fend for her own life.

The young arctic fox Napoleon III, having escaped from the fur farm, ended up in the village of Kovylkino. Following him, hunters, fur farm workers, a police detachment and correspondents arrived in the village.

column2: The Curse of the Cat People
column3: The young, friendless daughter of Oliver and Alice Reed befriends her father's dead first wife and an aging, reclusive actress.
A coming-of-age romantic comedy about a woman who crash lands her spaceship in the Sonoran desert and quickly learns she's gotta get off Earth.
Stargirl Caraway as she journeys out of Mica into a bigger world of music, dreams and possibility.
Unsatisfied with her life in England, young mother Julia relocates to Morocco with her small daughters, Lucy and Bea. Although the family enjoys various adventures, they struggle to make ends meet.
A California vacation rental haunted by the ghost of a dangerously disturbed suicide becomes a nightmare deathtrap for three couples that stay there.
A man becomes the superintendent of a large New York City apartment building where people mysteriously go missing.
An expecting couple's weekend turns into a nightmare when their baby starts to come early and they suffer a horrific accident on the way to the hospital.
A child's visit to the museum inadvertently becomes an adventure that has him battling giant dragons. Based on a fantasy novel by Charlie Fletcher.
A charming guy attempts to pick up a woman in a bar by spinning a tale involving spies, implanted microchips and the dangerous military scientist hunting him.

After a tragic accident that killed her parents, Liza is unable to walk and spends her days trolling vloggers. When she witnesses a murder online, the police dismisses it as a hoax, and it's up to Liza to find the killer.
A gripping tale of revenge. A man wrongly convicted of murder seeks revenge after serving nine years in prison.
3 shocking tales of horror that takes you beyond fear.
Christopher Kalher's Masterpiece Of A Film.
An optimistic group of cheerleaders turn into fame hounds and eventually monsters, when they stumble upon a forgotten east Texas town of intelligent zombies that just want to be left alone.
A physicist discovers that an excavation site is a key to bringing about the Apocalypse.

Our VCR (video comic recorder), travels black in time to stop a rogue android developer with alien-hand syndrome from stealing the Lunisolar-Cryptocalendar, hacking Galaxy mainframes, causing global pandemics and universal destruction.
A woman tasked with finding homes for 12 abandoned puppies before Christmas finds love with her co-worker just in time for the holidays.
A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. An unlikely hero must lead a motley band of teachers in the fight of their lives.

Kenneth is a socially awkward office worker who has little experience with romance. He buys a life-like sex doll in an attempt to rid him of his loneliness, but soon finds there may be a dark side to 'Nikki'.
Will love endure the cold sea Olympic3D a Titanic love story action adventure romance ship sinks again.
When troubled teen Milo, who has a fascination with vampire lore, meets the equally alienated Sophie, the two form a bond that begins to blur Milo's fantasy into reality.
Mr. Hobbs wants to spend a quiet holiday at the beach, but his wife has invited all their family to stay with them.
Small-town Detective, Chuck Eisenberg, is paired with LAPD transfer, Detective Carly Martinez, to uncover the mysterious murder of two nuns.
A struggling artist travels to Amsterdam to try to win back the heart of the woman he loves.

column2: To Love or Not to Love
column3: Stuck in a passionless relationship, a struggling romance novelist travels to France hoping to find his inspiration, where he unexpectedly finds much more than that.

Awakened without memory and trapped in a time-loop, Clayton, a small town handyman, becomes the prime suspect in a missing person case. When a mystical man shows up demanding answers, Clayton begins to doubt his own sanity.

Set in the 1930's. This story takes place in the middle of a crisis between two people who cannot help their daily life. They got stuck in a pointless paranoia and guilt that will explode in an unexpected way we could ever imagine.

column2: Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight
column3: A group of technology-dependent teenagers goes to offline camp and faces a deadly danger lurking in the woods.

A riveting film about the first Black woman to get her pilot's license. Her story is filled with romance, adventure, and determination to succeed in times especially difficult for women and minorities.

Year 2101. The southern hemisphere of planet Earth has become the world's garbage dump. In the middle of this enormous cemetery, a man will wake up without remembering anything about his past, his present or why he is there.
Lucinda Regis, Director of Development at MALCO Oceanic Research, becomes the target of a dangerous killer after unraveling a sinister plot to inject sharks with human DNA.
DEA agents fight South African mercenaries after a gold heist goes terribly wrong in Mexico.
A Kuwaiti version of the iconic movie Back to the future
In the summer of 1959, on an isolated military base in the Amazon Rainforest, two base operators try to figure out the cause of a series of anomalies that appear to be coming from space.
The Bugsy Cartoon are about three friends who years before being crowned Bugsy enjoy a collection of adventures together while living their everyday lives as teens.
Four guys serve their prison sentences in the jovial and not-very-authoritarian prison in Maribo.

In order to gain revenge on the killers of his parents, a man joins an organized crime ring as a hit man. The brutality of his slayings in his quest for vengeance makes him a man that the police desperately want to collar.
The movie centers around a Danish teacher and his adult students in the Danish port town of Korsør and deals with life, poetry, artificial insemination, lesbian couple etc.
A romantic holiday turns into a quest for survival when a city boy and his hot-headed fiance-to-be stumble on the killing of a big shot CEO in the South African wilderness.
Major Joe Nolan heads a rescue mission in the South Pacific to recover a downed atomic rocket. The crew crash lands on a mysterious island, and spends much time rock-climbing.
A teen girl is haunted by a dark spirit, only to discover that the demon has come to fulfil a curse on her.
This Is Heaven (1929) is an American Pre-Code film, produced by Samuel Goldwyn, released through United Artists, and directed by Alfred Santell.
Advocate Jayant defends his clients and gets them off the hook, even if they are guilty. However, when his wife is raped by the son of a gangster he has been defending, he vows to take revenge.
The film tells the story of a family trying to find a cure for the damage their son Onur received as a result of a traffic accident with magic.

A Chinese Ghost Story II Chinese )s}B IIºS is a 1990 Hong Kong romantic comedy-horror film directed by Ching Siu-tung and produced by Tsui Hark. It is the sequel to A Chinese Ghost Story and is followed by A Chinese Ghost Story III.
After learning the truth about his alien ancestry and newfound abilities, Michael Matthews joins a group of local vigilantes struggling to protect their city.
A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.
Horror awaits a group of friends that fails to keep a promise to a vengeful spirit.
A sequel to Who Framed Roger Rabbit (1988).
Steven thinks his time defending the Earth is over, but when a new threat comes to Beach City, Steven faces his biggest challenge yet.
Things are normally quiet in this small West Virginia Town. It's picture perfect actually. But something very dark lies there just waiting to be uncovered.
A deranged scientist escapes from prison and recruits Dracula, Frankenstein's monster and the Wolf Man to get revenge on his behalf.

An alien race known as the Ichori, attacks Earth to steal all of its natural resources and destroy humankind. While fighting to save Earth, Kairn, an alien ally, falls in love with Daria, a doctor involved in the resistance.
Anthology movie that presents 3 stories about romance.
A man is killed in combat to awaken in another war, then killed again jumping through time as he looks to stop the cycle of death and rebirth.
Do not include any spoilers
An Arabian prince falls in with a group of downtrodden rebels and faces the wrath of an unsympathetic sultan whose wife he is also romancing.
A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.
Two love stories set in one location separated by two hundred years.

Amelia was a lonely 10-year-old girl. Ratna, her mother, was too busy working. Amelia, who feels neglected, befriended her cousin, Ambar. When the holidays arrived, Amelia decided to visit Ambar in her village.
Gwyn begins doubting her "yes" to Matt's wedding proposal, when she hears about her parents' and brother's adultery.
A self-destructive socialite sells her soul for social media fame and finds herself trapped in a gruesome supernatural nightmare. A deft balance of psychological horror and biting social satire.
Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.
A feminine android delivers packages to the scattered humans in the galaxy. With years to spare the android and us have time to contemplate what it is to be human.
Sylvia Langdon is haunted by the memory of a would be rapist, whom she believes she has killed.
Follows the story and real testimony of Lucía, the only witness in the crime of the Jesuits in El Salvador.

column2: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow
column3: Naruto and his team are hired to protect a young actress from three rogue warriors in the Land of the Snow.
A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.
Alain Delon and Claude Jade stars in this Soviet movie: Documents reveal in 1980 that the Germans planned to kill the Big Three in Teheran in 1943.

After winning a case that challenges her moral compass, a Philadelphia lawyer follows a mysterious lead to Tulsa, OK to discover the events of the Black Wall St. riot of 1921 and her family's connection to it.
VIOLENCE. Violence permeates and is widely accepted in all cultures and all societies as a driving force of evolution.

A twisted tale of two estranged sisters whose reunion is cut short by the rise of flesh-possessing demons, thrusting them into a primal battle for survival as they face the most nightmarish version of family imaginable.

Four lifelong friends head to a remote lodge for a weekend of fun. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly descends into a fight for their lives when a local Pagan cult offer them up to their Goddess as a sacrifice for the Solstice.
A bouncer with a slightly murderous anger-management problem that she controls with the help of an electrode-lined vest she uses to shock herself back to normalcy whenever she gets homicidal.
The story of Stanislaw and Anna Oswiecimowie, real-life half-siblings who lived in the 17th century, and who, according to the legend were lovers.
May Britt plays a seemingly innocent farm girl convinced that her slovenly uncle (Cameron Mitchell) is the man responsible for the bloody scissor-murders of several local girls.
The finale of the 2nd Gen Series. Aaron teams up with every ally possible to fight the biggest threat made against the planet.
Anglo-Indian Victoria Jones seeks her true identity amid the chaos of the British withdrawal from India.
Diamond smuggling, and the disappearance of the mother of several children, in the seaside resort of Brighton after World War II.

FBI agent Brad joins Tony and Nick, the self styled Supermen who battle crime wearing bullet-proof super-suits. They are on a case involving radioactive counterfeit money and people who can be broken down into precious jewels.

Marshal Bravestarr and a female judge are sent to New Texas, a frontier planet under attack by the evil cattle spirit Stampede, who, with his ruthless sidekick, Tex Hex, are vying for control of the universe, one planet at a time.
A man finds himself amidst a police investigation that revolves around a horrible crime with only one survivor left: a young girl.
Plot Unknown

Life With Luca is a spin-off comedy series based on the long-running hit Life with Derek. The series picks up 15 years later, as Derek and his "Type A" personality daughter Skyler prepare to move in with aunt Casey and her extended family.
A couple decides to tie the knot and has to whether the storm that is the groom's older sister.
A police officer is investigating the disappearance of a colleague's young boy. His key seems to be the "dark skinned" friend of the boy about whom nobody cares, including the police.
Three friends, bonded by a love of running, were desperate to ditch their desks and go on an adventure. They placed a bet, span a globe and landed on Tajikistan.
On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

column2: La véritable histoire du Chat Botté
column3: An adaptation of Charles Perrault's famous Puss'n Boots, "The True Story of Puss'n Boots" is a story for young and old for the first time on cinema screens.
After their home is destroyed by invaders, a peasant family escapes into the woods in a desperate attempt to survive the attack.

A small town Sherrif feels the walls close in on a tragic death investigation he buried away 2 years prior, beginning to unravel upon the return of the culprit and the pursuit of a man seeking vengeance.
Four young people spend a night in a haunted mansion.
Ex-sweethearts are forced to reunite this Christmas when an eccentric billionaire threatens to buy out their seaside Caribbean town.

The story of a young city boy wanting to become the mahout, the elephant driver. Despite his master's belief that only Karen tribe people are born to be mahouts, the lad finally wins his heart and becomes a real mahout.
A dog travels to India with his family, but is mistakenly shipped to the opposite side of the country and embarks on a road trip to reunite with them.
A soldier returning from the war in Afghanistan uncovers a conspiracy involving the intelligence services and a gang of drug dealers.

After receiving new information from Salem regarding the disappearance of his sister and death of his parents, Ethan, an investigative journalist is determined to uncover what happened the night he lost his family over a decade ago.

A medical doctor comeback to his village. The place is ruled by Japanese invaders. They broke the doctor's hand but he manages to learn a special Kung-Fu, then takes his violent revenge and frees the village.

column2: 3 Ninjas: High Noon at Mega Mountain
column3: The three unstoppable Ninja brothers fight to save their hero (Hulk Hogan) and Mega Mountain Amusement Park from the vicious kid-hating Medusa (Loni Anderson).
Pilgrim discovers that his planet is targeted to be destroyed. With the help of Evangel, he escapes the planet and starts his journey to the safest place in the universe, the Star System Celeste.
Famed wrestler/secret agent El Santo must venture deep into the Amazon jungle to rescue a girl who is set to be sacrificed under the full moon by the Jibaro indians.
1950s LA: A police detective checks into a hotel with a bag of money, hoping to go away with Swedish Mary.

Young graduates spending a relaxing weekend in the woods are stalked by an unstoppable killer. Meanwhile, another, more frightening menace emerges and it's up to the survivors to band together and find a way to face the Devil's Music.

In the poor Norway in the early 1800s Gjest Baardsen starts off like a Robin Hood, stealing from the rich, giving to the poor. Based on the real character which became the poor mans hero, and got lots of help to get away from the law.
A team of high-tech commandos is deployed to robot-controlled territory to retrieve technology from an alien crash. As the soldiers battle deadly robots, they are pursued by a mighty alien warrior.
A piano player pretending to be visually-impaired, unwittingly becomes entangled in a number of problems as he witnesses the murder of a former film actor.
Professor Wilczur, from whom his wife and beloved daughter left, is looking for oblivion in alcohol. Severely wounded in the head during a fight in a suburban tavern, he loses his memory.

A wannabe novelist's dream of literary fame materializes when she gets an offer from a female serial killer to chronicle her murders. But as the blood soaked chapters unfold, the writer discovers a dark connection to the killer.
A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.
Movie compilation edition of the acclaimed OVA.

A father and son track down the iconic "Shot Heard 'Round the World" baseball from the 1951 pennant game between the Brooklyn Dodgers and NY Giants. The two-year quest helps lift the son out of a life of crippling depression and anxiety.

In an isolated villa, a chamber music quintet is experimenting with new sounds for in a forest night concert. They play wearing Trance Masks. Soon they will realize that humans are the wrong side of nature.
In Victorian London, a Scotland Yard inspector hunts down the sadistic killer behind a series of gory, Jack the Ripper-Like murders.
A girl and her brother fly to New Guinea to look for a lost expedition, led by her husband, which has vanished in the great jungle.
Frustrated boy plans to make a new country where he can live his life in his own way. But he finds life is not easy anywhere on this planet.
While Judge Hardy handles a couple's divorce, Andy takes a shine to their shy daughter.

In a not-too-distant future where every aspect of society is controlled by machines, two police officers performing a routine check encounter a robotic uprising, and a secret that the government would do anything to cover up.
Explores and explains the mysteries of the world famous Khajuraho temples through a fiction focusing on the spiritual of the sexual sculptures.

Nightmares Unleashed is a feature film based off the short film of the same name which is an oneiric style of film where a young lady gets sucked into the T.V and must escape her "nightmares" or the films she's watched.
A filmmaker with a mid-life crisis meets a mysterious young girl who reminds of every woman in his past.

A true fantasy camp for rich kids, Betaville is where the nation's most elite send their sons and daughters for the summer. These kids of important leaders get special treatment, which includes being guarded by their own personal army.
A world-famous pianist loses both hands in an accident. When new hands are grafted on, he doesn't know they once belonged to a murderer.
During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.
Rajan, a police officer, is in charge of the investigation regarding a murder that took place on a train. However, finding the culprit becomes a difficult task as he only has one witness.

In the crime-rampant city of Detroit, detectives Riko Delio and Jason Stone are assigned to dive deep into a vital case to put an end to the war on organized crime lead by a notorious gangster known all across the city as The Kingpin.
Edwin and Netta with their two children, Adam and Sekar going to Netta's hometown at Temanggung. Netta were suspected as the cause of Lampor terror at her hometown, a demon who bring a flying casket.
When his son is kidnapped, a government official has to find the money to meet the ransom request.
A father's wish for a cure becomes his family's worst nightmare as they find themselves battling the forces of a darker world.

In the second act, the protagonists enter a series of dream worlds and alternate dimensions. When the girls reawaken, they find themselves in the presence of a Blue God and tasked with a new everyday.
A group of boys who have been sent off to work by their king discover a magical box that grants powers to those who come into contact with it.
Justice needs to be served at Britain's most notorious young offenders institute.
The story of the Greek mythological figure, updated in this 80's version.
Paul, a phony politician commits a murder and leaks out the video by morphing a famous actor Kiran's face onto it. When Chitra, a journalist, finds out about it, she sets out to reveal the truth.

Radio astronomers discover a mysterious signal in the deep sea that could be contact with extraterrestrials. After several terrifying manifestations threaten their beliefs, the team must fight to survive the ultimate evil.
Fabrizio finds refuge from thugs in a convent, and passion in the arms of Lucrezia Borgia.
A man runs around the world for a woman's love. He wants to prove her that the world is not big enough to keep them apart.

A whimsical journey of a young autistic girl kayaking in Hong Kong water in search of perfect blue water for her pet Clownfish. Facing incredible odds and dangers, she finds the unexpected in her heart.

Sarah Portico, a geologist and scientist, travels to a remote island to investigate an environmental mystery. Upon her arrival on the island, she begins to experience strange dreams and visions that seem to predict her future.
Two middle-aged lovers pretend to be a married couple. Their new friends Tolya and Zoya are amazed at the matrimonial idyll of Kraskov and Vera. But this idyll is a myth.
Set in 1999, Kool Kats follows the rise of three rather naive kid gangs of the "Eastern Islands" a central suburb in Amsterdam.

Our figurine sized supermen hero embarks on an epic surreal journey that will take him across the Ethiopian post apocalyptic landscape in search of a way to get on the hovering spacecraft that for years has become a landmark in the skies.
A psychotic oil matriarch leaves the whole industry exposed when she attempts to outfight a bullish farmer whose water has been poisoned.
A dapper gangster sponsors an alcoholic violinist in order to win the love of a glamorous divorced socialite.
A youth group terrorized by the ghost who always come after their phone playing automatically the mysterious ringtone
The Continuing Story of Major Mujtaba Rizvi (Shaan) after the events of Waar (2013).
A man, sexually maimed by his former wife, lives vicariously through her affairs.
A birthday outing with two brothers and a friend turns into a horrific fight for survival after they become trapped in a house with a "family" of malevolent women.
DVD release of seven short films by François Ozon originally produced between 1993 and 2006. A Curtain Raiser, X2000, Bed Scenes, Little Death, Truth or Dare, A Rose Between Us, Victor.

When Barry Corvall discovers that his new bride is a possible enemy agent, he resigns from the diplomatic service to go undercover to root out an espionage ring planning to destroy American industrial capability.
Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where three American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.

In a tense alternate world, where believers are no longer welcome, le a crocodile farm operated by two families is about to become a Sanctuary for misfits. But in the meantime, they will have to face the ire of shareholders.

A Vietnam veteran with a psychic connection to sharks discovers their exploitation by the local aquarium and begins an underwater reign of terror to avenge them. The movie action scenes were shot using real sharks.
Thakur Pratap Singh is a respected Zamindar. Ravi is his son. Two brides fight for one groom Ravi. What happens to Ravi ? Whom does Ravi marry ?
Jackson, a boy whose family has fallen on hard times is visited by his imaginary friend, a giant cat named Crenshaw.
Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

Enrico is taken to Lazlo to live, where he is befriended by the village boys. After learning the truth about his father, he runs away but becomes ill. The boys watch over him in the hope of preventing Death from reaching their friend.
Four short horror films that are directed and written by women.
John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.
Futuristic Science Fiction about a sport to the death, using "destructocycles".

column2: Lupin III: Legend of the Gold of Babylon
column3: Lupin squares off with two criminal families and Inspector Zenigata's new female patrol to track down a hoard of biblical-era treasure.

When tragedy strikes, two damaged souls are left with one night to come to terms with their past and the feelings they have for each other before they are separated by an ocean and the fear of happiness.

"Maro Adugu Maarpu Kosam" U Story, Dialogues, Screen play, Producer & Directer Inavolu Prasanna kumar under the Banner of Mitas Visions is a Social awareness message oriented film. This ...                See full synopsis »
An unfairly jailed cop is broken out of prison to join a black ops private unit hired to protect the identity of an Iranian VIP spy codenamed Xerxes

column2: King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
column3: Sorceress Morgana and her son, Mordred, return to Earth after 1,500 years, hell-bent on destruction.
Myra Maynard, is plagued by a wide variety of metaphysical assaults by the corrupt Black Order, a secret organization which uses magic, curses and any supernatural means possible to achieve its ends.
After a business man kills thousands of snakes in pit where they are building a new apartment building. The people living there soon become attacked by thousands of snakes as vengeance.
When a TV reporter sets out to uncover a small town's hidden secret, she unwittingly becomes embroiled in a story that began with the curse of a Louisiana doll-maker over 40 years earlier.
Two unemployed people lose patience and start earning money through some fraudulent actions.
This is the story of an underprivileged, lost young woman, that finds atonement and redemption in the art of photography, in the magic of nature and, overall, through the true and endless love.

A poet in love unwittingly finds a very valuable necklace, to be well with his future mother-in-law he gives it to her without knowing that it is very expensive and that it will bring him many problems.
In a bizarre post-apocalyptic world, Drifterboy and Boss-Action go on a quest to find a supposed civilization beyond a mountain. Instead, they find hell.
A couple has a fight after living together 5 years in Las Vegas. They go out and celebrate 4th of July, each with a new partner. Breakup?
A beautiful young Chinese woman has the adventure of her lifetime in peaceful romantic New Zealand.
A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from terrorists, who want to use his mental powers for evil.
A group of thieves head to Mexico to find a centuries-old treasure buried beneath the Yucatan peninsula.
The true story of serial killer Henry Lee Lucas.
When an obsessive gamer living in his parents' basement is forced to get a job, he embarks on the most epic quest of his life - to slay the corporate villains and save his princess.
A man obsessed with the idea of writing "high literature" starts to cause conflicts around him to write about it.
When Mark Connors tries to understand the plant EARTH, things go awry and it is up to the Him to stop the villainous Aliens from enacting his terrible plans.
In Welcome O Life, one person's visions help him to find meaning in a broken industrial world, but as a young and impulsive man, he doesn't have the patience to let his dreams materialize.
A widower must look after his precocious daughter and rebuild his life and career after he's sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup.

The naïve Cassandra creates replicator technology that could destroy or save humanity. She must escape from controlling governmental forces, a secret society, and businessmen that seek to steal her research and her mind.
Plot kept under wraps.
A tenderfoot from Philadelphia, two misfit gamblers on the run, and a deadly preacher have a date with destiny in a boom town gone bust called Big Kill.

The adventures of sassy, outspoken box turtles Rafi and Hank and their friend, a gruff snapping turtle named Goliath. After vandals break into a nature park and kidnap Hank, it's up to Rafi and Goliath to track down their missing friend.
Its a village backdrop happens in 1988.The main theme of the movie is TIME WILL DECIDE THE FATE of the people.

Borzoo is in love with Maryam and they want to get marry while his niece Zohre is in love with another guy Amir. Borzoo gets marry with Maryam but the troubles begin for all when other people too intervene between them.
A roadside incident shakes up a teenage girl's life by challenging her self-confidence and inner strength.
A boozing young man in love with his co-worker finds that everyone around him, even his pompous and condescending best friend, is changing into a rhinoceros.
A decently-executed but fairly routine, contemporary ninkyô programmer.
A group of young explorers visit a seemingly normal forest.
A screenwriter loses a script in the back of a rickshaw, and complications in the driver's life make it difficult to return to its rightful owner.
College student, Doug, discovers a meteorite which gives him a new super power everyday, hilarity ensues as he attempts to discover the meaning of true heroism.

A rare family night for Jay takes a brutal twist when he awakens in a basement with three other prisoners. As their vengeful captor runs riot, Jay engages in a twisted battle to solve the puzzle to his past and save his family's future.
A Russian gangster kidnaps a woman and her friend, an aging European deceived by a young lover.

A bomb explodes in a shopping mall. Sam the security agent tries to save the victims, but at the end he runs off. Later he encounters all the people he saved. They all think that somehow he is responsible for what happened.
Neowestern Action Thriller.
Australian geologist Mr Smith arrives at Thariode, British India for gold mining. Based on the 2019 documentary film "Thariode" by Nirmal Baby Varghese.
A story of what happens when a reluctant man is forced to face his fears, which begins as a fun camping trip and ends in a fight for survival in the remote forest of the pacific northwest.
The story of a young doctor who lives a luxurious life based on credit cards, chasing girls and his bad intentions once he goes bankrupt.
A fantasy film about a near future in which the manipulation through TV and mass media modifies our real lives for the benefits of obscure interests.

Riots in a Mexican town are the backdrop of an American woman desperately trying to protect her deaf-mute son from the mysterious Game Committee threatening to kill him if she refuses to play the game by delivering $500,000 in 24 hours.
Adults who have long ago lost their link to nature fail to understand the feelings a growing 12-year-old country girl has for a beautiful black stallion.

On April 12, 1961, Soviet cosmonaut Gagarin blasted off in a Vostok rocket and he orbited Earth for 106 minutes. He was the cosmonaut who was selected from over three thousand fighter pilots throughout the Soviet Union.
When a fading actress learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

column2: The X Files: I Want to Believe
column3: Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.
A young man joins a gang of smugglers that looks for someone with clean criminal record.
'Two seasoned contract killers, disposing of their latest victim in a 'mob graveyard' are stalked through the ancient forest by a malevolent supernatural force...'
Yash falls in love with Natasha but is not able to profess his feelings to her. A few years later, he stalks and kidnaps her. Will they fall in love or will his obsession increase with time.
Two children living in different countries are visited nightly by a faceless being who wants to take possession of them.
Seaside (nowhere near the sea), puppeteers Judy and Punch are trying to resurrect their marionette show in an an anarchic town on the brink of mob rule.
Ravi Varma, who is sentenced to life in prison for murder, tells his story to his wife's sister, a news reporter, about the true story of what happened.

Sayuri, a coffee shop waitress, uses her supernatural powers to help those who are troubled by spiritual phenomena. She gradually gets involved in serious matters, eventually facing a fierce battle with the devil.
A poet sells his collection of comic books and action figures in order to afford to hire a male stripper on New Years Eve.
A group of kids wage war against the evil spirits of their neighborhood, fighting to protect people from their damaging influence.
Priya, locked up in her room when trying to runaway witnesses the murder of her neighbour and captures it in her camera. She being the only witness is now the target of the murderer.

Nello saves the life of a dog but returns home to find his grandfather dead. Living under a haystack, he enters a drawing contest and wins the prize and the affections of a fellow artist, who adopts him.

Long-suffering heiress Seeta is treated worse than a servant by her abusive money-grubbing aunt. Meanwhile, her long-lost twin sister Geeta grows up to be a gutsy street performer. One day, the girls unintentionally swap places.

It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

Yeong-ju, now an unwed mother working in a hospital, contracts TB. Her young child, now in the custody of her ex-lover, runs away from home and tries to find the remote island where his mother is living to be at her bedside
The new kid in Cradle Bay, Washington stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.
On her return from Florence, where she was a victim of Stendhal Syndrome, a young Quebec violinist undertakes research to find her mother who has been missing for two years.

column2: Dancing on the Brink of the World
column3: A man tries to pull off the greatest techno heist in banking history.

Supernaturals in LA and their savage instincts, clan turf wars, and scientific experiments, while a group of photojournalists are documenting sudden appearances of both Earth's mystery beings and unidentified entities from the skies.
A group of young students discover that the fate of humankind's existence when aliens threaten to occupy the planet.

"Kilos" is a tension filled crime thriller about an undercover cop, Max, who has infiltrated a ruthless drug cartel. But when Pecan, a ruthless thug, starts to smell a rat, Max finds himself doing anything he can to survive.
After his family is killed in front of his eyes, little Seyit Battal grows up to be the nightmare of Byzantine's Black Knighthood.
Three childhood friends from Belgrade, Serbia see their destinies change as they become adults during the wartime 1990s.
Maria, a beautiful girl, baptized by Father Gavriil, joins gang leader Davelis and returns to her village to take revenge on the people who had treated her badly.
Two strangers research a mysterious outbreak of mass hysteria in a small village.

column2: A Tale of Love and Darkness
column3: The story of Amos Oz's youth, set against the backdrop of the end of the British Mandate for Palestine and the early years of the State of Israel. The film details the young man's relationship with his mother and his beginnings as a writer, while looking at what happens when the stories we tell become the stories we live.
It is said that every investigator has a crime that haunts them, a case that hurts him more than the others, without him necessarily knowing why. For Yohan that case is the murder of Clara.
Paranormal events affect a couple who have recently moved into their New York City apartment.
Teenagers gathered in an old mansion are being murdered one by one. The survivors must discover who among them is the killer before he finishes off everybody.
Residents of Manhattan's Hell's Kitchen attempt to balance family and friendship against the harsh street life that unfolds around them.

Toomaj manages to escape from the prison but when get back home he finds that his wife has been raped by an unknown person. This is only the beginning of the troubles as Toomaj begins to search for that person.
A series of murders and gossip about 'the cut-throat woman' hits the streets. Although her friend has been missing, a high school girl, Misaki, does not believe in the rumors.
Nightclub owner T.J. Brennon dies in a car accident and two narcotics agents are killed in his apartment, prompting an investigation by the local police aided by Brennon's cop brother.
A political attaché stationed in the Congo takes one false step.
Tania and Daniela exchange husbands during a wedding just for fun, but a fatal accident will create new, strange relationships.

Airboy the Movie. Airboy was a 1942 fictional comic book aviator hero during the World War II period. Airboy's biggest nemesis was Valkyrie, a sexy cleavage baring German aviator who later became his ally.

column2: When Common Sense Tells You Not To
column3: Mysterious Bum with amnesia wanders into the life of a successful Attorney who hates Christmas. Attorney's two children know his painful secret, but only the Bum can help them.

Nearly a year after a botched job, a hitman takes a new assignment with the promise of a big payoff for three killings. What starts off as an easy task soon unravels, sending the killer into the heart of darkness.

A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.
Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, land- and air-residents live together.

column2: The Last Days of American Crime
column3: In the not-too-distant future, as a final response to terrorism and crime, the U.S. government plans to broadcast a signal making it impossible for anyone to knowingly commit unlawful acts.

A group of people inside an underground complex which possesses high tech computers which tracks world events consider all options as nuclear war is at hand,air supplies may last only eight days and Biblical prophesy unfolds.
A tram engine discovers the secrets of his hidden abilities as a "hybrid engine" and confronts an old foe from the past, while trying to fit in with the engines of his new railway.
The film explores the dark underbelly of Thiruvananthapuram where rival goondas clash in cold-blooded gang wars to gain dominion over the city's suburbs and slums.
A young singer with an unscrupulous manager falls in love with a photographer and tries to improve her life. She changes things for the better but is shot down by the manager she rebelled against.
In the year 2057, agent Hayes is sent to Titan to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a scientist.
The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.
A deadly prehistoric strain of bacteria spawns back to life and terrorizes a quiet lakeside town.
Unusual (multiple) people tend to meet at a Restaurant and their life-changing moments take place in order to know about a single person.
A group of rebels set out to kill the oligarchs and military thugs who terrorize a war-torn planet in the remote Tau Ceti solar system.
One man does all that he can to stop an impending apocalypse.

column2: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
column3: Malcolm Turner and his stepson Trent go undercover at an all-girls school to flush out a killer.

column2: Beyond Blue: An Unnerving Tale of a Demented Mind
column3: A man obsessed with his mother's homemade food and controlled by his inner demons. What he feels; thinks and what his actions lead him is 'BEYOND BLUE'
A magical love story involving a man who lives his life like a ghost and a country girl that falls in love with him. On a rural mountain in Jumunjin, South Korea.
A Broadway star unintentionally kills her impresario but keeps mum about it after the police investigator targets a rival actress.
When a San Francisco priest is murdered, a policeman, who's a close friend, starts an investigation.

One day, at the end of his work in a taxi, a taxi driver finds a lottery ticket and finds out that the ticket has won a prize of one hundred thousand tomans. He tramples everywhere in search of the ticket holder.

Darek is arrested by police while having a large amount of drugs in his car. His childhood friends try to help him and find out who gave Darek such a dose and informed the cops. Who is to blame and who can be trusted?

column2: The House of the Lost on the Cape
column3: A 17-year old girl experiencing a sense of yearning and comfort in the traditional Japanese house "Mayoiga".
Can a philosopher's stone turn everything in life to gold? Can it become the elixir of life?
A doctor in 1974, arrives at a widow's house, along with his associates, to help a woman disturbed by nightmares, and who has not left her home in a year.
Kit is a young man hunted by the police after a series of murders. A mystery unravels and out comes a story about revenge.
Psychological action drama about a group of partisans, ambushed by the enemy.
This visually arresting chiller concerns a group of runaway teens that escape from a drug rehab and encounter demonic forces in a rural farmhouse.
A former Confederate officer and a Mexican try to prevent a former Confederate colonel from selling stolen rifles to renegade Apaches in Mexico.
Uganda's president gives Captain Alex the mission to defeat the Tiger Maffia, but Alex gets killed in the process. Upon hearing the tragic news, his brother investigates to avenge Alex.
A scientist's kids are sucked into a TV screen and wind up in the Stone Age with cavemen and dinosaurs.

A baroque mix of revolutionary politics, pop culture and semiotics loosely based on the play by Pedro Calderón de la Barca. A young prince learns that life is just a dream from which we wake when we die. And that dreams may be as real as life.
A doctor falls in love with a mysterious woman, unknowing that she's already dead. Now he must bring her murderers to justice.

column2: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water - The Motion Picture
column3: A teen acrobat of mysterious origins and a young inventor find themselves entangled in a sinister plot that involves the fate of the world.
A ticket scalper wants to make one last big deal on the pope's visit to finally do something worthwhile about his relationship.
Finn trying to make it in Hollywood. Throughout the movie Finn meets with an elderly man, Roger, who helps Finn learn how to awaken to the insights of his soul.

column2: The How-To Guide for Saving the World
column3: What happens when a covert group that protects the Earth from alien invaders is wiped out, and their instruction manual is left behind?
Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.
Jeeva, the son of a don, falls in love with Swarna, daughter of a famous Carnatic singer. However, he chooses to hide the truth about his family background to win her love.

An atmospheric slasher horror movie based in North Yorkshire. A survival experience group clash with a farmer set on revenge, as they wade into his land not knowing what awaits them and their team members.
Wages of Cine presents an anthology of twelve tales that transverse space and time following a mysterious object known as the "Arte Factum".
Several episodes of the 1966 TV series "The Green Hornet" edited together and released as a feature.

A group of aspiring actors are chosen for a reality Horror TV show where they must survive a Slasher movie. In time, the actors discover that the show is fake but they Slasher is real; who has been sent out to kill them.
A clumsy, inept detective is hired to investigate the murder of a chauffeur at a country home.
A single mother, expert in black magic, is forced to use her powers when a prostitution ring kidnaps her daughter.
After exposure to radiation, an atomic research scientist finds himself changing into a murderous, lizard-like creature every time he is exposed to sunlight.
Follows a woman checking into a psychiatric ward to investigate a homicide.
Two agents are assigned to break up a gang involved in counterfeiting, white slavery and drug smuggling.
Thirty years after they nearly pulled off the heist of a lifetime, a group of seven thieves reunite to finish the job they started.
A man imprisons his estranged junkie friend in an isolated cabin in the boonies of San Diego to force him through a week of sobriety, but the events of that week are being mysteriously manipulated.
A man goes into isolation to nurture his time machine to fruition, only to have to stop his invention from creating a black hole which would cause earth's destruction.
A young boy attempts to reunite an abandoned polar bear cub with its mother in northern Canada.
A group of teenagers stumble upon a secret lab and battle their superior clones.
Drummond, his girlfriend and his butler try to free an high post of Scotland Yard who has been kidnapped.

column2: Violet Evergarden: Eternity and the Auto Memory Doll
column3: Violet Evergarden, a former soldier returned from war, comes to teach at a women's academy and changes a young girl's life.
It is about of love life of a normal Chinese lovers. Even if a small man, he also has a fair-dream.

When Rin-Tin-Tin's master is found murdered, Rinty is accused of the crime. Knowing who the real murderer is, Rinty travels to the frozen country; of the Northwest to track him down and bring him to justice, while clearing his own name.
A man, depressed by the death of his family, adopts a boy with hearing and speech difficulty and names him after his dead son. The boy, who has seen the killers of his widowed mother, is in danger.
