Lonely and disaffected teenage girl Astrid Phillips learns that she is the last in line of a European house of nobility, only to find that the grand estate she inherits is haunted by the ghost of a dead Spanish princess.

Dr. Stevens works at the local asylum where strange apparitions and patient abuse surround her day to day. Now she must uncover the ugly truth of the hospital and the many secrets that have been locked up for decades.
Several innocent bystanders are injured or killed when two robbers, fleeing from the police, run into the neighborhood cafe.
The legend of the master thief Ole Høiland who i the first half of the 1800s stole from the rich and charmed the women he met on his way, until he tried to make a heist from the National bank.
A hard-boiled police detective sets out to capture a gruesome serial killer terrorizing the canals of Amsterdam.
In the near future, 10 men are voted as the 10 who could lead the world; on the list is leading Hong Kong scientist Dr. Ken.
The saying that a man used to say, "even to die you have to know how to do it", turned him into a legend.
The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.
A prehistoric shark is released into a the waters near a small lake community as a result of an oil drilling accident, and proceeds to wreak havoc on nearby swimmers.

Based on the real-life chronicle of America's first serial killer, Boone Helm (aka "the Kentucky cannibal"), and his last days as the law tracked his bloody exploits across the breadth of the Wild West.

As he completes the last day of his job contract, Andrea, a security guard of a Parisian train station, finds himself, unwillingly, at the center of an international conspiracy leading him on a manhunt in the heart of the City of Light.
A woman is taken to a mysterious clinic whose patients have a mental disorder in which their memories and identities are disintegrating as a result of a strange environmental accident.
A bloody power struggle erupts between three brothers who are vying to take over the family business following the death of their father.
An Earthman returns to the planet Gor, and fights against tyranny.

Descending upon a tight-knit Midwestern community, a methodical serial killer upends the lives of two small-town detectives in his insistence that the fate of humanity rests in the hands of Wendy Garcia - a missing 12-year-old girl.
While Billie keeps pranking master Kwel two scoundrels kidnap Kareltje.
A scientific expedition investigating the outbreak of an unknown viral epidemic on an island in the south Pacific battles with a giant alien spider in the jungle.
A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.
A woman jeopardizes her relationship when she harbors a secret from the man that she loves.
A feature film using facts and myth to create fiction. "Reality is just a dream, when dreams become real"
A film about the feat of the Podolsk cadets in October 1941 near Moscow. The cadets of the Podolsk artillery-infantry schools are ordered to take up defenses on the Ilyinsky line.
Two FBI agents track down a missing person's case which leads them to a group of stock brokers who hunt people for sport.
A darkly comic look at death, racism, and one Detroit family that brings them both together.
An unscrupulous archaeologist searches for Alexander's treasure, using clues he finds by desecrating historical sites and artifacts; but he is not the only one who is trying to find the treasure.
Several episodes of the 1966 TV series "The Green Hornet" edited together and released as a feature.

Rasmus lives at an orphanage. He's OK, but wants a mom and a dad, and from time to time some comes to find a child, but they always chose little girls curls. Rasmus realizes he has to run away and find parents himself.
Yanyan, fall in love and tries her best to capture the heart of Blue a.k.a. Mr. Heartless. Will Yanyan's loving and upbeat nature be good enough to turn things around for the cold and distant Blue?
A single mother's search for her stolen new born baby sends her on a journey through the underworld of London and on a collision course with her past.

The king of hearts has disappeared from the Kingdom of Cards, and the Joker and his friends set out on a quest to locate him, but there are other forces at play in the Kingdom, and someone might have an ace up their sleeve.
A poet in love with Death follows his unhappy wife into the underworld.

After the separation of her parents from her father, a 13-year-old girl is placed in an orphanage where she has difficulty settling in, but then begins to break away from her father because she sees through his selfishness.
A bank manager is unjustly framed for robbery by his colleagues and imprisoned. After his release, he assumes another identity to exact vengeance.
American honeymooners in Hungary become trapped in the home of a Satan-worshipping priest when the bride is taken there for medical help following a road accident.

When David, in a wheelchair with muscular dystrophy, accurately foretells the death of their fourth grade teacher, a doubtful Lyle decides to test the existence of God by attempting to get David to run again.
When a teenage girl develops a rift with her twin sister, she lies about a perfect boyfriend that mysteriously becomes real and life-threatening.

A ring of gangsters has been terrorizing New York City. Special agent Jerry Cotton is summoned by the FBI to help crack down on the Criminals and put them out of business. He doesnt pull any punches either.
A modern take on the ever popular horror franchise, still true to the novel of Holzer.
Zad is on a mission to convince a woman to go with him in order to save the world.
A gorgeous American arrives in Brazilian headhunter country seeking her scapegrace fiancé.
A robbery witness hiding in a Chinese eatery opens a door to an exotic beach and encounters a lovely native girl and her bizarre inventor father.

This psychological drama about a couple who suffer the fate of chronic dissatisfaction from a narcissist husband, and the survivalist nature of the wife, while maintaining true to their culture by making it look sane to the public.
In 1975, a group of small time criminals attempt to pull off the biggest heist in American history: stealing over $30 million from the Mafia in the smallest state in the union, Rhode Island.
Pashmina is an animated tale of a Indian-American girl who rediscovers her heritage through her magical pashmina.

Dan O'Reilly, who has spent forty years working in oil fields, is about to strike oil when his land lease nears its end. J. C. Anderson of the Anderson Producing and Refining Corp. ...                See full synopsis »
Sequel of Avatar: The Way of Water (2022). The plot is unknown.
He was a boy with no friends. The other a dog, abandoned and forgotten. Together, they would build a bond that could never be broken and will share adventures that will last a lifetime.
The police force of a remote Midwestern town search for a killer Santa Claus who is picking off citizens on Christmas Eve.
Some things should remain buried. A treasure map leads an old cowhand to an old cemetery, resulting in grave consequences.
A young Mayoral candidate compromises his campaign when a lovers jealous ex-boyfriend begins a deadly competition between the two of them.
Chiaki returned to her home town Nuegabuchi, a hot springs village, upon hearing that her mother Yoshiko will be closing down her inn.

Four young adults go off on a much needed road trip together to find some relaxation from busy lifestyles. After becoming weary from travel, they find a remote motel to settle down for a night, but do not get the bargain they sought.
Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

In order to win the heart of counselor Cindy Keyes, kitchen boy Will Cross comes to realize that becoming King of the Camp takes much more than beating tough guy Chase Gunn in a wake boarding competition.
Adventures of a young Master Ip in Hong Kong.

column2: You Bring It Back with You
column3: Two students, on board an educational vessel, encounter an anomaly in their training mission.

Lady Evelyn Bagley mounts an expedition to find her long-lost baby. Bill Boosey is the fearless hunter and guide. Prof. Tinkle is searching for the rare Oozalum bird. Everything is going swimmingly until a gorilla enters the camp.
A mainlander comes to Hong Kong to find his cousin in this spinoff to the 1972 Bruce Lee classic.

column2: John Stone: War on Planet Earth
column3: John Stone, the rebel leader of a human and drone army, prepares to battle a legion of demonic shape shifting fallen angels for the future of Planet Earth.
Tim is a quiet man who has lost everything. His lover's murder brought his life into a downward spiral. We find him at his darkest hour as he is being led on a spiritual journey of life acceptance.
A beautiful afternoon lunch out in secluded nature ends up being a nightmare for Bruce Cannon and Dallas Lane
A man who believes that he has murdered his wife, sees her return as a vengeful ghost.
Júlio wanted to be the most popular person in school but ends up getting more than what he wished for.
John Miller wants a job at a prestigious newspaper. In order to get it, he must get the dirt on Mr. Billionaire, a now bankrupt tycoon. There's only one problem, Mr. Billionaire is John's father.

WILL THE MAGIC OF AN ANCIENT CULTURE TRIUMPH OVER AN EVIL OF MODERN CIVILIZATION! March 10, 2002 LOS ANGELES TIMES THE WORLD Mexico Captures Tijuana Drug Lord Narcotics: The arrest, and the...                See full synopsis »
A detective and a CIA agent team up to catch a criminal by interrogating three sets of people unwillingly involved in the mastermind's latest crime.
JR, Charlie, and Sol are back for one more adventure, that takes them from a dull daily grind to trying to save an entire star system that's been taken hostage.

After discovering an urban legend of a demented serial killer, who has nothing but a carved "smiley" on his face, a mentally fragile teenager must figure out if she is going insane - or if she could be the next victim.
On her 13th birthday Katie, a talented young girl, receives a magical amulet. This amulet was on a quest to find the fifth and last witch to complete the order of the star witches.
A newspaper reporter becomes a witness to a murder and finds himself relentlessly pursued by the killer.
Visitors to a remote island discover that a reclusive Nazi commandant has been breeding a group of Zombie soldiers.
A millionaire gets amnesia after a hit to the head and now he has to rediscover his past and decide what kind of man he wants to be in the future.
Teenage assassin sets out on a long voyage to gun down a witness under protection program, who luxuriates in the artificial worlds of Las Vegas.
Deep and ground, a person must fight to survive the help that conquers.

Pennsylvania, 1859. Railroad tycoon Brennan (Alan Hale) is muscling in on oil-drilling farmers, led by Peter Cortland (Randolph Scott). Cortland must try to save their oil business, while also saving his marriage to Sally (Irene Dunne).
Federation trooper, Johnny Rico's ordered to work with a group of new recruits on a satellite station on Mars, where giant bugs have decided to target their next attack.
Anand comes to Chennai with an ambition of becoming an actor. However, his life turns upside down when he gets embroiled in the murder of a minister.
Two drifters contend with love and murder in a small town.

God is disappointed with the human race and wants His stone tablets back. An angel is given the assignment and, with Gabriëls help, tries to manipulate several humans on earth to get his job done. But humans have a will of their own.
A desert survival reality show goes horribly wrong.
A combat veteran, with serious psychological damage, stalks campers and hunters in the woods.
There is a reason you shouldn't go down into the woods today, as a gang of youths will soon discover that they're in for a bloody surprise - Literally.
David Marks, a real estate scion, is suspected of killing his wife Katie, who disappeared in 1982.

In a remote corner of the mountain wilderness, there is a small inn called The Margin of the World Inn strangely located in the hub of traffic. There are many haunted rumors flying around about ghosts, love, martial arts and intrigue.
The young knight Tristan is injured in a fight in Ireland and cared for by the beautiful Isolde. He falls in love with her, unaware that she is the daughter of the Irish king.
Newspaper reporter Joe Ryan and District Attorney Thomas Redwine strike a deal. In exchange for having access to jailed actress Judy Allen, Joe must help Thomas on a tough racketeering case.
Fortune 2.
A man discovers a worm hole in a deserted forest which enables him to travel through time. During his travels, he falls in love.
A young girl from a broken home having problems in school and in her personal life, decides to run away to live with her father in the wilderness.
She prepares for an imminent end... He prepares for a start with her...
Acclaimed director Liu Chia-liang directs his brothers Gordon Liu Chia-hui and Liu Chia-yung in a wild and crazy ghostly film in this heralded sequel to The Spiritual Boxer.
An expatriate lawyer girl from Indonesia who working in Australia got message from ghost spirit.

Viswanathan, new in town, soon learns that he is being chased by enemies of his look-alike, who is a con man. Vishwanathan tries to find out Uthaman before its too late, but things don't go as planned.
After Jodi Kreyman gains popularity, her miscommunications start causing rifts with those around her and now she really needs to 'stand tall'.
A man's recurring dream involving a beautiful Asian woman leads him to Hong Kong.
Two women, one body, one fun loving, one a psychopath, can they truly find love
Chronicles the life of a young New Orleans prostitute and her co-workers.
A cop, a lawyer, and an assassin cross paths after the murder of a federal witness and the kidnapping of a famous pop star.
A collection of some of the world's old science fiction movie trailers brought to you on DVDR.
After years of domestic abuse, Donnie and his agoraphobic mother Helen attempt to make a normal life for themselves, only to find that they can't shake their unforgiving past.
Elizabeth Berkley stars as a young and rising Public Relations executive who meets a strange man after a cocktail party, and she is framed for murder.

A skeptical filmmaker is hired to document Bigfoot sightings. He travels to a hot spot of Bigfoot activity and pursues the wild beast. Along the way he learns a lot about the illusive creature and in the process he finds himself.
Torchwood within the Czech Republic find themselves with a cult against the establishment.
'One man's journey into a realm of his personality that he never knew existed...'
When he gets involved with the mysterious girl next door, an ex-convict is reluctantly dragged into one last job, which leads him deeper and deeper into the world he is trying to escape.

column2: Waiting for the Miracle to Come
column3: A young woman receives a cryptic letter from her recently deceased father, which sends her on a journey into the past and leads to a discovery that will change her family forever.
George finds an old Templar relic that awakens dark forces.
A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

Dani (Michael Ronda), a 9 year old boy, has a dog named Pirata; a large black Newfoundland. One day Pirata suffers a fatal accident. Danis life takes a tragic turn, but Pirata returns from ...                See full synopsis »

When several women are found mutilated and murdered, the Paris police are baffled as to who the killer may be. All evidence points to Dupin, but soon it becomes apparent that it is someone (or something) stronger and deadlier than a human.

A romantic comedy about a New York socialite who fakes her identity to get her book published and has to rush back to her deceased mother's farm when the publisher and her son come to visit their 'Australian' author.

column2: Santo vs. the Killers from Other Worlds
column3: Santo, the crime-fighting wrestler, battles an alien monster who is controlled by an evil madman bent on taking over the world.
Four British villains raid a settlement to obtain explosives for use in a diamond mine. In doing so they nearly destroy the settlement, so and Tarzan pursues them to their mine.

Rose Corley, when she and her crew embark on a daring mission to rescue her father, Mark, from a secret prison, they are confronted with the ultimate power of the universe: an ancient alien race known only as The Radial.

After a kidney transplant, Jake Warren experiences reoccurring nightmares he believes to be visions of his donor's violent murder, sending him on a dark path of vengeance, leading to an unbearable truth.

The wife of a murdered CIA agent awakens from a five year coma focused on finding the person who put her there, who murdered her husband, and what the assailants have done with her three year old daughter.

A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.
Kafka works during the day at an insurance company, where events lead him to discover a mysterious underground society with strange suppressive goals.
A group of spring-breakers are enjoying the weekend beside a gorgeous lake. This is where the true horror begins.
A man and a woman fight over the last bottle of champagne left in San Francisco--she wants it for a wedding, and he wants to use it to christen a ship.

When Black Appalachians return from the Civil War, their Granny Woman must battle the village's conflict between revenge and justice. Should someone die for the sake of honor? Based on the plays Oresteia by Aeschylus.
Wheely, a cabbie from the lower ranks of society, faces an uphill battle to save his dream girl from a monstrous 18-wheeler truck who is the mastermind of a luxury car-napping syndicate.
Husband and wife go through a major change in their life after the car accident.

Carries (Mentari De Marelle) dream to go to Verona, Juliet's city residence, has been answered. From childhood, Carrie had fallen in love with the story of Romeo and Juliet. Carrie believes, there must be a Romeo for her.
There is a beast in the fog. A hungry thing with claws and wings, that stalks unseen, that destroys everything and everyone it pulls in.
Young Seo Man-deok has to unravel the plot against his new bride to clear her name.
A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces the man's younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.

column2: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl
column3: A high school student's blissful days with his girlfriend are interrupted when his first crush returns in two forms.
The story of the relationship between two young artists, a photographer and a writer, but above all the story of personal freedom through the filter of the imagination.
Compilation of 3 episodes of the "Adventures of Superman" TV show: episodes #30 ("Jet Ace"), #35 ("The Dog Who Knew Superman"), and #42 ("The Clown Who Cried").
After serving an extended prison sentence for the killing of a man he was hired to investigate, an ex-private eye approaches the completion of his memoirs to set the record straight.

column2: A Princesa Xuxa e os Trapalhões
column3: A distant planet is overtaken by war, slavery and desolation after a tyrannical man murders the world's emperor. Is up to four jumbled man and the king's sweet-hearted daughter to change their reality.
In the Australian Outback, two estranged brothers discover old secrets and family lies. As their friends start to go missing they fear they are being stalked by someone or something.

The future reveals how paranoia, control and power changes American society. Through AI, citizens no longer enjoy privacy, but are monitored in their moods, reactions and all activities. The face of good and the face of evil. One prevails.

Conocer la pareja de tu vida es sólo obra del destino! Pero una cosa es casarse y otra, controlarse. Así que para sobrevivir la crisis del matrimonio, te diremos cómo lograrlo. Esta ...                See full synopsis »

column2: The Mystery of Dr. Fu Manchu
column3: A killer kitty with poison-tipped claws, giant noxious mushrooms and aphonia-inducing flowers are just some of the challenges faced by Sir Denis Nayland Smith and Dr Petrie in their battles against arch-villain Fu Manchu.
A young man uses a bug camera to spy on his ex-girlfriend, then witnesses her abduction.
An egg from outer space infects the villagers of Vigasio. Agent Danger is assigned by the Agency to investigate on the case and find the antidote to the virus.
Two brothers' sibling relationship and rivalry go off the charts when they discover they're dating the same girl, and each wants her for himself.
Plot being kept under wraps
A young doctor falls in love with a disturbed young woman, becomes involved in her husband's death, and must flee with her to the Mexican border.
A top model is determined to win the national championship. However, things take a turn for the worse when she begins to receive death threats.
A mysterious young boy has to fulfill a dark destiny he barely understands that could change the world forever.
During the 1960s, a Caribbean sailor and his tomboy daughter search for buried treasure but run into unsavory characters and a cute lawyer who's after romance.
After decades manning a space station in the far-flung reaches of outer space, two jaded and ragtag humans are assigned a team of very unusual colleagues : a ten-clone hive mind of identical beings.
Movie about a friendship of two children - a girl and a boy during the last day of summer holiday.
A girl reporter is blackmailed for learning that a man is a freed murderer.
A story of body snatchers in Edinburgh, based on Burke and Hare.
A variety of losers in Dublin have harrowingly farcical intersecting stories of love, greed and violence.

When terrorists try to seize control of a Berlin-Paris flight, a soft-spoken American co-pilot struggles to save the lives of the passengers and crew while forging a surprising connection with one of the hijackers.

column2: Wer reißt denn gleich vorm Teufel aus
column3: Adaptation of Grimm's fairy tale "Der Teufel mit den drei goldenen Haaren"
As animals begin disappearing from a futuristic zoo, a neurodivergent teenager who loves animals becomes a prime suspect.
Fisherwoman Tinay goes to the city to catch a higher-paying job. Instead, she dives in between the relationship of her boss's son and his complicated girlfriend.
A girl arrives in Buenos Aires from Catamarca and fulfills her dream of being an actress.
Newly arrived in Paris, Galia lives in a small apartment near Notre-Dame cathedral. One evening, whilst walking along the banks of the River Seine, she saves a young woman from drowning.
An adolescent boy with a supernatural condition that causes serious injury to anything he touches or touches him, begins to venture outside following the death of his mother.

When Nick Di Santo learns that his father is not only alive but can possibly reveal the origin of his son's dark gift, he sets out on a trip that takes him to an abandoned mansion he thought only existed in his childhood imagination.
A woman's joy at finding her long-lost daughter is threatened when the girl faces a prison sentence after being framed for murder.
Estranged sisters Dawn and Isabella Kimble struggle to fulfill their personal and professional dreams. Can a childhood wish under a December Sky bring these sisters together. again?
Benjamin, a young German computer whiz, is invited to join a subversive hacker group that wants to be noticed on the world's stage.

Camden, who suffers from agoraphobia takes in Randy, who suffers from claustrophobia, as a roommate. Unfortunately, Randy turns out to be a serial killer, and Camden becomes a prisoner inb his own apartment.
An exasperated police inspector receives different eyewitness accounts surrounding a downed saucer and its female occupant.

column2: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
column3: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know that things are about to take a turn for the worst.
A man's daughter is killed by thieves during a bank robbery. Due to the incompetence of the corrupt authorities, he decides to take to law into his own hands and track down the killers.

An anonymous multinational company deceitfully leads a powerful politician's wife and her chauffeur to an empty flat to hold them captive where the company's representative mysteriously controls the space and time inside.
When a millionaire's valet is murdered he hires a detective to discover by who and why his valet was killed.
When a prosecutor leaks to a Miami reporter that a liquor wholesaler is suspected in the murder of a union head, the man's life begins to unravel.
This story is adapted from real events about a defending team of an African bodyguard company who encountered armed bandits slaughtering civilians.
Unhappy Larry Burrows sees what his life could've been like, had he made that winning home run as a teenager.
Despite being nearly proven the murderer, a serial killer threatens to kill the daughter of a forensic pathologist if he doesn't get him bailed out.
The black swan queen of a sub-tropical lake haven must use all her cunning to protect her last born son when her duplicitous daughter brings a murderous male swan to her kingdom.

Follows the President of the United States along with her key staff who are on a flight back to Washington, D.C., when they receive news that a Zombie apocalypse caused by a new vaccine is rapidly spreading throughout the country.
The forbidden love between a bouncer and a belly dancer both working at the same night club finds hope when they try to escape their individual destinies.
Six ghost investigators enter a house to capture evidence of a haunting. They are the ones that are hunted.
Marvel Knights: Spider-Man is a no-budget fan film produced by Made Legit Media and directed by Jesse Scimeca. Make sure to stay after the credits for a little something extra. ;)
A small time arms dealer in South America to sell weapons to the revolutionaries, winds up negotiating the sale of an experimental plane to the nation's dictator.
Red Ninja the Sisterhood is an action pack old school martial arts movie in our time with traditional apparel and old school techniques. The red ninja are trained by the legendary Golden hands.
Publisher Will Randall becomes a demon wolf and has to fight to keep his job.
A young girl begins to suspect that her neighbor on a quiet suburban street is fugitive family killer John List.
19th century story about a woodcutter in Frisia who becomes famous for making puppets.
A trio of moronic aliens crash-land on Earth and become celebrities, while a fourth alien, who arrives separately, finds himself ignored.
A true-life crime drama in which two indiscreet lovers, manipulated by a psychopath, find themselves at the mercy of a flawed justice system.
Valluvanar is an honest politician. When his son Kamban is arrested, he refuses to bail him out of jail. The opposition party takes advantage of the situation and thus helps Kamban escape from jail.
The story of Astroboy, a robot created by Dr Elephant, in the image of a boy, who has super strength and could fly.

Narasimha, a physically disabled waiter, who is suffering due to his psychological wounds by his schoolmates. Narasimha is a weak repressed person,who is seeking revenge with help of a Japanese Samurai executioner Kazu Yamaguchi.

Two best friends and research colleagues decide to go on the road after their PhD graduation. In a psychedelic trip through Vegas, Joshua Tree, the NorCal mountains, and an Indian vision quest, the two scientists find their true calling.
A young man is forced to come to terms with his past when a dead body mysteriously shows up in his house

Tensions over race and gender have reached a violent extreme, so the U.S. government institutes 'The Freshening': every American receives an injection, after which everyone only sees others as the same race and gender as themselves.
An eccentric mortician recounts several macabre and phantasmagorical tales that he's encountered in his distinguished career.
The story of a warrior who took advantage of an amnesty to cross from a mountain to a city.
TRUST US is a drama/comedy where Guy Backman tries to change his past to insure a better future, but he may have gone too far.
A female hotel manager and her male accomplice, murder a German gangster to steal his diamonds. Soon, other members of the gang arrive to find out what went on.
A couple who have been together for several years try to decide if they should stay together.
A restless girl embarks on a journey back to a city populated by the dead in search of a mysterious internet lover.
Aris, a Greek man, becomes a no one in his own country and struggles to recover his self, living as a foreigner.

A renowned author, college professor and criminologist is given a year off in order to write his latest book. His arrival in Buenos Aires gives him the opportunity to work on his true project, planning and pulling off the perfect crime.
The arrival of Anglo newcomers to an East L.A. Latino neighborhood rocks the quiet world of a handsome young local who is torn between the family restaurant and life as a big city chef.
A loner madman necrophile, with also the passion of the ancient Egypt culture, start to mummifies the bodies of young victims to satisfy his desire for love and sex.
A young gas miner seeks the aid of an inter-dimensional shaman in saving her terminally ill sister.
Twins Ram and Raj are separated when Raj is ousted by his father due to his bad behaviour. Years later, when Raj learns that Ram has been killed, he sets out to find the culprit.
Several love stories set in one of the most interesting new cities in the world, Rotterdam.

In a future ruled by attractive people, mutant terrorists kidnap a rich man's daughter to claim rights for the ugly. Escaping police, the mutant leader crashes into a planet of crazy miners where no women live.
An ex-star pilot must stop a mad criminal and his gang from destroying what is left of civilization.
In a post-apocalyptic world full of terrifying mutants known as gargoyles, survivors of the last human colony battles against intruding gargoyles a few miles below the Earth's surface.

column2: He's a Legend, He's a Hero
column3: A highly fictionalized biography of the famous Bruce Lee, this movie traces his college life, his marriage to Linda Lee, his relationship with his master, and his untimely death.

After surviving a shark attack a young woman is plagued by nightmares of being stalked in the dark sea by a ravenous predator, and hallucinations of visits from her sister and boyfriend, both who were killed in the attack.

A special NASA Unit is excited as a strange meteor hurls toward their new alien communication signal. But, one of their scientists knows it is alien with the intention to take over earth through possession, because he is himself an alien.
Parvathy is elated when she finds out that her brother, Saravanan, who has been missing for 15 years, is in Goa. However, somebody has already hatched a plan to kill him.
A faithless man's young wife loves a poor man framed for theft.
In the midst of the Chechen War, a remote psychiatric institution is left without staff leaving the patients to fend for themselves. Based on a true story.
Set in a future where the Aztec empire was never conquered, and became a hyper-advanced civilization. That until supernatural beings appear with the goal to enslave the inhabitants.
THEY PLAYED THE GAME BY A DIFFERENT SET OF RULES.
This movie follows the rivalry between a small-town southern sheriff and a small-town teenaged thief who steals cars and destroys them with the sheriff's daughter by his side.
Sarah LaMere had loved Michael Rome Matthews for a long time.
Two crooked lawmen (Stomy Bugsy, Titoff) search for a precious stone to collect an inheritance.
For the 50th anniversary of the Lake Bodom murders, two media students obsessed with the case launch a journalistic investigation. The footage they have left behind only raises new questions.

The town where Dina, a student of the Pedagogical Institute, comes to practice, is paralyzed with fear. A series of mysterious murders of outwardly similar girls makes residents think that a real maniac is operating in the city.
Women train to become members of a SWAT team.
Story about a IT professional settled in US and married to an Indian girl. After marriage both living a happily ever after life but things changed when his ex-fiance ruined his marriage life.

column2: Christmas at the Grey Horse Inn
column3: Writer Charlotte Quinn has lost her publisher, boyfriend and Christmas spirit. She flees ATL for NC to settle her aunt's estate and inherits an Inn and a pair of horses that will have to be sold to pay the taxes. How will she save the day?
The Turkish rescue team will be back after 12 years slavery to save the earth.

The teenager Erik is ecstatic when Thor, the god of thunder, turns up and asks him for help, but Erik's journey forces him to question whether good and evil are really as black and white as he has been told by the gods.
A scientific expedition investigating the outbreak of an unknown viral epidemic on an island in the south Pacific battles with a giant alien spider in the jungle.
A private detective's wife takes over his business when he enters the Army.
A young girl turns to a department store Santa in the hopes that he will help find a new husband for her divorced mother.
Get her back. Kill them all.
A man kills his girlfriend then studies abroad using her money, but he should have checked to make sure she was really dead.

Another experimental film featuring footage from: "Avant-Macabre", "Here Come the Demons" and "Forest of Chaos!". A "Macabre"-Inspired, Spin-off Experimental Film from: John H Shelton. An Anthology of Experimental Terror.

Detective Ricardo Colletti's personal life is turned upside down when his wife is raped by members of a notorious street gang. When two of the gang members are found dead, Internal Affairs Bureau makes a bold move to catch their suspect.
Rusty is a successful architect with the life of his dreams. However, when his boyfriend leaves town, Rusty meets a mysterious drifter names Denny who opens Rusty up to a strange new world.
The Crew of a Sentinel unit (a 30 ton walking tank) is sent on a desperate mission to protect the flank of a retreating army from alien invaders.

column2: Three Mirrors Creature's Flashes of Flesh
column3: In the aftermath of an emotional shock, a ruthless high-class manager faces her own abyss, becomes pervaded by a sensory spirit and undertakes a purifying voyage.
The Secret Magic Control Agency sends its two best agents, Hansel and Gretel, to fight against the witch of the Gingerbread House.
During the never-ending TV taping for a New Year's Eve program, peoples personal lives clash and eventually explode out into the open.

Roman visits recently engaged Luke and his sexually frustrated fiancé Mya. Mya is forced into an internal battle between being faithful to her fiance and sexual tension between their new house guest who has an ulterior motive of his own.
Three young girls must avenge the death of their mother, who was a spy, in order to collect a $3-million inheritance.
A talented young dancer is mentored by a former burlesque icon, only to find herself a pawn in the older woman's demented attempts to regain the limelight.

Plop lives in the Melkherberg in the forest where everybody sits together to drink some milk and have cookies. Plop, Klus, Lui, Kwebbel, Smul en Sam love to dance and party. Together they encounter a lot of adventures.
A men whose wife not ready to accept him has a husband despite of the fact that everyone else was telling that he is her husband.

Charlie Waye is in mourning. His Wife is dead and his Child is Missing and a new kind of evil is destroying the World. He knows he must answer the call, and fast, but how can you be a Superhero when you are sick with dementia?
Per is hired by a creepy manager to set fire on a factory that is part of a major fraud case. Of course, it goes wrong and Per must go underground at the director's deserted farm in Sweden.

column2: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again
column3: Nick Daley hesitates becoming a museum nightwatchman and Kahmunrah returns to conquer the world.
A young photojournalist survives the horrors of war only to begin her descent into madness after discovering her father's murderous past while taking care of her dying mother.

column2: In Search of the Lost City
column3: French Riviera. In an international school, a Science and Geography professor during his classes often narrates some fantasy tales concerning his studies about a city mysteriously ...                See full synopsis »
A mysterious gardener journeys to undo the effects of a witch's spell that are preventing the birds from returning to his homeland.

Have you ever wondered how your old schoolmates are? Perhaps the guy next to you, who is doing time in jail at the moment, still thinks you are his best and only friend. Perhaps your first ...                See full synopsis »
A teacher is assigned to a remote desert village that is obsessed with a mysterious buried treasure and whose children are cursed to wander the desert.
Two jumbled and coward drivers join a rich family that moves to an ancient castle inhabited by a resented but friendly ghost.
A teenage girl once possessed by a demon finds that it still lurks within her. Meanwhile, a priest investigates the death of the girl's exorcist.
A desperate woman and her daughter struggle to fend off an evil being from their isolated shack armed with only candles and oil lamps.
A fantasy retelling of the South Tyrolean legend of King Laurin and his rose garden.
Tom Sawyer and his pal Huckleberry Finn have great adventures on the Mississippi River, pretending to be pirates, attending their own funeral and witnessing a murder.
Ten strangers must try to solve a deadly puzzle in an unlikely environment.
Rajan, a police officer, is in charge of the investigation regarding a murder that took place on a train. However, finding the culprit becomes a difficult task as he only has one witness.
A young man falls for the commissioner's sister, Anjali, who betrays him. After finishing his time behind bars, he sets on a mission to save another girl named Anjali who is chased by a gangster.

column2: Killer School Girls from Outer Space
column3: When a shooting star lands in Small Town USA, a teenage couple decide to check it out. They discover their shooting star is a flying saucer piloted by Killer School Girls from outer space on a mission to destroy the earth!
A woman is recruited by the Mossad to work undercover in Tehran.
Evil villain plots to take over the world using an army of invisible soldiers.
Lina Inverse and her overly-endowed associate Nagha the Serpent travel to Mipross Island, where they encounter an old sage who enlists them in his battle to defeat the demon Joyrock.

With Louis disappearing into the jungles, after a showdown with local militia, leading to an international manhunt. Hiding on a cargo ship bound, he discovers it's transporting more than goods, including a human trafficking ring.
An ex-con on the run from his criminal past hides out from those he ratted on by chaperoning a field trip to New Orleans.
Project information under wraps.

In the near future, the New World Police tries to dismantle terrorist insurgent cells. Li Yuen and Rick Chavez must be against to the terrorist group called "PROTEUS" that intend to hit with attacks in all major cities.
Vincke and Verstuyft are the best detectives of the Antwerp police department. They are confronted with the murder on a leading executive and put all their effort to catch the murderer.
The film depicts an unpredictable global cooperative investigation by South Korean, North Korean, and American detectives who have come together for their own purposes.
Achari tricks his Guru into taking a group trip to the US to pursue his dream girl, whom he met in India.

Ariel is a girl who has love phobia caused by her high school ex-boyfriend who left her heart broken. She vows never to fall in love again but then she meets a handsome doctor in the hospital who seems to a perfect guy.
Vacationing Englishman Oliver Larker stumbles upon a plot to kill a young American tourist in Spain.

When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams, where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love, they decide to make their dreams come true, but it's difficult in real life.
When a disabled war veteran discovers the dead body of a beautiful singer in his back yard, his fascination with her photographic image soon turns to obsession.
A pastor who's suffered a personal loss accepts a position in a town that believes in a Christmas miracle candle, which he strives to abolish.

A young woman finds a stranger unconscious on the road in the middle of nowhere. When he wakes up he has no memory. He could be anyone. Now she finds herself inexorably drawn towards this mysterious stranger and increasingly afraid of him.

An experienced photographer and an aspiring model experience the delights of love at first sight. But to make things work between them, they do their best to avoid revealing each other their true selves.
Film crew document a week in the life of a juvenile courier running for gangs in the ghettos of 'The Cape Flats', in Cape Town. The drugs he delivers. The stores he robs. The people he kills.

Set in the distant future, mankind has harnessed the power of faster than light travel by harvesting the eggs of the largest species mankind has ever known. The only problem...they have to get them first.

On the planet Sera, a former P.O.W. is civilization's best hope in their fight against the Locust Horde, a race of creatures who emerged from underneath the planet's surface, intent on eliminating humankind.
Three kids fresh out of high school try to solve a closed-case murder with the help of a pompous classmate, an old woman and just a little bit of ingenuity.
A young man keeps seeing coffins come in and out of the new neighbors house. He sees that women who go into that house simply disappear. He contacts the police but to no avail.

A businessman's daughter has some unexpected guests - her former classmates. A happy reunion becoming more complicated when guests tells her that they need some money to cover the murder they've committed.
Satan offers a weary ghost a chance for redemption through true love.
Sheriff Rockwell teams up with the new sheriff of York County, a young woman, to solve a murder that happened on the county line.
After the mysterious death of a young man his autopsy reveals a jump drive in his stomach. It contained footage that goes back six months before his death and was title "The Truth."
A restless 15-year-old who has dreamed of becoming an ice skater her entire life.

Opella and Dave are engaged to be married, and spice up their sex life by acting out complicated and increasingly kinky games and fantasies. When he becomes upset and insists that they are going too far, she storms out of the house.

column2: De club van Sinterklaas en de race tegen de klok
column3: In the film, St. Nicolas' Eve threatens to be canceled because a young Piet drops St. Nicholas's clock. In addition, the Saint's horse is behaving very strangely because he has run into Britt Dekker.

column2: Carlos Dunn's Judge Jeffrey's Last Witch Trial
column3: The screenplay for "Judge Jeffrey's Last Witch Trial" was derived from a short story by the same name written by Carlos Dunn in 1975.
A student, a railway worker and a peasant go on a trip to the Julian Alps and meet people on their way.
A young woman quits her job and heads on a road trip across the country in order to fulfill her deceased sister's wish list.
An eccentric young boy befriends a dying young girl and vows to provide her with blood of a rare type in order to save her life.

Three short tales of terror that revolve around helpless souls tangled in the dark side of human nature. From mental illness and urban legends, to brainwashed neighbors, and the Devil himself. This is "3 Flies in a Widow's Web"
A mischievous teen wants to teach a lesson to a man by making his daughter his girlfriend.
A detective and a psychoanalyst uncover evidence of a satanic cult while investigating a young woman's terrifying past.

Laravin Sahakkal (Lara) is an Indian Tamil-language action thriller film written and directed by Bharathi Mohan and produced by Srinivas Rao under K3 Cine Creations, starring Jagan, Niharika in lead roles.
When an old computer virus affects multiple different OS systems, a group of mysterious people become targets of a ruthless cyber predator.
Forty years after Three Mile Island the site of the infamous fast breeder reactor is now an exclusive and thriving holiday resort. But has its nuclear legacy really been laid to rest?
Four young girls on a camping trip in the woods are stalked by a pair of crazed serial killers.
An urban fairy tale that explores art, fame, success, race, personal identity, spirituality and the collective consciousness in the social-media age.
Plot is unknown.
First film of a trilogy following the dramatic life of Rika, a half-Japanese/half-American woman who becomes the tough-as-nails leader of an all-girl crime gang.

Tony is impotent and so he kill his wives who ever complains about it. The 2nd wife Lily, whom he kills, becomes a ghost and starts killing Tony's family members. An evil Daayan uses the ghost to gain immortality and money also.

When their dying father makes a sudden change to his will, two half-brothers from different worlds - one a Hong Kong labourer, the other a Vancouver businessman - must decide what they value most - money or family.
Reza is a naive and honest middle age teacher that has difficulties in communicating with women. He meets a gummies saleswoman.

When a quirky shut-in gets a feisty new neighbor -- a transgender woman in a tumultuous relationship -- the two begin a strange friendship that hurls them on a cross-country adventure to meet a transformational healer.
A security guard uncovers more than he bargained for.

Ma is kidnapped and tortured. Since then, his girlfriend Amy senses he's no longer the same person, and becomes convinced that something supernatural is corrupting his soul. Policeman Pit is determined to get to the bottom of the case.
A neuron-transfer scientist experiments with the thoughts of a comatose young woman.
Story of a boy and his horse. Mike is the horse and is owned by Speck and his best friend Jimmy together they have a paper route, on which they deliver papers to customers via a wagon pulled by Mike.
Four young survivors of a world-wide zombie apocalypse navigate the ruins of North America, discovering a vital secret on the way.

A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.

A young guy who has murdered his sister's husband in taking revenge on him is looking for a hide out in Tehran while carrying a gun and his mute sister with himself. Until he meets a local driver (Reza Attaran) who decides to help him.
Mr. Dennis Hope, the man who actually owns the moon.
Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman, is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love.
Vampire death dealer Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.
A high school, outcast obsessed with monsters, tracks down a Nazi-era Vampire that is terrorizing his town.

An art student taps into a rich source of creative inspiration after the accidental slaughter of her rapist. An unlikely vigilante emerges, set out to avenge college girls whose attackers walked free.

column2: Prince Nezha's Triumph Against Dragon King
column3: Tells the fable from Chinese mythology about the young warrior Nezha who takes on a group of evil dragons.

On the way to a new life on the frontier, a five year-old GIRL's parents are murdered. Orphaned, The Girl is taken in by her mysterious UNCLE, an ex-Confederate turned bounty hunter, whom The Girl knows will make her parents' killers pay.

column2: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
column3: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.
Ravi and Suman. Happy in their world in the Chawl, their life takes a turn when Suman meets her old friend Neha, and happens to see her apartment.
Plot kept under wraps.
Dishonest smugglers hide their stuff in old Mazier's cafe.
A small Australian town is stricken by unusual occurrences; electrical faults, violent and psychotic human behavior.
A group of alpinists make a perilous journey up a mountain.
The story of Buck Rogers, an astronaut from 20th century, who awakens after remaining dormant for 500 years and attempts to save the earth from an evil ruler.
A satire of the movie series "Emmanuelle".
As an 11-year-old boy struggles to cope with a disability, he finds a pony who gives birth to a unicorn which he takes care of.

A man discovers an antidepressant has a strange side effect on him: an ability to step into "memory windows" and go back in time to win the love of the girl he is obsessed with, but finds each "fix" has disastrous consequences.

column2: Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City
column3: Set in 1998, this origin story explores the secrets of the mysterious Spencer Mansion and the ill-fated Raccoon City.

column2: The Man Who Loved Cat Dancing
column3: Western story about a defiant wife who leaves her husband to take up riding with outlaws.
A Carpathian village is haunted by the ghost of a murderous little girl, prompting a coroner and a medical student to uncover her secrets while a witch attempts to protect the villagers.
Set in the wetlands of Brazil, a lawyer helps a mysterious young woman protect her multi-billion dollar inheritance from her greedy relatives.
In the wake of 5 other High Schoolers disappearing from their hometown, Harris, Will and Norman must work together to find their friend and bring him back home.

A group of wayward astronauts returning from a long mission to Ganymede crash land on a planet very much like earth. The problem is that the mysterious inhabitants are murderous lunatics out to kill every one of them... or so it seems.

As the war for the independence of Greece in the early-1820s rages on, the fervent patriot and fearless commander, Mando Mavrogenous, engages herself in an intense relationship with Prince Demetrios Ypsilantis.
After aging criminal Roy Earle is released from prison he decides to pull one last heist before retiring - by robbing a resort hotel.
It follows a vibrant couple as they meet and fall in love. Some unexpected things happen that make everything take a turn. Will everything be sorted out between them?
In 1980's New Orleans, twin Creole punk rockers must destroy a cursed family heirloom before it forces them to repeat the same deadly and heartbreaking cycle as their ancestors.

When a girl is given a horse that has been deemed useless, she finds purpose in a world that's lost its shine. With a renewed hope in life since losing her mom, she clings to the one thing she still has: barrel racing.
Geethu, a five-year-old girl lives with her mother after her parents' divorce. She befriends Nandan, the driver of her school bus, and decides to spend her holidays with him at his village.
A deathly hunt emerges when an expert woodsman poaches the same albino elk a wildlife biologist fights to protect.
After the killing of her husband by friendly fire during a police raid, Dr. Carole Nelson tries to find gangster Joe Gurney to clear her name with the medical board.
A prequel to the original Detective Bobby Dicey (2015) film
JR busts out of prison with Brendan Lynch, Australia's most notorious criminal, and joins Lynch's gang for a gold heist that soon pits the two men against one another.
A desperate killer leaves the city behind and meets, on his way, a mysterious witch who's connected to nature. Thus begins a strange organic relationship, between life and death.
Eleven tales of love connected by padlocks on a gate - a journey exploring the heart behind the worldwide phenomenon that is Locks of Love.
A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when a group of friends and a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.
An opportunity arises for Robert Atkinson, a London banker who risks his bank's money to leave the mundane behind to start a new life.
In México City, a Cuban dancer from "Cabaret Changó" rescues a baby from a garbage can and decides to raise him, but her pachuco pimp gets in her way.
Two amateur film-makers find the movie they thought they were making, is actually making them.
Transsexuals troublemakers from planet Transmotivia are traveling through space; being pushy and pugnacious to everyone they meet. When they reach Earth, they get more than they bargained for.
An adolescent lion is accidentally shipped from the New York Zoo to Africa. Now running free, his zoo pals must put aside their differences to help bring him back.
Five teens are forced into a thirty day digital detox. No cell phones, electronics, internet or video games. Their lives will forever be changed.
A cat who turns into a young woman helps a journalist protect their town from a factory boss with an evil plan.
Everyone has demons in their closet but when Trey meets the wrong love of his life, those demons become reality. And for those closes to Trey, his reality is deadly.
A young man defies tribal laws and searches for answers. The result of his quest yields knowledge of past generations.
The final student of a dying martial arts master is instructed to locate the previous five students and defeat any evil ones among them.

High up on a mountain peak surrounded by clouds, a secret Yeti society lives in peace and harmony. One day, a Yeti witnesses an airplane crash; Inside lies "Smallfoot", a legendary creature that will rock the society to its core.
In a future where people print their own 3D printed drugs at home, Alice takes the reality-warping drug "Nirvana" and embarks on a trip as Ecilia in a radically different Wonderland.

A photographer who's afraid he's slowly losing his grip on reality is seduced by a disturbed married model. She claims it's their destiny to be together. Her husband disagrees. The photographer starts having a strange feeling of deja vu.
A thief is caught up in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse between a maverick cop and London crime boss.
Meeting the woman of your dreams in Hawaii is a blessing until you discover she has short-term memory loss and forgets everything the very next day.
A small town is being terrorized by a serial clown killer.
An aging detective must find a missing girl and return her to the Company overlords that rule over the world of the future if he is ever to see his family again.

Set two years after the events of the first fan film, Steven Lloyd - the boy who supposedly put an end to the life of Michael Myers in October, 2008 - suffers from horrifying dreams of the serial killer resurrecting himself from the dead.
A group of contestants travel to a castle in Italy to participate in a million dollar treasure hunt hidden on the premises. Little did they know, the lord of the castle hides a deadly secret.
This collection of Minions shorts from the "Despicable Me" franchise includes mini-movies like "Training Wheels," "Puppy" and "Yellow Is the New Black."
Brawling cable layer Steve Reardon doesn't want to marry girlfriend Edith but he also doesn't want her to date other men.
Jaime wants to go to Hollywood. His parents want him to go a bit farther.

column2: Lucy Shimmers and the Prince of Peace
column3: Second chances start when a hardened criminal crosses paths with a precocious little girl who is helped by an angel to change hearts during the holiday season.
A girl living with an old couple in their house as paying guest finds out that the old couple died years ago and the house where she lives is seized by police.
Two siblings find out about a mythical aquatic monster and try to a save a remote Canadian lake from being used as a dump site for toxic waste.
Centres around a Mahjong master, Andy, and his dealings with his ex-girlfriend, estranged family and a local gang.

Led by a madly enthusiastic director, a team of amateur filmmakers hole up in a former undercover DOD research facility to make a film about a dream researcher who disappeared while in the midst of a secret neurological experiment.
Ex-sweethearts are forced to reunite this Christmas when an eccentric billionaire threatens to buy out their seaside Caribbean town.
Two cops and two gangsters, too twisted for their own good. What can happen the day they meet?
A 1970s version of the future, where personalities and asteroids collide.
A travel agent travels to Africa intending to start a resort hotel only to encounter her crusty ex-husband and ivory smugglers.
Set in the spring of 1972, Lacy, a teenage hitchhiker, gets lost in the forest of Bruce Peninsula, where she spends many hallucinatory, surrealistic days and nights attempting to escape.
An American detective unmasks a gambler as the head of a banknote counterfeiting gang.
When an oil company unwittingly unleashes a prehistoric shark from its icy prison, the Jurassic killer maroons a group of thieves and beautiful young female college students on an abandoned island.
A graduation beach party ends in tragedy when Angel dies. Ten years later, the survivors of the party are being killed off one by one.
Two roommates/physical therapists, one a vain woman and the other an awkward teenager, share an increasingly bizarre relationship.
Three Colorado girls decide to hop on their motorcycles and head to California. On the way they get mixed up in drugs, rape and stolen motorcycles.

A group of college students ride share to a music festival and have a campfire story competition on the way. As the stories progress, the tensions rise as they realize they are in a story of their own.

column2: Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight
column3: A group of technology-dependent teenagers goes to offline camp and faces a deadly danger lurking in the woods.
The Ikon is a painted animation that tells the tale of young Russians, bound by their encounter with an Orthodox icon of mysterious origins.
8 years ago, two brothers set out to explore filmmaking by recreating their favorite film. The following is the product of that endeavor.

Helena suffers the loss of her parents. Between mourning and abandonment, she receives through dreams, messages that will make her delve into herself, and at the same time, follow the strange trail of someone who will change her existence.
A TV channel would be the first in the world to send a martial arts contest through the Internet. The competition is the people with completely different backgrounds that will make up for the title.

Two sisters plot for revenge against the drug-lord who murdered their family and took their home, now being used as a base for their experiments on aphrodisiacs. The older sister becomes a prostitute in order to get close to the gang.

Immigrant radical Bartolomeo Romagna is falsely condemned and executed for a payroll robbery. Years later, his son Mio sets out to find the truth of the crime and to bring to account the gangster Trock Estrella.
Jack Voorhees is back one year later to take revenge on Crystina and her friends.
Three close friends. One common enemy. Bad Plans. Worse Luck. When it's summer in the suburbs, even if crime doesn't pay, at least it's something to do.
Busty, blonde and beautiful, Six-Pack Annie seeks to help her Aunt Tess raise $5,000 for the family diner...by trying to find a rich daddy.

Serdar is a radio programmer and famous for his jokes. One day he made a joke to his girlfriend to aim for his proposal. But the things don't work as he wants. To reunite them, one of their common friend organizes an holiday for them.
Türkan, a young woman, works as a secretary in a bank. Kemal works alongside his wealthy uncle. There is a big secret that Kemal kept from Türkan.
Fred, a commercial director, decides to learn the flute to relieve his stress. His music teacher is none other than Isabelle, a flutist he once saw playing in the subway. He falls under her charm.
After discovering a parallel universe an astrophysicist enters a series of supernatural worlds that forces him to question his reality.
What happens when an American family gets two trees that grow spendable money.
A U.S. climbing team, funded by millionaire Clairborne is determined to conquer K2.

A man takes up residence with a mysterious marquis and is soon persuaded to enter into an asylum for preventative therapy. Things are not what they seem, and the marquis may be even more sinister than what the young man may've predicted.

A psychological thriller following Jake, a reclusive news editor, who is inadvertently sent secret dashcam video evidence that points to a possible conspiracy and cover-up involving high-ranking government officials.
A final year medical student goes on the run after bring implicated in the hit and run death of a fellow student.

Callan (Brian Austin Green) returns to the scene with his team in order to oppose the return of the evil Gunnar (Vinnie Jones); his path crosses again with Frank Nitti (Tom Sizemore) detective under the city of Los Angeles.

Tomás Kóblic is a former Navy captain who, during the last Argentine dictatorship, was a participant in "the flights of death." He will abandon his career to hide in Colonia Helena, where the only law is a corrupt Commissioner.
A mother, forced to steal her suddenly deceased husband's trucking haul to provide for her daughter, discovers the truth behind his death on their cross-country adventure.
An English lady falls madly in love with a French Pirate.

A troubled young woman must finally come to terms with her horrific past as she is propelled through dreams into the terrifying fairytale world of the Red Kingdom where she encounters figures reminiscent of her memories and fears.
A story that is written, directed, and produced by Andrew Ackerson.
Three friends get caught in a life of major crime.
A boy receiving treatment for his auto-immune disorder discovers that the house he's living in isn't as safe as he thought.
The federal agent Jo Dee Fostar is currently investigating a serial killer, helped by doctor Animal who is isolated in a maximum security jail.

column2: Crocodile Jones: The Son of Indiana Dundee
column3: A MAN, HIS FRIEND, AND A TRIBE JOIN FORCES TO FIND THE STO.NINO'S MISSING GOLDEN GLOBE.
An aspiring filmmaker exploits his only friends to finish an epic fantasy film during a weekend film competition.
Arriving from the future on the Earth of 2024, a colonist from a distant planet and a cyborg enter into mortal combat. Now mankind has only two choices - to remain Homo sapiens or to become cyborgs.

Gokul Das, an ex-gangster tries to make a living by becoming the driver of a millionaire, whose daughter, Priya is the target of some killers. Das tries to save Priya, but things are not what they seem to appear.
Sexual encounters and criminal mayhem occur when two people meet via their computers.
As they battle through evil men and orc-infested lands, two orphaned brothers align with a band of rogue warriors who swear their allegiance in the hazardous quest to hunt dragons.
A pianist helps his brother escape from two gangsters, who retaliate by abducting their kid brother.
A story about Louis Pothen, a divorce lawyer and his wife Vasuki Iyer, a kathakali dancer.
A hitman tries to retire, but a beautiful thief may change his plans.

column2: Dinotopia: Quest for the Ruby Sunstone
column3: An Orphaned Boy sets out in search of adventure, but when a shipwreck lands him on an island where Dinosaurs and Humans coexist, he finds not only adventure but a family as well.
A deranged writer murders a maid after she resists his advances. The writer engages his brother's help in hiding the body, causing unexpected problems for both of them.
Henry Aldrich wants to win a trip to Alaska.
Five people are gathered in a cafe because of a phone call they have all received. The plot thickens when they discover a dead body in a bedroom upstairs.

Six adults traveled cross country from the west coast to Cleveland, Ohio for their ten-year high school reunion. They would never make it. A camcorder and tape was found documenting their trip. Their story has never been told until now.
A woman returns to home from Canada to find her confused parents hiding a terrible secret from her. She had a Siamese twin who died upon separation. Her twin now haunts the family house.
A crazed man escapes from prison to kill his wife's lover.
When the investigation on a prostitute murder by the Paris vice department derails, one cop will stop at nothing for revenge.

In the year 2057, human emotions are regulated by technological implants. When a woman's "regulator" malfunctions, she and her husband must decide whether to report the problem and return to the system.

column2: The Tale of Soldier Fedot, The Daring Fellow
column3: The king decided to bring archer to a nervous breakdown because he in love with archer's wife.
A supernatural thriller set in a remote town that is being terrorized by a Yeti.
After a violent assault, a woman undergoes changes that cause her husband and daughters to fear for their lives.
A married woman unsuccessfully tries to find a job in order to provide a better life to her son.
In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K.
ACTION DRAMA ABOUT THE GANGSTERS OF THE EARLY SHOWA ERA.
A princess attempts to win back her kingdom from a powerful shape-shifting sorcerer.
A compilation of 3 short horror stories. 'Wooden Clogs' directed by Kenji Nakanishi, 'Regeneration' and 'Last Day as a Teenager' directed by Takayuki Sato.

column2: Timetrip: The Curse of the Viking Witch
column3: Valdemar and Sille meets Benedict, a man who claims to have been cursed to eternal life by a Norse shaman in the viking age.
Work-life balance breaks down for Paris's most gifted armed robbers when a grave mistake forces them to work for a crime boss in a high-stakes heist.
Two military pilots are close friends, and share in a lot of hazardous missions while engaging in a series of good-natured romantic rivalries.

When nothing can be done for a Fatal Familial Insomnia patient at the hospital, a med student has her brother moved to a secret facility in the basement for alternative treatment. Is it demonic possession?

Pedro Ortiz, a brave charro, arrives to a fishing village that is passing hard times. There's no fish in the waters. His manners and his love for Maria, a local attractive widow, will get him into trouble
Two extreme films in one. The real "Italian Grindhouse".

column2: A Quiet Place in the Country
column3: An accomplished painter rents a dilapidated villa in the country, and soon finds himself absorbed in the property's history, particularly the murder of a sex-obsessed countess who died there decades prior.
Gang of robbers heads for Mexican border, meets unexpected opposition along the way.
An official, betrayed by his lady servant, joins musketeers such as Athos, while she turns into a countess and a spy that will eventually be executed.
A deep cover agent is framed after a botched sting operation and the assassination of two undercover officers.
A twelve-year-old girl is transported by a magical black stallion to the mystical world of ALBION, where she discovers that she alone is the key to saving an entire race of people.
It's a story about a little child. Who wants to be a Train driver. And he knows it as train pilot.

Spawn - having become plagued by nightmares - discovers that his former Special Forces partner, Chapel, was the one who murdered him. Their paths inevitably cross when Chapel attempts to steal military weapons for Jason Wynn.

Shot without crew in a span of 10 years in six different countries, it's a silent film the main cast of which is the director himself, his real wife and his real son. Shooting started when the director's son wasn't born yet.
Golgo 13 is assigned to murder a man named Boss Goa.
"13 no Tsuki" is about a man and his love for the women he couldn't have.

A model and wannabe Bollywood actress, Sanjana, experiences bizarre supernatural events that make her boyfriend, Rohit, mistrust her. To get things back on track, they go to Lucknow on holiday, where things turn more dangerous.
When a rogue vampire kills his partner, an NSA special agent reluctantly teams with another officer who is a "good" vampire in an attempt to track down the evil vampire killer.

column2: Alpha and Omega 4: The Legend of the Saw Toothed Cave
column3: After exploring the haunted Saw Tooth Cave and finding a wolf who has been driven away from her pack, Runt musters all of courage to help her.
A New York psychiatrist is solicited by government agents in connection with a former patient of his who also happens to be a scientist wanted by certain foreign powers.

A prominent psychiatrist at a state run hospital wrestles with madness and a dark supernatural force as he and a female police detective race to stop an escaped patient from butchering five people held hostage in a remote mansion.

column2: The Ark of the Sun God
column3: A safecracker takes a job where he must go to Istanbul and steal a scepter that once belonged to the god Gilgamesh but is now in the temple of a secret cult.
In 2030 during World War III in which a small group of survivors make it into a bunker. Two years later they have to exit to find new supplies, but they are greeted by dinosaur predators.
Teddy tours the country through the eyes of the world wide web.

Sacha Keller is only interested in one night stands with 20-somethings and has a phobia of children. That is until he meets Charlotte, the divorced mother-of-three and ex-wife of one his employer's powerful clients.
Two police detectives, a grizzled veteran and one fresh-faced rookie, hunt a ritualistic serial killer murdering people with tattoos and skinning them.
In New Mexico, looking for his son's murderer, Ben Kane takes a deputy marshal's job and runs into young Billy Young who's on the lam.
A collection of four Japanese folk tales with supernatural themes.
A family inherits an old mansion which houses the dangerous 'Book of Evil' that has all the monsters of the world trapped inside it.

In 1718, on a small island off the Carolina coast, a recently freed family of indentured servants plans to settle and homestead there but they run into conflict with a group of fishermen also claiming ownership of the island.

Cuando uno nace con el alma de un pistolero, todo lo que uno piensa es matar. Su fiel compañero para esto es un Revolver, pero este es el caso de un REVOLVER SANGRIENTO que no tiene miedo, incluso mientras realiza sus deseos más mortales.

column2: Hopz and the Hot Air Balloon Adventure
column3: Hope the Easter bunny and his bestie Lil'Bit the Easter duckling have a question: who is the best Easter egg hunter of them all? Follow the music and find out in Hopz And The Hot Air Balloon Adventure.
Sue, the crazy girl that feels as if she was born in the wrong place. But the craziest thing she's ever done is that she is about to leave everything behind, including Belle.
The film portrays the unexpected incidents happening over two days in the life of an oversees returned, middle class family man Jitya Bhau in a the small town city of Maharashtra.
A nice young couple move into an eerie house which is located in a small Louisiana town, unaware of its violent history, and soon find themselves tormented by the previous owners.
A sci-fi/thriller centered on a group of survivors in the U.S. after an attack by "inhuman nocturnal predators" caused the country to be evacuated.
Set in the era of Great Gelum, it is a story about a major scientific breakthrough that pivots around the mystery of the new human blood type code-named Snow Maiden.
The first alien man has arrived on earth, and no woman can refuse him.
Two Hong Kong police detectives seek a serial killer.

The Franklin kids come home for Christmas to find that their childhood home and the family business is in jeopardy. While trying to save their home and Toy store, they re-discover the core values of love, family, and the Christmas spirit.

Yuntum (Sanely Insane) is the story of love and an illusion of love, a decay of an instrument, a boy in the dilemma with a special gift, a girl bounded by fate, a man caught in the past and the divine intervention of God.
A road detour leads four friends to repay a past life karmic debt.

column2: Alien Showdown: The Day the Old West Stood Still
column3: An alien scout lands on earth in the year 1854. The creature is searching for water and food. Once it finds what it needs, it will call in an invasion fleet. A lone cowboy must stand against the alien invader or all will be lost.
Ramadan is simple employee who steal the salrays of the hall department and go to prison

column2: Troop 491: the Adventures of the Muddy Lions
column3: Tristan, a reluctant new Scout is conflicted after witnessing a homicide. Will he follow the code the Streets or the code of the Scouts?
Dorothy, heir to the Oz throne, must take it back from the wicked Prime Minister Kruel with the help of three farmhands.
It is based on a true story..

After inheriting a house in the south of France, Michael falls in love with Ariel, only to find himself embroiled in an alien conspiracy taking over the world, one human body at a time - Based on the acclaimed novel The Maggot People.
A patriotic military man foils a plot by anarchists against the government of an unnamed country, in this Nazi era propaganda drama.

column2: S the Last Policeman Recovery of Our Future
column3: A former boxer with a blunt personality and strong hand-to-hand combat skills, Ichigo is a member of the NPS, the national police unit that combats terrorism and other dangerous crimes outside the scope of ordinary police work.
A young woman who possesses supernatural powers and visions of an upcoming apocalypse is aided by a retired bounty hunter who must protect her from those who wish to use her abilities for evil.
There is a high-price for honour. The debt is overdue.
Two families from two different backgrounds come together through their children to become best friends crossing racial lines on both sides to create a feel good film and truly a positive outcome
Frank Bigelow, told he's been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find out who killed him and why.
A true New Zealand story about friendship and the spirit that lives in many of us.

A teenager named Tessa Gray travels to London during the Victorian era where she discovers that she has the ability to transform her body and ultimately meets up with Shadowhunters who hunt vampires, werewolves, and warlocks.

column2: Quando o Galo Cantar Pela Terceira Vez Renegarás Tua Mãe
column3: Inácio, a functional schizophrenic, is a doorman in a building in the South Zone of Rio. He ends up obsessing over one of the residents, making the relationship with his mother unsustainable.
Deep in the English moors, a sociopath preys on innocent people, until one day his secrets are finally revealed and an inevitable confrontation is at hand.
When plans for a weekend vacation hit a dead end, a group of close-knit friends find themselves stranded in unfamiliar territory, pursued by a menacing, blood thirsty predator.

After a major bio-weapon attack on London, two scientists debate whether to save a suspected terrorist's life. However, assassins have infiltrated the building, and soon the scientists find themselves with time, and options, running out.
Two brothers on the mean streets of NY discover how far brotherly love will go when one is a cop and the other is a gangster.
Aditya is a Police Constable who's life takes a turn when a murder and robbery that take place while he is on duty. Can Aditya manage it all?
An American woman searching for her sister's killer in Ireland becomes involved in a world of vampires and other fantastic creatures.
Earth has been conquered by robots from a distant galaxy. Survivors are confined to their houses and must wear electronic implants, risking incineration by robot sentries if they venture outside.
Policeman Vila and his buddy Chamorro discover a link between two apparently unconnected murders and begin to suspect a sinister conspiracy.

Regular guy Ed (Marcus Carroll) awakes one morning to find that his Grandmother has become one of the living dead. While trapped in his home Ed tries to survive the day, keep his house zombie free, stay alive and save the day.
The Muppets present their own touching rendition of Charles Dickens' classic tale.

A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.
A 3000 mile race from San Francisco to Miami that took place in the Spring of 2003. 150 cars and stars created all kinds of mayhem and chaos over 6 days racing from coast to coast!
Ex-gangster Harry Payne confronts his violent past and vengeance from beyond the grave.
Two extreme films in one. The real "Italian Grindhouse".
A Foreign Service Officer in London tries to prevent a terrorist attack set to hit New York City, but is forced to go on the run when she is framed for crimes she did not commit.
A Mexican-American gangster from Robstown, Texas takes on the mafia on his own, while coming to terms with an age old vendetta.
An immigrant from Columbia, Angela, travels to New York City, leaving her country behind with hopes for a new life, only to find life has an idea of its own.
Two generations of an Italian Mafia family, struggle for survival during the most ruthless and violent time in Detroit history.
A series of murders that take place in an old, dark mansion are suspected of being committed by an ape.
A pregnant teenager comes to a tense agreement with the couple sheltering her.
A horror film with surreal language and social criticism on child abuse in Brazil.
