A young woman who works in a beauty parlor discovers that her vagina can talk, which causes her no end of trouble.
Womanizer. Pimp. Junkie. Dealer. Gambler. Thief. Killer. Father.
With Brialeos convalescing after a mission, Deunan is assigned a new and remarkably familiar partner as a strange wave of terrorist attacks plague Olympus.
'Back in the Neighbourhood' continues the story of two gang leaders from Manastur district (Cluj-Napoca, Romania) using the strong language typical for the tough street life.
When their boat sinks, 3 men make it to an Isle they'll wish they had never found.
A group of teenagers, unprepared for their final exams due to their indulgence in more pleasurable pursuits, barricade themselves in their school and challenge their despised and sadistic headmaster.
A spiritual pilgrimage based on true story.
The children of a small European mountain village end up being its only residents, soon after the adults cannot take their behavior any longer.
A dark, modern fairy tale about a troubled teenage girl who goes on a perilous quest for a fallen angel to save her mother from terminal cancer.
A messianic entity from the future travels to modern-day earth to wipe out 300,000,000 "bad people" and usher in a new era of peace.

column2: The Invisible Man vs. The Human Fly
column3: A ruthless serial killer with a peculiar method of stalking and killing his victims comes face to face with a police officer turned invisible by a scientific experiment. Who will emerge triumphant?

In a future with a depleted ozone layer, sunlight is deadly, and a nocturnal life is key to survival. A disillusioned priest attempts to escape the treacherous outpost of Jewel, a Western town ruled with an iron fist by an unhinged tyrant.

A millionaire disappears somewhere in Africa, with his child daughter, and a lot of diamonds. 15 years later, his wife ears a legend about a white Jungle Goddess near the general location of the plane crash, and orders a search for her.
In order to sustain his family, a troubled pilot accepts one last crooked deal to transport a dangerous cargo inside his spaceship.
Two brothers - one a priest, one a career criminal - find bloody salvation in a mysterious underground carnival.

Nick's wife's in bed with his boss. He later gets a gun to his head by a carjacker but steps on the gas pedal. They end up friends after adventures together - holdups, burglary, reckless driving, revenge etc. Twists follow.
When their adoptive mother is gunned down in a store robbery, four brothers decide to investigate the murder and find the killers themselves, but not all is what it seems.

Zoe has suffered with Leukemia her whole life. When her condition worsens, she's given months to live. One day, a Young Astronaut crash lands near her home. Zoe spends her last days showing the Astronaut the wonders of Planet Earth.
Vasu, a prankster, whiles away his time teasing girls and getting scolded by his father. But when one of his pranks results in his brother getting jailed, he decides to turn over a new leaf.

A town falls victim to a series of gruesome murders, an FBI agent with a tattered past must work with the local Sheriff to stop the beast before she too falls prey to The Lycanthropist that howls under the full moon.

Hiroka and Rei, two energetic girls. Umi and Mana, united by a strong friendship. Mr and Ms Owada, leading a collapsing relationship. A sudden tragedy can occur to anyone. This is a story about people's despair, and hope.
An aging hitman for the Italian mob harboring a life threatening secret, reluctantly opens himself up to love, and the consequences that follow.

When 4 friends attend a birthday party they find a stolen painting which sends them on chase to find out who the real burgulars are and where the next hit will be. Will they be able to find the real burgulars and solve the case? Find out!
A sect of assassins tricks people into believing in eternal life through astral travel.
Do people really sleep?

A painter and an art critic who romanticize each other's obsession with fame decide to collaborate on a project they believe will revolutionize the art world. They are determined to make a painting come to life, even if it kills them.
Espe, a teen streamer who dreams of having thousands of followers, accepts a viral challenge in which she has to disappear for 48 hours. But what starts as a game, becomes something dangerous.
A travel writer stumbles upon a gruesome secret while traveling aboard a luxury cruise ship.

column2: Kamen Rider Super Den-O Trilogy: Episode Red - Zero's Star Twinkle
column3: Yuuto finds himself continually drawn to his fiancee, Airi, and when another man contracts with an Imagin to woo her, Ryotaro and the Imgain are pulled into the situation, all while the DenLiner runs out of control through time.

Three vampires settle in the quaint and bizarre beach community of Lost Cove. Although safe from the exterior forces that plague their kind, they're met with internal conflicts of grief, love, redemption, and coming to terms with the past.

1984, a team of rangers on a punitive expedition in Colombia jungle gets abducted by aliens. During the experiment, conducted on the space station, humans are forced to pass deadly tests, competing with warriors from other worlds.

column2: Mio in the Land of Faraway
column3: A lonely boy who is transferred from his dull life with his adoptive parents to the land where his real father is the King. In that country, he sets out on a quest, together with his new friend, to destroy the evil Knight Kato.
An old inmate tells his cellmate, who's up for parole, about the location of a 35-year old gold loot and the released convict goes looking for it in Arizona.
Han and Hao are about to get married soon when Hao picks up a strange red envelope on the street and then all hell breaks loose with a vengeful supernatural bride wreaking havoc on his life.

This is the third time that Vik and his family have moved to a different city. Vik is a shy child who finds it hard to make new friends, and whenever he finally does start to open up to ...                See full synopsis »
His bartender turns out to be a vampire queen that sends him out on the town as an abomination hell-bent on destroying everything in his path on the way to conquering his pre-vamp prey.
The film 27 Down is an original mystery thriller. It follows the exploits of a Boston Police detective who gets embroiled in a tense hit-and-run investigation.
The summer adventures of the teenagers are centered around Karlis, whose rich imagination sees UFOs everywhere.

A compassionate captain takes a homeless stowaway in his house to live with his money-grubbing family; however, when he is lost at sea, they will rush to take control. But, is he truly dead? Can his "resurrection" force a change of plans?
Romantic comedy-drama about a husband (Sordi) who is jealous of his wife's (Vitti) infatuation with a Professor.
A group of New York executives harbor a deep, dark secret in order to preserve their livelihoods.
A dead antelope returns from the grave to kill the hunter that put him there.
Plot kept under wraps.

The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.
Plagued by reoccurring nightmares after having turned ten years old, the young men and women from four separate families seek to uncover the truth of their connectedness.

In 2003, A man enters a building. His resignation letter at hand. But what happens when he clips into an existence that no one knows. The unimaginable world of endless liminal spaces - and the creatures that call this place home.
A man with a Vision of his own death must prevent it from happening.

When Graham, a disillusioned investment banker in London, adopts an adorable but mischievous otter, his life is turned upside down. Moving to the Isle of Skye, Graham reconnects with nature and more importantly learns to love again.

column2: The Yin and the Yang of Mr. Go
column3: Buddha has the power to change the nature of a person into their opposite. He uses this power only when the world is in danger. When a villain obtains plans that could be used for peace or war, Buddha turns him into a good guy. Now what?
A young Scottish shepherd, following the death of his unfaithful wife, fights to maintain his own sanity when the past catches up to him.
When an unexpected injury forces Jesse out of work, facing financial crisis and mental anguish, the family must stand together.
When a man is murdered in Moscow, experimental bionic research brings him back to life. He then sets out to find his murderers and money that was stolen during the crime.
A documentary crew follows an elite unit of soldiers in the wake of an alien invasion.
An invincible sorcerer first shrinks his mentor and then deceptively abducts and holds a princess in his underwater palace.

A washed up aerospace engineer must make his remaining days count and decides to jump start a 1980s NASA "black project," but he needs the help of a misguided teen model rocket builder to do it, and an unlikely friendship blossoms.
In 1936, a young man arrives in Hitler's Germany, frantically seeking information about his missing German mother, and finds she is pending execution at a concentration camp.

A dark comedy about a half-wild creature from the African jungle, which has been identified as a heir of the noble family, set in Germany in the 1930s, shows that in certain circumstances, people behave worse than animals in the jungle.

A magic blade made thousands of years ago from the remains of a meteor is stolen by a criminal gang in Japan. A Japanese policeman tracks the gang to California in his quest to get the sword back before it can be put to evil use.
A mystery about a woman with amnesia figuring out who she is.
Man hopes to get a girlfriend which he loves but he ends up in friend zone.

Daniel Jakor is one of the most prolific and successful artists of which the world has never heard. Struggling to sell his art, he discovers that his true genius lies not in the creation of his own work but in forgery of the Great Masters.

Koshizu (Fuji), a young geisha, tries to kill herself but is saved by cook Yukichi (Sugahara). Rival geisha Adakichi (Yumi), greedy trader Yasukawa (Abe) and wealthy businessman Asai (Soganoya) add up to dramatic turns.
A man seeks redemption before he is exposed .

The devil encourages media personality Donald Trump to run for president of the United States, so he can have a political puppet. But throughout Trump's many gaffes, the devil wonders if he even has a chance of winning.
John, an escaped convict, takes refuge on the farm of Widow Couderc. He becomes the older woman's lover and admits that he's on the run. The widow's in-laws, who despise her,
Two mismatched cops wage a personal war against a vicious Los Angeles gangster.
A seasoned agent from the Spanish secret service, teams up with an American bounty hunter, to try to capture Daryl Lymangood (Jamie Wilson), a dangerous British psychopath.
Not all who win are lucky.
A newspaper publisher and his Korean servant fight crime as vigilantes who pose as a notorious masked gangster and his aide.
A 12 year old boy mixes up the reality and the adventure of the computer gaming into an unpleasant life style. His parents are not aware of the situation and the problem gets worse and worst.
A post-singularity alien civilization attempts to take over the Earth from a small industrial Soviet town by implanting alien minds into human bodies.
A drama with a two-tiered storyline concerning a mother and daughter who try to form a bond after the young woman's difficult childhood.

After the Libyan Revolution, an orphan of an indigenous North African tribe is taken as a servant of a rebel militia, where she meets an Arab soldier who pledges to return her to safety in order to cope with his own demons.
In the 1950s, a young boy living with his troublesome family in rural USA fantasizes that a neighboring widow is actually a vampire, responsible for a number of disappearances in the area.
A director of TV commercials learns about astral projection. He has out of body experiences during his sleep and his dad in law and doctor die mysteriously.
A district attorney rises to political success and the governorship but loses his sense of morality once he starts associating with the shadowy and perhaps diabolical Nick Beal.
Two college students, anticipating a relaxing weekend of housesitting, stumble upon a satanic cult.
A gang's plans for a St. Louis bank robbery are complicated when the sister of one of the thieves starts voicing her well-founded suspicions.

column2: The Black Waters of Echo's Pond
column3: Nine friends take a holiday at a Victorian home on a private island and uncover a game that when played brings out the worst in each of them. Jealously, greed, hatred, lust, all of the things they keep buried deep inside themselves rise to the surface and come to a boil.

Rebecca inherits her grandmother's gothic mansion and celebrates by bringing her best friend and her boyfriend for a weekend. While exploring the crypts, they find an old dusty book, which gives a detailed description of a vampire's life.

A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.
A girl waits 50 years for a doctor's son to return from India, but when he does so he is married.
A Gandharva Kanya and a prince fall in love with each other. Lord Indra curses them and the prince forgets her. They reunite after facing many obstacles.
Ex bank robber and football hooligan George Bull tries to win his ailing father's approval by vowing to save his pub, conflicting with his own desire to stay on the straight and narrow.

Suresh Gopi's character name in this film is Rudra Simhan who is a yogi who gave up all worldly pleasures by listening to the call of his soul. When he comes back to his homeland after a long journey he comes in to the life of Haimavathi.
An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.
3 teen boys, part of a boy scout troop on a WA wilderness trip, find boxes of US Army weapons. They take a box of SAMs. Some well armed men want them back and it's hunting season on boy scouts.
Set in riot-torn, near-future Los Angeles, 'Hotel Artemis' follows the Nurse, who runs a secret, members-only emergency room for criminals.
A GIRL....A BOY....CREATED BY NATURE IN ONE BODY FIGHTING, LOVING ABD SHARING EACH OTHER.

A love-stuck girl defying family wish marries her boyfriend who leaves her soon. Tuned away by own family now, she is compelled to face the harsh world reality where trust and love is very hard to come by and forced to play deadly game.
A village boy falls in love with a girl, who hails from a neighbouring village. They face many obstacles after the girl's father's arch-rival enters their life.

We are following the lives of four young boys from the city center of Belgrade, who have entered the world of crime and violence at a young age. The gang moves from selling weed to selling heroin and that's when all the problems start.
Using high tech gadgets, two kids have to save their reactivated OSS top spy parents when they're taken by an evil, high tech enemy.
Solomon Baumgarden is a New York City probation officer assisting teenagers through the court system.
A gang of poverty-ridden juvenile delinquents progress from petty theft to hard crime, but a kindly judge manages to set most of them on the right path after they are finally apprehended.
College students have an experience of their lifetime after a protest goes horribly wrong.
Two friends spend the day with a mayfly.
When a deaf family move in a new home but what they didn't know there are monster family live there.
Killer Robots attack and takeover a top level Nuclear Missile facility.
After his missing sister turns up dead, a high school hacker digs deep to uncover a spider web of cover-up that has him running for his life.
Pras (Oka Antara) wants to realize his dreams of having a significant life and career as a journalist, but Jakarta changes everything.

A British archaeologist finds an ancient village that opens the door to a story of a Druid Ministre Airell in the time Christ and religious upheaval, revealing the mysteries of Briton, the Druids, the coming of a new world.

Life through the eyes of a sixteen-year old boy growing up in Boston's north side. Director Francine Pellegrino captures the richness of Boston-Italian heritage while exposing the importance of love, family, and neighborhood.
During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.
The outcast son of a primate King learns about being a monkey.
A murder suspect has gone missing. Three people must find him, each for their own reasons. Only one of them can get what they want. How far will they go to get it?
A multicultural couple moves into a farm house when a stranger arrives and disrupts their new peaceful life.

San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with female partner Inspector Kate Moore, with whom he's not too excited to be working.
A Man Called Nereus is a film that smashes together the genres of Science fiction, Crime-Action Drama and Comedy.
Laura and Ruben reunite after spending 15 years apart in a remote cabin in the woods.
While playing a video game on TV, school-children are mysteriously transported to a prehistoric island.

column2: The Untitled Police Task Force Project
column3: A special Global task force, the RTF, is formed to catch or solve crimes committed by sexual offenders. One particular case manages to elude them, especially when it could be one their own.
An Oxford graduate takes up a job in a mental asylum, only to discover that the "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane, and that there is more going on than meets the eye.

column2: The Royal Hunt of the Sun
column3: In 1532, Spanish conquistador Francisco Pizarro leads an expedition into the heart of the Inca Empire and captures the Incan Emperor Atahualpa and claims Peru for Spain.
A retiring Yakuza boss must lead his enemies into a contaminated lab to save his ill daughter.
Paula Parkins is the teenage daughter of wealthy parents who can't seem to make time for her, so she looks for thrills as the leader of her all girl-gang who rob and rape young men.
A 12-year-old reeling from the loss of his best friend who decides to finish their bucket list without his family's knowledge.

World War III is over, the planet is mostly uninhabitable. On an island in the Pacific, the Islanders survive this cursed world in a fortified colony. Under the orders of the maniacal Zeus they are forced to fight each other to the death.

Five bored, small town teens search for excitement using five cards from the deck and find a hidden horror. When they burn down a witches evil cottage in the forest, the witch has her revenge. Will a crucifix save one of them?
A wild tiger causes havoc in a remote village and all hope rests on a brave hunter. An archaeologist and old crush of the hunter's wife comes into the mix to further the chaos.
The discovery of a new kind of enemy drives an Antarctic Research Facility at McMurdo Sound to the brink of war.
A lesbian with commitment issues befriends a widowed mother who is visiting her workaholic daughter.
The pupils at a high school next to a nuclear power plant start acting and looking strange after buying contaminated drugs from a plant worker.
A part-Indian freedom fighter named Seabo is framed and put on a brutal Southern chain gang.
Year 2161: one android and three employees of a human-meat fast food chain, must fight an army of terrorist created mutants

When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort--a hedonistic island paradise for swingers--it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence...or at least hide it.
A headstrong teen loses his younger brother in New York City and must use his wits to enlist the help of a quirky assortment of locals to find him, before their mom gets home.
A criminal escapes from prison, however a betrayal leads to his second arrest.
In the closing days of World War I, an unlikely group of companions race across a war-torn world to stop the sinister plot behind Project Pinscher.
Jack goes up the beanstalk to rescue a little girl who has been transformed into a harp.
Astérix and Obélix compete at the Olympics in order to help their friend Lovesix marry Princess Irina. Brutus also tries to win the game with his own team and get rid of his father Julius Caesar.
Wild-hearted mechanic boy Iwaki falls in love with the innocent but gang tied Michiko.

column2: The Hunt of the Son of Beast
column3: Andrew, David and his friends are taking a vacation to Kings Island when something strange and mysterious is happening and it's returning.
CEO of a High Tech company dies and his family is forced to find and complete his projects in order to stay financially solvent.
A first year college student forms a music club in an abandoned theater, putting on a modern day version of Shakespeare's "Much Ado About Nothing" to raise money for a local homeless man.

column2: May the Devil Take You Too
column3: Two years after escaping from demonic terror, the young woman is still haunted by unnatural vision. The dangers that await her and her friends are increasingly threatening: the figure of darkness rises to take their lives.

column2: Manila Kingpin: The Asiong Salonga Story
column3: Biopic of the notorious late-1940s Manila gangster until his death at 26 in 1951: a legend known to this day who came from Tondo, a town in Manila known during that period as a tough and dangerous place.
In this adaptation of Mark Twain's timeless classic, Thomasina Sawyer and Huck Finn must decide what to do after witnessing the pinning of a murder on an innocent man.
Jigar, an independent, carefree, insurance agent falls in love with Shruti. Soon he realizes that love is not eternal but it comes with an expiry date.

In the Médoc, a young woman is found drowned. An accident, her influential family of winegrowers maintains. Or rather murder, as the American inspector Morrison suspects. If so, why? What secrets this family keeps?

Striving to be a whiz-bang salesman and screwing up at every turn, Red Skelton turns in a genius comic performance inevitably getting into big trouble, impossible situations and a wild chase involving dastardly crooks.
A botanist with photographic memory takes interest in a recurring nightmare and decides to dig deeper, only to stumble on a murder mystery.
Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
A young woman dreams of becoming a race-car driver, even though the career claimed the life of her father.
A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy.
An obsessed cop is on the trail of a serial killer prowling the streets of Buffalo, N.Y. but when his teenage daughter disappears, he drops any professional restraint to get the killer.
King tells story about the dream of a village boy named Guntur (Rangga Raditya) to become an international badminton player like his and his father idol, Liem Swie King.
A Special Forces Agent is assigned to protect a scientist and his creation from a sinister gang.
Alia is now working and living at an orphanage, where she meets a girl who also possesses inner eyes like her.
Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Herbie, Number 53, the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own, puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.
Japan creates an artificial black hole device to trap Godzilla forever, but a test of the device creates new foes for Godzilla, car-sized dragonflies called meganula and their queen, Megaguirus.

Jo March and her sisters Meg, Beth, and Amy live in a happy family in Concord, Massachusetts. Jo yearns to be a writer, and through the course of the years, finds much within her own family to write about.
Tia and Tony visit Los Angeles, but he's quickly kidnapped by an evil scientist, leaving her to desperately search for him.
After a prank goes awry and lands a hospital janitor in a coma, a group of doctors begin dying at the hands of the comatose patient who is extracting revenge through out-of-body experiences.
A supernatural thriller about a young woman named Senka, who resorts to the supernatural to resurrect her husband, but must deal with the consequences as Hell creeps into her home.
When three scientist launch a bio attack on a bus full of hot girls they create sex crazed zombies wreaking havoc on a small town.
It's 2029, nearly a decade after the Covid-19 vaccine was tampered with. People turn into flesh-eating zombies when they meet an unvaccinated person.
A government researcher, sent to research the "menace" of wolves in the north, learns about the true beneficial and positive nature of the species.
An update to the 1996 film 'Twister', which centered on a pair of storm chasers who risk their lives in an attempt to test an experimental weather alert system.
A doctor finds a jungle laboratory, complete with mad scientist and genetic engineering experiments.
A bunch of kids go to the woods to party. At the same time a freak known as The Bunny Man has escaped from his nest...
An offbeat examination of Internet crime, shady partnerships, and well-deserved revenge, Chasing Eagle Rock asks the question: if they steal your identity, do you still know who you are?
The real-life adaptation of video game Mysterious Island Mençuna, in which ten children are invited to to the island to experience it.
A gang of young "black jackets", led by Frankie, opens a nightclub just above the hideout of a gangster named Morelli who is plotting the heist of the century: the theft of a priceless tiara.
A young mermaid gives up her life in the sea to love a human prince.
A writer goes on a quest of self-discovery as the present collides with the past.
The staff and students of St Bernadette's Primary School in Coventry audition for a place in a rock-musical competition.
One mans adventure turns to tragedy after an accident. Chased by unknown men he must do what he can to survive and escape his nightmare.
A crown prince doesn't want to marry a foreign princess, so he asks an actor to take his place.
Make room for ogre-sized family fun as the greatest fairy tale never told comes to life in a whole new way in this breathtaking Broadway musical adaptation of the hit movie Shrek!
A gang of idol smugglers plan to steal a hidden treasure in an ancient Hindu temple, that has mysterious secrets. What happens next ?
A story about a young singer and musician who hasn't been competing to work on his country
Dr. Thomas Bolton fights for the use of anesthetic in surgery and uses himself as a guinea pig, but soon finds himself addicted.
An airplane exposed to radiation lands, and blood drinking zombies emerge armed with knives, guns and teeth! They go on a rampage slicing, dicing, and biting their way across the Italian countryside.
Story about someone who committed suicide in 1986. A couple of friends go back in time to 1984 to prevent it happening.

Tobi lives with his grandfather in a humble little house, they keep collecting cardboard and thanks to the special talent of the child playing the harmonica. One day Tobi finds a magic book which speaks and tells his stories.

World War II is not over and the Nazis are researching a weapon far greater than the atomic bomb, investing in the ability to achieve time travel. An elite group tries to stop the Nazis from taking the technology back to the past.

The path that was open 30 years ago gets shut down and trespassers, who choose to travel along this path, are mysteriously found dead on the same night. The series of mysterious events are interwoven with an emotional backstory.
A bank clerk forges a check to help his girlfriend's father. He's found out, but instead of being arrested he becomes a member of a gang of forgers.
A military intelligence officer and a pretty reporter try to find a scientist whose inventions can destroy the world.

The Adventure Family was expecting a slower pace once they moved from LA to Tennessee in 2020. What they got instead was a classic 1980's adventure kick started by the discovery of a clue to a lost Civil War treasure in their own backyard.
Three twenty-somethings find themselves in an impossible time loop, where each day they awaken to the same terrifying day as the preceding one.
THE MAIN EVENT in a decade of Motion Pictures...A MOVIE you will never Forger.

In August 1937, Japanese troops occupied Shanghai. Three leaders in Shanghai go their separate ways: Jinrong Huang never sees other people; Xiaolin Zhang makes a great fortune and Yuesheng Du leaves for HongKong.
The adventurous journey of a prince to achieve a magical flower to bring back his father's vision.
Ramakant a righteous man takes a stand against a politician, a feared goon. Father-son duo defeat the ill-practices.
Adaptation of Eleven Days by Donald Harstad
A young woman's life unravels after she listens to a mysterious record that unleashes a terrifying curse.
Some mysterious events happen to a scientist in the mountain house where he lives.
A struggling artist in a small town becomes the prime suspect when his wife mysteriously disappears.
A private detective gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan, a performer whose amazing illusions captivate the world, but they are not really what everyone thinks.
A box of mysterious VHS tapes open up a nightmare world for a young executive.

Alok rejects a potential bride Ashwini as he feels she is too traditional for his liking. But when he is travelling to Goa by train, Ashwini happens to be his co-passenger. During the journey, Alok starts developing feelings for her.
A fugitive lives apart from society, in a swampy area, right in the jungle, with the company of his grandson.

Sara, the daughter of Oliver and Julia, suddenly disappears. Days pass without any news about the girl. But one morning, the family receives a letter from someone who claims to have Sara and wants to talk with them that night.

A young attorney cannot defend himself against accusations that he murdered his business partner, as he has no memory of the night it happened. A fraternity pin found at the scene of the crime becomes the key to solving the mystery.

column2: Ernest and Celestine: A Trip to Gibberitia
column3: Ernest and Célestine return to Ernest's country to have his broken violin repaired. They discover that music is banned throughout the country. They will attempt to right this injustice in order to bring joy back to bear country.
Children of Varnu Street whose fathers work in nearby factories face the "Tuliana Empire" - a group of boys, children of merchants from the nearby Lauku Street.

In the year 2084 humans have settled down on Mars and society is considered a utopia. However, there's a group of 4 friends and one of them dies under strange circumstances, something that, in theory, shouldn't happen.
When you marry for status be prepared for unsuspected consequences.

2 Danish teen brothers visit their grandpa on his old fishing boat and scuba dive. Some men hire an old minesweeper to find the sunk German sub U-461 from WW2 but the brothers find it. A lot of strange things start happening.
Manorama, wife of an irrigation minister, tasks Satyaveer to find if her husband is cheating. As Satyaveer starts investigating, he gets trapped in a web of lies and must uncover the entire truth.
Desperate to land a man on the moon before Russia does, NASA hastily preps a would-be spaceman for a mission that would leave him alone in a lunar shelter for a year.
A team of ghost hunters and paranormal researchers film a documentary about a haunted forest in rural India where many local villagers have been killed or gone missing.

Six college students are about to find out that one wrong turn into the darkness could lead to a collision course with a most terrifying local myth, with a thirst for destruction and a craving for tourists.

After the paralysis of his best friend a teenage boy (played by Marc Crealmann) takes the advice of his experienced teacher to take his friend to a special place outside the city of Edinburgh... a place of hope and fantasy.
THE PROTAGONIST'S AGILITY AND FEROCITY IN COMBAT EARN HIM THE MONICKER OF FOREST WOLF.
A Thriller Produced By Greg Ellis.

Twelve-year-old orphan Peter is spirited away to the magical world of Neverland, where he finds both fun and danger, and ultimately discovers his destiny: to become the hero who will be forever known as Peter Pan.
A mentally unstable elderly woman, recently released from a mental asylum, proceeds to slaughter all the guests staying at her motel.
La India Maria raises a kidnapped newborn and is chased down by criminals who want the boy.
A black cleaning lady in New York City is mysteriously transformed into a handsome, white, young man.

After being objectified by her husband, Leah Shaffer abandons her marriage and falls in to a destined kinship with a small cult bent on ending misogynistic culture and transcending to a place beyond the stars.

column2: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
column3: Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl from his dreams who can travel across multiverses, to battle multiple threats, including other-universe versions of himself, which threaten to wipe out millions across the multiverse. They seek help from Wanda the Scarlet Witch, Wong and others.
Based on the novel "The Ballad of the Belstone Fox", this heartwarming film chronicles the life of a fox much smarter than the dogs that hunt him. In fact, they never could catch him!
Untitled animation movie based on an original medieval legend
A Boy, a loss, and his green best friend.
High school student turns out to be personification of Lucifer. Two arch angels in human form (as women) take him on.
A scientist races the clock in an attempt to save Earth from a series of deadly meteor attacks.
A single mother, expert in black magic, is forced to use her powers when a prostitution ring kidnaps her daughter.
In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.
A chauffeur kidnaps his rich boss's dog to hold it for ransom, but when she accidentally gets the dog back, she thinks that it's the chauffeur who's been kidnapped.
Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.
A high school student, skillful in gymnastics, is seriously injured in a car accident. Her future will show which is stronger - dreams or reality.
Martin McGartland joins the I.R.A. and feeds information to Britain's Special Branch Agent Fergus.
After being wrongfully convicted for his boss' murder, Jamal 'Speed' Evans escapes from prison and travels back in time to vindicate his name.

When a struggling middle-age artist meets an unscrupulous insurance salesman and the scheme they cook up to better both of their lives goes seriously wrong, the artist's life will never be the same. Could this be the end of Art?
In the sharks' second adventure, a shark's refusal to return a glass of pesto leads to a terrorist crisis.
A man's heroic acts land him in the Indian army. He gets married and eventually reaches a high-ranking post. Unbeknownst to his wife and son, he was once an assassin linked to Sri Lankan terrorists.
In a world where the right of the stronger rules, a dwarf of all people brings the male regime of violence to collapse.
A mysterious box unleashes a force that causes its victims to be hunted down by their worst regrets. Based on the short film.

Tommy leaves his kittens out for Santa to take back to the North Pole, but after a major allergic reaction Santa can't deliver presents anymore, so the kittens have to deliver the rest of the presents to all the boys and girls.

column2: Low Road: The Life and Legacy of Donald Goines
column3: This biopic follows the life of iconic street literature novelist Donald Goines.
Two couples spend a weekend in the country, only to cross paths with a brutal serial killer. As the body count rises, suspicion spirals into paranoia, climaxing in a terrifying battle for survival.
Hornsby, a recently retired FBI agent goes to South America to find his old partner.

Cleric is the journey of a psychic enforcer named Samara, who comes out of a self-imposed retirement as a servant of the Ministry of Control to hunt down the Heretic, a genetically engineered terrorist.

Clara faces a horrifying past when she returns to the town where she grew up while experiencing a marriage crisis. Only a police officer could help her solve what is happening to her grandparents and the rest of the people from the place.
When a South African terrorist group takes local farmers hostage, Captain Caprivi puts together a unit to save the hostages and take out the bad guys.
After being killed by his wife and a scheming black magician, a man's ghost teams up with a rookie cop to get his revenge.

A lowly hospital orderly impersonates a recently deceased doctor and goes to work in the busy ER of a small hospital where he meets and befriends a nurse who slowly figures out his secret and helps him maintain his charade.

column2: De noche los gatos son pardos
column3: A crew is shooting a libertine costume film when Valentin, the director, suddenly disappears. While the local police investigate, the film shoot continues but takes an odd turn. Robin, the cameraman and director's lover, follows a promise.

Noel Niihashi and Ninny Spangcole are witch and protection agents for Wing Bind an organization for dragon conservation and management. Their mission is to protect and manage the dragons within London on behalf of the people.
Retired British general Brunswick reminisces about the days when he was a colonel in charge of a British Army battalion fighting against native rebels in colonial India during the late 1800s.
In London, a girl's wish to be reunited with her father causes Manhattan -- where her dad lives -- to break away from the U.S. and head toward England.
In an alternate universe where the wild west never ceased, a lone traveler happens upon a town facing the brunt of lawless creeds and political chaos.

column2: Arnold Fink and the Great Candy Adventure
column3: When Halloween lands on a Saturday, four twelve-year-old boys plan the ultimate day of trick-or-treating. The only problem is they'll have to contend with a group of rowdy teenagers bent on egging them and stealing their candy.
A troubled girl is convince that she is seen a ghost in her house. To prove that is real she start making a video diary and go ghost hunting.
Three young ad-men enter the woods for a photo shoot, but a girlfriend's mysterious disappearance sparks a harrowing descent into unreality.
Using a magic flying carpet and a handful of friends, the son of a murdered Caliph must fight the usurper in order to win the throne of the Caliphate.
After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.
A series of mysterious events and the pestering motor gang 'The Red Vampires' turns the idyllic holiday of Blinker and his friends into a thrilling adventure.
A coming of age story of a young teenage couple as they struggle with an unwanted pregnancy and the pressures it brings. Their decisions separately and jointly have severe and dramatic consequences.
A would-be actress uncovers horrifying files on other starlets.
A man named Wander attempts to bring a maiden who was sacrificed back to life by defeating a series of colossal stone creatures, so that a magical being named Dormin will revive her.
Follows a young woman who discovers that her boyfriend is sleeping with her cousin Helen, and goes to confront them at a dinner party, only to find out that Helen is dead and everybody is a suspect.

In Sakurada, Misora is a high school student who has the power to reset the world by 3 days and Kei is able to remember everything. Using their powers together, they can go back in time by 3 days and retain their memory.
Twin brothers are sent to an orphanage after the death of their parents. They are separated and don't meet for twenty years, only to discover they're on opposite sides of the law.

A Texan paranormal radio host attempts to protect a young orphan woman from an onslaught of deadly alien and psychic phenomena, only to discover the world of the paranormal might be far more sinister and cohesive.

column2: Live Like a Cop, Die Like a Man
column3: Fred and Tony are members of an elite 'special squad' of police in Rome, Italy, who are licenced-to-kill, undercover cops who thrive on living dangerously.
A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

column2: The Three Investigators and the Secret of Skeleton Island
column3: Three kid detectives go on an epic journey to eerie Skeleton Island. Once home to pirates, it's now plagued by a mysterious beast.

A troubled teenager falls victim to an online predator. Unable to cope with the trauma, Hannah Green becomes self destructive, and her parents make the heartbreaking decision to send her away to an alternative healing center in the wilderness.
The peasant Ahmet, who is left with wealth from his father, whom he does not know, will be in trouble with his money-like relatives.
A Chicagoan inherits an old yacht. He, his wife, daughter and son fly to a Caribbean island and hire a dubious Captain Ron to sail them on an adventure to Miami.

column2: ArchDemons: When the Devil Comes to Town
column3: The ArchHeroes face a threat from the Etherworld.

Secret Agent Ferguson, a member of ASIS, is sent on a mission to America to find Philip Kernan, a cross dressing arms dealer attempting to buy Yellow Cake U-235. Once there he teams up with an American Secret Agent, Francesca Balboni and together they work to complete the mission.

After being cursed into the Labyrinth with the Demigod Minotaur, Ariad sets out to remove the curse and claim title to the throne of Knossis, but finds her younger sister Raven and her mother, Queen Pasiphae, battling for the same throne.

A 12-year-old tech prodigy's science experiment goes awry and he forges a telepathic connection with his dog. The duo join forces and use their unique perspectives on life to comically overcome complications of family and school.
An alcoholic lawyer who successfully defended a notorious gambler on a murder charge objects when his free-spirited daughter becomes romantically involved with him.
Queen Vanestra turned Prince Colin, Maginos and Tilda into field mice who must race through a castle find Vanestra's weakness and defeat her.
A mad scientist named Dr. Dreadful leads a terrorist organization called the Hand of Pleasure.

On the brink of leaving for college, a high school senior gets into a car accident unearthing shocking secrets, including ties to a political family that could have profound implications for the future.
Too old grandpa is being celebity by news maker who came from centre. But then he recollected something weird things about his missus .
Anderssonskans Kalle is the horror of the neighborhood due to his mischief.
A Love story that can never happen between a human girl and a Vampire.
A tale of family, loss and reunion, mystically linking the Famine times in Ireland to the present day.
Ladybug and Cat Noir Awakening, is an upcoming animated musical film based on Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir.
A young Filipino man seeks vengeance against an American bounty hunter through the dreams and memories of his ancestors from the Philippine-American War.
A young woman with psychic powers is obsessed with having a child. Even though she is unable to conceive, her desire to do so creates a supernatural force determined to fulfill her wishes.
A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.
At a wealthy family estate, extortionists go after their matriarch and her inheritance while a ghost and and ax-wielding figure lurk in the shadows.
After serving a brutal tour of duty, veteran soldier Thomas Conrad is looking forward to a peaceful life at home with his family. But a drug cartel's ruthless enforcer has other plans for him.

Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.
An evil millionaire named Artigas plans to use a super-explosive device to conquer the world from his headquarters inside an enormous volcano.
A comedy set in a traditional neighborhood where a young mechanic working in a workshop falls in love with an engineering student and tries to get close to her but fails.

Santo is called by Interpol to investigate the mysterious disappearance of two scientists in Latin America. As soon as he starts his work, there is a failed attempt on his life by a strange voodoo girl, Dejanira...
Elegant martial arts action contrasts with brutal violence in this deadly dance of morality and greed.
When an anxiety-ridden photographer dies from malaria, she has to race against time to escape from the grotesque beings in order to come back to life.

column2: Persona 3 the Movie: #4 Winter of Rebirth
column3: The season changes to winter. Makoto makes a decision in order to greet the spring that is waiting beyond.
The Oldest Profession: Hookers versus Vampires For two thousand years ladies of the evening have been keeping the world safe by battling vampires in the dark corners of the night.

Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime side by side in Metropolis. However, Krypto must master his own powers for a rescue mission when Superman is kidnapped.
The pupils of Castle Schreckenstein and Castle Rosenfels look for a solution to forestall the sale of Castle Schreckenstein due to debts.
Camp Wcabaca, a rehabilitation center for troubled youth has just added a new member to the staff: The Lunch Lady. Things begin to go downhill as she begins murdering students that break her rules.
Fresh out of a spell in prison a man attempts to set his life right by working a mysterious job that requires him to seek out life forms hidden amongst us.
Joe Shepard is a man who lost everything and now a special interest of the US government.

In this sequel to "Black God, White Devil", Antonio das Mortes must return back to action after killing the last of the Cangaceiros 29 years ago, when a new outlaw appears, who will eventually reveal as an idealist and mark him profoundly.
Best friends Chris and Vijay are trapped in a quarantine house by a deceptive doctor, and must do whatever they can to escape with their lives, overcoming a system that seems stacked against them.

A billionaire in real estate uses his hypnotic powers to seduce women in his company and others, then makes them commit suicide. A nosy reporter's friend is one of the victims, now she's willing to do anything to get her vengeance.
A lackadaisical handyman and aspiring novelist tries to support his younger girlfriend as she slowly succumbs to madness.

Six separate episodes: would-be suicides discuss their despair. A provincial dance hall. An investigative reporter posing as a husband-to-be. A young unwed mother. Girl-watching techniques of Italian men. A glimpse into prostitution.

The fate of the world is threatened by seemingly monstrous entities known as Angels. NERV is an organisation set up to counter this threat and it is up to young pilots to protect Earth but exactly what are the real motives behind NERV?

Vittoria lives in the suburbs with her son Salvatore, a great fan of superheroes stories, who shapes the harsh reality that surrounds them by imagining himself as part of the adventures of Astroman, the idol of his favorite web series.
A debt-ridden circus is saved by a well-meaning but inept publicity man.
Adapted from a J.B. Priestley play with many of the original actors. The tale of various people who have come to live in an "ideal" city and their hopes and reasons for doing so.

After a nearly fatal car accident, a nightclub singer and a rich man fall madly in love with each other, unbeknownst to them, that both his haughty mother and his arrogant fiancée are bent on separating them. Can they keep them apart?
The complete "Ramayana" epic covering Rama's birth, marriage to Sita, 14 years in exile, separation from Sita, victory over Ravana and coronation.
A story of a young man's quest to avenge the death of his older brother.
A Gripping Nightmarish Journey in Broad Daylight which revolves around 9 BRAINS, 9 CRIMES in 9 HOURS..!.

Helen Ware has just been given shocking news that changes her outlook on Love, Life and Relationship forever. See how she's forced to accept her new reality and how she embarks on a journey of love that is quite unorthodox.
Real Haunts is a documentary film that explores 5 famous haunted hot spots with 3 ghost hunting teams.
This video-log tells of a dude named "Adam" who follows a white rabbit into a fantasy world of visual nonsense & peculiar characters.
Features five French innovative and "shocking" shorts, produced and directed by the new generation of Gallic cinema: "Patiente 69"; "Teen Funkle Paradise"; "Propriété commune"; "Nue"; and "Bom".
Hundreds of dinosaurs created by a biotech firm escape into Los Angeles, and wreak havoc on the city.
Count Brankovan, a vampire, returns from the dead to avenge himself himself on some humans who previously had been bugging him.
As a worldwide drought sweeps the globe, a father must embark on an obsessive quest through the impassable desert to return his daughter home and reunite the family.
4 (four) characters take turns experiencing scary events when they are alone. The terror of these spirits that spread fear, panic, and hysteria just came unexpectedly.

In the summer of 1967, on a remote sheep farm in the Scottish Highlands, the lives of a grieving boy, his lonely Aunt and dour Uncle are touched by magic when a stranger appears who is not only a US Marine, but a Native American Indian.
After being jailed for arson, a member of a neighborhood watch becomes the center knowledge in a mystery to find a murderous terrorist group.
An outer-space story influenced by Moby-Dick.

column2: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
column3: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
Through a series of circumstances, a pair of Old West gunfighters end up as fighter pilots in World War I.

column2: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
column3: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.
The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.
Law student join forces with a nun to fight for better life conditions for the population of a small Northeast Brazilian town, exploited by local powerful people.

column2: Karusu: A Sicilian Tale - Part I
column3: A young boy watches his family argue after the local mafia offers to buy their farmland. When the conflict turns fatal, he discovers the thirst for money that destroyed his family and the power of revenge that will make things right.
A mother finds out that her daughter not only has a new relationship with a Cuban, but is also getting married in Cuba. She wants to put a stop to the doomed marriage, and takes the first plane.
Parents of first cousins, Sujatha and Raghu, decide that they will get the children married to each other on becoming adults. But Raghu becomes a troublesome character as he grows up.
Pro Beach Volleyball star, Kelly Reyes, faces challenges everyday, fierce competitors, the press, but nothing could prepare her for him.
Two real life dacoits of Chambal, Mohar Singh and Madho Singh starred in this film.
A zombie paired up with a human on SWAT investigate a domestic disturbance where one wife is threatening to cut off the other wife's boob for cheating.
A rogue soldier turned outlaw is thrust into a fight with a dirty sheriff and the cartel he works for to protect his niece and sister.
In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Fun Down There follows a week in the life of Buddy, a naif who arrives in Manhattan ready to fall in love. The film's dry lends itself to a refreshingly casual quality about the sex scenes-plus there's a happy ending.

An unsatisfied woman in her late 30s dreams about stealing the big cash and leaving the country. She meets a petty criminal ten years her junior who has the thing for her, and she asks herself is he the only true love of her life.
Three rich trustees are murdered - appearing as suicides. When a bus filled with orphans and three other rich trustees has an "accident," Colonel Bingham investigates.
An eccentric scientist helps a fugitive from the law become invisible, unwittingly giving him the power to exact revenge on his former friends.
A morally bankrupt defense attorney suffers a nervous breakdown and begins to see visions of a dead client. At the same time, people associated with that case start turning up dead.

As a young autistic girl uncovers her own unique powers as a chess prodigy she must battle her way past male Grandmasters in the misogynistic world of competitive chess and achieve the title of youngest ever World Champion.
The lives of a group of teenagers are turned upside down when their town is taken over by sinister forces.
An introspective young girl falls for the new boy in class, an outcast who is also a hemophiliac.
When a good trip turns bad.
Two identical sisters play identity switch during Christmas party, finding out more about their family and themselves before the night ends.
When Nicole comes in contact with Father Anton (Corneliu Ulici) more and more inexplicable events occur. The pair begin to believe that the priest lost the battle with a demon.
After botching a kidnapping, two criminals hide with their victim in a friends house in the jungle. After one of them rapes the friend's wife, they're left to be eaten by a nearby cannibal tribe.
Siblings Dylan and Andrea set off with their new friends on a marvelous journey of discovery in search of long lost pirate loot.
A janitor, a bus driver, and a gardener become instant basketball players because of a magical ball.
Two girls thrown together by their boyfriends' violence accidentally kill one of them.
When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.
A maniacal leader trains assassins to become more efficient killing machines through virtual reality. A Federal Service Agent is assigned to infiltrate the mysterious academy.

Thierry's wife Zandalee married the poet he once was. Taking over his dad's company in New Orleans gives him stress and impotence. Thierry meets his high school buddy Johnny at a bachelor party. The painter Johnny can satisfy Zandalee.
Prequel film of UN-GO telling the encounter of Shinjuurou and Inga.
While four men blow up a safe, a night watchman is accidentally killed. They get away with the loot. Ten years later, the stepson of the dead night watchman receives vital information.
A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.
Plot kept under wraps.

In a small village in rural China, whenever the sound of a crow is heard at night, someone dies. After his wife succumbs to this mysterious curse, Ji-ryang sets out to battle the supernatural and defeat a restless spirit.
A group of young friends make a spaceship and encounter what they believe is an extra terrestrial.
A boy fell in love with a girl that he never saw before. Both of them are trying their best to meet each other. But it was not that easy.

A mysterious killer known only as The Dragonfly is on the prowl for the next victim. As detectives desperately try to track down the cold blooded killer, they make one fatal error; assuming the killer is a man.
Campfire dead by dawn is an Adaptation based on Devon Commons short story that tells a story of six friends that goes on a deadly camp trip in the dark woods.

Jaded Carla drugs her stuck up aunt and her daughter with mind-altering aphrodisiac concocted from a rose by an ominous Pan sex cult. The women become crazed nymphos and the only way to cure them is for Carla to give herself to "Pan".
In a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by an extraterrestrial catastrophe of unprecedented proportions, one man, Marshall Adams struggles to cope with his new found life when an unknown visitor arrives.
Korea's first nuclear submarine and a crew with no record of existence embark on a do-or-die mission into the deep waters of the Pacific.
When city girl Gabriela spontaneously enters a contest and wins a rustic New Zealand inn, she teams up with bighearted contractor Jake Taylor to fix and flip it.
When her child is diagnosed with a rare genetic disease, a determined mother vows to give her child the best life possible with the support of her family, whatever it takes.
Reporter Steve Haines (Boyd), on the trail of a business tycoon, follows his subject onto an ocean liner and gets wound up in a cruise full of intrigue, romance and murder.
Based on a true story. An unassuming small-town homemaker teams up with an untested lawyer to save her family from the billion-dollar coal destroying their health and local natural resources.

In this final installment of the Blind Dead series, a doctor and his wife move to a small inhospitable coastal village where he plans to start a practice only to discover that undead demon-worshiping Templar Knights haunt the place.

A second generation Pakistani-American arrives in his family's ancestral town, to discover his place in the world and confronts a beautiful historic culture rife with deeply ingrained gender inequality and subjugation of women.
Two years after their loved ones were murdered in obsessive rage, the survivors are dragged into a horrific psychological breakdown - and blood soaked plan for revenge.
A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.
A young bride's marital bliss is replaced by shades of suspicion when she suspects that her husband is trying to starve his young son to death in order to claim an inheritance the boy is entitled to.

A serial killer is murdering victims in a most unusual way, and you may die laughing before the next victim is found. The body count rises as our hero battles a crime syndicate, government intelligence agency and international terrorists.
During the First World War, many Turks were martyred in Yemen. Against the Lawrence and Sheikh Faisal alliance, Turkish soldiers will try to defend Medina and protect the holy land.
A distressed family man finds unexpected solace in his predicament of randomly teleporting around the world, leaving his wife to provide for their small daughter.
Now out of school for the summer, three young lads' boring day soon become an adventurous one that includes a runaway lawnmower, a bumbling bully and much more.

12-year-old Mariana and her stepbrother Marcus end up after a fight on board a home-built rocket. Behind the rocket construction are Albert, a slightly crazy scientist, and his helper Lemming, a talking lemming.

A change of pace for social realist Le Chanois, a swashbuckler: French Robin Hood figure Mandrin (later a hero of the Paris Commune) leads a smuggling gang against financial restrictions under Louis XV.

General Ruarte has designs on Paco's fianceè Zaira. Paco often dreams of being Zorro and his two servants think of exploiting the situation: they give him sleeping pills which transform him into the undefeatable hero.
Sethu is an unemployed youth, struggling to get a job. However, when a spate of robberies take place in the neighborhood, his friend poses him as a Nepali to get a job as a security guard.

A Viking clan from Newfoundland sails further into the unknown in order to escape their enemies and a hostile environment when the ship is tossed onto the shores of a desolate island populated with horrific creatures.

Ulla is a sensitive and principled 10th-grader in a small East German town. When Winfried falls in love with her, he adopts her passion for protecting the environment. Ulla tries to stop illegal trout farm and gets her classmates involved.
On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

Stones of power are given to chosen fighters trained by a master in order to overthrow the master's plan to destroy humanity. The fighters do not necessarily get along even as the world heads toward peril.
In 1945 a group of victorious American officers discover a stash of German jewels and try to fence them in New York.

The 2 hour horror satire is about a Swamp-Monster, witch appears again in a crazy city. The leading actress is a TV-reporter who finds herself in a frustrating job with mobbing colleagues and a mad camera guy.
There once lived on our planet a race of people who could travel through time and space with a thought.
An old woman gets attached to a robot dog with uncertain intentions.
A charming guy attempts to pick up a woman in a bar by spinning a tale involving spies, implanted microchips and the dangerous military scientist hunting him.

When college professor, Peter Proud begins experiencing flashbacks of an earlier life, he's mysteriously drawn to a place he's never been to, but which seems familiar and where he soon finds his previous incarnation's wife.

When Paravart Iamn finds his brother's corpse in an inexplicable state, his seemingly average life turns sideways. As he tries to understand exactly what has happened, something incomprehensible and reality bending transpires.
Follow Little Hakka as she deploys her magic "Hakka Hat" to battle the evil forces intent on destroying nature in this beautifully animated adventure for children.

The impossible comes to reality, after two years of experimentation. Now comes - THE UNUSUAL - THE FANTASTIC - THE EXTRAORDINARY - THE EXCEPTIONAL - THE EXPLOSIVE - ADVENTRURES OF THE HEADLESS BANDIT.

Desperation and debt causes a man to kidnap a little girl for her ransom. It is a bold and dangerous move, but does he have what it takes to see it through to the end? Does he have it in him to do the unthinkable if necessary?
A man, taken and locked up for 14 years without any sane reason, is suddenly released, and has 4 days to figure out why this was done to him.

What happens when you're attacked by something, but no one believes you? Ben, Melissa, Darnell, and Courtney are about to find out. One by one, it seems something is out to turn their fears into reality.

column2: The Bowery Boys Meet the Monsters
column3: Slip, Sach and the rest of the Bowery Boys enter a haunted house, where they engage in slapstick with the Gravesend Family which has one Creepy Butler, 2 Mad Scientists a crazy old woman with a Man eating Plant a Savage Gorilla, an 8 foot tall Robot and a Vampiress.
In 1980s Times Square, a female serial killer meets her match in the form of a brilliant but troubled young prostitute.

When the biggest player in British cyber-crime faces destruction by some deadly serious Islamic extremists, he knows it's time to settle old scores and play the biggest scam of his life - before bailing out fast.

Gandharwa is a unique story of a person who met with a incident which have changed his life and lost his identity . His Fight with Himself is great. They are much more surprising elements in Gandharwa.
Television host and self-proclaimed economist David Johnson deals with paranormal interference following a series of chronic depressive episodes, horrifyingly altering life around him.

In France, opera star Enrico Baroni has tired of his mistress Pompom. After a performance, Enrico goes to a cabaret with his manager, Muldoni, and some friends. When Pompom arrives, Enrico ...                See full synopsis »

Claire Lescot is a famous first lady. All men want to be loved by her and among them is the young scientist Einar Norsen. When she mocks at him, he leaves her house with the declared intention to kill himself.
Shivan and Chellan are friends and due to misunderstandings, they turn against each other and jeopardize each other's lives.
A murdered detective must avenge his murder after he is reincarnated as a dog.

column2: Winnie the Pooh: A Very Merry Pooh Year
column3: Ring in the season with Winnie The Pooh in a holiday adventure.
Beelzebub, a powerful demon hellbent to possess and consume souls, goes after siblings and their lifelong friends at a rundown country house.

column2: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
column3: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.
A couple plots a daring escape from slavery which involves the wife posing as a white man and her husband posing as her servant.

Anthony Zimmer was a big money launderer. The police wants him, but he has changed his face and voice. His old Russian clients want him dead. His ex is told to socialize with a random man on the train Paris to Nice.
During a heist in Russia, a professional thief finds himself dealing with serial killers, insane hostages, double-crossing psycho Russian hardmen and the real possibility of a horrible death.
Sitadevi's life turns upside down when her husband dies in an accident. To add to her sorrow, one of her sons is separated from her and grows up to be a criminal.
A young avid skateboarder uncovers a government conspiracy while investigating his adoptive brother's mysterious death.
A story about making the choice between the ultimate dream for oneself or the ultimate sacrifice for the sake of many.
An eloping bride is taken into Hell, and her fiancé must pursue.
When a friend's suicide leaves behind a mysterious computer drive, a fringe hacker and an accomplished computer technician come together to decipher the message left in his wake.

The modern-day Robin Hood collects greasy money from jeepney drivers on behalf of the criminal syndicate. He then gets a meager amount in return which he uses to feed his adoptive parents who he loves dearly.
A loner artist with a history of abuse meets a beautiful woman who takes an interest in his life and work; leading to a chilling path of tragedy.
A young journalist named Jin Maddison has traced the origin of many Christmas traditions to a remote town in the Midwest called Selah, where the holiday holds a much darker, more disturbing meaning.
When a contract killer and a thief discover they share the same lover they vow to eliminate the other.
Karel Zeman's brilliant animation, cowritten with Jurácek: ironic, surreal, following the adventures of a plowboy and a mercenary to the battlefields of the Thirty Years War.

The director of a famous theater in 1930s Bucharest and his Jewish dramatist are preparing a show designed to satirize the fascist (legionnaire) movement, but the legionnaires are determined to stop the spectacle by any means.
On the morning he is set to star in a career-changing blockbuster film, an Irish actor trying to live down his rocky past confronts a series of devastating events that threaten his sobriety.
Józef visits his dying father at a remote mental institution, where time itself doesn't seem to exist, and the line between dreams and memories becomes indistinguishable.
A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

A drug deal goes bad, leaving bodies. A sheriff shoots his deputy for the money and a wounded amnesiac shoots the sheriff and escapes with $3,000,000. DEA investigates as does the drug lord dad of the dead deputy.
When their attractive cousin Elvira starts a relationship with their middle-aged father don Pepe, beautiful sisters Flor and María make plans to prevent the impending marriage.

column2: Kyonyû doragon: Onsen zonbi vs sutorippâ 5
column3: Lena Jodo works at an unsuccessful strip club called Paradise Ikagawa along with his five female co-workers. But everything changes when they summon an army of zombies by accident. Now they are the only ones who can save the world.
7 Kids train hard to defend the legendary Footballfield of the wild guys to Fat Michi and the Galactic Footballers.

15 years ago, the Super Task Force Six were shut down in secret by The evil Emperor Zagel. Since then, he has been working on a super weapon powered by all six armors. A former Enforcer smuggles a super suit to an unprepared Jason!

Based on true events, a man is dealt with a bad hand in life. Anger and bitterness gravitate dark forces that taunt him. Would he get the chance to redeem himself and overcome his darkness before it's too late.
Velma is a down and out waitress who loves to sing. She learns that she must raise $50,000 to save the bar she loves. With loan sharks at her door, will she save her legacy?
Navendu toils hard to support his joint family and keep it together. However, their familial bond gets threatened when his younger brother marries a woman who insists on living separately.
Shunned by elite society as a member of the gig economy, a dog walker infiltrates an exclusive L.A. community with designs of reaching the top of the neighborhood's social ladder.
Four Stories.
With just 6 days to the end of school, Something was beginning to boil in Suburbia.
A young female artist with a vivid imagination takes on a boring work experience job only to come up with an idea that may change the world.

In the midst of a meteorological phenomenon, Nina returns to her unfamiliar childhood home. Discovering an incriminating package in an old mattress, she is forced to confront uncomfortable truths from her mother's past.
Two contract killers are hired by competing cartels to hunt down an elusive drug scientist. The scientist escapes, leading to a globetrotting chase and fight for survival.
A secret agent is assigned to capture a criminal gang that is threatening to destroy Earth with a death ray.

During a night of partying, a normal group of friends get in trouble with Aunt Marilyn, a mobster and the owner of a well-known club in Santiago. To come out of the mess, the friends will go from expert boozers to fledgling gunslingers.

column2: Kamen Rider Wizard in Magic Land
column3: A rainbow-colored tornado takes Haruto and Koyomi to an alternate reality called "Magic Land" where anyone has an ability to use magic, and some of them can even transform into a Kamen Rider Mage.
Tells the story of a divinity decision maker in historical observance battle with evil.
While investigating a crime syndicate, a dedicated cop crosses path with a mute vagrant who turns out to be an undercover agent that would eventually help him with his fight agaist it.
The adventures of a brave young boy who travels from planet to planet in a determined quest to avenge his mother's death.

It's a tradition that on the first birthday of every horse they can choose what they want to be in life. What happens when a young horses birthday wish come true is a magical adventure of friendship and trust between human and animal.
The plot is under wraps.
A 11 year old disabled girl, routinely pimped out by her prostitute mother, is saved by a suicidal cab driver. Together they go on a journey of redemption that forever changes their lives.

The Greek pirate who turned businessman, Ioannis Varvakis, made his fortune selling caviar in Russia and all over the world. Varvakis strives all his life for freedom for himself and then for his country.
One of the world's deadliest assassins is forced to team up with her teenage daughter's boyfriend.
A tortured and raped young girl mutates into a penis-headed demon and mutilates her captors.

After Tim, a crypto currency trader loses his life's savings after an insider tip goes wrong. Tim meets Juan Jones a local Miami shylock who takes Tim for a ride through the streets of Miami for a night of corruption, and self-discovery.

Mac a faded boxer and former contender for the world champion title is now a door to door salesman, He makes just enough money to raise his little daughter Sofia, A young filmmaker challenge him to make a come back and fight for the title.

column2: Darkness on the Edge of Town
column3: After a deadly encounter with his Russian half-brother, Nick Salt must find St. Stephen's golden shotgun and avenge his friends.
Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.
Persephone is the harbinger of the unknown her return to normalcy from death foreshadows the horrors of daily routine.

Two worlds come together but to see the Little People, you must believe. An enchanting and magical world where dark forces lurk and danger is everywhere. Based upon the upcoming book, Little People, coming out at the end of the year.
Story based on the true ATM incident (attempt to murder) that frightened Bangalore city. The search of the criminal is completely fictional from the Director's eye.
The Bowery Boys investigate a murder, and all the evidence points to the involvement of the notorious Loop gang.
Peanut butter is the secret ingredient for magic potions made by two friendly ghosts. Eleven-year-old Michael loses all of his hair when he gets a fright and uses the potion to get his hair back.
Jeremy Stanton (Cain), an ordinary man, makes an extraordinary mistake.
A defense attorney begins to suspect that there might be more to her client, who is charged with the murders of a vacationing family, than meets the eye.
A real estate broker tries to sell a theater which is haunted by a ghost.
This film is made based on the real stories that took place at an abandoned house in Johor called Villa Nabila.
Follows Ember and Wade, in a city where fire-, water-, land- and air-residents live together.
A debt collector gets involved in a dangerous situation when a corrupt businessman he retrieved 100,000 dollars for doesn't want to pay him his usual percentage for his services.

column2: La vida difícil de una mujer fácil
column3: Durante el velorio de la prostituta Violeta varios hombres recuerdan cómo fueron ayudados por ella.

In 1993, in Hollywood, California, a decadent ventriloquist overdoses and dies, leaving her two children to be sent to a foster house with their dummy. Their lives become a nightmare of abuse and murder, to be avenged by a wrathful dummy.
A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.

The 12 year old driving enthusiast Gabriel is frustrated with his grandparents and decides to go across Poland with a comrade to find the father who left him as young. A subtle, cheerful, and touching story of friendship and love.
An avionics engineer is shortlisted to join one of the first expeditions to Mars. Now, he has to break the news to his wife and children that this will be a one way trip.

column2: The Subtle Caricature of the Would Be Assassin
column3: In this wild absurdist comedy, a seemingly amnesiac man wakes up on the beach and gets caught up in a number of events with various characters in a quasi-fictitious world.
Jesse 01776 and Sonja 01984 team up in rebellion against the self-proclaimed Boss of America and his soulless goons and thugs, embarking on a bloodthirsty adventure of romance and revenge.
24 year old Polly Marie Davis spent 186 days in the clutches of a madman. Her body was battered and broken but her will to survive never wavered.
A film about a party that turns sinister. When Lennard and Isaak get invited to a party, things turn out worse than they ever could've imagined.
The captivating story of Sweden's greatest judicial scandal ever, about one man who sacrificed everything in his hunt for the truth.
After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.
Angels and demons gather together, determined to wake up their god before the arrival of the second flood.

Tao is a ruthless loan shark, whose brother, Fu Sai Hang, is the captain of the local police. When the mob kills Tao, his brother comes for revenge. Aided by his sister's daughter, Hor-Yee (Joey Wang) to bring down the mob to justice.
Javier wants to forget his ex. But it's impossible when she's always online. Getting drunk and partying it's the only solution. Or not?
An amnesiac woman falls for the man who rescued her from a hit-and-run accident.

column2: Dracula Has Risen from the Grave
column3: When Castle Dracula is exorcised by the Monsignor, it accidentally brings the Count back from the dead. Dracula follows the Monsignor back to his hometown, preying on the holy man's beautiful niece and her friends.
A group of friends get together for a murder mystery party, but things take a dark turn when one hijacks the evening and is out for blood.
A young diplomatic courier discovers he's carrying stolen plans for an attack on America.
Part of a mystical moon rock resurrects a vengeful soul to go to war with a cult and their woman-hating leader in the backwoods of Tennessee.
An anti-Hollywood film, that explores what really happens to people in their family life when they are forced to deal with death, betrayal, and each other.
Unable to find a job, Karunakaran decides to work as a henchman for a gangster. But he is forced to fight against his own gang when they hatch a plan to kill his lover Nisha and her parents.

The Human Glitch is a film about a young adult called Ethan Henderson who finds a computer in a junkyard which still works so he takes it home and that is when hell starts for Ethan and his friends can they escape before it's too late?
An inventor spurns his city life and moves his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.
The murder of a young woman in London exposes deep racial tensions and prejudices inherent in the area.
The adventures of Golden Retriever pup Napoleon and his friend, the parrot Birdo Lucci.
A little kid shrinks himself so that he can travel into the body of his grandfather. Here he has to kill the kidney-stone his grandfather is suffering from.
