A math teacher in Atlanta, USA is scandalized when he looks to get funding for his school by altering his students' test scores.
An anthology of three loosely connected occult tales, with ironic and romantic twists.
WITH THE AID OF HIS SEVEN DEADLY WEAPONS, A MAN SINGLE-HANDEDLY FIGHTS HIS NEMESIS.
Luigi is engaged to a rich bourgeois, but unexpectedly his cousin Sonia comes back to Italy. She is very young and beautiful and once she loved Luigi. What is he to do?
When he finds a shark that can travel on land residing in his home, an ex-cop enlists the help of a grizzled former real estate agent, and an eccentric "house shark" expert to kill the beast.
Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
David Hilton is a mythological research expert. When his friend, Dr Kixley, is kidnapped by dangerous Satanists, David is called on by the Vatican to help save Dr Kixley from an evil end.

For fear of condemning his compatriots to certain death by the hand of the Turkish oppressors, a proud Cretan returns to the blood-stained ancestral grounds under a new name. Will the Eagle of the Enslaved ignite the spark of rebellion?
Two desperate men find themselves unwitting pawns in an ancient ritual.
A series of incidents involving aircrafts belonging to NATO nations indicates a systematic sabotage.
Young warrior Fangbone returns to Skullbania to find themselves out of his villain, Venomous Drool.

column2: 'Rameau's Nephew' by Diderot (Thanx to Dennis Young) by Wilma Schoen (1974)
column3: Snow's ambitious attempt at exploring the formal intricacies and artificialities of the sound cinema.
The story of prophet "Muhammad" and the delivery of the message of God "Allah."
A mad scientist teams with an evil, disfigured woman to kidnap and operate on young women to make her look beautiful again.

A flight attendant and her business partner on a mission to steal diamonds and free themselves from the clutches of a loan shark.At 40,000 feet in the air, the heist goes horribly wrong and turns into a hostage situation.

An atomic bomb falls in Siberia and the USA is blamed. Cold War panic turns to chaos, martial law is declared and the US Constitution suspended. Survivalist John Tillman must save his family from roaming gangs and a corrupt army unit.
A widower looks to travel back in time to solve a matter with his wife and he learns she has left him her fortune.

Based on an acclaimed graphic novel, Mars & Avril is set in Montreal of the future, at the dawn of the first human landing on Mars, and tells the story of a musician who becomes obsessed with his muse.
A scientific expedition in Africa investigates wasps that have been exposed to radiation and mutated into giant, killing monsters.

column2: Dino Mecard the Movie: The Tinysaur Island
column3: Yong-chan and his friends embark on a big adventure to save tiny dinosaurs from greedy villains overtaking their peaceful island home.
Action-packed female protagonist undisclosed storyline.
Plot kept under wraps.

column2: Leave Me Where You Found Me
column3: A destitute loner struggles to find solace after his unplanned pregnancy with an Ivy-bound scholar is terminated.
The last words uttered by by a conscience-stricken crook dying on the Saint's doorstep lead the detective in pursuit of gold smugglers and the master crook known as the Tiger.

A psychological thriller about two girls. Aubrey, whose life and mind is falling apart and Rachel, whose life seems to skip like a CD player. As the two clash and begin to intertwine they learn each other's fate is in the other's hand.
A group of people with different backgrounds and behaviors discover their belonging to a hidden civilization of deities called Orishas.
An emotionally remote recovering alcoholic and his dowdy, unambitious wife face a personal crisis when they take in an attractive lodger.
In 1934, an English widow moves to Widows' Peak, Ireland. She befriends other widows and the son of one. Hostility escalates between her and an Irish spinster.
A college student joins a group of friends on vacation and returns as the only survivor of a deadly massacre.
Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.
A high school teacher from a troubled inner city Washington D.C. neighborhood becomes a super-powered hero and takes on the gang that has been terrorizing his streets.
Two teens battle their way through a religious apocalypse on a mission to defeat the Antichrist.
Sinbad and his shipmates aid a young prince, who must battle an evil wizard to gain the hand of a beautiful princess.
Four star witnesses are placed into witness protection before realizing that their biggest threat isn't the Mexican Drug Cartel, but each other.
Based on the Mario Mendoza's book and inspired by true events, tells three interconnected stories happening in the eve of the infamous Pozzetto Massacre.
A cursed survivor of killings at the Amityville House brings evil to a small island where bizarre genetic experiments are carried out on humans and animals in a secret women's prison.
Pee-wee Herman is now a small-town farmer with a fiancée, but when a traveling circus comes to town, he finds himself falling for the trapeze artist.

Ariel and Rocío, two kids mistreated by their grandmother, flee from home in order to meet their mother, who is working in another country. The kids face menacing challenges and drift through several countries to find her.
A fugitive is having plastic surgery to hide his identity, while committing another crime.
Picking up where the original series left off, Scott Bernard continues his search for Rick Hunter and the fate of the SDF-3.
A selfish young woman threatens to close her family's diner for the first time ever on Christmas Day, prompting a visit from a feisty guardian angel determined to protect a holiday tradition.

After humanity is frozen in time, Teddy and his ex-girlfriend Leyna seem to be the only people who are unaffected. They search for the cause of the freeze and confront the issues from their relationship.

In a surreal universe where bananas shoot laser beams and soup cans are used as grenades, a wacky cast of gangsters are thrown into a deadly game against one another in order to claim a mystical longboard.

Ma-Lai accidentally found out that his dog, Guai-Guai which died in an accident started coming back home for dinner. Day after day, Ma-Lai started to suspect that there is something mysterious at home that brings the dead alive...

A young group of avid documentary film makers are sent to shoot in the vast extremes of the South Australian wilderness. They end up in a place called Nowhere Else. What transpires there is devastatingly, like nothing else on Earth.

column2: The Further Adventures of Anse and Bhule in No-man's Land
column3: The Further Adventures of Anse and Bhule is a post-apocalyptic, love story following a cult of men as they discover women from a dueling tribe, shattering and transforming each others fears, beliefs and cultures forever.
Zoe is a post-apocalyptic thriller that tells the tale of BULL who is a weathered survivor in a world that has forgotten not only it's past but the unique sensibilities that give humanity purpose.

Assigned the easy task of assassinating a couple in a hotel room, instead, a hardened contract killer finds himself fighting for his life in a maze-like place crammed with demonic henchmen. Can he escape from the nightmarish Hotel Inferno?

A young Japanese boy climbs a mountain in search of a magic wizard. The youth finds the wizard, and is tutored by him. Reinforced with magic powers, the boy eventually fights and defeats the evil witches of down under.
Murder during film shoot sparks search for a killer.

The true story of a young man falsely accused of rape and sentenced to six years in a maximum security prison. He must rely on survival skills and an unlikely bond with an infamous inmate to prove his innocence and regain his freedom.

After the death of his father, a boy growing up on a lunar mining colony takes a trip to explore a legendary crater, along with his four best friends, prior to being permanently relocated to another planet.

In a dystopian world, a bounty hunter sets out to capture a ruthless band of outlaws who have kidnapped an important father and daughter through a world of multiverses. Unbeknownst to the Outlaws and the Bounty Hunter is that another, more powerful man known only as The Finisher has plans of his own.
A presidential bodyguard is assigned to protect an objecting first lady, as repeated attempts are made on her life.
A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.
A public relations man for a movie studio uses an early form of television to help solve a murder.
Good trumps evil when dealt with revenge.
"Trapped Magic: The Broken Blade" is the feature-length adaptation to the 2016 short fantasy movie "Trapped Magic."
After years of research, the doctor finally succeeds in creating the perfect woman, who gets the name "Eva".

column2: Untitled David S. Goyer Supernatural Thriller Project
column3: Plot undisclosed.
A man with a dark past hitches a ride that turns into a road trip to hell and leads him to the revelation of a family secret of biblical proportions.
After her father's murder at the hands of the Golden Knight organization, Yu Fei-Hsia is accused of killing a clan member in vengeance. To prove her innocence she has to track down the real killer.
Action drama about a gangster before the Second World War.

A major crime occurs in Tokyo when detectives Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to investigate the crime. A battle between the strongest detectives in Asia is about to break out with bursts of laughter.
In a post-apocalyptic future, a masked vigilante searches for his parents while outrunning a relentless arms dealer bent on destroying him.
A person who had usurped the identity of a famous writer of detective stories was killed in the train. Why and by whom?

Three adolescent brothers form an innocent fraternity which grows and morphs into an evil global society threatening the existence of a nation. Revealing the society will save their lives, keeping it secret will save a nation.
Circuit crashes on a hostile planet with no memory. He must find his way back to the Orbitor Space Station to complete his mission. Will he make it or be deleted in the process?
A crook on the run hooks up with a criminal gang to commit a kidnapping. However, things don't go quite as planned.

Much ado about a painting of a made-up woman a French painter has visualized. When an American heiress who looks like the woman turns up, there is a possible scandal and a scramble to find the canvas, which has since disappeared.
The story of Makai Priestess Bikuu and her duties as a Darkness Hunter.

Fossil Ridge, once believed to be a cattle ranch is discovered to be a breeding ground for vicious prehistoric velociraptors. When the bloodthirsty dinosaurs escape, the townspeople must fight to survive the deadly raptors.

The contents of a memory card are presented in the exact order in which they were found. Beginning with a simple camping trip and ending in a bloodbath years later, the mystery of these video clips have never been solved.
A young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring. Her sister Windsor begins training under a respected ex-fighter as she searches for the killer.

Investigative reporter Ji-won begins to receive a series of menacing calls. To escape the terrifying and relentless clanging of the telephone, she changes her number and moves out. But the threatening campaign of terror continues unabated.

Ruthless gangster Guts pulls off a heist of diamonds, then enlists the aid of longtime triad member, Fei, to arrange a buyer for them. But when Guts double crosses the buyer, Fei ends up with the diamonds, wanted by both the cops and Guts.

column2: Big games, in search of three treasures
column3: Good friends accidentally enters a mysterious world. Two friends set out in search of three gems to unravel the mystery of Zolboo, which is full of fairy tales and is stuck in a dream world.
A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

A disgraced NYC Firefighter running from his shame attempts to start over in a small mountain town. To save himself, he must first save the town but is he prepared for one of the biggest forest fire "blowups" in modern memory?
In this experimental update of Jack and the Beanstalk (ital), a streetwise pot dealer is catapulted on a mystical adventure when he trades his father's gold watch for a pair of psychotropic seeds.
Dark secrets are revealed when three young hikers venture into remote canyon country in search of ancient Indian petroglyphs.

When an ancient statue is moved for display in Expo '70, a giant, vaguely Triceratops-like monster is released. The monster goes to Japan in pursuit of the statue and ends up battling Gamera, the giant flying turtle.
After her mother mysteriously goes missing, a young runaway tracks down her estranged father, convinced only he can decipher the secret meaning and story hidden in her mom's art and writing.
Majestic mountains, a still lake and venomous betrayals engulf a female married couple attempting to celebrate their one-year anniversary.

Two branches of the same family fight for the love of a handsome Spanish poacher, and to retrieve the location of a treasure hidden by an ancestor during WWII, which secret is guarded by Marthe, their spinster aunt.
A summer vacation where three friends spend together.

A former terrorist has started a lawful career, being a truck driver. On a trip he ignores the warnings given about the mafia, which leads to them setting fire to his truck, which has his wife on board. This has to be avenged.

Thomas is obsessed with mob culture and sets out to fix the 1992 trial of mob-boss John Gotti. He believes if the plan is executed, it will put him at the center of all that he idolizes. He wants to fit in and get attention.
Plot details are unavailable at this time.

Set in the post-apocalyptic dystopian red-light district of Tijuana, Mexico in the year 2050, a disabled veteran of the Second Mexican American War tries to recovers society-changing technology for a black market arms broker.
Chintamani is about a common man with uncommon achievements.
Four strangers, each of them possessing their own secrets, work together to pilot a crudely constructed submarine that is loaded with cocaine to safe harbor with the Coast Guard in pursuit.
To rekindle their love, a divorce judge orders a couple whose marriage is on the rocks to re-enact their four-day breakneck courtship.
A female warrior who was raised as a man joins a young samurai's quest to recover 48 of his body parts from 48 demons and to avenge her parents death.
Santa has to get a job as Santa to earn money to pay his overdue rent bill
A film about trusting your instincts. And it offers this advice: Listen to your inner voice. You never know who it might be.

Max lives in the United States, he loses all his money. He then returns to Lebanon, with his spoiled dog, and works as a security officer. He and his dog are placed in a situation where they need to rescue Nadia's kidnapped father.

A catastrophic volcanic eruption releases ancient dragon-like creatures on the surrounding areas. Scientists believe this could start a chain reaction of volcanic eruptions giving way to a global Dragon Apocalypse.
A mill owner in the Sudetenland and his family's lives are changed as Europe heats up in 1938.
Shekharan is a noble gangster and his trusted henchman is Madhvan. When the Kotturan brothers try to plot against Shekharan, Madhavan strives to save his employer from their evil intentions.
A scientist finds the secret that predispose to the formation of the ideal couple. With this new alchemy, he achieves a pioneering experience: the creation of a perfect androgynous.
A woman is murdered, but she is seen in different ways by different people.
A scientist battles an otherworldly Lunamancer for the soul of his sister, armed only with his faith and a crowbar.

Six friends. Six days. One ocean. They said it couldn't be done. Swimming from Cyprus to Israel, they broke more than a record- they broke through their past and their fears-and conquered an ocean that couldn't break them.
THE APPROACHING MARRIAGE OF A YOUNG DAUGHTER BRINGS BACK MEMORIES OF HOW HER PARENTS FOUGHT FOR THEIR LOVE.

Two brothers have half of a powerful ancient Chinese talisman. An evil gang leader has the other half, and determines to get the brothers' half and have a complete medallion so he can gain absolute power.

Tormented by his mother's suicide, an artist chases after fame and a temptress lured by a powerful art dealer to the brink of ruin. In a decadent world steeped in social injustice and wealth inequality, redemption and revenge collide.
The year is 1879. Gunfighters from the far reaches of the globe descend on the mining town of Religion, Arizona to compete in a legendary poker tournament.

A man goes to Mexico and tangles with bandits. His then called to a tiny European country where a revolution is going on. It turns out that he is heir to the throne and he manages to squelch the plotters and win the girl in short order.

Bahar's sister is a prostitute. A pervert is constantly killing women in the same area. Bahar, whose sister was killed, begins to act as a prostitute to catch the murderer and searches for the murderer.
When a bishop comes to a prison to hear the confession of an old friend he is forced to watch a play, performed by the inmates, about their youth together, love and betrayal.
An arranged marriage is interrupted by a rather personal problem.

When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.
17-year-old Emma joins a high-school cheerleading team when she moves to Australia with her dad who is a former Air Force Officer.

Between a four-year gap in the murder of a young girl, the daughter of a well-known sculptor is discovered dead, and her parents conduct an investigation, only to discover they are much out of their depth.
A Frenchwoman is taken hostage by an African tribe for months - can she escape ?
Blackfunk is a provocative urban tale of love, anger and pain. It is sensuous, yet daring and raw-filled with colorful characters and realistic issues.

Depressed single mom Adele and her son Henry offer a wounded, fearsome man a ride. As police search town for the escaped convict, the mother and son gradually learn his true story as their options become increasingly limited.
A love story centering on the connection between music and memory and how they transport us, sometimes literally.
A grieving father reaches the end of his rope, and decides to commit suicide.
A young woman has two distinct personalities, one of whom is evil and constantly gets her in trouble.
A disjointed young family sets out to Catalina Island looking to reconnect only to have an encounter of the sixth kind, struggling to survive unimaginable horror and find their way home.
When Niko's finances go astray, he hides out in thefamily house in the Greek mountain town of Siatista. Surrounded by ghosts of his past, Niko must uncover the mystery of his father's death.
Two childhood friends grow up differently to fall in love with the same woman.

Rookie field air support controller Kinney is embedded with a Delta Force team on a mission in the Philippines. When the team is trapped without weapons, the skills of Reaper, an Air Force drone pilot, become their only chance of survival.
Monterrey, Mexico 1979. A stolen sculpture sets off a series of events where two sleazy detectives are unexpectedly in the biggest case of their career.
BUS 31 is an upcoming feature film that follows the story of a 31-year-old bus driver takes his to be scrapped bus on a fantastic adventure.
The fate of all action figures rest in the hands of a few, poorly made knockoffs.

The two-hour scripted feature THE CANNIBAL IN THE JUNGLE follows the story of an American scientist who was convicted of killing and cannibalizing two colleagues in the jungles of Flores, Indonesia in 1977.

column2: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
column3: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.
There literally is none...
John Hawkwood, renown for his swordsmanship, is paid to lead various European armies during the Renaissance wars.
Carina Lau is a career-minded cop who will do anything to track down a vicious criminal.
The Saint returns to London and with the help of an American pickpocket and a beautiful adventuress breaks a counterfeiting ring.
THE FILM VINDICATES GOVERNMENT EFFORTS TO SOLVE THE PROBLEMS IN MINDANAO, ESPECIALLY THOSE THAT RELATE TO SECESSIONIST MOVEMENTS.

When a grave robber tries to barter with a strange antiques dealer, the two trade stories rather than goods. Tales of zombies, vampires, and ghosts are told upstairs while an unspeakable horror waits in the basement.
A young couple arrives at a mysterious mansion. Only one housekeeper lives here. The couple is killed the same night, and the other guests who arrive at the mansion over time will die the same.
An impoverished advocate faces challenges after he falls in love with a wealthy woman who has a look-alike courtesan sister.
A paranoid man begins videotaping the strange, unexplainable events happening around him.
After being released from prison, Tang Kat Yung exacts revenge on Li Ah Chai, in this sequel to Rich and Famous.
The Wanderer is the old king who is overthrown by his bodyguards, and he seeks vengeance for the murder of his queen while providing safety for the future of his comatose son.
The story of how a green-skinned woman framed by the Wizard of Oz becomes the Wicked Witch of the West. The first of a two-part feature film adaptation of the Broadway musical.
Plot kept under wraps.

Hani and her college friends are fond of playing pranks on other students. Their latest victim Puteri is so traumatized she almost kills herself. A masked killer starts to terrorize Hani and friends on the eve of her 25th birthday.

column2: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - The Movie
column3: Ultraman and his comrades from M-78 (including a new Ultraman, Zero, the son of Ultra Seven) join forces with other allies to fight a massive army of giant monsters led by the evil Ultraman Belial.

column2: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
column3: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.
The rivalry between two bounty hunters intensifies as they both attempt to track down a destructive device known as the "Hand of God."
With the help of a handsome young friend, a distraught young woman must figure out if she committed murder or not, while hiding-out in a rundown motel off a desert highway.
A scientist and his family return to the island of Rarotonga, the white goddess.
An adaptation of the famous Angélique character for the Ottoman Empire, involving sultan Deli Ibrahim (Ibrahim The Mad).
Kuroki, a journalist working for a newspaper, is investigating the clandestine sale of arms to Southeast Asia.
Kai, a woman born blind but granted "sight" with the help of an AI program called Bo(o). In time, Kai begins to question the influence that Bo(o) is having on her, and suspects manipulation.
A schizophrenic architect must embrace his madness in order to uncover the secrets of New York and prevent the Demiurge, an ancient Gnostic god that's imprisoned beneath the city, from escaping.

column2: Tsatsiki, Dad and the Olive War
column3: Tsatsiki's dad is forced to sell his beloved olive farm. Tsatsiki and his friends, Per-Hammar and Alva, has to find a way to save the olive farm from being sold to an evil corporation.
Will and Liz, Five Years later.
TRANSHUMANITY talks about us, about who we are as human beings and how different our life will be a mere 100 years from now.

A woman disappeared. After a snowstorm, her car is discovered on a road to a small remote village. While the police don't know where to start, five people are linked to the disappearance. Each one with his or her own secret.

Beautiful twin sisters living in London soon discover that the feelings and actions of one physically and mentally affects the other in drastic and often horrifying ways, in this updated retelling of A Picture Of Dorian Grey.

Around the time that the chief of police is elected the Most Popular Citizen of Valleby, a thief and impostor is released after two decades in jail and returns to the town with a revenge plan in mind.
Senior detective Yang Zhigang investigates the murder of a government official found dead in a Jiangcheng brothel at the end of World War II.
Two teenagers and a cat try to enjoy a quiet afternoon by a peaceful looking lake in Tel Aviv.

Cosmos is a bus driver traveling to Spain. After the bus breaks down at a rest area. Passengers are picked up by another bus, but Cosmos is left alone with his coach. He has no light, no water, and no food.

column2: Kamen Rider Saber: Trio of Deep Sin
column3: Eight years after the battle for the Book of Omniscience, the peaceful lives of Touma, Rintaro, Mei and Kento are troubled by a mysterious new Falchion who can seemingly erase people from existence altogether.
Three episodes of a police nature, one of them starring Maigret and the other Lemmy Caution.
A paid assassin working for the biker gangs of Quebec outsmarts both the police and the underworld for decades, committing 28 hits over 25 years.
In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.
An illiterate village girl defies the customs of her tribe, discriminatory to women, only to become the spark of a Literary Revolution.
When a deadly age-warping virus infects a race of vampires, the last remaining humans are forced to join them to save the innocent blood of a child.

A Halloween anthology. Katherine's husband died a year ago, she hasn't been out much nor seen her friends in a long time. She invites them over Halloween night to gather around and tell scary stories like they used to when they were kids.
The film tells the story of the Tarsans who used to live in the forest now living in the city. This film is inspired by the Tarzan story.
The President's daughter uses her extraterrestrial influence to spare the fate of a children's shelter in Los Angeles.
A young Frenchman arrives in Northern California looking to forget a lost love and ends up encountering various forms of feminine power.
In 1881, in Algeria, Michael Denning and Hector Servadac are fighting a duel when a comet brushing Earth takes the two men to the Moon where they discover a prehistoric civilization.
An emotionally damaged teen struggles to deal with a secret he can not tell anyone.
After the brutal murder of Damien's family he begins to seek out revenge on the man responsible.
A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family where the patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife.
A yeti-like monster is stalking the mountains of rural Mexico, sometimes displaying the powers of hypnosis. It ultimately plays a part in destroying two shady characters.

column2: Kanang Anak Langkau The Iban Warrior
column3: A film based on true story of Sergeant Kanang Anak Langkau, an iban warrior and the nation's most decorated war hero, who fought bravely during communist insurgency.
A murder witness becomes the target of a pair of sociopaths.

Lifelong friends Neil and Gilbert's undeniable bond is tested to the limits when Neil makes a magical wish that comes true. With the assistance of Neil's charismatic neighbor, Jimmy, and Gilbert's wild ideas, Neil endures one epic night.

High up on a mountain peak surrounded by clouds, a secret Yeti society lives in peace and harmony. One day, a Yeti witnesses an airplane crash; Inside lies "Smallfoot", a legendary creature that will rock the society to its core.

column2: All the Colors in My Darkness
column3: A desperate woman and her husband travel to a rural fertility commune where they fall under the sway of the group's enigmatic matriarch, only to become entangled in a web of long-buried secrets which reveal dark truths in both of them.

WW2, December 1942, four children on the run. Sarah and Daniel are Jews about to be deported, but hide in the cellar of Otto and Gerda, until they are discovered and their parents are arrested. They have to get to faraway neutral Sweden.
This drama is inspired on a real event in 1990 when 49 political prisoners escaped from a tunnel that took 18 months to dig.
A small group of video streamers rent out an abandoned theater as their base, the townspeople and local enforcement are not so sure of this group or their intentions.
Set in the Anti-Japanese War, Chinese archaeologists and patriots fight to protect the national treasure.

After Santa rejects his wife's idea for a line of eco-friendly toys, Mrs. Claus (Monica) leaves home to pursue her own dreams and ends up taking a job as a nanny to two young children in, of all places, Santa Monica.
Homicidal sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo is tasked with escorting a mobster to Malta. When the prisoner escapes, Geronimo goes to catch him.

Vijay (chiranjeevi) has a habit of accepting challenges; his friend Chanti throws a challenge at him to kill a professor. The challenge turns ugly when the professor is killed for real and the blame falls on Vijay.

Ling is a fashion columnist whose ex-boyfriend died in a car accident. Debt collectors Fei and Ma are eyewitnesses on the scene and Fei is certain that Peter's death is more than just an accident. The weird and suspicious act.
One of the main players in Italian politics, Aldo Moro, gets kidnapped and murdered by terrorists. One judge finds evidence that sheds dangerous new light on the case.
A dangerous cocaine dealer embarks on a surprising journey by unwillingly duplicating his daily criminal routine through an extensive range of emotional behaviors.
It tells the story of of a mother named Cheryl whose daughter is nowhere to be found. Authorities and media dismiss her as a runaway while focusing on another missing girl, who is white.

Late-1960s suburban Canadian children work on building a rocket vessel, with the intention of delivering one or two neighborhood children to the moon, whilst dealing with social issues of the coming-of-age, orphan-hood and family veins.
On industrial relations and socialist competition. As always in Soviet films, labor processes develop against the backdrop of intricately intertwined love stories.

As the local mob destroys the life of a big family and leaves them on the brink of survival, a powerful, yet secret love burns between Marko, a local gangster and Angela, young daughter of the betrayed father.
An entertaining sci-fi thriller with plenty of action, drama, humor, and bits of gor, Lizard Boy raises questions about modern genetics while harkening back to the monster movies of old.
Betrayed on a high risk mission to uncover the key players in a terrorist network, Special Forces officer Simon Carter and the secretive Division 9 discover the enemy comes from within.
A neglected young man wishes to be invisible and the wish comes true. However in an attempt to get his ladylove, he gets in the bad books of police who wants him dead.

"DopeSmack" follows Alex Santos, a self-taught scientist, who develops a bulletproof suit and receives superhuman powers that allow him to battle super-villains, fight for his city, avenge his father's death and rescue the ones he loves.
A yacht in the English channel is helped to port - when the police arrive there are no crew, no papers and no clues. What is the mystery of the ghost ship?
A struggling young woman is implanted with an experimental AI chip. She must fight to survive when it takes control.
It tells the story of Maestro Mouse and his adventures as he traverses the globe, recruiting an orchestra like no other.

Everything changes for Aarav when he gets involved in a road accident. A wrong decision takes him on a journey darker than his wildest dreams. Loved by a father, pampered by a friend and chased by a cop, will he be able to find redemption?
A newly widowed mother returns to her father's isolated hotel, where a sinister folklore presence stalks the land.

A newly widowed man embarks on a sailing trip from LA to Hawaii and employs an eager young couple to crew his luxurious boat. Shortly after setting sail, the chemistry of the crew begins to shift, as does their original motivations.

When Tanju's mother is killed crossing the road, he begins a journey through the seven stages of grief. Living in the dangerous underworld of Mirpur, he encounters Murad - a corrupt policeman with a sinister plan for his young charge.
Amid a series of brutal killings of Indian agents in London, a RAW officer and India's Ambassador to Great Britain race against time to find the traitor within their own ranks.
Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.
A group of thieves meticulously plans a daring heist to steal a priceless diamond from a heavily guarded museum facing intricate security systems and rival criminals who also seek the precious gem.
Shiva and Athulya try to make their long-distance relationship work. However, Athulya's colleague Karthik develops feelings for her, which complicates the bond between them.
A capuchin monkey helps Katie, a young teenager, overcome her depression after her mother dies.

column2: Do You See What I See
column3: An idealistic Australian student navigates rising political tensions at an elite college in the USA as a masked killer unleashes hell on Halloween.
Across different eras, a poor family, an anxious developer and a fed-up landlady become tied to the same mysterious house in this animated dark comedy.
A group of teens discovers secret plans for a time machine, and construct one. However, things start to get out of control.

Forest Scientist Sonia is torn from her ivory tower and thrown between the cross fires of an international mafia gang and multinational energy enterprises as she secretly conducts research in a restricted area in the Canadian wilderness.
The Chipmunks compete with the Chipettes in a round the world race.
A horror film based on an urban legend

Archaeologist Kirsten Scott travels to Slovakia to view a priest's diary, from the 1700s. It holds clues to a burial site, deep in the mountains. The thrill of discovery turns to horror, as the tomb contains something not quite dead.
A family struggles to repel a Caribbean evil spirit who haunts their house.
Secret agent Nam-kung infiltrates a North Korean operation in Japan that is responsible for kidnapping travelling South Korean and taking them to Pyeongyang
A San Francisco attorney (Dean Martin) is hired to defend a black militant accused of murder.
An Iranian jeweler who helped arrest a thief discovers that the culprit has been released from prison and is out for revenge.
Justin owes a debt to a ruthless drug dealer. A dangerous cult urges him to repay his debts by submitting to a gory and invasive procedure. Trading soft flesh for hard cash may be his only way out.
Ryan, a good-natured slacker, is tempted into a money laundering scheme while working for a lottery magazine. A capitalistic comedy that asks the question - when is "enough" enough?
People from various walks of life find themselves held captive in a desolate area surrounding a secret government installation rumored to contain extraterrestrial life.

An old Gothic cathedral built over a mass grave develops strange powers that trap a number of people inside with ghosts from a 12th Century massacre seeking to resurrect an ancient demon from the bowels of the Earth.

column2: Pettson and Findus: Findus Moves House
column3: The old man Petterson is trying to sleep but his cat Findus is keeping him awake, so they both agree that Findus shall have his own house. Based on the beloved books by Sven Nordqvist.
Van Helsing is called upon to help save a missing girl and her friends from a hoard of demons.

A young attorney cannot defend himself against accusations that he murdered his business partner, as he has no memory of the night it happened. A fraternity pin found at the scene of the crime becomes the key to solving the mystery.
A story that revolves around three sisters who live in their grandmother's home and the arrival of their thirteen-year-old half sister.
A group of friends try to keep their heads straight on New Year's Eve as unexplainable events begin to occur, causing hysteria, paranoia, and distrust between them.

A new, single, young doctor comes to town, taking over from a retiring doctor. The young women are excited and the old women have something to gossip about. He proves to be honest, competent and reliable. Who's the lucky lady?

One of the world's top bodyguards gets a new client, a world class hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial alive and on time.
Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.

A young couple announces their wedding at a party with friends. The reactions of the latter reveal hitherto unexpressed sentimental flaws within the group. The following days, the tension rises to the surface.

Believing that a German spy has killed her new husband (Franchot Tone), a struggling chorus girl (Jean Harlow) flees to Paris where she meets and marries a World War I pilot (Cary Grant), whose carefree ways bring unexpected results.
In March 1914, a mining engineer named Richard Hannay tries to prevent Prussian Agents from executing a political assassination designed to trigger World War I.

On the day of his girlfriend's marriage, Gautam gets kidnapped by an unknown criminal. Bored on the way to the kidnapper's den, Gautam is forced to narrate his cute love story which is filled with loads of twists and turns.

Alexr is coming from the West to Belgrade for the restitution of his family's property and with the intent of making an opera. As pressure mounts, so does his obsession with his anarchist psychiatrist as he faces mental breakdown.
This portrays harmony and friction involving oriental and Mediterranean factions, both proficient at martial artistry, but one is dabbling in illicit dealings fronted by a nightclub.
In war-torn Eastern Europe, a mysterious businessman hires a group of mercenaries on a routine mission to protect him not knowing of the long-hidden secret that lies there.
A man becomes involved in a turbulent crime streak after kidnapping a woman
Follows two British officers, Harry Jones and Cedric Hill, who escape from a remote Turkish P.O.W. camp by using a Ouija board.
Sequel of 'Attack the Block'.
After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.
Business partners plan to gift a third of share to their children, if they marry, the offspring refusing to the marriage loses the portion. The children have other ideas.
When the coolest guy in school discovers that the new girl sees through his popularity and good looks, he enlists the class nerd to take over his social media accounts to add substance to his style.

Following his mother's death, the protagonist returns from the US to his ancestral home to fulfill his mother's last wish. Upon arrival he understands that the world of black magic and sorcery he heard as stories were not far from real.

Alain is a boxer in 1925 Marseille, France. When he doesn't take the dive paid to take by a mob boss, he has to split. He joins the Foreign Legion and is sent to Morocco. He makes 3 friends and they watch each other's backs.

A team of martial arts and weapon masters, led by the revenge-seeking Aika, hunt down and destroy yakuza organizations in Japan. When they meet up with the Black Bullet organization, however, they may have met their match.
Teenaged boy Ricky needs to uncover the mystery behind a murderous psychopath known as the Axeman.
A young man inherits the family home only to be hunted by entities fixed on revenge for crimes committed by his great grandfather 50 years ago.
Robot 13 is created so Adrian has a friend, but the metal marvel teaches the whole community what it means to have a heart.
When normal kids try to be famous, it becomes a comedy. And where there is a comedy, tragedy is not too far behind. A story about friendship and loss set in Arizona.
Feature adaptation of Hajime Isayama's manga about a monster hunter out for revenge.
An imprisoned criminal rats out his former boss for one last chance to reunite his family and become the father he never was.
A man visits a small town hoping to investigate the creation of a machine that is said to visualize your consciousness. Upon arriving he finds the machine has created controversy among the townsfolk.
Wrongly accused man fights to clear his name and uncover the real killer, as 'Damaged' streams it live on dark web in BLAMED.
When a group of friends come across an abandoned house in the barren desert, what follows is a terrifying tale of evil possession causing the friends to slowly turn against each other.
Greta's dad Tom is moving the family cross-country in a dented station wagon, promising a California paradise to his kids. All that's missing is Mom.
Follows a woman as her life gets upended when an engagement ring that was for someone else leads her to the person she's meant to be with.
Pursued by the big-time gambler he robbed, John Muller assumes a new identity, with unfortunate results.

A girl is about to inherit a fortune, but she is missing in Africa. Only then, family charges Congo Bill, an adventurer, to find her, and bring her back to civilization. He follows a legend about some White Queen, but his path is full of difficulties, by an inhospitable jungle, and the man who will lose the fortune if the girl is found alive.
A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.
A serial killer in Los Angeles celebrates Jack the Ripper's 100th birthday by committing similar murders and only one has a chance of stopping him.
Shot in one single take with no cuts, Rendez-vous is an original Mexican thriller about a couple who meet online.

column2: Don't Go Into the House by the Woods
column3: A young man goes to his parents house over the weekend and is scared to death when he starts to receive phone calls from a psycho who might be inside the house.
Two businessmen, a prostitute, a hitman and a gang of thugs all fight over the ransom money of a kidnapping.

A group of friends find themselves the captors of a sadistic madman when they stumble upon an underground torture chamber filled with unspeakable horrors while hatching a plan to get revenge on the bully who has been tormenting them.
A gender-swapped retelling of Charles Perrault's classic, where Cinderfella is visited by a fairy godfather to help him escape from his wicked stepmother and stepbrothers.
Juliette, a lone survivor of an apocalyptic era, fights to survive against hunger, thirst, a broken leg and strange, disturbing creatures that only come out at nighttime.
A group of Chinese youths living in Japan struggle to make their way in life and eventually find trouble with the local crime syndicate.
Accidentally sent to China, out little hero needs to not only find his way in a foreign place he suddenly finally finds himself in but also to help his friends before he can return home.

column2: The Girl Who Ventured West, a Johnny Appleseed Story
column3: After losing her parents, job, and relationship; Finn, a pessimistic paralegal struggling to find her own path, finds herself swept up in a westbound adventure of American Folklore, led by none other than a modern day Johnny Appleseed.

Story of a promising high school basketball star and his relationships with two brothers, one a drug dealer and the other a former basketball star fallen on hard times and now employed as a security guard.

column2: Eternal Love of Su-il and Sun-ae
column3: Sim Sun-ae leaves Lee Su-il and marries the rich man Kim Chung-bae. Lee Su-il takes a job with a Japanese moneylender to collect money from his borrowers. Soon, Sun-ae fell ill because she could not forget Lee Su-il.
When his father is murdered, erstwhile conman Nick Darrow asks the cops if he can go undercover to find the killers, and maybe even stop a crime ring that has been plaguing the police.
A gang of men are searching for an alien life form.
A trilogy of three improbable stories of horror and the supernatural are combined into this low budget thriller: "That's the Way to Do It," "Dreamhouse,," and "Do You Believe in Fairies?"
Two cops investigating the murder of a young boy become invloved in a very secret project involving alien life. Needless to say, the authorities don't want them to stick their noses into this.
After saying "no" on her wedding day, Joice leaves the Ivory Coast to start a new life in Guangzhou, China.

'Holidays' is an anthology feature film that puts a uniquely dark and original spin on some of the most iconic and beloved holidays of all time by challenging our folklore, traditions and assumptions.
A couple endures a series of mishaps right before their wedding day.
From the strange horizon he came - bringing justice to a place of violence and greed.

An exploration of British history, culture and society since King Arthur. It opens on two protagonists dressed in white presenting and arguing their views on the 10 rules that really govern Great Britain and the United Kingdom.

Astronaut Kathryn Voss, sole survivor of a disastrous space mission, is desperate to reunite with her terminally ill daughter but becomes a fugitive when the government discovers she's returned to earth with an extraordinary gift.
A satanic cult chooses an unwitting young girl as its new queen.
